Before_IN this_DT correspondence_NN took_VBD place_NN the_DT Lieutenant-Gover-_NNP nor_CC had_VBD already_RB had_VBN under_IN consideration_NN the_DT question_NN of_IN modifying_VBG some_DT of_IN the_DT regulations_NNS issued_VBN under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ,_, 1897_CD ,_, in_IN the_DT light_NN of_IN the_DT experience_NN gained_VBN in_IN combating_VBG plague_NN in_IN Western_JJ India_NNP ._.

3_CD ._.
While_IN these_DT points_NNS were_VBD being_VBG considered_VBN ,_, representations_NNS were_VBD received_VBN from_IN the_DT Muhammadan_NNP community_NN and_CC the_DT Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Association_NNP on_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN the_DT regulations_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP came_VBD in_IN various_JJ ways_NNS to_TO the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP 's_POS notice_NN that_IN some_DT alarm_NN had_VBD been_VBN caused_VBN among_IN both_DT Hindus_NNP and_CC Muhammadans_NNPS by_IN the_DT prospect_NN of_IN the_DT existing_VBG plague_NN regulations_NNS ,_, especially_RB those_DT relating_VBG to_TO segregation_NN ,_, being_VBG brought_VBN into_IN force_NN ._.

8_CD ._.
*_RB 4_CD ._.
Just_RB as_IN the_DT regulation_NN was_VBD ready_JJ for_IN publication_NN ,_, Dr._NNP Lowson_NNP arrived_VBD in_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP thought_VBD it_PRP right_VBD to_TO consult_VB him_PRP on_IN the_DT subject_NN ._.

*_NN It_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN that_IN in_IN his_PRP$ opinion_NN the_DT system_NN of_IN home_NN segregation_NN authorised_VBN by_IN rule_NN 31_CD of_IN the_DT draft_NN regula-_JJ tion_NN is_VBZ likely_JJ to_TO prove_VB absolutely_RB ineffectual_JJ in_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN even_RB a_DT few_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN occurring_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN to_TO proceed_VB on_IN these_DT lines_NNS is_VBZ to_TO court_NN disaster_NN ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP fully_RB recognises_VBZ the_DT social_JJ and_CC political_JJ objections_NNS to_TO enforcing_VBG immediate_JJ removal_NN to_TO hospitals_NNS and_CC segregation_NN camps_NNS ,_, and_CC at_IN first_RB he_PRP declined_VBD to_TO modify_VB the_DT regulation_NN to_TO meet_VB Dr._NNP Lowson_NNP 's_POS views_NNS ;_: but_CC after_IN once_RB more_JJR per-_JJ sonally_RB discussing_VBG the_DT question_NN with_IN him_PRP ,_, Sir_NNP Alexander_NNP Mackenzie_NNP is_VBZ driven_VBN to_TO the_DT conclusion_NN that_IN no_DT system_NN of_IN home-segregation_NN could_MD be_VB successfully_RB worked_VBN in_IN Calcutta_NNP ._.
It_PRP would_MD seem_VB to_TO be_VB unwise_JJ to_TO reject_VB the_DT teaching_NN of_IN experience_NN in_IN a_DT matter_NN of_IN this_DT importance_NN ,_, and_CC Dr._NNP Lowson_NNP attributes_VBZ much_RB of_IN the_DT mortality_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP to_TO futile_VB efforts_NNS in_IN this_DT direction_NN in_IN the_DT early_JJ stages_NNS of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, and_CC failure_NN to_TO realise_VB the_DT imperative_JJ necessity_NN of_IN isolating_VBG at_IN the_DT earliest_JJS *_NN Not_RB printed_VBN ._.

Measures_NNS outside_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.
5_CD possible_JJ stage_NN all_DT sources_NNS of_IN infection_NN ._.
His_PRP$ Honour_NNP is_VBZ disposed_VBN ,_, therefore_RB ,_, to_TO substitute_VB for_IN rule_NN 31_CD the_DT following_NN :_: -_: ``_`` If_IN on_IN examination_NN of_IN a_DT sick_JJ person_NN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP suspects_VBZ that_IN such_JJ person_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG from_IN or_CC infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ,_, he_PRP may_MD cause_VB such_JJ person_NN to_TO be_VB removed_VBN to_TO a_DT hospital_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD arrange_VB for_IN his_PRP$ detention_NN ,_, dieting_VBG and_CC medical_JJ treatment_NN therein_NN ._.
He_PRP may_MD also_RB cause_VB the_DT other_JJ occupants_NNS of_IN the_DT house_NN in_IN which_WDT such_JJ person_NN resides_NNS to_TO be_VB removed_VBN to_TO a_DT segregation_NN camp_NN and_CC to_TO be_VB detained_VBN under_IN observation_NN for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS ._.
``_`` When_WRB particular_JJ castes_NNS or_CC classes_NNS of_IN the_DT community_NN have_VBP constructed_VBN at_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ cost_NN private_JJ hospitals_NNS and_CC segregation_NN camps_NNS ,_, the_DT site_NN and_CC plan_NN of_IN which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN approved_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, and_CC have_VBP arranged_VBN ,_, to_TO that_DT officer_NN 's_POS satisfac-_JJ tion_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT medical_JJ administration_NN of_IN such_JJ hospitals_NNS and_CC camps_NNS ,_, sick_JJ or_CC suspected_JJ persons_NNS may_MD ,_, if_IN they_PRP so_VBP desire_JJ and_CC if_IN accommodation_NN is_VBZ available_JJ ,_, be_VB removed_VBN to_TO the_DT private_JJ hospital_NN or_CC segregation_NN camp_NN constructed_VBN for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT caste_NN or_CC class_NN to_TO which_WDT they_PRP belong_VBP instead_RB of_IN to_TO a_DT public_JJ hospital_NN or_CC camp_NN ._.
``_`` In_IN both_DT public_JJ and_CC private_JJ camps_NNS and_CC hospitals_NNS separate_JJ and_CC suitable_JJ accom-_JJ modation_NN shall_MD be_VB provided_VBN for_IN females_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN a_DT female_NN who_WP ,_, by_IN the_DT custom_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN does_VBZ not_RB appear_VB in_IN public_JJ ,_, her_PRP$ parda_JJ shall_MD be_VB strictly_RB preserved_VBN both_DT in_IN removal_NN to_TO the_DT camp_NN or_CC hospital_NN and_CC during_IN her_PRP$ stay_NN there_RB ._.
The_DT friends_NNS and_CC servants_NNS of_IN sick_JJ persons_NNS shall_MD be_VB permitted_VBN to_TO accompany_VB them_PRP to_TO hos-_JJ pital_NN ,_, but_CC shall_MD be_VB subject_JJ to_TO the_DT same_JJ rules_NNS as_IN regards_NNS segregation_NN as_IN if_IN they_PRP were_VBD sick_JJ themselves_PRP ._. ''_''
5_CD ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ believes_VBZ that_IN the_DT above_JJ rule_NN con-_JJ cedes_NNS everything_NN that_WDT can_MD reasonably_RB be_VB demanded_VBN by_IN the_DT higher_JJR classes_NNS of_IN Hindus_NNP and_CC Muhammadans_NNPS ._.
If_IN ,_, as_IN Dr._NNP Lowson_NNP has_VBZ urged_VBN ,_, the_DT hospitals_NNS and_CC camps_NNS are_VBP established_VBN in_IN available_JJ open_JJ spaces_NNS near_IN the_DT houses_NNS of_IN the_DT sufferers_NNS ,_, but_CC little_JJ hardship_NN will_MD be_VB involved_VBN in_IN insisting_VBG on_IN removal_NN thereto_NN ._.
As_IN ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT Government_NNP of_IN the_DT North-Western_JJ Provinces_NNP has_VBZ adopted_VBN what_WP Dr._NNP Lowson_NNP declares_VBZ to_TO be_VB a_DT hopelessly_RB impracticable_JJ scheme_NN of_IN home-segregation_NN ,_, and_CC has_VBZ thereby_VBN greatly_RB increased_VBD the_DT political_JJ difficulty_NN of_IN introducing_VBG more_RBR stringent_JJ measures_NNS ,_, I_PRP am_VBP desired_VBN to_TO submit_VB the_DT question_NN for_IN the_DT orders_NNS of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP is_VBZ not_RB prepared_JJ to_TO adopt_VB a_DT system_NN which_WDT the_DT expert_NN placed_VBD at_IN his_PRP$ disposal_NN declares_VBZ to_TO be_VB fatal_JJ in_IN its_PRP$ results_NNS and_CC condemned_VBN by_IN all_DT ex-_JJ perience_NN ._.
There_EX appear_VB to_TO be_VB three_CD possible_JJ courses_NNS open_VBP to_TO us_PRP :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) To_TO enact_VB the_DT draft_NN regulation_NN as_IN it_PRP stands_VBZ ,_, trusting_VBG that_IN the_DT plague_NN may_MD not_RB reach_VB Calcutta_NNP and_CC Howrah_NNP ,_, or_CC ,_, if_IN it_PRP does_VBZ ,_, that_IN the_DT clause_NN requiring_VBG deposit_NN of_IN the_DT cost_NN as_IN a_DT condition_NN precedent_NN to_TO house-segregation_NN will_MD deter_VB all_DT but_CC a_DT few_JJ families_NNS from_IN applying_VBG for_IN the_DT privilege_NN ._.
It_PRP may_MD be_VB added_VBN that_DT should_MD an_DT outbreak_NN occur_VBP the_DT panic_NN would_MD be_VB so_RB great_JJ that_IN the_DT most_RBS stringent_JJ measures_NNS might_MD then_RB be_VB adopted_VBN without_IN provoking_VBG resistance_NN ,_, but_CC by_IN the_DT time_NN the_DT disease_NN had_VBD spread_VBN to_TO the_DT extent_NN of_IN causing_VBG a_DT panic_NN it_PRP would_MD probably_RB be_VB too_RB late_JJ for_IN segregation_NN to_TO be_VB of_IN any_DT use_NN ._.

(_( 2_CD )_) To_TO enact_VB the_DT draft_NN regulation_NN ,_, substituting_VBG for_IN rule_NN 31_CD the_DT draft_NN rule_NN given_VBN above_IN ._.

6_CD and_CC rule_VB 3_CD of_IN Regulation_NNP No_NNP ._.

8_CD ,_, but_CC under_IN executive_JJ orders_NNS issued_VBD some_DT months_NNS ago_IN ,_, all_PDT the_DT chief_JJ mufassal_NN municipalities_NNS have_VBP done_VBN as_RB much_JJ general_JJ clean-_NN ing_VBG up_RP as_IN their_PRP$ funds_NNS permitted_VBN ,_, while_IN in_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, as_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP are_VBP aware_JJ ,_, a_DT special_JJ staff_NN has_VBZ been_VBN employed_VBN since_IN last_JJ October_NNP to_TO remove_VB accumulations_NNS of_IN filth_NN ._.

3_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT second_JJ place_NN representations_NNS were_VBD received_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bengal_NNP from_IN the_DT Muhammadan_NNP community_NN and_CC the_DT Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Association_NNP on_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN the_DT regulations_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP came_VBD in_IN various_JJ ways_NNS to_TO the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP 's_POS notice_NN that_IN some_DT alarm_NN had_VBD been_VBN caused_VBN among_IN both_DT Hindus_NNP and_CC Muhammadans_NNPS by_IN the_DT prospect_NN of_IN the_DT existing_VBG plague_NN regulations_NNS ,_, especially_RB those_DT relating_VBG to_TO segregation_NN ,_, being_VBG brought_VBN into_IN force_NN ._.
After_IN considering_VBG the_DT objections_NNS taken_VBN to_TO the_DT existing_VBG rules_NNS and_CC consulting_VBG the_DT heads_NNS of_IN the_DT native_JJ community_NN ,_, the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bengal_NNP drew_VBD up_RP a_DT new_JJ draft_NN regulation_NN numbered_VBD 8_CD ,_, a_DT copy_NN of_IN which_WDT is_VBZ forwarded_VBN with_IN your_PRP$ letter_NN ._.
Rule_NNP 31_CD of_IN this_DT draft_NN deals_VBZ with_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN segregation_NN ,_, and_CC provides_VBZ that_IN the_DT isolation_NN of_IN the_DT sick_NN may_MD be_VB carried_VBN out_IN in_IN ,_, or_CC in_IN the_DT immediate_JJ neighbourhood_NN of_IN ,_, their_PRP$ own_JJ homes_NNS ,_, if_IN there_EX is_VBZ suitable_JJ accommodation_NN for_IN such_JJ isolation_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN a_DT sum_NN sufficient_NN to_TO meet_VB the_DT probable_JJ expenses_NNS of_IN isolation_NN is_VBZ deposited_VBN ._.
Just_RB as_IN the_DT regulation_NN was_VBD ready_JJ for_IN publication_NN ,_, Dr._NNP Lowson_NNP arrived_VBD in_IN Bengal_NNP and_CC the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP consulted_VBD him_PRP on_IN the_DT subject_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Lowson_NNP expressed_VBD views_NNS strongly_RB adverse_VBP to_TO the_DT proposed_VBN system_NN of_IN home-_JJ segregation_NN which_WDT he_PRP considered_VBD likely_JJ to_TO prove_VB absolutely_RB ineffectual_JJ in_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN even_RB a_DT few_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN occurring_NN ._.
His_PRP$ Honour_CD the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP ,_, after_IN discussing_VBG the_DT question_NN with_IN Dr._NNP Lowson_NNP ,_, was_VBD driven_VBN to_TO the_DT conclusion_NN that_IN no_DT system_NN of_IN home-segre-_JJ gation_NN could_MD be_VB successfully_RB worked_VBN in_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, and_CC is_VBZ disposed_VBN to_TO substitute_VB for_IN rule_NN 31_CD of_IN draft_NN Notification_NNP No_NNP ._.
8_CD ,_, the_DT rule_NN set_VBN forth_NN in_IN paragraph_JJ 4_CD of_IN your_PRP$ letter_NN ._.
That_DT rule_NN provides_VBZ for_IN the_DT compulsory_NN removal_NN of_IN all_DT persons_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN ,_, or_CC infected_VBN with_IN ,_, plague_NN to_TO a_DT plague_JJ hospital_NN maintained_VBD either_CC by_IN the_DT Government_NNP or_CC by_IN some_DT particular_JJ caste_NN or_CC class_NN of_IN the_DT community_NN ._.
His_PRP$ Honour_CD the_DT Lieutenant-_NNP Governor_NNP submits_VBZ the_DT question_NN for_IN the_DT orders_NNS of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP with_IN the_DT remark_NN that_IN he_PRP is_VBZ not_RB prepared_JJ to_TO adopt_VB a_DT system_NN which_WDT the_DT expert_NN placed_VBD at_IN his_PRP$ disposal_NN declares_VBZ to_TO be_VB fatal_JJ in_IN its_PRP$ resultsand_NN condemned_VBN by_IN all_DT experience_NN ._.
8_CD Measures_NNS outside_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
VII_NNP ._.
4_CD ._.
I_PRP am_VBP in_IN the_DT first_JJ place_NN to_TO explain_VB that_IN Dr._NNP Lowson_NNP is_VBZ in_IN no_DT sense_NN the_DT representative_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ._.
The_DT Govern-_NNP ment_NN of_IN India_NNP have_VBP never_RB expressed_VBN their_PRP$ adherence_NN to_TO his_PRP$ views_NNS ,_, nor_CC have_VBP they_PRP accredited_VBD him_PRP to_TO Local_NNP Governments_NNP with_IN the_DT object_NN of_IN expressing_VBG to_TO them_PRP the_DT views_NNS of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ._.
The_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP informed_VBD the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP that_WDT Dr._NNP Lowson_NNP 's_POS experience_NN had_VBD been_VBN useful_JJ ,_, and_CC suggested_VBD that_IN other_JJ Local_JJ Governments_NNS might_MD wish_VB to_TO avail_VB themselves_PRP of_IN it_PRP ._.
The_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP had_VBD no_DT objection_NN and_CC circulated_VBD the_DT suggestion_NN ._.
But_CC it_PRP was_VBD no_DT part_NN of_IN their_PRP$ intentions_NNS that_IN the_DT Local_JJ Governments_NNS should_MD do_VB more_JJR than_IN consider_JJR on_IN its_PRP$ merits_NNS any_DT suggestion_NN Dr._NNP Lowson_NNP might_MD make_VB ,_, and_CC the_DT danger_NN of_IN following_VBG his_PRP$ advice_NN without_IN giving_VBG full_JJ considera-_JJ tion_NN to_TO aspects_NNS of_IN the_DT question_NN which_WDT would_MD not_RB occur_VB to_TO him_PRP is_VBZ illustrat-_JJ ed_NN by_IN the_DT tone_NN of_IN his_PRP$ letter_NN of_IN June_NNP 1st_CD ,_, and_CC by_IN his_PRP$ condemnation_NN of_IN the_DT rules_NNS prescribed_VBN for_IN the_DT North-Western_JJ Provinces_NNS and_CC Oudh_NNP ._.

5_CD ._.

On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, it_PRP must_MD take_VB into_IN account_NN the_DT state_NN of_IN feeling_NN in_IN the_DT province_NN and_CC the_DT extent_NN to_TO which_WDT political_JJ disaffection_NN and_CC disorder_NN are_VBP to_TO be_VB apprehended_VBN from_IN the_DT enforcement_NN of_IN a_DT rule_NN rendering_VBG every_DT person_NN suspected_VBN of_IN suffering_VBG from_IN ,_, or_CC being_VBG infected_VBN with_IN ,_, plague_NN liable_JJ to_TO be_VB sent_VBN to_TO hospital_NN ._.
The_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT information_NN at_IN present_JJ before_IN him_PRP ,_, is_VBZ disposed_VBN to_TO agree_VB that_DT segregation_NN is_VBZ the_DT best_JJS pre-_JJ ventive_JJ measure_NN that_WDT can_MD be_VB devised_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN if_IN it_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB enforced_VBN in_IN a_DT place_NN like_IN Calcutta_NNP segregation_NN in_IN hospital_NN is_VBZ essential_JJ for_IN the_DT greater_JJR part_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN likely_RB to_TO be_VB affected_VBN ._.

3_CD ._.

4_CD ._.
The_DT entire_JJ regulation_NN was_VBD laid_VBN before_IN the_DT meeting_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT dis-_JJ cussion_NN was_VBD confined_VBN to_TO the_DT provisions_NNS relating_VBG to_TO segregation_NN ,_, and_CC none_NN of_IN the_DT other_JJ rules_NNS were_VBD objected_VBN to_TO ._.

Measures_NNS outside_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.
11_CD (_( b_NN )_) ``_`` that_DT inmates_VBZ of_IN infected_JJ houses_NNS should_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO remain_VB under_IN observation_NN ten_JJ days_NNS in_IN any_DT uninfected_JJ houses_NNS chosen_VBN by_IN themselves_PRP and_CC approved_VBD of_IN by_IN medical_JJ experts_NNS at_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ expense_NN ._. ''_''
5_CD ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP is_VBZ clearly_RB of_IN opinion_NN that_IN neither_DT of_IN these_DT proposals_NNS can_MD be_VB accepted_VBN ._.
Their_PRP$ practical_JJ result_NN would_MD be_VB to_TO introduce_VB home-segregation_NN on_IN a_DT large_JJ scale_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO multiply_VB the_DT so-_NN called_VBN ``_`` hospitals_NNS ''_'' to_TO such_PDT an_DT extent_NN that_IN no_DT effective_JJ control_NN could_MD be_VB exercised_VBN over_IN the_DT intercourse_NN of_IN plague_NN patients_NNS and_CC suspects_NNS with_IN uninfected_JJ members_NNS of_IN the_DT community_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP feels_NNS much_RB sympathy_VBP with_IN the_DT desire_NN of_IN the_DT upper_JJ classes_NNS of_IN natives_NNS that_IN in_IN guarding_VBG against_IN spread_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN Calcutta_NNP as_IN little_JJ violence_NN as_IN possible_JJ should_MD be_VB done_VBN to_TO their_PRP$ social_JJ traditions_NNS and_CC usages_NNS ,_, and_CC he_PRP is_VBZ anxious_JJ to_TO make_VB every_DT concession_NN that_WDT is_VBZ consistent_JJ with_IN the_DT paramount_NN duty_NN of_IN preventing_VBG the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
With_IN this_DT object_JJ rule_NN 31_CD of_IN the_DT draft_NN Regulation_NNP (_( 46_CD *_NN of_IN that_DT now_RB submitted_VBN )_) has_VBZ been_VBN further_RB amended_VBN to_TO the_DT following_JJ effect_NN :_: -_: 46_CD ._.
Segregation.-_NNP (_( 1_CD )_) If_IN on_IN examination_NN of_IN any_DT person_NN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP suspects_VBZ that_IN such_JJ person_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG from_IN or_CC infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ,_, he_PRP may_MD cause_VB such_JJ person_NN to_TO be_VB removed_VBN to_TO a_DT hospital_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD arrange_VB for_IN his_PRP$ detention_NN ,_, dieting_VBG and_CC medical_JJ treatment_NN therein_NN ._.
He_PRP may_MD also_RB cause_VB the_DT other_JJ occupants_NNS of_IN the_DT house_NN in_IN which_WDT such_JJ person_NN resides_NNS to_TO be_VB removed_VBN to_TO a_DT segregation_NN camp_NN and_CC to_TO be_VB detained_VBN under_IN observation_NN for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN parda-_JJ nashin_JJ ladies_NNS a_DT lady_NN doctor_NN shall_MD conduct_VB the_DT examination_NN ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) When_WRB private_JJ plague_NN hospitals_NNS or_CC segregation_NN camps_NNS have_VBP been_VBN provided_VBN and_CC fully_RB equipped_VBN by_IN or_CC for_IN particular_JJ castes_NNS ,_, classes_NNS ,_, joint_JJ families_NNS ,_, or_CC associations_NNS of_IN families_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, or_CC in_IN Calcutta_NNP two_CD members_NNS of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Commission_NNP empowered_VBD for_IN this_DT purpose_NN by_IN the_DT President_NNP ,_, have_VBP in_IN writing_VBG ap-_JJ proved_NN of_IN the_DT site_NN ,_, plan_NN ,_, furniture_NN and_CC arrangements_NNS for_IN medical_JJ administration_NN of_IN such_JJ hospitals_NNS and_CC camps_NNS ,_, sick_JJ or_CC suspected_JJ persons_NNS may_MD ,_, if_IN they_PRP so_VBP desire_JJ and_CC if_IN accommodation_NN is_VBZ available_JJ ,_, be_VB removed_VBN to_TO the_DT private_JJ hospital_NN or_CC segregation_NN camp_NN constructed_VBN for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN the_DT caste_NN ,_, class_NN or_CC family_NN to_TO which_WDT they_PRP belong_VBP ,_, instead_RB of_IN to_TO a_DT public_JJ hospital_NN or_CC camp_NN ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) In_IN both_DT public_JJ and_CC private_JJ camps_NNS and_CC hospitals_NNS separate_JJ and_CC suitable_JJ accommodation_NN shall_MD be_VB provided_VBN for_IN females_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN a_DT female_NN who_WP ,_, by_IN the_DT custom_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN ,_, does_VBZ not_RB appear_VB in_IN public_JJ ,_, her_PRP$ parda_JJ shall_MD be_VB strictly_RB preserved_VBN both_DT in_IN removal_NN to_TO the_DT camp_NN or_CC hospital_NN and_CC during_IN her_PRP$ stay_NN there_RB ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) The_DT relatives_NNS ,_, friends_NNS ,_, hakims_NNS ,_, and_CC priests_NNS of_IN sick_JJ persons_NNS shall_MD be_VB allowed_VBN free_JJ access_NN to_TO them_PRP during_IN the_DT daytime_NN ,_, subject_JJ only_RB to_TO such_JJ precautions_NNS as_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD consider_VB necessary_JJ ._.
(_( 5_CD )_) Members_NNS of_IN the_DT family_NN of_IN a_DT sick_JJ person_NN who_WP are_VBP in_IN attendance_NN on_IN him_PRP may_MD also_RB be_VB admitted_VBN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ,_, whether_IN public_JJ or_CC private_JJ ,_, provided_VBD that_IN they_PRP shall_MD sleep_VB in_IN the_DT compound_NN in_IN suitable_JJ accommodation_NN provided_VBD for_IN the_DT pur-_JJ pose_NN ,_, and_CC not_RB in_IN the_DT hospital_NN itself_PRP ._.
*_JJ Appendix_NNP IV_NNP ._.
?_. 12_CD Measures_NNS outside_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
VII_NNP ._.
Explanation_NNP 1.-It_CD is_VBZ not_RB necessary_JJ that_IN hospitals_NNS provided_VBN in_IN accordance_NN with_IN this_DT rule_NN should_MD be_VB constructed_VBN in_IN remote_NN or_CC inconvenient_JJ situations_NNS ._.
Explanation_NNP 2.-Persons_NNS desirous_JJ of_IN taking_VBG advantage_NN of_IN clause_NN (_( 2_CD )_) should_MD at_IN once_RB communicate_NN with_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Commission_NNP ,_, and_CC satisfy_VB that_DT body_NN of_IN their_PRP$ ability_NN to_TO provide_VB adequate_JJ hospitals_NNS and_CC camps_NNS when_WRB plague_NN breaks_VBZ out_RP ._.
Explanation_NNP 3.-Private_JJ hospitals_NNS and_CC camps_NNS may_MD be_VB closed_VBN by_IN order_NN of_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Commission_NNP ,_, if_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP reports_NNS that_IN medical_JJ attendance_NN and_CC segregation_NN are_VBP not_RB maintained_VBN to_TO his_PRP$ satisfaction_NN ,_, or_CC that_IN the_DT conditions_NNS on_IN which_WDT such_JJ camps_NNS or_CC hospitals_NNS were_VBD sanctioned_VBN are_VBP not_RB complied_VBN with_IN ._.
6_CD ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN that_IN ,_, following_VBG the_DT analogy_NN of_IN the_DT second_JJ clause_NN *_NN of_IN rule_NN 12_CD of_IN Regulation_NNP No_NNP ._.
4_CD of_IN the_DT 10th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ,_, which_WDT was_VBD based_VBN upon_IN a_DT suggestion_NN made_VBN by_IN a_DT native_JJ gentleman_NN to_TO the_DT Presi-_NNP dent_NN of_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Board_NNP ,_, the_DT system_NN of_IN caste_NN and_CC class_NN hospitals_NNS ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ worked_VBN successfully_RB in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN extended_VBN under_IN certain_JJ conditions_NNS to_TO joint_VB families_NNS or_CC associations_NNS of_IN families_NNS ._.

The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ hopes_NNS that_IN it_PRP will_MD be_VB possible_JJ to_TO induce_VB persons_NNS intending_VBG to_TO take_VB advantage_NN of_IN clause_NN (_( 2_CD )_) to_TO come_VB forward_RB in_IN time_NN and_CC communicate_NN with_IN the_DT Plague_NNP Commission_NNP ._.
When_WRB plague_NN actually_RB breaks_VBZ out_IN it_PRP will_MD be_VB too_RB late_JJ to_TO make_VB any_DT but_CC the_DT simplest_JJS arrangements_NNS ,_, and_CC persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP not_RB organised_VBN their_PRP$ private_JJ hospitals_NNS beforehand_VBP will_MD find_VB themselves_PRP compelled_VBN to_TO resort_VB to_TO those_DT provided_VBN for_IN the_DT general_JJ public_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
In_IN other_JJ respects_NNS the_DT draft_NN regulation_NN is_VBZ based_VBN for_IN the_DT most_JJS part_NN upon_IN the_DT corresponding_JJ rules_NNS in_IN force_NN in_IN the_DT North-Western_JJ Provinces_NNS ,_, which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN modified_VBN so_RB as_IN to_TO adapt_VB them_PRP to_TO the_DT administrative_JJ arrangements_NNS of_IN Bengal_NNP ._.

(_( 3_CD )_) Rules_NNPS 23_CD and_CC 24_CD and_CC 33_CD to_TO 38_CD confer_NN upon_IN the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN and_CC ,_, in_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, upon_IN the_DT Chairman_NNP of_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP extensive_JJ powers_NNS in_IN respect_NN of_IN appointing_VBG Health_NNP Officers_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ subordinates_NNS ,_, cleansing_VBG houses_NNS and_CC premises_NNS ,_, abating_VBG overcrowding_NN ,_, providing_VBG hospitals_NNS ,_, etc_FW ._.
Recent_JJ experience_NN has_VBZ shown_VBN that_IN Municipal_NNP Com-_NNP missioners_NNS in_IN Bengal_NNP can_MD not_RB be_VB trusted_VBN to_TO take_VB timely_RB or_CC vigorous_JJ action_NN in_IN respect_NN of_IN these_DT matters_NNS ._.
As_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP are_VBP aware_JJ ,_, it_PRP was_VBD only_RB by_IN the_DT strong-_JJ est_NN pressure_NN that_IN the_DT Commissioners_NNPS of_IN Calcutta_NNP were_VBD induced_VBN to_TO sanction_VB an_DT adequate_JJ establishment_NN for_IN the_DT removal_NN of_IN the_DT large_JJ accumulations_NNS of_IN filth_NN brought_VBD to_TO 14_CD Measures_NNS outside_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.

VII_NNP ._.
notice_NN by_IN the_DT enquiries_NNS of_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Board_NNP ;_: and_CC at_IN the_DT present_JJ time_NN ,_, if_IN plague_NN were_VBD to_TO appear_VB in_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, it_PRP would_MD find_VB the_DT town_NN without_IN a_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP capable_NN of_IN dealing_VBG with_IN such_PDT an_DT emergency_NN ._.
The_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT adjacent_JJ municipalities_NNS is_VBZ even_RB worse_JJR ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP has_VBZ now_RB before_IN him_PRP a_DT strong_JJ representation_NN from_IN the_DT Chamber_NNP of_IN Commerce_NNP on_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN the_DT insanitary_JJ condition_NN of_IN Serampore_NNP ;_: and_CC in_IN most_JJS of_IN the_DT smaller_JJR municipalities_NNS near_IN Calcutta_NNP on_IN either_DT bank_NN of_IN the_DT Hooghly_NNP the_DT state_NN of_IN things_NNS is_VBZ equally_RB bad_JJ ._.
The_DT only_JJ remedy_NN is_VBZ to_TO appoint_VB a_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP with_IN a_DT sufficient_JJ staff_NN to_TO put_VB matters_NNS right_RB ;_: but_CC the_DT income_NN of_IN the_DT munici-_JJ palities_NNS is_VBZ small_JJ ;_: they_PRP could_MD not_RB afford_VB to_TO pay_VB separate_JJ Health_NNP Officers_NNP ,_, and_CC jealousy_NN and_CC party_NN spirit_NN are_VBP too_RB strong_JJ among_IN them_PRP for_IN there_EX to_TO be_VB any_DT chance_NN of_IN their_PRP$ agreeing_NN to_TO combine_VB to_TO pay_VB a_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
In_IN view_NN of_IN the_DT danger_NN to_TO Calcutta_NNP arising_VBG from_IN these_DT insanitary_JJ areas_NNS ,_, the_DT Lieutenant_NNP Governor_NNP is_VBZ satisfied_JJ that_IN the_DT time_NN has_VBZ come_VBN for_IN Government_NNP to_TO intervene_VB and_CC to_TO empower_VB the_DT Magistrates_NNP of_IN Howrah_NNP ,_, Hooghly_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT 24-Parganas_JJ to_TO take_VB such_JJ measure_NN as_IN are_VBP necessary_JJ to_TO enforce_VB reforms_NNS ._.
They_PRP will_MD be_VB instructed_VBN to_TO proceed_VB with_IN due_JJ regard_NN to_TO considerations_NNS of_IN economy_NN ;_: but_CC however_RB careful_JJ they_PRP may_MD be_VB ,_, the_DT Lieutenant-_NNP Governor_NNP apprehends_VBZ that_IN it_PRP will_MD be_VB necessary_JJ to_TO supplement_VB the_DT resources_NNS of_IN the_DT municipalities_NNS by_IN borrowing_VBG under_IN the_DT Emergency_NNP Loans_NNP Act_NNP ._.
His_PRP$ Honour_NN trusts_NNS that_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP will_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO find_VB the_DT requisite_JJ funds_NNS in_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN the_DT Provincial_JJ Loans_NNPS Budget_NNP being_VBG exhausted_VBN ._.
8_CD ._.

8o6-T._JJ M._NNP ,_, of_IN the_DT 21st_CD September_NNP 1897_CD ,_, seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB given_VBN rise_NN to_TO some_DT misapprehension_NN ._.

g._NN I_PRP am_VBP to_TO request_VB that_IN if_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP approve_NN of_IN the_DT draft_NN rule_NN relating_VBG to_TO segregation_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT general_JJ policy_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT remaining_NN rules_NNS are_VBP explained_VBN in_IN this_DT letter_NN ,_, permission_NN to_TO publish_VB the_DT entire_JJ regulation_NN may_MD be_VB communicated_VBN by_IN telegram_NN ._.

No_DT ._.
4_CD ._.
NOTIFICATION_NNP TEMPORARILY_NNP FORBIDDING_NNP THE_NNP SALE_NNP OF_NNP RAILWAY_NNP TICKETS_NNP TO_NNP HARDWAR_NNP AND_NNP NEIGHBOUR-_NNP ING_NNP STATIONS_NNP ._.
Government_NN of_IN India_NNP ,_, Home_NNP Department_NNP Notification_NNP No_NNP ._.
1518_CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 18th_CD May_NNP 1897_CD ._.
Whereas_IN the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP is_VBZ satisfied_JJ that_IN there_EX is_VBZ danger_NN of_IN an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN plague_NN if_IN persons_NNS assemble_VBP at_IN Hardwar_NNP to_TO attend_VB fairs_NNS in_IN the_DT present_JJ month_NN of_IN May_NNP and_CC the_DT ensuing_VBG month_NN of_IN June_NNP ;_: In_IN exercise_NN of_IN the_DT powers_NNS conferred_VBN by_IN section_NN 2_CD ,_, sub-section_NN (_( 1_CD )_) ,_, of_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP (_( III_NNP of_IN 1897_CD )_) ,_, the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP is_VBZ pleased_VBN to_TO direct_VB that_IN no_DT tickets_NNS to_TO travel_VB by_IN railway_NN to_TO Lakhsar_NNP ,_, Patri_NNP ,_, Jawalapur_NNP ,_, and_CC Hardwar_NNP shall_MD be_VB sold_VBN from_IN the_DT 24th_CD day_NN of_IN May_NNP 1897_CD to_TO the_DT 12th_CD day_NN of_IN June_NNP 1897_CD ._.
No_DT ._.
5_CD ._.
REGULATIONS_NNS PRESCRIBED_NNP BY_NNP THE_NNP GOVERNMENT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP NORTH-WESTERN_NNP PROVINCES_NNP AND_NNP OUDH_NNP FOR_NNP DEAL-_NNP ING_NNP WITH_NNP PLAGUE_NNP AT_NNP HARDWAR_NNP ._.
Dated_VBD the_DT 1st_CD May_NNP 1897_CD ._.
It_PRP having_VBG been_VBN ascertained_VBN that_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN exists_NNS in_IN Hardwar_NNP ,_, the_DT following_JJ measures_NNS are_VBP prescribed_VBN under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP (_( III_NNP of_IN 1897_CD )_) for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN eradicating_VBG it_PRP ._.
These_DT rules_NNS shall_MD ?_. 16_CD Measures_NNS outside_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
VII_NNP ._.
remain_NN in_IN force_NN until_IN the_DT town_NN is_VBZ declared_VBN to_TO be_VB free_JJ from_IN infection_NN They_PRP are_VBP supplementary_JJ to_TO those_DT issued_VBN with_IN *Notification_NN No_NNP ._.
212/XVI-404.Bo._JJ ,_, dated_JJ 26th_CD March_NNP 1897_CD ,_, and_CC apply-_NN (_( 1_CD )_) to_TO the_DT infected_JJ areas_NNS ;_: (_( 2_CD )_) to_TO visitors_NNS and_CC pilgrims_NNS to_TO Hardwar_NNP coming_VBG from_IN infected_VBN areas_NNS ._.
I.-Measures_NNS concerning_VBG the_DT Infected_NNP Areas_NNP ._.
1_CD ._.
The_DT infected_JJ areas_NNS shall_MD be_VB placed_VBN in_IN quarantine_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT specially_RB infected_JJ block_NN adjacent_NN to_TO Ramghat_NNP shall_MD remove_VB to_TO the_DT camp_NN established_VBN at_IN Chauk_NNP Ram_NNP Jas_NNP on_IN the_DT Jawalapur_NNP road_NN ._.
Any_DT person_NN wishing_VBG to_TO leave_VB the_DT camp_NN shall_MD ,_, before_IN leaving_VBG ,_, obtain_VB a_DT written_VBN permission_NN to_TO do_VB so_RB from_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP or_CC Magistrate_NNP ._.
Information_NN of_IN the_DT departure_NN of_IN such_JJ persons_NNS shall_MD be_VB sent_VBN to_TO the_DT Magistrates_NNP of_IN districts_NNS to_TO which_WDT they_PRP are_VBP proceed-_JJ ing_NN ._.
Provision_NN for_IN watch_NN and_CC ward_NN of_IN the_DT evacuated_JJ quarter_NN and_CC for_IN the_DT custody_NN of_IN the_DT property_NN of_IN persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP removed_VBN from_IN it_PRP shall_MD be_VB made_VBN in_IN accordance_NN with_IN rule_NN 39_CD of_IN Notification_NNP No_NNP ._.
212/XVI-404.B_JJ ._.
of_IN the_DT 26th_CD March_NNP 1897_CD ._.
N.B.-The_JJ accommodation_NN in_IN this_DT camp_NN has_VBZ been_VBN provided_VBN with_IN due_JJ regard_NN to_TO the_DT convenience_NN of_IN families_NNS and_CC the_DT privacy_NN of_IN females_NNS ._.
3_CD ._.
Inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT Ramghat_NNP block_NN who_WP do_VBP not_RB wish_VB to_TO leave_VB Hardwar_NNP shall_MD reside_VB in_IN the_DT camp_NN for_IN one_CD month_NN ,_, or_CC until_IN the_DT Ramghat_NNP block_NN is_VBZ declared_VBN to_TO be_VB safe_JJ for_IN re-occupation_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
Residents_NNS in_IN the_DT camp_NN shall_MD be_VB liable_JJ to_TO medical_JJ examination_NN daily_RB ,_, females_NNS being_VBG inspected_VBN by_IN female_JJ medical_JJ officers_NNS ._.
5_CD ._.
Residents_NNS in_IN the_DT camp_NN shall_MD be_VB permitted_VBN during_IN the_DT day_NN to_TO visit_VB all_PDT the_DT parts_NNS of_IN Hardwar_NNP other_JJ than_IN the_DT areas_NNS declared_VBD to_TO be_VB infected_VBN ,_, but_CC should_MD cook_VB their_PRP$ meals_NNS and_CC sleep_NN in_IN the_DT camp_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
After_IN the_DT evacuation_NN of_IN the_DT Ramghat_NNP block_NN ,_, the_DT houses_NNS ,_, etc._NN ,_, shall_MD be_VB thoroughly_RB cleansed_VBN and_CC disinfected_VBN ,_, the_DT owners_NNS and_CC occupiers_NNS being_VBG allowed_VBN to_TO be_VB present_JJ at_IN the_DT time_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
Facilities_NNS shall_MD be_VB given_VBN in_IN the_DT camp_NN for_IN persons_NNS to_TO open_VB shop_NN and_CC carry_NN on_IN their_PRP$ trades_NNS so_RB far_RB as_IN they_PRP may_MD be_VB consistent_JJ with_IN the_DT object_NN of_IN these_DT rules_NNS ._.
8_CD ._.
Hospitals_NNS and_CC segregation_NN huts_NNS for_IN the_DT accommodation_NN and_CC reception_NN of_IN persons_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN and_CC for_IN their_PRP$ friends_NNS and_CC attendants_NNS shall_MD be_VB provided_VBN in_IN accordance_NN with_IN G._NNP O_NNP ._.
No_DT ._.
234/_CD XVI-404-B_JJ ,_, -283_NNP of_IN 5th_CD April_NNP 1897_CD ._.
9_CD ._.
Free_JJ access_NN shall_MD be_VB given_VBN in_IN the_DT camp_NN and_CC hospitals_NNS to_TO baids_NNS ,_, hakims_NNS ,_, pandas_NNS ,_, and_CC religious_JJ instructors_NNS ,_, who_WP shall_MD be_VB free_JJ to_TO treat_VB and_CC communicate_VB with_IN those_DT who_WP desire_VBP to_TO consult_VB them_PRP ._.

Measures_NNS outside_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.

The_DT provisions_NNS of_IN rule_NN 31_CD (_( 2_CD )_) of_IN the_DT rules_NNS published_VBN in_IN Notifie_NNP tion_NN No_NNP ._.
212/XVI-404-B._JJ ,_, dated_JJ 26th_CD March_NNP 1897_CD ,_, shall_MD until_IN further_JJ notice_RB apply_VBP to_TO all_DT deaths_NNS occurring_VBG in_IN the_DT Hardwar_NNP Municipality_NNP :_: -_: ``_`` Rule_NN 31_CD (_( 2_CD )_) .-The_CD dead_JJ body_NN of_IN a_DT person_NN who_WP has_VBZ died_VBN of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN shall_MD not_RB be_VB removed_VBN from_IN the_DT house_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT death_NN occurred_VBD until_IN after_IN the_DT expiry_NN of_IN six_CD hours_NNS from_IN the_DT time_NN notice_NN of_IN such_JJ intended_VBN removal_NN shall_MD have_VB been_VBN delivered_VBN at_IN the_DT nearest_JJS police_NN station_NN by_IN ,_, or_CC on_IN behalf_NN of_IN the_DT ,_, friends_NNS of_IN the_DT deceased_JJ or_CC of_IN the_DT owners_NNS or_CC occupiers_NNS of_IN the_DT house_NN ,_, unless_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP or_CC other_JJ sanitary_JJ or_CC executive_JJ authority_NN has_VBZ permitted_VBN earlier_RBR removal_NN ._. ''_''
II.-Measures_NNS regarding_VBG Visitors_NNS and_CC Pilgrims_NNP coming_VBG to_TO Hardwar_NNP from_IN Infected_NNP Areas_NNP ._.
II.-All_JJ pilgrims_NNS and_CC visitors_NNS from_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP ,_, or_CC other_JJ place_NN infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ,_, coming_VBG to_TO Hardwar_NNP by_IN rail_NN or_CC road_NN ,_, shall_MD reside_VB in_IN the_DT camp_NN at_IN Hardwar_NNP provided_VBD for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, where_WRB provision_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN for_IN their_PRP$ accommodation_NN ._.
They_PRP shall_MD be_VB permitted_VBN during_IN the_DT day_NN to_TO visit_VB the_DT towns_NNS ,_, shrines_NNS and_CC bathing_VBG ghats_NNS ,_, but_CC must_MD cook_VB their_PRP$ food_NN and_CC sleep_NN in_IN the_DT camp_NN at_IN night_NN ._.
Such_JJ visitors_NNS shall_MD be_VB liable_JJ to_TO medical_JJ inspection_NN from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN ._.
Khandraoni_NNP ._.
No_DT ._.
6_CD ._.
REPORT_VBN BY_NNP SURGEON-LIEUTENANT-COLONEL_NNP CROFTS_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP OUTBREAK_NNP OF_NNP PLAGUE_NNP IN_NNP KHANDRAONI_NNP VILLAGE_NNP ,_, GWALIOR_NNP STATE_NNP ._.
Gwalior_NNP ,_, the_DT 8th_CD May_NNP 1897_CD ._.
The_DT orders_NNS received_VBD ._.
I_PRP ._.
Under_IN instructions_NNS from_IN H._NNP H._NNP the_DT Maharajah_NNP Scindia_NNP I_PRP left_VBD Gwalior_NNP on_IN the_DT 17th_CD of_IN March_NNP and_CC proceeded_VBD to_TO Khandraoni_NNP village_NN ,_, arriving_VBG there_RB on_IN the_DT 18th_CD ,_, to_TO enquire_VB into_IN a_DT reported_VBN outbreak_NN of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ._.
Description_NN of_IN Khandraoni_NNP village_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
Khandraoni_NNP is_VBZ a_DT village_NN situated_VBN in_IN the_DT Karera_NNP Tehsil_NNP of_IN the_DT Chanderi_NNP Subah_NNP ,_, distant_NN from_IN Jhansi_NNP ,_, Dattia_NNP ,_, Dinara_NNP ,_, and_CC Karera_NNP ,_, twenty_NN ,_, ten_RB ,_, seven_CD and_CC twelve_VB miles_NNS ,_, respectively_RB ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT population_NN according_VBG to_TO the_DT last_JJ yearly_JJ census_NN taken_VBN in_IN July_NNP 1896_CD was_VBD 558_CD (_( 187_CD men_NNS ,_, 157_CD women_NNS ,_, and_CC 214_CD children_NNS )_) ,_, of_IN which_WDT only_RB five_CD were_VBD Mahomedans_NNPS ,_, the_DT remainder_NN being_VBG Hindus_NNP ,_, principally_RB Brahmins_NNP ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT total_JJ area_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN lands_VBZ is_VBZ 2,599_CD bighas_NN ,_, 3_CD biswas_NN ._.
The_DT area_NN under_IN cultivation_NN in_IN the_DT current_JJ year_NN is_VBZ 940_CD bighas_NN ,_, the_DT c_NN 3_CD ?_. 18_CD Measures_NNS outside_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
VII_NNP ._.
average_JJ cultivated_VBD area_NN in_IN normal_JJ years_NNS being_VBG 1,006_CD bighas_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT revenue_NN demand_NN for_IN the_DT whole_JJ year_NN being_VBG Rs_NNP ._.
1,374-1-0_JJ ,_, Imperial_NNP coin_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
On_IN the_DT north_NN and_CC west_JJS the_DT village_NN boundary_JJ runs_NNS with_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT villages_NNS of_IN Rao_NNP Mou_NNP and_CC Ata_NNP of_IN the_DT Dattia_NNP State_NNP ,_, while_IN to_TO the_DT south_NN and_CC east_JJ lie_NN the_DT Gwalior_NNP villages_NNS of_IN Panoha_NNP and_CC Belloni_NNP ._.
6_CD ._.
On_IN my_PRP$ arrival_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT 18th_CD of_IN March_NNP ,_, I_PRP examined_VBD all_PDT the_DT sick_NN in_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT signs_NNS and_CC symptoms_NNS present_JJ ,_, together_RB with_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ nature_NN of_IN the_DT outbreak_NN and_CC its_PRP$ history_NN ,_, left_VBD no_DT doubt_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT disease_NN being_VBG bubonic_JJ plague_NN ._.
History_NN of_IN the_DT outbreak_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
From_IN enquiries_NNS made_VBN from_IN the_DT Patwari_NNP and_CC Lambardar_NNP of_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN ,_, for_IN some_DT years_NNS past_IN ,_, several_JJ of_IN the_DT inhabi-_JJ tants_NNS of_IN Khandraoni_NNP have_VBP been_VBN in_IN the_DT habit_NN of_IN going_VBG to_TO Bombay_NNP and_CC taking_VBG service_NN there_RB ,_, re-visiting_VBG their_PRP$ village_NN at_IN intervals_NNS ;_: and_CC that_IN amongst_JJ these_DT were_VBD two_CD Brahmins_NNS ,_, Bindraban_NNP and_CC Khoobi_NNP ,_, the_DT former_JJ being_VBG one_CD of_IN the_DT Lambardars_NNP of_IN the_DT villages_NNS ._.
8_CD ._.
These_DT men_NNS came_VBD straight_RB from_IN Bombay_NNP to_TO Khandraoni_NNP ,_, arriving_VBG there_RB on_IN the_DT 9th_CD of_IN January_NNP last_JJ (_( three_CD days_NNS before_IN Makar_NNP Sankrant_NNP in_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN Poos_NNP )_) ._.
On_IN leaving_VBG Bombay_NNP Bindraban_NNP was_VBD suffering_VBG from_IN fever_NN and_CC Khoobi_NNP attended_VBD him_PRP while_IN on_IN the_DT way_NN ,_, bringing_VBG him_PRP to_TO Jhansi_NNP by_IN rail_NN ,_, and_CC from_IN there_RB ,_, in_IN a_DT country_NN cart_NN ,_, to_TO Khandraoni_NNP ,_, where_WRB he_PRP died_VBD five_CD days_NNS after_IN his_PRP$ arrival_NN ._.
Two_CD days_NNS after_IN Bindra-_NNP ban_NN 's_POS death_NN Khoobi_NNP fell_VBD ill_RB and_CC died_VBD in_IN three_CD days_NNS ,_, and_CC about_IN a_DT week_NN after_IN his_PRP$ death_NN a_DT native_JJ hakim_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, named_VBN Nazar_NNP Mahomed_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD been_VBN treating_VBG Bindraban_NNP and_CC Khoobi_NNP ,_, was_VBD attacked_VBN with_IN fever_NN and_CC died_VBD ;_: and_CC at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN another_DT native_JJ hakim_NN ,_, named_VBN Gopi_NNP ,_, who_WP had_VBD come_VBN from_IN Karera_NNP to_TO treat_VB Nazar_NNP Mahomed_NNP ,_, also_RB succumbed_VBD to_TO the_DT disease_NN ._.
The_DT plague_NN then_RB gradually_RB spread_JJ amongst_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, and_CC up_RB to_TO the_DT date_NN of_IN my_PRP$ arrival_NN there_EX had_VBD been_VBN 59_CD seizures_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT 47_CD had_VBD proved_VBN fatal_JJ ._.
Instructions_NNS received_VBD from_IN H._NNP H.the_NNP Maharajah_NNP ._.
9_CD ._.
His_PRP$ Highness_NNP the_DT Maharajah_NNP Scindia_NNP 's_POS instructions_NNS were_VBD that_IN in_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN being_VBG present_JJ every_DT means_NN should_MD be_VB employed-_JJ (_( 1_CD )_) to_TO stamp_VB out_RP the_DT disease_NN in_IN the_DT village_NN itself_PRP ;_: (_( 2_CD )_) to_TO prevent_VB its_PRP$ spread_NN to_TO any_DT other_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT State_NNP ;_: (_( 3_CD )_) to_TO treat_VB the_DT sick_NN ;_: and_CC (_( 4_CD )_) to_TO interfere_VB as_RB little_JJ as_IN possible_JJ with_IN the_DT harvesting_NN of_IN the_DT crops_NNS then_RB in_IN the_DT ground_NN ._.
The_DT principles_NNS on_IN Which_NNP the_DT 10_CD ._.
Being_VBG satisfied_VBD that_IN the_DT disease_NN was_VBD bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, the_DT following_JJ principles_NNS were_VBD accepted_VBN as_IN a_DT basis_NN on_IN which_WDT measures_NNS ?_. APP_NNP ._.
VII_NNP ._. ]_NN
Measures_NNS outside_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.
19_CD measures_NNS taken_VBN were_VBD based_VBN ._.
should_MD be_VB taken_VBN to_TO carry_VB out_RP the_DT above_JJ instructions_NNS to_TO a_DT successful_JJ conclusion_NN :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) That_IN the_DT plague_NN was_VBD due_JJ to_TO a_DT specific_JJ microbe_NN ._.
(_( b_NN )_) That_IN this_DT microbe_NN could_MD be_VB carried_VBN by_IN the_DT excreta_NN of_IN persons_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN and_CC by_IN clothing_NN ,_, wooden_JJ and_CC earthen_JJ articles_NNS of_IN all_DT descriptions_NNS and_CC by_IN food_NN of_IN all_DT kinds_NNS ,_, cooked_VBD or_CC uncooked_JJ ._.
(_( c_NN )_) That_IN the_DT microbe_NN once_RB imported_VBN by_IN any_DT of_IN the_DT above_NN agencies_NNS into_IN a_DT house_NN ,_, where_WRB conditions_NNS obtained_VBD which_WDT were_VBD favourable_JJ to_TO its_PRP$ development_NN ,_, not_RB alone_RB established_VBN it-_JJ self_NN in_IN the_DT floor_NN ,_, walls_NNS and_CC roof_NN of_IN that_DT house_NN ,_, but_CC also_RB in_IN or_CC on_IN every_DT article_NN which_WDT that_IN house_NN contained_VBD ._.
(_( d_NN )_) That_IN the_DT conditions_NNS favourable_JJ to_TO the_DT development_NN of_IN the_DT microbe_NN were_VBD insanitary_JJ conditions_NNS of_IN all_DT kinds_NNS ,_, especial-_JJ ly_NN dirt_NN ,_, overcrowding_VBG and_CC the_DT absence_NN of_IN thorough_JJ ventilation_NN and_CC light_NN ._.
(_( e_NN )_) That_IN the_DT microbe_NN could_MD not_RB establish_VB itself_PRP unless_IN the_DT above_JJ conditions_NNS were_VBD present_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN it_PRP was_VBD impossible_JJ for_IN it_PRP to_TO exist_VB for_IN more_JJR than_IN a_DT few_JJ days_NNS in_IN any_DT place_NN which_WDT was_VBD free_JJ from_IN insanitary_JJ conditions_NNS and_CC exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT direct_JJ rays_NNS of_IN the_DT sun_NN ,_, and_CC that_DT very_RB high_JJ artificial_JJ heat_NN rendered_VBD it_PRP inert_NN ._.
Measures_NNS taken_VBN ._.
11_CD ._.
For_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN clearness_NN in_IN this_DT report_NN the_DT following_VBG measures_NNS based_VBN on_IN the_DT above_JJ principles_NNS are_VBP recorded_VBN ,_, not_RB in_IN the_DT sequence_NN of_IN their_PRP$ being_VBG given_VBN effect_NN to_TO ,_, but_CC in_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT objects_NNS held_VBD in_IN view_NN ,_, many_JJ of_IN the_DT measures_NNS being_VBG carried_VBN out_RP simultaneously_RB :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) An_DT order_NN was_VBD sent_VBN to_TO the_DT Officer_NNP Commanding_NNP the_DT Karera_NNP Cantonment_NNP to_TO march_VB at_IN once_RB to_TO Khandraoni_NNP with_IN four_CD companies_NNS of_IN infantry_NN and_CC hospital_JJ establishment_NN and_CC equipment_NN ._.
The_DT Tehsildar_NNP of_IN Karera_NNP was_VBD also_RB ordered_VBN to_TO come_VB to_TO Khandraoni_NNP and_CC arrange_NN for_IN such_JJ supplies_NNS as_IN might_MD be_VB necessary_JJ for_IN the_DT troops_NNS and_CC villagers_NNS ._.
(_( b_NN )_) In_IN the_DT meantime_NN a_DT nominal_JJ roll_NN was_VBD made_VBN of_IN all_PDT the_DT inhabi-_JJ tants_NNS of_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN that_IN the_DT total_JJ num-_JJ ber_NN present_NN was_VBD 435_CD ._.
(_( c_NN )_) These_DT were_VBD each_DT examined_VBN and_CC were_VBD divided_VBN for_IN the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN segregation_NN into_IN four_CD classes_NNS ,_, viz_NN ._.
:_: -_: Class_NN I.-Those_JJ families_NNS who_WP were_VBD perfectly_RB healthy_JJ and_CC amongst_JJ whom_WP no_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN or_CC fever_NN of_IN any_DT kind_NN had_VBD occurred_VBN since_IN the_DT 9th_CD of_IN January_NNP (_( it_PRP was_VBD thought_VBN advisable_JJ to_TO treat_VB any_DT case_NN of_IN fever_NN as_IN coming_VBG under_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP was_VBD impossible_JJ from_IN questioning_VBG the_DT villagers_NNS ?_. 20_CD Measures_NNS outside_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
VII_NNP ._.
themselves_PRP to_TO distinguish_VB ,_, with_IN any_DT certainty_NN ,_, between_IN so-_NN called_VBN fever_NN and_CC plague_NN )_) ._.
Class_NN II.-Those_JJ families_NNS who_WP were_VBD in_IN good_JJ health_NN ,_, but_CC amongst_RB whom_WP cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN and_CC fever_NN had_VBD occurred_VBN since_IN 9th_CD of_IN January_NNP ._.
Class_NN III.-Those_JJ families_NNS amongst_VBP whom_WP there_EX were_VBD cases_NNS con-_JJ valescent_NN from_IN plague_NN or_CC fever_NN ._.
Class_NN IV.-Those_JJ families_NNS ,_, some_DT of_IN whose_WP$ members_NNS were_VBD then_RB suffering_VBG with_IN plague_NN or_CC fever_NN ._.
Evacuation_NN of_IN village_NN ._.
12_CD ._.
On_IN the_DT 19th_CD of_IN March_NNP four_CD companies_NNS of_IN the_DT 6th_CD Infantry_NNP having_VBG arrived_VBN from_IN Karera_NNP ,_, the_DT inhabitants_NNS were_VBD ordered_VBN to_TO go_VB to_TO their_PRP$ houses_NNS and_CC remain_VBP there_RB ._.
Sentries_NNS were_VBD then_RB posted_VBN on_IN all_PDT the_DT infected_VBN houses_NNS (_( i.e._FW ,_, of_IN classes_NNS II_NNP ,_, III_NNP and_CC IV_NNP )_) as_RB well_RB as_IN those_DT of_IN class_NN I_PRP in_IN their_PRP$ immediate_JJ vicinity_NN ,_, and_CC strict_JJ orders_NNS were_VBD issued_VBN to_TO prevent_VB any_DT persons_NNS entering_VBG or_CC leaving_VBG those_DT houses_NNS or_CC taking_VBG any_DT article_NN therefrom_NN ._.
13_CD ._.
The_DT remainder_NN of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS (_( i.e._FW ,_, class_NN I_PRP ,_, with_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN those_DT mentioned_VBN in_IN paragraph_NN 12_CD )_) were_VBD then_RB turned_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT village_NN and_CC surrounded_VBN by_IN a_DT cordon_NN of_IN sentries_NNS ._.
This_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO take_VB any_DT of_IN their_PRP$ property_NN which_WDT they_PRP wanted_VBD with_IN them_PRP ._.
14_CD ._.
Classes_NNS II_NNP ,_, III_NNP and_CC IV_NNP as_RB well_RB as_IN those_DT of_IN class_NN I_PRP living_VBG in_IN their_PRP$ immediate_JJ vicinity_NN were_VBD then_RB successively_RB taken_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT village_NN and_CC segregated_VBD one_CD from_IN another_DT by_IN a_DT cordon_NN of_IN sentries_NNS ,_, those_DT of_IN class_NN I_PRP hitherto_VBP detained_JJ being_VBG allowed_VBN to_TO join_VB the_DT others_NNS of_IN the_DT same_JJ class_NN ._.
15_CD ._.
These_DT classes_NNS and_CC those_DT of_IN class_NN I_PRP above_VBP referred_VBN to_TO were_VBD not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO take_VB anything_NN out_IN of_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS ,_, except_IN the_DT clothes_NNS they_PRP were_VBD wearing_VBG ,_, as_IN much_JJ bedding_NN as_IN was_VBD absolutely_RB necessary_JJ for_IN their_PRP$ protection_NN from_IN the_DT climate_NN ,_, their_PRP$ money_NN ,_, ornaments_NNS and_CC metal_JJ cook-_JJ ing_NN utensils_NNS ._.
16_CD ._.
In_IN carrying_VBG out_RP this_DT measure_NN I_PRP took_VBD the_DT precaution_NN of_IN visiting_VBG each_DT house_NN in_IN turn_NN ,_, and_CC saw_VBD that_IN each_DT family_NN were_VBD placed_VBN in_IN charge_NN of_IN an_DT escort_NN and_CC conducted_VBD straight_RB to_TO the_DT place_NN appointed_VBN for_IN their_PRP$ segregation_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT order_NN regarding_VBG the_DT removal_NN of_IN any_DT article_NN other_JJ than_IN those_DT above_IN mentioned_VBN was_VBD strictly_RB adhered_VBN to_TO ._.
17_CD ._.
The_DT village_NN having_VBG been_VBN evacuated_VBN ,_, sentries_NNS were_VBD posted_VBN all_DT round_NN with_IN strict_JJ orders_NNS to_TO prevent_VB any_DT one_CD from_IN entering_VBG the_DT village_NN ._.

18_CD ._.
The_DT following_NN were_VBD the_DT arrangements_NNS for_IN feeding_VBG classes_NNS II_NNP ,_, III_NNP and_CC IV_NNP :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) Two_CD Bunniahs_NNP were_VBD engaged_VBN from_IN a_DT neighbouring_JJ village_NN ,_, where_WRB it_PRP was_VBD ascertained_VBN that_IN no_DT plague_NN was_VBD present_JJ ,_, and_CC APP_NNP ._.
VII_NNP ._. ]_NN
Measures_NNS outside_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.
21_CD the_DT necessary_JJ supplies_NNS were_VBD also_RB brought_VBN from_IN the_DT same_JJ source_NN ._.
(_( b_NN )_) Both_DT Bunniahs_NNP and_CC supplies_NNS were_VBD placed_VBN under_IN a_DT guard_NN ,_, orders_NNS being_VBG given_VBN not_RB to_TO allow_VB any_DT of_IN the_DT villagers_NNS to_TO come_VB in_IN contact_NN with_IN them_PRP ,_, nor_CC to_TO allow_VB the_DT latter_NN to_TO mix_VB with_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN the_DT village_NN ._.
(_( c_NN )_) The_DT amount_NN of_IN grain_NN ,_, etc._FW ,_, necessary_JJ for_IN each_DT individual_JJ family_NN was_VBD calculated_VBN and_CC supplied_VBN once_RB a_DT day_NN under_IN the_DT following_JJ arrangements_NNS ._.
(_( d_NN )_) The_DT daily_JJ supplies_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN by_IN a_DT Bunniah_NNP under_IN escort_NN to_TO the_DT boundary_NN of_IN the_DT segregation_NN camp_NN ,_, where_WRB one_CD member_NN of_IN each_DT family_NN was_VBD deputed_VBN to_TO receive_VB them_PRP ._.
The_DT supplies_NNS were_VBD then_RB weighed_VBN and_CC handed_VBN over_RP ,_, care_NN being_VBG taken_VBN that_IN neither_CC the_DT Bunniah_NNP nor_CC his_PRP$ scales_NNS came_VBD in_IN contact_NN with_IN the_DT segregated_JJ inhabitants_NNS ,_, the_DT Bunniah_NNP was_VBD then_RB marched_VBN back_RB to_TO the_DT place_NN allotted_VBD for_IN supplies_NNS and_CC again_RB placed_VBN under_IN the_DT Commissariat_NNP Guard_NNP ._.
Arrangements_NNS for_IN hutting_NN ,_, et_NN :_: 19_CD ._.
Arrangements_NNS were_VBD also_RB made_VBN for_IN the_DT supply_NN of_IN chapper_NN huts_NNS ,_, charpoys_NNS ,_, straw_NN and_CC blankets_NNS for_IN hospital_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN the_DT old_JJ and_CC weakly_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT community_NN ,_, while_IN grinding_VBG stones_NNS for_IN the_DT por-_JJ tion_NN of_IN class_NN I_PRP who_WP were_VBD not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO bring_VB these_DT articles_NNS from_IN the_DT village_NN were_VBD also_RB supplied_VBN as_RB well_RB as_IN new_JJ earthen_NN vessels_NNS to_TO all_DT who_WP required_VBD them_PRP ._.
It_PRP may_MD here_RB be_VB mentioned_VBN that_IN there_EX was_VBD little_JJ or_CC no_DT grain_NN brought_VBD out_IN of_IN the_DT villages_NNS ,_, as_IN those_DT who_WP were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO bring_VB any_DT had_VBD little_JJ or_CC none_NN to_TO bring_VB and_CC were_VBD beginning_VBG to_TO live_VB on_IN the_DT current_JJ year_NN 's_POS produce_NN ,_, some_DT of_IN which_WDT was_VBD then_RB on_IN the_DT threshing-floors_NNS ._.
Water-supply_NNP ._.
20_CD ._.
As_IN the_DT segregation_NN camps_NNS were_VBD all_DT situated_VBN along_IN the_DT banks_NNS of_IN a_DT small_JJ river_NN which_WDT was_VBD the_DT usual_JJ source_NN of_IN water-supply_NN ,_, no_DT diffi-_JJ culty_NN regarding_VBG this_DT was_VBD experienced_VBN ,_, but_CC care_NN was_VBD taken_VBN that_IN the_DT segregation_NN camp_NN of_IN the_DT healthy_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS was_VBD highest_JJS up_RB stream_NN ,_, while_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT hospital_NN was_VBD lowest_JJS ._.
Compensation_NN lists_NNS ._.
21_CD ._.
The_DT owners_NNS of_IN the_DT infected_JJ houses_NNS as_RB well_RB as_IN of_IN those_DT of_IN the_DT houses_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ immediate_JJ vicinity_NN were_VBD called_VBN upon_IN to_TO give_VB lists_NNS of_IN property_NN therein_NN with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO subsequent_JJ compensation_NN ;_: these_DT were_VBD made_VBN out_RP in_IN my_PRP$ presence_NN by_IN the_DT Patwari_NNP ,_, and_CC having_VBG been_VBN initialled_VBN by_IN me_PRP ,_, were_VBD handed_VBN over_IN to_TO the_DT owners_NNS ._.
The_DT majority_NN of_IN the_DT lists_NNS contained_VBD property_NN of_IN little_JJ value_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD instances_NNS where_WRB the_DT amount_NN of_IN grain_NN ,_, goor_NN and_CC ghee_NN ,_, etc._NN ,_, seems_VBZ suspiciously_RB large_JJ ,_, the_DT owner_NN was_VBD taken_VBN to_TO his_PRP$ house_NN and_CC made_VBD to_TO show_VB where_WRB the_DT amount_NN which_WDT he_PRP had_VBD written_VBN down_RP was_VBD ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD invariably_RB found_VBN that_IN only_RB about_IN half_PDT the_DT stated_JJ amount_NN was_VBD present_JJ ._.
The_DT necessary_JJ correction_NN was_VBD made_VBN in_IN the_DT list_NN and_CC owner_NN was_VBD again_RB marched_VBN back_RB to_TO segregation_NN camp_NN under_IN escort_NN ._.
?_. 22_CD Measures_NNS outside_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ,_, [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
VII_NNP ._.
Infected_VBN houses_NNS burnt_VBP ._.
22_CD ._.
With_IN the_DT help_NN of_IN a_DT few_JJ policemen_NNS and_CC chuprassies_NNS hay_VBP and_CC other_JJ inflammable_JJ materials_NNS were_VBD then_RB placed_VBN in_IN the_DT infected_JJ houses_NNS and_CC those_DT in_IN their_PRP$ immediate_JJ vicinity_NN ,_, which_WDT were_VBD then_RB set_VBN fire_NN to_TO and_CC destroyed_VBN under_IN my_PRP$ personal_JJ supervision_NN ;_: care_NN being_VBG taken_VBN that_IN nothing_NN that_WDT could_MD be_VB burnt_VBN escaped_JJ ._.
A_DT short_JJ time_NN after_IN the_DT houses_NNS were_VBD set_VBN fire_NN to_TO it_PRP began_VBD to_TO blow_VB half_PDT a_DT gale_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT good_JJ many_JJ more_JJR houses_NNS than_IN was_VBD intended_VBN were_VBD destroyed_VBN by_IN fire_NN ,_, but_CC this_DT may_MD be_VB looked_VBN upon_IN as_IN an_DT error_NN of_IN Providence_NNP ,_, if_IN such_JJ can_MD be_VB ,_, on_IN the_DT right_JJ side_NN ._.
Every_DT heap_NN of_IN refuse_NN and_CC litter_NN in_IN and_CC round_VB the_DT village_NN was_VBD also_RB set_VBN fire_NN to_TO and_CC burned_VBN as_RB far_RB as_IN this_DT was_VBD possible_JJ ._.
The_DT sentries_NNS placed_VBN over_IN the_DT infected_JJ houses_NNS were_VBD then_RB withdrawn_VBN ,_, the_DT cordon_NN round_VBD the_DT village_NN still_RB remaining_VBG ._.
23_CD ._.
Every_DT morning_NN and_CC evening_VBG a_DT bugler_NN blew_NN ``_`` The_DT assembly_NN ''_'' for_IN roll_NN call_NN and_CC inspection_NN in_IN the_DT several_JJ camps_NNS ,_, any_DT one_CD showing_NN signs_NNS of_IN disease_NN or_CC debility_NN being_VBG put_VBN apart_RP for_IN further_JJ examination_NN after_IN inspection_NN ._.
24_CD ._.
It_PRP having_VBG been_VBN found_VBN that_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT people_NNS obtained_VBD their_PRP$ livelihood_NN by_IN daily_JJ labour_NNS and_CC begging_NN ,_, these_DT had_VBD to_TO be_VB put_VBN on_IN free_JJ rations_NNS at_IN the_DT expense_NN of_IN the_DT State_NNP ,_, their_PRP$ ordinary_JJ means_NNS of_IN livelihood_NN being_VBG interfered_VBN with_IN by_IN their_PRP$ segregation_NN in_IN camp_NN ._.
Every_DT effort_NN was_VBD made_VBN to_TO convince_VB the_DT people_NNS that_IN the_DT measures_NNS taken_VBN were_VBD entirely_RB for_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ benefit_NN and_CC with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO stop_VB the_DT mortality_NN amongst_VBZ them_PRP ._.
Compensation_NN was_VBD promised_VBN for_IN the_DT unavoidable_JJ damage_NN to_TO their_PRP$ property_NN and_CC crops_NNS ;_: they_PRP were_VBD made_VBN as_RB comfortable_JJ as_IN possible_JJ under_IN the_DT circumstances_NNS ._.
Small_JJ luxuries_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN tobacco_NN ,_, etc._FW ,_, was_VBD given_VBN to_TO them_PRP ,_, they_PRP were_VBD urged_VBN and_CC encouraged_VBN to_TO scatter_VB themselves_PRP as_RB much_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, to_TO wash_VB themselves_PRP and_CC their_PRP$ clothing_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO keep_VB the_DT ground_NN in_IN their_PRP$ vicinity_NN clean_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD ,_, moreover_RB ,_, pointed_VBD out_RP that_IN it_PRP was_VBD absolutely_RB necessary_JJ that_IN the_DT camp_NN rules_NNS should_MD be_VB carried_VBN out_IN in_IN their_PRP$ entirety_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN obtaining_VBG the_DT full_JJ bene-_JJ fit_NN for_IN which_WDT they_PRP were_VBD formulated_VBN ,_, and_CC they_PRP were_VBD made_VBN to_TO understand_VB very_RB clearly_RB that_IN ,_, if_IN necessary_JJ ,_, these_DT rules_NNS would_MD be_VB carried_VBN out_RP by_IN force_NN ._.
25_CD ._.
The_DT sentries_NNS were_VBD prohibited_VBN from_IN entering_VBG the_DT segregation_NN camp_NN ,_, and_CC were_VBD warned_VBN not_RB to_TO let_VB any_DT of_IN the_DT villagers_NNS approach_VBP within_IN fifteen_JJ yards_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ post_NN ._.
Measures_NNS taken_VBN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
26_CD ._.
The_DT measures_NNS taken_VBN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT plague_NN from_IN spreading_VBG to_TO other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT State_NNP were_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) The_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT staff_NN of_IN civil_JJ officials_NNS ,_, Suba_NNP ,_, Tehsildar_NNP ,_, chuprassies_NNS ,_, etc._FW ,_, were_VBD removed_VBN from_IN the_DT vicinity_NN of_IN the_DT village_NN and_CC located_VBD nearthe_JJ village_NN Belloni_NNP ,_, nobody_NN ,_, except_IN the_DT medical_JJ staff_NN and_CC the_DT officers_NNS and_CC sepoys_NNS engaged_VBN on_IN ?_. VII_NNP ._. ]_NN
Measures_NNS outside_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.
23_CD segregation_NN duty_NN ,_, being_VBG allowed_VBN to_TO remain_VB within_IN the_DT boundary_JJ limits_NNS of_IN Khandraoni_NNP village_NN ._.
(_( b_NN )_) Nobody_NN ,_, without_IN regard_NN to_TO his_PRP$ rank_NN ,_, business_NN or_CC occupation_NN ,_, was_VBD permitted_VBN to_TO enter_VB or_CC leave_VB the_DT segregation_NN camps_NNS or_CC cross_VB the_DT village_NN boundary_NN without_IN an_DT order_NN from_IN me_PRP and_CC without_IN being_VBG accompanied_VBN by_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT orderly_JJ Havil-_NNP dars_NNS detailed_VBD for_IN this_DT duty_NN at_IN my_PRP$ camp_NN ,_, and_CC orders_NNS were_VBD issued_VBN to_TO the_DT sentries_NNS that_WDT under_IN no_DT pretext_NN whatsoever_NN was_VBD this_DT rule_NN to_TO be_VB broken_VBN ,_, and_CC to_TO make_VB this_DT further_JJ cer-_NN tain_NN ,_, entrance_NN to_TO or_CC exit_NN from_IN village_NN boundary_JJ limits_NNS on_IN segregation_NN camps_NNS was_VBD absolutely_RB prohibited_VBN ,_, except_IN at_IN one_CD place_NN appointed_VBN for_IN this_DT purpose_NN ._.
Considerable_JJ incon-_JJ venience_NN no_DT doubt_NN arose_VBD from_IN this_DT rule_NN ,_, but_CC it_PRP was_VBD early_RB recognised_VBN that_IN the_DT strict_JJ observance_NN of_IN this_DT rule_NN was_VBD of_IN the_DT most_RBS vital_JJ importance_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ satisfactory_JJ to_TO be_VB able_JJ to_TO state_NN that_IN ,_, with_IN one_CD exception_NN which_WDT fortunately_RB was_VBD followed_VBN by_IN no_DT ill-result_NN ,_, but_CC of_IN which_WDT due_JJ notice_NN was_VBD taken_VBN ,_, no_DT instance_NN of_IN this_DT rule_NN being_VBG broken_VBN came_VBD to_TO my_PRP$ knowledge_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT Officers_NNPS Commanding_VBG the_DT Troops_NNP ,_, Sir-Suba_NNP ,_, and_CC other_JJ officials_NNS set_VBD a_DT good_JJ example_NN by_IN their_PRP$ strict_JJ adherence_NN to_TO this_DT rule_NN ._.
(_( c_NN )_) A_DT list_NN containing_VBG the_DT names_NNS of_IN every_DT village_NN within_IN a_DT radius_NN of_IN ten_JJ miles_NNS from_IN Khandraoni_NNP was_VBD made_VBN out_RP ,_, these_DT villages_NNS were_VBD divided_VBN into_IN circles_NNS of_IN four_CD or_CC five_CD villages_NNS ,_, each_DT according_VBG to_TO the_DT distance_NN between_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC each_DT circle_NN was_VBD placed_VBN in_IN charge_NN of_IN a_DT policeman_NN whose_WP$ duty_NN it_PRP was_VBD to_TO collect_VB daily_JJ reports_NNS from_IN the_DT Patwaris_NNP of_IN each_DT village_NN ._.
The_DT reports_NNS to_TO contain_VB the_DT following_JJ in-_JJ formation_NN :_: -_: I.-Whether_NN there_EX were_VBD any_DT sick_JJ in_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN so_RB ,_, the_DT nature_NN of_IN their_PRP$ sickness_NN ._.
II.-Whether_NNP any_DT one_CD had_VBD arrived_VBN or_CC left_VBN the_DT village_NN since_IN last_JJ report_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN so_RB ,_, where_WRB they_PRP had_VBD come_VBN from_IN or_CC gone_VBN to_TO ._.
(_( d_NN )_) On_IN comparing_VBG the_DT census_NN of_IN Khandraoni_NNP ,_, taken_VBN in_IN July_NNP 1896_CD ,_, with_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN people_NNS present_JJ when_WRB the_DT roll_NN was_VBD made_VBN out_RP ,_, it_PRP was_VBD seen_VBN that_IN there_EX was_VBD a_DT considerable_JJ decrease_NN in_IN the_DT population_NN ,_, even_RB allowing_VBG for_IN the_DT number_NN who_WP had_VBD died_VBN of_IN plague_NN and_CC other_JJ cause_NN during_IN the_DT preceding_VBG eight_CD months_NNS ._.
A_DT return_NN was_VBD therefore_RB called_VBN for_IN from_IN all_DT villages_NNS within_IN ten_JJ miles_NNS radius_RB showing_VBG ,_, if_IN any_DT one_CD from_IN Khandraoni_NNP had_VBD arrived_VBN in_IN the_DT village_NN since_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN January_NNP ,_, and_CC if_IN so_RB ,_, whether_IN they_PRP were_VBD 24_CD Measures_NNS outside_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.
[_JJ APP_NNP ._.
VII_NNP ,_, still_RB there_RB ,_, a_DT list_NN of_IN their_PRP$ names_NNS with_IN dates_NNS of_IN arrival_NN being_VBG also_RB asked_VBN for_IN ,_, enquiry_NN was_VBD also_RB made_VBN from_IN the_DT inhabi-_JJ tants_NNS of_IN Khandraoni_NNP itself_PRP as_IN to_TO the_DT whereabouts_NNS of_IN any_DT one_NN who_WP had_VBD left_VBN the_DT village_NN since_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN the_DT Brahmins_NNP ,_, Bindraban_NNP and_CC Khoobi_NNP ,_, from_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
(_( e_NN )_) Orders_NNPS were_VBD issued_VBN that_IN if_IN there_EX were_VBD any_DT persons_NNS who_WP had_VBD come_VBN from_IN Bombay_NNP since_IN July_NNP 1896_CD ,_, or_CC from_IN Khandraoni_NNP since_IN the_DT 1st_CD of_IN January_NNP 1897_CD ,_, such_JJ persons_NNS were_VBD to_TO be_VB segregated_VBN outside_IN the_DT village_NN until_IN inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN ._.
(_( f_NN )_) A_DT list_NN was_VBD called_VBN for_IN giving_VBG the_DT names_NNS of_IN any_DT of_IN the_DT inhabi-_JJ tants_NNS of_IN villages_NNS who_WP might_MD then_RB be_VB in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC orders_NNS were_VBD issued_VBN that_IN their_PRP$ relations_NNS in_IN the_DT village_NN should_MD write_VB and_CC tell_VB them_PRP that_IN they_PRP were_VBD prohibited_VBN from_IN coming_VBG back_RB to_TO the_DT State_NNP during_IN the_DT continuance_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN at_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
(_( g_NN )_) Orders_NNPS were_VBD issued_VBN to_TO the_DT inhabitants_NNS of_IN all_DT villages_NNS within_IN ten_JJ miles_NNS round_VBP that_IN no_DT person_NN from_IN Khandraoni_NNP or_CC Bombay_NNP was_VBD to_TO be_VB admitted_VBN into_IN the_DT village_NN ;_: moreover_CC ,_, they_PRP them-_VBP selves_NNS were_VBD prohibited_VBN from_IN coming_VBG to_TO Khandraoni_NNP ,_, and_CC they_PRP were_VBD also_RB told_VBN that_IN ,_, except_IN for_IN any_DT very_RB urgent_JJ reasons_NNS ,_, they_PRP were_VBD to_TO remain_VB at_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ village_NN for_IN at_IN least_JJS a_DT month_NN ._.
(_( h_NN )_) The_DT villages_NNS all_DT round_NN were_VBD inspected_VBN ,_, those_DT in_IN which_WDT there_EX were_VBD people_NNS who_WP had_VBD come_VBN from_IN Khandraoni_NNP and_CC Bombay_NNP being_VBG taken_VBN first_RB ,_, and_CC no_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB present_JJ amongst_VB them_PRP ._.
False_JJ alarms_NNS were_VBD at_IN first_JJ of_IN fre-_JJ quent_NN occurrence_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT daily_JJ reports_NNS contained_VBD many_JJ cases_NNS ,_, whose_WP$ symptoms_NNS ,_, roughly_RB described_VBN by_IN the_DT Pat-_NNP waris_NN ,_, might_MD be_VB those_DT of_IN plague_NN ;_: these_DT were_VBD inspected_VBN without_IN delay_NN ,_, and_CC though_IN doing_VBG so_RB entailed_VBD many_JJ long_RB rides_NNS ,_, still_RB there_EX was_VBD satisfactory_JJ compensation_NN ,_, inasmuch_JJ as_IN none_NN of_IN these_DT cases_NNS thus_RB inspected_VBN proved_VBD to_TO be_VB plague_NN ._.
(_( i_NN )_) Supplies_NNPS for_IN the_DT sepoys_NNS were_VBD brought_VBN from_IN outside_NN into_IN their_PRP$ camp_NN ,_, which_WDT was_VBD pitched_VBN about_IN a_DT mile_NN from_IN the_DT villages_NNS under_IN escort_NN ._.
The_DT carts_NNS were_VBD unloaded_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT cart_NN and_CC cartmen_NNS at_IN once_RB conducted_VBN outside_JJ village_NN limits_NNS ._.
The_DT supplies_NNS for_IN segregation_NN camp_NN were_VBD in_IN a_DT similar_JJ manner_NN brought_VBD to_TO the_DT places_NNS appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT Bunniahs_NNP near_IN which_WDT no_DT villager_NN was_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO approach_VB ._.

Measures_NNS outside_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.
25_CD Arrangements_NNS for_IN treatment_NN of_IN sick_NN ._.
27_CD ._.
The_DT arrangements_NNS for_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN the_DT sick_JJ were_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) The_DT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP and_CC medicines_NNS were_VBD ordered_VBN with_IN the_DT troops_NNS from_IN Karera_NNP ._.
(_( b_NN )_) Chapper_NNP huts_NNS were_VBD provided_VBN for_IN each_DT patient_NN ,_, the_DT huts_NNS being_VBG placed_VBN about_IN 20_CD yards_NNS from_IN one_CD another_DT ,_, clean_JJ straw_NN being_VBG placed_VBN on_IN the_DT ground_NN ,_, separate_JJ chappers_NNS were_VBD made_VBN for_IN the_DT other_JJ members_NNS of_IN the_DT patient_NN 's_POS family_NN who_WP were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO attend_VB upon_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ sick_NN ,_, but_CC were_VBD discour-_NNS aged_VBN from_IN coming_VBG in_IN any_DT number_NN to_TO the_DT sick_JJ huts_NNS ._.
(_( c_NN )_) Charpoys_VBZ with_IN blankets_NNS ,_, etc._FW ,_, were_VBD supplied_VBN ,_, suitable_JJ food_NN was_VBD cooked_VBN for_IN all_DT patients_NNS either_CC by_IN a_DT member_NN of_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ family_NN or_CC by_IN a_DT Brahman_NNP who_WP was_VBD appointed_VBN as_IN a_DT cook_NN or_CC water-carrier_NN ._.
28_CD ._.
There_EX being_VBG few_JJ patients_NNS in_IN hospital_NN ,_, nobody_NN ,_, except_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Assistant_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP and_CC Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP ,_, were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO enter_VB the_DT segregation_NN camps_NNS ._.
29_CD ._.
A_DT mehtar_NN was_VBD entertained_VBN for_IN the_DT hospital_NN segregation_NN camp_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO go_VB outside_IN it_PRP until_IN it_PRP was_VBD finally_RB broken_VBN up_RP ._.
30_CD ._.
When_WRB a_DT patient_NN died_VBD the_DT body_NN was_VBD cremated_VBN ,_, all_PDT the_DT patient_NN 's_POS clothes_NNS ,_, charpoy_NN ,_, hut_NN ,_, etc._NN ,_, being_VBG burnt_JJ ,_, compensation_NN for_IN clothes_NNS being_VBG paid_VBN to_TO the_DT relatives_NNS ._.
31_CD ._.
The_DT mode_NN of_IN supplying_VBG the_DT hospital_NN camp_NN with_IN food_NN has_VBZ already_RB been_VBN noted_VBN ._.
Non-inter-_JJ ference_NN with_IN harvest_NN ._.
32_CD ._.
There_EX was_VBD at_IN first_JJ considerable_JJ difficulty_NN in_IN carrying_VBG out_RP the_DT :_: instruction_NN issued_VBD regarding_VBG non-interference_NN with_IN the_DT harvesting_NN of_IN the_DT crops_NNS ,_, as_IN on_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN the_DT four_CD companies_NNS of_IN infantry_NN from_IN Karera_NNP it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN that_IN the_DT total_JJ strength_NN amounted_VBD to_TO only_RB 204_CD sepoys_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD impossible_JJ to_TO cover_VB the_DT amount_NN of_IN ground_NN within_IN village_NN limits_NNS with_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN sentries_NNS at_IN my_PRP$ disposal_NN ._.
I_PRP therefore_RB telegraphed_VBD to_TO Gwalior_NNP to_TO send_VB four_CD more_JJR companies_NNS of_IN infantry_NN from_IN Lashkar_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT meantime_NN I_PRP had_VBD perforce_NN to_TO keep_VB the_DT inhabitants_NNS in_IN segregration_NN camp_NN of_IN a_DT necessarily_RB confined_VBN area_NN ;_: H._NNP H._NNP the_DT Maharajah_NNP 's_POS promptness_NN in_IN acceding_VBG to_TO my_PRP$ request_NN and_CC in_IN despatch-_JJ ing_NN without_IN delay_FW four_CD companies_NNS of_IN the_DT 10th_JJ Infantry_NNP of_IN a_DT strength_NN of_IN 232_CD sepoys_NNS placed_VBD me_PRP in_IN a_DT position_NN to_TO carry_VB out_RP H._NNP H._NNP 's_POS instruc-_JJ tions_NNS regarding_VBG the_DT crops_NNS ._.
33_CD ._.
The_DT line_NN of_IN sentries_NNS round_VBP the_DT segregation_NN camp_NN were_VBD thrown_VBN back_RB to_TO the_DT limits_NNS of_IN the_DT village_NN boundary_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT people_NNS of_IN class_NN I_PRP were_VBD then_RB at_IN liberty_NN to_TO harvest_VB their_PRP$ crops_NNS at_IN their_PRP$ leisure_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN those_DT lying_VBG within_IN segregation_NN camps_NNS of_IN classes_NNS II_NNP ,_, III_NNP and_CC IV_NNP ;_: and_CC after_IN ten_JJ days_NNS in_IN segregation_NN camp_NN ,_, those_DT of_IN class_NN II_NNP ,_, no_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN having_VBG occurred_VBN amongst_IN them_PRP ,_, were_VBD also_RB allowed_VBN to_TO C4_NNP ?_. 26_CD Measures_NNS outside_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.

VII_NNP ._.
harvest_JJS their_PRP$ crops_NNS and_CC were_VBD amalgamated_VBN with_IN class_NN I_PRP in_IN so_RB far_RB as_IN the_DT limit_NN of_IN their_PRP$ camp_NN was_VBD concerned_VBN ._.
34_CD ._.
The_DT crops_NNS of_IN classes_NNS III_NNP and_CC IV_NNP were_VBD harvested_VBN under_IN the_DT direction_NN of_IN the_DT Assistant_NNP Tehsildar_NNP attached_VBD to_TO the_DT Suba_NNP 's_POS camp_NN ._.
35_CD ._.
The_DT villagers_NNS of_IN Billoni_NNP who_WP had_VBD a_DT few_JJ fields_NNS just_RB inside_IN the_DT Khandraoni_NNP village_NN limits_NNS were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO work_VB under_IN a_DT guard_NN ;_: they_PRP cut_VBD their_PRP$ crops_NNS in_IN one_CD day_NN and_CC took_VBD them_PRP outside_IN the_DT chain_NN of_IN sentries_NNS ,_, not_RB having_VBG come_VBN in_IN contact_NN with_IN the_DT Khandraoni_NNP villagers_NNS in_IN any_DT way_NN ._.
36_CD ._.
It_PRP was_VBD thought_VBN well_RB to_TO defer_VB cleaning_VBG up_RP the_DT village_NN until_IN the_DT infected_JJ houses_NNS ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ site_NN ,_, had_VBD been_VBN exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT disinfecting_VBG action_NN of_IN the_DT sun_NN and_CC air_NN for_IN at_IN least_JJS three_CD weeks_NNS ,_, and_CC thus_RB prevent_VB the_DT danger_NN of_IN persons_NNS engaged_VBN in_IN cleaning_VBG the_DT village_NN from_IN contracting_VBG the_DT disease_NN ._.
Cleaning_NN and_CC disinfecting_NN village_NN ._.
37_CD ._.
The_DT following_NN were_VBD the_DT arrangements_NNS made_VBN for_IN cleaning_NN and_CC disinfecting_VBG the_DT village_NN :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) A_DT number_NN was_VBD affixed_VBN to_TO every_DT house_NN in_IN the_DT village_NN and_CC a_DT list_NN of_IN the_DT owners_NNS was_VBD made_VBN ,_, the_DT houses_NNS being_VBG divided_VBN into_IN classes_NNS to_TO correspond_VB with_IN those_DT into_IN which_WDT the_DT inhabitants_NNS had_VBD been_VBN divided_VBN in_IN the_DT first_JJ instance_NN ,_, except_IN that_DT class_NN II_NNP was_VBD amalgamated_VBN with_IN class_NN I_PRP ._.
(_( b_NN )_) The_DT owners_NNS of_IN class_NN I_PRP were_VBD then_RB required_VBN to_TO clean_VB their_PRP$ own_JJ houses_NNS ,_, and_CC ,_, for_IN this_DT purpose_NN ,_, were_VBD divided_VBN into_IN working_VBG parties_NNS of_IN not_RB more_JJR than_IN ten_JJ persons_NNS in_IN each_DT ,_, each_DT working_VBG party_NN being_VBG supplied_VBN with_IN phowras_NNS ,_, baskets_NNS ,_, etc._NN ,_, to_TO clean_VB away_RP dirt_NN and_CC rubbish_NN ,_, and_CC lime_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN white-_JJ washing_VBG the_DT houses_NNS inside_IN and_CC outside_JJ ,_, and_CC were_VBD placed_VBN in_IN charge_NN of_IN two_CD sepoys_NNS who_WP were_VBD ordered_VBN to_TO see_VB that_IN this_DT work_NN was_VBD thoroughly_RB and_CC quickly_RB carried_VBD out_RP ,_, and_CC that_IN all_DT rub-_JJ bish_NN was_VBD removed_VBN to_TO a_DT distance_NN and_CC burnt_NN as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, that_IN the_DT working_VBG parties_NNS did_VBD not_RB enter_VB houses_NNS other_JJ than_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN every_DT evening_NN they_PRP marched_VBD them_PRP out-_JJ side_NN the_DT chain_NN of_IN sentries_NNS posted_VBN round_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, and_CC saw_VBD that_IN the_DT phowras_NNS ,_, baskets_NNS ,_, etc._FW ,_, were_VBD deposited_VBN in_IN the_DT place_NN assigned_VBN to_TO them_PRP under_IN a_DT guard_NN ._.
Rest_NN from_IN noon_NN to_TO 2_CD o'clock_NN was_VBD allowed_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT work_NN was_VBD daily_RB inspected_VBN in_IN order_NN to_TO see_VB that_IN it_PRP was_VBD properly_RB done_VBN ._.
(_( c_NN )_) As_IN the_DT people_NNS of_IN classes_NNS III_NNP and_CC IV_NNP were_VBD still_RB segregated_VBN from_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN and_CC remained_VBD so_RB until_IN the_DT camp_NN was_VBD finally_RB broken_VBN up_RP ,_, working_VBG parties_NNS were_VBD engaged_VBN to_TO clean_VB their_PRP$ houses_NNS from_IN which_WDT the_DT dbris_NN was_VBD first_RB removed_VBN ,_, the_DT floors_NNS were_VBD then_RB dug_VB up_RP to_TO the_DT depth_NN of_IN one_CD and_CC a_DT half_JJ feet_NNS ,_, the_DT walls_NNS were_VBD scraped_VBN ,_, and_CC both_DT were_VBD APP_NNP ._.
VII_NNP ._. ]_NN
Measures_NNS outside_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.
27_CD thoroughly_RB sprayed_VBN with_IN disinfectants_NNS by_IN means_NNS of_IN a_DT fire-_JJ engine_NN ,_, worked_VBN by_IN hand_NN ,_, brought_VBD from_IN Gwalior_NNP for_IN this_DT purpose_NN ._.
(_( d_NN )_) In_IN the_DT meantime_NN the_DT working_VBG parties_NNS were_VBD engaged_VBN in_IN clean-_NN ing_VBG up_RP the_DT village_NN generally_RB ,_, every_DT one_CD employed_VBN being_VBG paid_VBN daily_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT working_VBG parties_NNS being_VBG all_DT under_IN the_DT supervision_NN of_IN sepoys_NNS told_VBD off_RP for_IN this_DT purpose_NN ;_: no_DT slouching_NN was_VBD allowed_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT work_NN was_VBD carried_VBN out_IN sys-_JJ tematically_RB and_CC continuously_RB until_IN I_PRP was_VBD satisfied_VBN that_IN the_DT village_NN was_VBD cleaned_VBN as_RB far_RB as_IN any_DT Indian_JJ village_NN could_MD be_VB ._.
Segregation_NN camp_NN broken_VBN up_RP ._.
The_DT village_NN having_VBG been_VBN thoroughly_RB cleaned_VBN and_CC disinfected_VBN ,_, and_CC no_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN having_VBG occurred_VBN since_IN the_DT 1st_CD April_NNP ,_, and_CC those_DT who_WP had_VBD been_VBN under_IN treatment_NN being_VBG now_RB recovered_VBN ,_, the_DT segregation_NN camp_NN was_VBD broken_VBN up_RP on_IN the_DT 29th_CD April_NNP ._.

The_DT harvest_NN having_VBG been_VBN gathered_VBN ,_, and_CC there_RB being_VBG many_JJ in_IN the_DT village_NN who_WP obtained_VBD their_PRP$ livelihood_NN by_IN daily_JJ labour_NNS or_CC begging_VBG ,_, relief_NN works_NNS were_VBD started_VBN for_IN the_DT former_JJ ,_, and_CC free_JJ rations_NNS were_VBD continued_VBN to_TO those_DT of_IN the_DT latter_NN who_WP were_VBD unable_JJ to_TO work_VB ._.

General_NNP remarks_NNS ._.
39_CD ._.
The_DT effects_NNS of_IN the_DT measures_NNS taken_VBN were_VBD too_RB successful_JJ to_TO allow_VB of_IN any_DT extended_JJ study_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, as_IN besides_IN the_DT eleven_JJ cases_NNS admitted_VBN on_IN my_PRP$ arrival_NN at_IN the_DT village_NN ,_, only_RB four_CD more_JJR admissions_NNS took_VBD place_NN ,_, and_CC those_DT within_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT information_NN of_IN the_DT segrega-_JJ tion_NN camps_NNS ._.

VII_NNP ._.
all_PDT the_DT cases_NNS that_WDT recovered_VBD general_JJ debility_NN was_VBD very_RB marked_JJ feature_NN ._.

29_CD This_DT damage_NN occurred_VBD owing_VBG to_TO the_DT small_JJ strength_NN of_IN the_DT troops_NNS available_JJ for_IN sentry_NN duty_NN when_WRB the_DT camp_NN was_VBD first_RB formed_VBN ,_, rendering_VBG it_PRP impossible_JJ to_TO allow_VB the_DT villagers_NNS access_NN to_TO their_PRP$ fields_NNS and_CC so_RB prevent_JJ damage_NN from_IN cattle_NNS ;_: neither_DT was_VBD it_PRP possible_JJ ,_, for_IN sanitry_NN reasons_NNS ,_, to_TO keep_VB the_DT cattle_NNS within_IN segregation_NN camp_NN ,_, as_IN they_PRP numbered_VBD 1,500_CD ,_, nor_CC could_MD arrangements_NNS be_VB made_VBN for_IN their_PRP$ food_NN ._.

Measures_NNS outside_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.

53_CD ._.
This_DT class_NN of_IN compensation_NN refers_NNS only_RB to_TO persons_NNS whose_WP$ houses_NNS being_VBG infected_VBN ,_, or_CC contagious_JJ to_TO those_DT infected_VBN ,_, were_VBD burnt_VBN ._.
54_CD ._.
In_IN order_NN to_TO make_VB an_DT estimate_NN of_IN the_DT cost_NN of_IN re-roofing_VBG the_DT houses_NNS ,_, measurements_NNS of_IN each_DT roof_NN were_VBD taken_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT amount_NN of_IN wood_NN required_VBN for_IN this_DT purpose_NN and_CC also_RB for_IN doors_NNS ,_, etc._FW ,_, was_VBD noted_VBN ;_: an_DT estimate_NN was_VBD then_RB made_VBN of_IN the_DT different_JJ kinds_NNS of_IN materials_NNS required_VBN for_IN each_DT roof_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT cost_NN of_IN re-roofing_NN calculated_VBN at_IN the_DT local_JJ rate_NN ,_, and_CC adding_VBG to_TO this_DT the_DT value_NN of_IN the_DT doors_NNS and_CC the_DT cost_NN of_IN labour_NN ,_, the_DT amount_NN of_IN compensation_NN payable_JJ for_IN each_DT house_NN separately_RB was_VBD obtained_VBN ._.
Most_JJS of_IN the_DT houses_NNS had_VBD tile_JJ roofing_NN ,_, the_DT average_JJ cost_NN of_IN which_WDT at_IN the_DT village_NN rate_NN is_VBZ Re_NNP ,_, 0-1-7_JJ per_IN square_JJ yard_NN ,_, thatched_VBD roofing_VBG costing_VBG half_NN as_IN much_JJ more_JJR ._.

55_CD ._.

936-G._JJ Plague_NNP is_VBZ endemic_JJ at_IN Palanpur_NNP ._.

Two_CD men_NNS from_IN Palanpur_NNP have_VBP been_VBN stopped_VBN with_IN plague_NN at_IN Abu_NNP road_NN and_CC if_IN this_DT continues_VBZ plague_NN may_MD become_VB endemic_JJ there_RB and_CC extend_VB into_IN Raj-_NNP putana_NN ._.
Palanpur_JJ people_NNS should_MD I_PRP think_VBP be_VB prevented_VBN from_IN booking_VBG from_IN Palanpur_NNP up_RP country_NN unless_IN they_PRP have_VBP gone_VBN through_IN quarantine_NN at_IN Palanpur_NNP ._.

Plague_NN at_IN Palanpur_NNP ._.
Government_NN of_IN India_NNP are_VBP opposed_VBN to_TO establishment_NN of_IN absolute_JJ quaran-_JJ tine_NN against_IN plague_NN infected_JJ places_NNS ._.
All_DT past_JJ experience_NN shows_NNS that_IN such_JJ quarantine_NN is_VBZ certain_JJ to_TO be_VB ineffective_JJ and_CC it_PRP causes_VBZ great_JJ in-_JJ convenience_NN and_CC hardship_NN besides_IN giving_VBG rise_NN to_TO opportunities_NNS of_IN oppression_NN and_CC extortion_NN ._.
