That_DT plague_NN follows_VBZ the_DT lines_NNS of_IN human_JJ intercourse_NN and_CC is_VBZ spread_VBN by_IN human_JJ beings_NNS is_VBZ written_VBN large_JJ in_IN the_DT Epidemiological_NNP History_NNP of_IN the_DT human_JJ race_NN ,_, and_CC every_DT succeeding_VBG epidemic_JJ ,_, including_VBG the_DT present_JJ one_CD ,_, amply_RB bears_VBZ this_DT out_RP ;_: it_PRP can_MD only_RB spread_VB along_IN these_DT lines_NNS ._.
The_DT great_JJ spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN which_WDT has_VBZ occurred_VBN in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO the_DT hurrying_VBG crowds_NN of_IN panic-stricken_JJ people_NNS ,_, who_WP ,_, as_IN a_DT rule_NN ,_, are_VBP rushing_VBG from_IN the_DT place_NN of_IN greatest_JJS infection_NN ,_, many_JJ in_IN their_PRP$ fear_NN deserting_VBG their_PRP$ dead_JJ and_CC dying_VBG relatives_NNS ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ these_DT panic-stricken_JJ people_NNS that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ so_RB essential_JJ to_TO catch_VB ,_, almost_RB as_RB much_JJ as_IN an_DT individual_NN enveloped_VBD in_IN flames_NNS ,_, who_WP ,_, by_IN his_PRP$ flight_NN ,_, not_RB only_RB in-_JJ jures_NNS himself_PRP ,_, but_CC may_MD bring_VB devastation_NN on_IN others_NNS ._.
Unfortunately_RB the_DT bacillus_NN of_IN plague_NN is_VBZ not_RB of_IN a_DT luminant_JJ nature_NN ,_, hence_RB the_DT necessity_NN of_IN quarantining_VBG all_DT suspects_NNS ._.
Absolute_NNP quarantine_NN is_VBZ an_DT admitted_JJ hardship_NN ,_, it_PRP paralyses_VBZ trade_NN and_CC dislocates_VBZ the_DT ordinary_JJ routine_NN of_IN every_DT day_NN life_NN ,_, it_PRP should_MD there-_VB fore_NN be_VB enacted_VBN in_IN a_DT common_JJ sense_NN manner_NN and_CC interpreted_VBN in_IN a_DT spirit_NN of_IN expediency_NN ._.
By_IN a_DT liberal_JJ grant_NN of_IN what_WP may_MD be_VB called_VBN sanitary_JJ passes_NNS ,_, the_DT hardships_NNS of_IN quarantine_NN can_MD be_VB largely_RB mitigated_VBN ._.
The_DT scheme_NN of_IN quarantine_NN is_VBZ to_TO impound_VB all_DT persons_NNS and_CC effects_NNS ,_, who_WP ,_, from_IN the_DT locality_NN they_PRP come_VBP from_IN ,_, and_CC also_RB from_IN the_DT purport_NN of_IN their_PRP$ journey_NN ,_, are_VBP likely_JJ to_TO be_VB spreaders_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT power_NN to_TO sign_VB sanitary_JJ passes_NNS was_VBD given_VBN to_TO a_DT certain_JJ number_NN of_IN responsible_JJ officials_NNS ,_, the_DT spirit_NN and_CC practical_JJ effects_NNS of_IN quarantine_NN would_MD be_VB enforced_VBN ._.
Because_IN quarantine_NN is_VBZ not_RB made_VBN absolute_IN it_PRP by_IN no_DT means_NN follows_VBZ that_IN the_DT measure_NN is_VBZ inoperative_JJ ._.
Every_DT plague_NN case_NN is_VBZ a_DT possible_JJ focus_NN of_IN infection_NN and_CC every_DT person_NN that_WDT is_VBZ kept_VBN within_IN quarantine_JJ limits_NNS is_VBZ a_DT possible_JJ centre_NN of_IN infection_NN that_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN repressed_VBN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT disease_NN that_WDT can_MD so_VB readily_RB be_VB smothered_VBN in_IN its_PRP$ initial_JJ stage_NN ,_, therefore_RB an_DT occasional_JJ case_NN that_WDT may_MD escape_VB the_DT scrutiny_NN of_IN the_DT quarantine_NN officials_NNS would_MD do_VB but_CC little_VB harm_NN ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ when_WRB many_JJ escape_VBP that_IN the_DT disease_NN becomes_NNS heightened_VBD up_RP into_IN epidemic_JJ dimensions_NNS and_CC it_PRP becomes_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO keep_VB it_PRP in_IN check_NN ._.
Local_JJ quarantine_NN may_MD be_VB divided_VBN into_IN :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) Camps_NNP of_IN observation_NN for_IN people_NNS leaving_VBG an_DT infected_JJ area_NN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN disease_NN into_IN the_DT districts_NNS ._.
(_( b_NN )_) Camps_NNP of_IN observation_NN for_IN arrivals_NNS from_IN infected_JJ districts_NNS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT reinfection_NN of_IN a_DT place_NN already_RB infected_VBN ._.
c_NNS 7_CD 50_CD Measures_NNS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
VIII_NNP ._.
(_( c_NN )_) Camps_NNP of_IN observation_NN in_IN districts_NNS which_WDT have_VBP not_RB as_IN yet_RB been_VBN infected_VBN for_IN arrivals_NNS from_IN infected_JJ districts_NNS ._.
In_IN a_DT well_RB regulated_VBN quarantine_NN camp_NN ,_, where_WRB strict_JJ disinfection_NN and_CC supervision_NN is_VBZ carried_VBN out_IN ,_, the_DT fear_NN of_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT infection_NN is_VBZ infinitesimal_JJ ,_, and_CC if_IN it_PRP does_VBZ spread_VB it_PRP shows_VBZ a_DT badly_RB regulated_VBN camp_NN ._.
This_DT has_VBZ been_VBN amply_RB proved_VBN in_IN the_DT Poona_NNP segregation_NN camp_NN ,_, where_WRB the_DT average_JJ number_NN of_IN inhabitants_NNS have_VBP been_VBN as_RB much_JJ as_IN 800_CD ,_, and_CC yet_RB in_IN the_DT period_NN of_IN over_IN a_DT month_NN only_RB some_DT 30_CD cases_NNS have_VBP occurred_VBN ,_, and_CC these_DT were_VBD probably_RB infected_VBN on_IN arrival_NN ,_, for_IN it_PRP must_MD be_VB remembered_VBN that_IN these_DT people_NNS were_VBD all_DT relatives_NNS or_CC friends_NNS taken_VBN from_IN the_DT infected_JJ houses_NNS ._.
The_DT non-success_NN of_IN the_DT camps_NNS at_IN Karrachi_NNP was_VBD due_JJ to_TO the_DT fact_NN which_WDT I_PRP pointed_VBD out_RP in_IN my_PRP$ report_NN on_IN this_DT place_NN ,_, that_IN no_DT preliminary_JJ disinfection_NN had_VBD been_VBN carried_VBN out_IN and_CC no_DT supervision_NN had_VBD been_VBN exer-_JJ cised_VBN ._.
They_PRP were_VBD camps_NNS minus_CC any_DT quarantine_JJ restrictions_NNS whatso-_JJ ever_RB ._.
There_EX is_VBZ evidence_NN in_IN several_JJ instances_NNS in_IN this_DT epidemic_NN of_IN infected_JJ clothes_NNS brought_VBD to_TO a_DT village_NN previously_RB clear_JJ and_CC the_DT plague_NN breaking_VBG out_RP ,_, although_IN the_DT people_NNS who_WP brought_VBD the_DT clothes_NNS remained_VBD free_JJ from_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
The_DT ideal_JJ attitude_NN of_IN a_DT populace_NN in_IN plague_JJ time_NN should_MD be_VB one_CD of_IN quiescence_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP can_MD not_RB be_VB too_RB earnestly_RB impressed_VBN on_IN all_DT that_IN this_DT disease_NN can_MD be_VB successfully_RB fought_VBN in_IN the_DT place_NN in_IN which_WDT it_PRP occurs_VBZ ,_, and_CC that_IN every_DT endeavour_NN should_MD be_VB made_VBN to_TO keep_VB the_DT people_NNS within_IN the_DT infected_JJ area_NN until_IN the_DT fight_NN is_VBZ over_IN ._.
The_DT principle_NN of_IN general_JJ sea_NN quarantine_NN is_VBZ a_DT much_RB more_RBR involved_JJ question_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP will_MD vary_VB according_VBG to_TO the_DT tanacity_NN of_IN life_NN of_IN the_DT bacillus_NN which_WDT causes_VBZ the_DT disease_NN ._.
Fortunately_RB the_DT microbe_NN ,_, that_WDT is_VBZ responsible_JJ for_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN this_DT disease_NN ,_, is_VBZ a_DT microbe_NN of_IN very_RB small_JJ verile_NN power_NN ;_: it_PRP is_VBZ killed_VBN in_IN weak_JJ antiseptic_JJ solutions_NNS ,_, and_CC recent_JJ bactereological_JJ investigations_NNS tend_VBP to_TO show_VB that_IN this_DT bacillus_JJ quickly_RB succumbs_VBZ to_TO the_DT attacks_NNS of_IN the_DT other_JJ non-pathogenic_JJ bacteria_NNS who_WP are_VBP always_RB present_JJ ,_, that_IN in_IN fact_NN infected_VBN clothing_NN and_CC rooms_NNS will_MD in_IN time_NN disinfect_JJ themselves_PRP ._.

It_PRP may_MD therefore_RB be_VB affirmed_VBN that_IN while_IN local_JJ quarantine_NN is_VBZ necessary_JJ in_IN combating_VBG the_DT disease_NN ;_: that_IN all_DT evidence_NN goes_VBZ to_TO prove_VB that_IN general_JJ sea_NN quarantine_NN is_VBZ unnecessary_JJ ,_, when_WRB the_DT port_NN of_IN arrival_NN is_VBZ a_DT week_NN distant_NN from_IN the_DT affected_JJ port_NN ,_, so_IN that_DT practically_VBZ it_PRP may_MD be_VB said_VBD that_IN quarantine_JJ out-_JJ side_NN Indian_JJ limits_NNS ought_MD to_TO be_VB unnecessary_JJ ._.
I_PRP feel_VBP sure_JJ that_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB true_JJ and_CC statesman-like_JJ policy_NN to_TO freely_RB accept_VB the_DT fact_NN of_IN the_DT communicability_NN of_IN this_DT disease_NN along_IN the_DT lines_NNS of_IN human_JJ intercourse_NN ,_, a_DT fact_NN which_WDT stands_VBZ out_RP in_IN every_DT history_NN of_IN this_DT disease_NN ,_, and_CC moreover_VB a_DT fact_NN that_WDT will_MD be_VB emphasised_VBN when_WRB the_DT history_NN of_IN the_DT present_JJ visitation_NN comes_VBZ to_TO be_VB written_VBN ._.

The_DT following_JJ rules_NNS are_VBP sanctioned_VBN by_IN Government_NNP under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP (_( III_NNP )_) of_IN 1887_CD :_: -_: *1_NN ._.
When_WRB any_DT town_NN or_CC village_NN or_CC group_NN of_IN villages_NNS has_VBZ ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN the_DT District_NNP ,_, become_VBP so_RB seriously_RB infected_VBN -with_NNP plague_NN as_IN to_TO justify_VB the_DT measure_NN ,_, the_DT District_NNP Magistrate_NNP may_MD declare_VB such_JJ town_NN or_CC village_NN or_CC group_NN of_IN villages_NNS to_TO be_VB an_DT infected_JJ area_NN and_CC appoint_VB one_CD or_CC more_JJR resident_JJ Plague_NNP Authorities_NNP ,_, who_WP should_MD in-_VB variably_RB be_VB persons_NNS of_IN known_JJ and_CC approved_VBD character_NN and_CC responsible_JJ position_NN ,_, for_IN such_JJ infected_JJ area_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD give_VB notice_NN to_TO the_DT Railway_NNP Authorities_NNP at_IN any_DT station_NN within_IN 20_CD miles_NNS of_IN such_JJ infected_JJ area_NN not_RB to_TO book_NN any_DT passenger_NN unless_IN such_JJ passenger_NN either_CC produces_VBZ a_DT pass_NN signed_VBN by_IN a_DT resident_JJ Plague_NNP Authority_NNP ,_, or_CC a_DT certificate_NN from_IN such_JJ special_JJ officer_NN as_IN may_MD be_VB appointed_VBN in_IN that_DT behalf_NN or_CC ,_, where_WRB no_DT such_JJ special_JJ officer_NN has_VBZ been_VBN appointed_VBN ,_, from_IN the_DT patel_NN and_CC village_NN account-_JJ ant_NN of_IN his_PRP$ village_NN (_( such_JJ village_NN not_RB being_VBG within_IN the_DT said_VBD infected_JJ area_NN )_) that_IN he_PRP is_VBZ a_DT resident_NN of_IN such_JJ village_NN and_CC has_VBZ only_RB just_RB quitted_VBN it_PRP ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT District_NNP Magistrate_NNP may_MD prohibit_VB the_DT departure_NN of_IN any_DT person_NN or_CC classes_NNS of_IN persons_NNS from_IN an_DT infected_JJ area_NN ,_, except_IN under_IN passes_NNS granted_VBN by_IN a_DT resident_JJ Plague_NNP Authority_NNP appointed_VBN by_IN the_DT District_NNP Magistrate_NNP ,_, and_CC may_MD set_VB up_RP the_DT gates_NNS ,_, chowkies_NNS ,_, etc._NN ,_, and_CC ,_, with_IN the_DT sanction_NN of_IN the_DT Commissioner_NNP ,_, employ_VBZ the_DT establishment_NN necessary_JJ to_TO enforce_VB this_DT order_NN :_: provided_VBN that_IN any_DT person_NN shall_MD be_VB entitled_VBN to_TO a_DT pass_NN who_WP has_VBZ been_VBN segregated_VBN to_TO the_DT satisfaction_NN of_IN the_DT resident_NN Plague_NNP Authority_NNP (_( t_NN )_) in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT segregation_NN quarters_NNS for_IN seven_CD days_NNS without_IN exhibiting_VBG any_DT sign_NN of_IN infection_NN ._.

3_CD ._.
When_WRB the_DT District_NNP Magistrate_NNP has_VBZ applied_VBN Rule_NNP 2_CD to_TO any_DT place_NN or_CC group_NN of_IN villages_NNS ,_, no_DT person_NN from_IN such_JJ place_NN or_CC from_IN any_DT village_NN of_IN such_JJ group_NN may_MD go_VB and_CC reside_VB in_IN any_DT other_JJ place_NN or_CC village_NN ,_, whether_IN within_IN or_CC without_IN the_DT same_JJ group_NN ,_, without_IN a_DT pass_NN in_IN that_DT behalf_NN from_IN the_DT resident_NN Plague_NNP Authority_NNP ._.
To_TO spend_VB a_DT night_NN in_IN any_DT place_NN consti-_JJ tutes_NNS residence_NN under_IN this_DT rule_NN ._.
It_PRP shall_MD be_VB the_DT duty_NN of_IN every_DT village_NN officer_NN to_TO prevent_VB persons_NNS from_IN residing_VBG in_IN his_PRP$ village_NN in_IN breach_NN of_IN this_DT rule_NN ._.

*_NN Notwithstanding_VBG anything_NN contained_VBN in_IN this_DT rule_NN ,_, it_PRP shall_MD rest_VB with_IN the_DT District_NNP Magistrate_NNP ,_, at_IN his_PRP$ discretion_NN ,_, to_TO exempt_VB from_IN the_DT necessity_NN of_IN taking_VBG out_RP passes_NNS persons_NNS who_WP are_VBP merely_RB returning_VBG from_IN an_DT infected_JJ area_NN to_TO their_PRP$ own_JJ village_NN after_IN bringing_VBG to_TO market_NN in_IN such_JJ infected_JJ area_NN articles_NNS of_IN food_NN or_CC fuel_NN ;_: Provided_VBD that_IN such_JJ return_NN be_VB within_IN eight_CD hours_NNS after_IN arrival_NN ,_, and_CC not_RB after_IN sunset_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN this_DT exemption_NN shall_MD not_RB apply_VB to_TO any_DT such_JJ person_NN who_WP may_MD have_VB entered_VBN a_DT dwelling-house_NN within_IN the_DT in-_JJ fected_JJ area_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT passes_NNS to_TO be_VB issued_VBN by_IN the_DT resident_NN Plague_NNP Authority_NNP may_MD be_VB of_IN two_CD kinds_NNS ,_, either_RB (_( 1_CD )_) general_NN or_CC (_( 2_CD )_) special_NN ._.
General_NNP passes_NNS may_MD be_VB given_VBN to_TO agriculturists_NNS and_CC others_NNS having_VBG occasion_NN to_TO make_VB daily_JJ or_CC frequent_JJ journeys_NNS by_IN road_NN ,_, rail_NN or_CC boat_NN from_IN an_DT infected_JJ area_NN ,_, and_CC may_MD be_VB given_VBN for_IN an_DT indefinite_JJ period_NN ;_: but_CC they_PRP will_MD not_RB cover_VB residence_NN outside_IN of_IN the_DT infected_JJ area_NN ,_, and_CC will_MD not_RB cover_VB journeys_NNS by_IN rail_NN unless_IN that_DT is_VBZ expressly_RB stated_VBN on_IN them_PRP ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN agricul-_JJ turists_NNS ,_, where_WRB the_DT resident_NN Plague_NNP Authority_NNP is_VBZ satisfied_JJ that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ for_IN the_DT whole_JJ family_NN to_TO go_VB and_CC work_VB in_IN the_DT fields_NNS ,_, a_DT single_JJ pass_NN may_MD be_VB given_VBN for_IN the_DT family_NN ,_, but_CC there_EX must_MD be_VB a_DT separate_JJ pass_NN for_IN each_DT person_NN making_VBG a_DT railway_NN journey_NN under_IN a_DT general_JJ pass_NN ._.
Special_JJ passes_NNS shall_MD be_VB passes_NNS permitting_VBG persons_NNS to_TO leave_VB the_DT infect-_JJ ed_JJ area_NN and_CC reside_NN elsewhere_RB ,_, and_CC may_MD be_VB granted_VBN for_IN households_NNS ,_, *_RB Inserted_VBN by_IN Notification_NNP No_NNP ._.

VIII_NNP ._.
provided_VBN that_IN the_DT name_NN and_CC description_NN of_IN each_DT person_NN covered_VBN by_IN the_DT pass_NN is_VBZ entered_VBN therein_RB ._.
5_CD ._.
General_JJ passes_NNS should_MD be_VB given_VBN freely_RB ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN agri-_JJ culturists_NNS working_VBG in_IN the_DT fields_NNS need_MD not_RB be_VB revoked_VBN even_RB should_MD a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN occur_NN in_IN the_DT family_NN of_IN the_DT passholder_NN ._.
It_PRP shall_MD be_VB in_IN the_DT discretion_NN of_IN the_DT District_NNP Magistrate_NNP to_TO exempt_VB all_DT persons_NNS making_VBG frequent_JJ journeys_NNS by_IN road_NN or_CC boat_NN from_IN the_DT necessity_NN of_IN taking_VBG out_RP general_JJ passes_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO direct_VB that_IN only_JJ persons_NNS appearing_VBG to_TO be_VB leav-_JJ ing_VBG the_DT infected_JJ area_NN by_IN road_NN or_CC boat_NN to_TO reside_VB elsewhere_RB shall_MD be_VB detained_VBN at_IN the_DT chowkies_NNS unless_IN they_PRP possess_VBP special_JJ passes_NNS ._.
All_DT persons_NNS travelling_VBG in_IN or_CC with_IN carriages_NNS and_CC carts_NNS ,_, or_CC carrying_VBG luggage_NN of_IN any_DT kind_NN ,_, or_CC having_VBG women_NNS and_CC children_NNS with_IN them_PRP (_( unless_IN they_PRP are_VBP believed_VBN to_TO be_VB agriculturists_NNS )_) may_MD be_VB presumed_VBN to_TO be_VB intending_VBG to_TO go_VB and_CC reside_VB elsewhere_RB ._.
6_CD ._.
Special_JJ passes_NNS may_MD also_RB be_VB given_VBN freely_RB ,_, especially_RB at_IN the_DT begin-_JJ ning_NN of_IN an_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, when_WRB the_DT resident_NN Plague_NNP Authority_NNP is_VBZ satisfied_VBN that_IN no_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN in_IN the_DT house_NN of_IN the_DT applicant_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN any_DT adjacent_JJ house_NN or_CC among_IN any_DT of_IN his_PRP$ relations_NNS or_CC associates_NNS :_: pro-_NN vided_VBD that_IN the_DT resident_NN Plague_NNP Authority_NNP may_MD always_RB require_VB the_DT dis-_JJ infection_NN in_IN a_DT prescribed_JJ manner_NN of_IN all_DT clothes_NNS and_CC other_JJ articles_NNS to_TO be_VB taken_VBN away_RP before_IN a_DT pass_NN is_VBZ given_VBN ._.
When_WRB the_DT applicant_NN is_VBZ known_VBN or_CC suspected_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN exposed_VBN to_TO infection_NN ,_, the_DT resident_NN Plague_NNP Authority_NNP shall_MD defer_VB granting_VBG the_DT pass_NN until_IN the_DT applicant_NN has_VBZ been_VBN kept_VBN under_IN medical_JJ observation_NN (_( 1_CD )_) for_IN a_DT period_NN which_WDT may_MD extend_VB to_TO ten_VB days_NNS ,_, (_( 2_CD )_) or_CC until_IN the_DT reasons_NNS for_IN suspicion_NN have_VBP disappeared_VBN ._.
In_IN such_JJ cases_NNS disinfection_NN of_IN clothes_NNS ,_, etc._FW ,_, should_MD always_RB be_VB insisted_VBN on_IN ._.
In_IN this_DT rule_NN applicant_NN includes_VBZ all_PDT the_DT persons_NNS in_IN a_DT household_NN on_IN whose_WP$ behalf_NN a_DT special_JJ pass_NN is_VBZ applied_VBN for_IN ._.
7_CD ._.

8_CD ._.

2_CD ._.

VIII_NNP ._.
the_DT imposition_NN of_IN such_JJ quarantine_NN ._.
The_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP are_VBP aware_JJ that_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP have_VBP been_VBN from_IN the_DT outset_NN ,_, for_IN reasons_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN fully_RB explained_VBN ,_, strongly_RB averse_VBZ to_TO the_DT imposi-_JJ tion_NN of_IN land_NN quarantine_NN ._.

3_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT second_JJ place_NN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP consider_NN that_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN the_DT rules_NNS is_VBZ open_JJ to_TO objection_NN ,_, inasmuch_JJ as_IN it_PRP exempts_VBZ certain_JJ classes_NNS of_IN persons_NNS from_IN their_PRP$ operation_NN ._.

59_CD 5_CD ._.
In_IN conclusion_NN ,_, I_PRP am_VBP to_TO say_VB that_IN the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP is_VBZ convinced_VBN that_IN these_DT elaborate_JJ rules_NNS for_IN the_DT control_NN of_IN the_DT move-_JJ ment_NN of_IN people_NNS from_IN infected_JJ localities_NNS will_MD be_VB powerless_JJ to_TO check_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN unless_IN they_PRP are_VBP accompanied_VBN by_IN stringent_JJ measures_NNS to_TO suppress_VB the_DT malady_NN within_IN the_DT infected_JJ areas_NNS ,_, Indeed_RB it_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO His_PRP$ Excellency_NN in_IN Council_NNP that_IN in_IN the_DT absence_NN of_IN such_JJ measures_NNS the_DT compulsory_NN detention_NN of_IN the_DT inmates_NNS in_IN infected_JJ localities_NNS will_MD tend_VB to_TO foster_VB the_DT growth_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ ,_, and_CC to_TO establish_VB plague_NN foci_JJ whence_NN the_DT disease_NN may_MD spread_VB with_IN even_RB greater_JJR virulence_NN than_IN if_IN no_DT measures_NNS had_VBD been_VBN devised_VBN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT egress_NN of_IN the_DT inhabi-_JJ tants_NNS ._.

(_( 2_CD )_) The_DT removal_NN of_IN the_DT sick_JJ to_TO segregation_NN hospitals_NNS ._.

*_JJ *_NNP *_NNP *_NNP *_NNP *_NNP *_VBD 3_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB noted_VBN that_IN ,_, however_RB strict_VBP the_DT measures_NNS of_IN the_DT Dis-_NNP trict_NN Magistrate_NNP of_IN Surat_NNP ,_, they_PRP are_VBP not_RB more_RBR so_RB than_IN those_DT adopted_VBN by_IN the_DT Governor_NNP of_IN Daman_NNP for_IN protection_NN against_IN his_PRP$ own_JJ people_NNS ._.
Plague_NNP having_VBG broken_VBN out_RP in_IN Little_NNP Daman_NNP ,_, he_PRP has_VBZ shut_VBN himself_PRP up_RP in_IN Big_NNP Daman_NNP and_CC absolutely_RB cut_VB off_RP all_DT communication_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO be_VB sure_JJ of_IN the_DT facts_NNS ,_, but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ credibly_RB asserted_VBN that_IN one_CD day_NN last_JJ week_NN there_EX were_VBD 40_CD deaths_NNS in_IN Little_NNP Daman_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN no_DT segregation_NN is_VBZ enforced_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD there_EX are_VBP isolated_JJ sheds_NNS ,_, but_CC no_DT one_NN is_VBZ removed_VBN there_RB unless_IN he_PRP has_VBZ no_DT friends_NNS ._.
Things_NNS being_VBG thus_RB disorganised_VBN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ only_RB fair_JJ that_IN the_DT British_JJ authorities_NNS should_MD protect_VB their_PRP$ own_JJ people_NNS as_RB severely_RB as_IN His_PRP$ Excellency_NN the_DT Governor_NNP protects_VBZ himself_PRP ._.
4_CD ._.
His_PRP$ Excellency_NN asks_VBZ firstly_RB that_IN goods_NNS coming_VBG by_IN rail_NN for_IN Daman_NNP may_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO pass_VB there_RB from_IN the_DT railway_NN station_NN ._.
At_IN present_JJ no_DT person_NN is_VBZ allowed_VBN to_TO enter_VB Daman_NNP territory_NN across_IN the_DT cordon_NN ,_, except_IN (_( 1_CD )_) postal_NN runners_NNS ,_, (_( 2_CD )_) Portuguese_NN officials_NNS ,_, (_( 3_CD )_) Portu-_NNP guese_JJ subjects_NNS armed_VBN with_IN a_DT pass_NN from_IN the_DT Mamlatdar_NNP of_IN Pardi_NNP which_WDT is_VBZ only_RB granted_VBN on_IN a_DT certificate_NN from_IN a_DT Portuguese_JJ authority_NN if_IN he_PRP comes_VBZ from_IN Portuguese_JJ territory_NN or_CC from_IN a_DT British_JJ authority_NN if_IN he_PRP comes_VBZ from_IN British_JJ territory_NN to_TO the_DT effect_NN that_IN he_PRP is_VBZ a_DT Portuguese_JJ subject_NN ._.
This_DT arrangement_NN is_VBZ not_RB objected_VBN to_TO by_IN the_DT Governor_NNP ._.

5_CD ._.

Memo_NNP ._.
by_IN F._NNP S._NNP P._NNP LELY_NNP ,_, Esq._NNP ,_, Commissioner_NNP ,_, Northern_NNP Division_NNP ._.
Various_JJ complaints_NNS have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN through_IN several_JJ channels_NNS by_IN the_DT Portuguese_JJ authorities_NNS against_IN the_DT preventive_JJ measures_NNS adopted_VBN by_IN the_DT British_JJ Government_NNP against_IN plague_NN ,_, but_CC I_PRP submit_VBP the_DT time_NN has_VBZ come_VBN when_WRB strong_JJ representations_NNS should_MD be_VB made_VBN in_IN the_DT reverse_JJ direction_NN ._.
We_PRP have_VBP far_RB more_JJR reason_NN to_TO complain_VB of_IN them_PRP than_IN they_PRP have_VBP to_TO complain_VB of_IN us_PRP ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT position_NN is_VBZ briefly_JJ this_DT ._.
On_IN the_DT 4th_CD March_NNP the_DT first_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN occurred_VBD in_IN Damaun_NNP ,_, and_CC it_PRP rapidly_RB spread_VBD until_IN the_DT daily_JJ mortality_NN in_IN a_DT town_NN of_IN 8,000_CD people_NNS is_VBZ said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN 60_CD to_TO 70_CD ._.
Up_RB to_TO this_DT day_NN the_DT Government_NNP have_VBP done_VBN practically_RB nothing_NN to_TO check_VB its_PRP$ course_NN ._.
The_DT Governor_NNP and_CC all_PDT his_PRP$ responsible_JJ officers_NNS have_VBP persistently_RB shut_VBN themselves_PRP up_RP in_IN the_DT Fort_NNP and_CC have_VBP done_VBN nothing_NN personally_RB ._.
The_DT only_JJ officer_NN who_WP ever_RB visits_VBZ the_DT plague_NN striken_JJ area_NN is_VBZ an_DT ``_`` Administrator_NN ,_, ''_'' who_WP has_VBZ no_DT power_NN to_TO make_VB himself_PRP felt_JJR and_CC is_VBZ virtually_RB only_RB a_DT reporter_NN ._.
The_DT medical_JJ attendance_NN is_VBZ most_RBS in-_JJ efficient_NN ._.
A_DT doctor_NN makes_VBZ hurried_VBN visits_NNS every_DT day_NN from_IN the_DT Fort_NNP to_TO the_DT plague_NN hospital_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT gentleman_JJ sent_NN expressly_RB from_IN Goa_NNP has_VBZ returned_VBN ,_, being_VBG unable_JJ to_TO get_VB on_IN with_IN the_DT authorities_NNS ._.
Segregation_NN is_VBZ ordered_VBN but_CC never_RB enforced_VBD except_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN friendless_NN and_CC low_JJ caste_NN people_NNS who_WP have_VBP no_DT influence_NN ._.
Disinfection_NN is_VBZ a_DT mere_JJ pretence_NN ._.
The_DT whole_JJ working_JJ staff_NN in_IN Lower_NNP Damaun_NNP consists_VBZ of_IN APP_NNP ._.
VIII_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN land_NN ._.
77_CD one_CD Jemadar_NN of_IN Police_NNP and_CC 18_CD sepoys_NNS ._.
Being_VBG under_IN on_IN discipline_NN ,_, they_PRP devote_VBP themselves_PRP to_TO making_VBG money_NN ,_, and_CC allow_VB the_DT people_NNS to_TO snap_VB their_PRP$ fingers_NNS at_IN orders_NNS ._.
Mr._NNP Judge_NNP informs_VBZ me_PRP that_IN the_DT Govern-_NNP ment_NN charges_VBZ a_DT fee_NN of_IN 14_CD annas_NNS for_IN registration_NN of_IN deaths_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT Jemadar_NNP charges_VBZ 4_CD annas_NNS for_IN allowing_VBG non-registration_NN ,_, and_CC naturally_RB his_PRP$ receipts_NNS are_VBP the_DT larger_JJR ._.

The_DT people_NNS flatly_RB refused_VBD to_TO go_VB to_TO the_DT hospital_NN and_CC have_VBP been_VBN allowed_VBN to_TO lie_VB in_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS and_CC die_VB to_TO the_DT number_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD ,_, of_IN 2,600_CD in_IN a_DT town_NN of_IN 8,000_CD ._.
3_CD ._.
Thus_RB Damaun_NNP is_VBZ a_DT standing_VBG menace_NN to_TO its_PRP$ neighbours-_JJ ourselves_NNS ._.
It_PRP at_IN present_JJ imposes_NNS on_IN us_PRP the_DT necessity_NN of_IN an_DT observa.._JJ tion_NN camp_NN supported_VBN by_IN a_DT cordon_NN of_IN over_IN 300_CD men_NNS ._.
If_IN this_DT was_VBD the_DT temporary_JJ result_NN of_IN an_DT epidemic_JJ which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN combated_VBN and_CC crushed_VBN with_IN the_DT energy_NN of_IN a_DT civilized_JJ nation_NN ,_, there_EX would_MD be_VB nothing_NN to_TO say_VB ;_: but_CC the_DT action_NN or_CC rather_RB inaction_NN of_IN the_DT Portuguese_NNP leaves_VBZ no_DT hope_NN of_IN an_DT early_JJ termination_NN to_TO all_PDT this_DT cost_NN and_CC trouble_NN ._.

4_CD ._.
I_PRP am_VBP quite_RB aware_JJ it_PRP would_MD be_VB useless_JJ to_TO try_VB to_TO get_VB the_DT Portu-_NNP guese_NN to_TO enforce_VB segregation_NN on_IN their_PRP$ Mahomedan_NNP and_CC other_JJ unruly_JJ subjects_NNS ._.

3_CD ._.

2_CD ._.
First_NNP of_IN all_PDT the_DT net_JJ results_NNS may_MD be_VB summarized_VBN ._.
The_DT Pardi_NNP Taluka_NNP is_VBZ the_DT southernmost_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT Surat_NNP District_NNP ._.
The_DT next_JJ railway_NN station_NN to_TO it_PRP on_IN the_DT north_NN is_VBZ Bulsar_NNP where_WRB 901_CD plague_NN cases_NNS have_VBP occurred_VBN ._.

The_DT deaths_NNS in_IN Damaun_NNP town_NN alone_RB soon_RB mounting_VBG up_RP to_TO 35_CD or_CC 40_CD per_IN diem_NN in_IN a_DT population_NN of_IN about_RB 5_CD to_TO 8,000_CD ._.
Geographically_RB this_DT Portuguese_JJ posses-_JJ sion_NN is_VBZ a_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT Pardi_NNP Taluka_NNP and_CC occupies_VBZ its_PRP$ south-west_JJ corner_NN ._.

The_DT people_NNS on_IN both_DT sides_NNS are_VBP closely_RB connected_VBN by_IN intermarriage_NN and_CC by_IN business_NN and_CC keep_VB up_RP constant_JJ intercourse_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN all_PDT these_DT fires_VBZ the_DT 58,245_CD people_NNS of_IN the_DT Pardi_NNP Taluka_NNP have_VBP remained_VBN unscathed_JJ ._.
Only_RB a_DT single_JJ indigenous_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN ,_, and_CC that_DT was_VBD a_DT ward_NN by_IN in_IN the_DT segregation_NN hos-_JJ pital_NN at_IN Pardi_NNP ._.

4_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT first_JJ place_NN it_PRP should_MD be_VB noted_VBN that_IN the_DT defence_NN has_VBZ been_VBN and_CC is_VBZ largely_RB the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS themselves_PRP ._.
In_IN the_DT month_NN of_IN February_NNP the_DT Commissioner_NNP being_VBG in_IN those_DT parts_NNS called_VBD meetings_NNS of_IN the_DT people_NNS in_IN Pardi_NNP town_NN and_CC in_IN Wapi_NNP ,_, the_DT next_JJ most_RBS important_JJ village_NN and_CC railway_NN station_NN ._.

This_DT suggestion_NN was_VBD taken_VBN up_RP so_RB warmly_RB that_IN the_DT people_NNS prevented_VBD even_RB the_DT staff_NN of_IN the_DT Divisional_NNP officer_NN who_WP had_VBD been_VBN on_IN tour_NN in_IN infected_JJ villages_NNS of_IN Bulsar_NNP from_IN entering_VBG the_DT town_NN of_IN Pardi_NNP ._.

VIII_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN land_NN ._.

5_CD ._.

At_IN Bhilad_NNP it_PRP was_VBD done_VBN by_IN the_DT Patel_NNP ._.

6_CD ._.
For_IN some_DT time_NN Damaun_NNP territory_NN was_VBD free_JJ from_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC many_JJ refugees_NNS from_IN stricken_JJ Bulsar_NNP being_VBG refused_VBN admission_NN into_IN British_JJ villages_NNS betook_VBP themselves_PRP in_IN that_DT direction_NN ._.

considered_VBN ,_, it_PRP can_MD scarcely_RB be_VB denied_VBN that_IN if_IN the_DT local_JJ officers_NNS had_VBD not_RB acted_VBN strongly_RB ,_, they_PRP would_MD have_VB had_VBN much_JJ to_TO answer_VB for_IN ._.

spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN land_NN ._.

10_CD ._.

VIII_NNP ._.

Their_PRP$ clothes_NNS and_CC kit_NNS are_VBP divided_VBN into_IN two_CD heaps-one_NN to_TO be_VB burnt_JJ or_CC sent_VBD back_RB at_IN the_DT option_NN of_IN the_DT owner_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT other_JJ to_TO be_VB disinfected_VBN by_IN boiling_VBG ._.
After_IN selecting_VBG a_DT suit_NN of_IN clothes_NNS that_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN boiled_VBN and_CC dried_VBN ,_, the_DT owner_NN goes_VBZ to_TO a_DT healthy_JJ shed_NN and_CC after_IN taking_VBG a_DT disinfecting_VBG bath_NN he_PRP puts_VBZ on_IN the_DT clean_JJ clothes_NNS and_CC throws_VBZ those_DT he_PRP was_VBD wearing_VBG over_IN the_DT fence_NN ,_, whence_NN they_PRP are_VBP taken_VBN up_RP and_CC boiled_VBN ._.

(_( 3_CD )_) On_IN the_DT passage_NN of_IN goods_NNS there_EX is_VBZ absolutely_RB no_DT embargo_NN ._.

Finally_RB the_DT Commissioner_NNP begs_NN to_TO submit_VB that-_JJ (_( 1_CD )_) Whatever_WDT precaution_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN ,_, it_PRP can_MD not_RB be_VB enforced_VBN over_IN 38_CD miles_NNS of_IN open_JJ country_NN without_IN a_DT cordon_NN ._.

VIII_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN land_NN ._.

The_DT one_CD route_NN through_IN Chola_NNP can_MD be_VB easily_RB used_VBN by_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN Damaun_NNP ,_, and_CC Mr._NNP Judge_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ assistants_NNS are_VBP able_JJ to_TO permanently_RB stay_VB there_RB and_CC look_VB after_IN things_NNS ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) Government_NN may_MD supply_VB a_DT Commissioned_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, but_CC the_DT advantage_NN will_MD not_RB be_VB obvious_JJ ._.
The_DT present_JJ medical_JJ officer_NN knows_VBZ his_PRP$ work_NN and_CC he_PRP acts_VBZ with_IN the_DT immediate_JJ personal_JJ assistance_NN of_IN Mr._NNP Judge_NNP ._.
This_DT sup-_JJ plies_NNS all_PDT the_DT guarantee_NN which_WDT would_MD be_VB afforded_VBN by_IN a_DT Commissioned_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP and_CC is_VBZ less_RBR expensive_JJ ._.
The_DT Commissioner_NNP 's_POS own_JJ opinion_NN is_VBZ that_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN Mr._NNP Judge_NNP who_WP has_VBZ had_VBN many_JJ years_NNS '_POS experience_NN and_CC more-_NN over_IN holds_VBZ command_NN of_IN the_DT salt_NN sepoys_NN is_VBZ far_RB more_RBR valu-_JJ able_JJ than_IN that_DT of_IN a_DT young_JJ doctor_NN new_JJ to_TO the_DT country_NN ._.

5_CD ._.
As_IN to_TO the_DT extent_NN of_IN accommodation_NN provided_VBN ,_, I_PRP was_VBD under_IN the_DT impression_NN that_IN the_DT 10th_JJ paragraph_NN of_IN my_PRP$ report_NN gave_VBD as_IN accurate_JJ information_NN as_IN was_VBD possible_JJ in_IN stating_VBG that_IN there_EX was_VBD ample_JJ room_NN for_IN those_DT who_WP had_VBD come_VBN ,_, up_RB to_TO date_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT number_NN was_VBD then_RB about_IN 75_CD ._.

6_CD ._.
With_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT questions_NNS asked_VBD in_IN paragraph_NN 4_CD of_IN the_DT Gov-_NNP ernment_NN of_IN India_NNP 's_POS letter_NN ,_, I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO quote_VB the_DT following_VBG from_IN Mr._NNP Judge_NNP 's_POS recent_JJ report_NN :_: -_: ``_`` Along_IN the_DT whole_JJ 38_CD miles_NNS to_TO be_VB guarded_VBN ,_, a_DT path_NN ,_, about_IN 10_CD feet_NNS wide_JJ ,_, was_VBD demarcated_VBN by_IN boulders_NNS and_CC clods_NNS of_IN earth_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT path_NN roughly_RB cleared_VBN and_CC made_VBN practicable_JJ for_IN patrolling_VBG by_IN night_NN and_CC day_NN ._.
Along_IN this_DT path_NN there_EX are_VBP 39_CD chowkeys_NNS taken_VBN into_IN use_NN (_( including_VBG 17_CD new_JJ ones_NNS )_) ,_, thus_RB giving_VBG chowkeys_NNS about_IN one_CD mile_NN equidistant_NN from_IN one_CD another_DT ._.
The_DT men_NNS off_IN duty_NN were_VBD not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO leave_VB the_DT chow-_JJ keys_NNS ,_, excepting_VBG with_IN leave_NN from_IN their_PRP$ Amaldar_NNP ,_, and_CC ,_, as_IN the_DT chowkeys_NNS are_VBP in_IN most_JJS cases_NNS visible_JJ from_IN one_CD another_DT ,_, this_DT ensured_VBD a_DT guard_NN visible_JJ to_TO each_DT other_JJ in_IN the_DT day_NN ._.
At_IN every_DT mile_NN two_CD sentries_NNS were_VBD put_VBN on_IN duty_NN between_IN each_DT chowkey_NN during_IN the_DT day_NN ,_, and_CC consequently_RB with_IN the_DT men_NNS off_IN duty_NN at_IN the_DT chowkeys_NNS at_IN every_DT 552_CD yards_NNS there_RB was_VBD a_DT man_NN on_IN watch_NN during_IN the_DT day_NN ._.
The_DT whole_JJ force_NN went_VBD on_IN duty_NN at_IN night_NN ._.
Advantage_NN was_VBD taken_VBN of_IN the_DT conformation_NN of_IN the_DT territorial_JJ frontier_NN and_CC the_DT existence_NN of_IN two_CD tidal_JJ rivers_NNS to_TO decrease_VB sentries_NNS in_IN one_CD direc-_JJ tion_NN and_CC increase_VB them_PRP in_IN another_DT ,_, and_CC along_IN the_DT principal_JJ part_NN to_TO be_VB guarded_VBN ,_, I_PRP was_VBD enabled_VBN to_TO place_VB eight_CD men_NNS per_IN mile_NN and_CC in_IN the_DT other_JJ about_IN six_CD men_NNS per_IN mile_NN at_IN night_NN and_CC half_NN these_DT men_NNS went_VBD on_IN sentry-go_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT other_JJ half_NN went_VBD to_TO sleep_VB on_IN the_DT line_NN at_IN places_NNS selected_VBN by_IN myself_PRP and_CC equidistant_VB from_IN one_CD another_DT ._.
By_IN these_DT means_NNS at_IN approxi-_JJ mately_RB every_DT 1/4_CD of_IN a_DT mile_NN there_EX was_VBD a_DT man_NN asleep_NN and_CC likely_JJ to_TO be_VB awakened_VBN by_IN persons_NNS or_CC vehicles_NNS passing_VBG ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT 440_CD yards_NNS between_IN each_DT sleeper_NN there_EX was_VBD a_DT sentry_NN patrolling_NN ._.
Where_WRB roads_NNS bisected_VBD the_DT cordon_NN ,_, modifications_NNS were_VBD made_VBN by_IN placing_VBG a_DT chowkey_NN or_CC sentry_NN post_NN ,_, etc._NN ,_, to_TO guard_VB them_PRP ._.
At_IN every_DT other_JJ chowkey_NN there_EX was_VBD an_DT Amaldar_NNP placed_VBD whose_WP$ duty_NN it_PRP was_VBD to_TO see_VB that_IN the_DT men_NNS went_VBD on_IN duty_NN during_IN the_DT day_NN ,_, and_CC twice_RB every_DT night_NN he_PRP had_VBD to_TO patrol_VB over_IN his_PRP$ sub-division_NN of_IN two_CD miles_NNS called_VBD Naik_NNP 's_POS beat_NN and_CC see_VB the_DT sentries_NNS were_VBD alert_JJ ._.
The_DT line_NN was_VBD again_RB divided_VBN into_IN four_CD divisions_NNS called_VBD Jamadar_NNP 's_POS patrol_NN and_CC each_DT division_NN place_NN APP_NNP ._.
VIII_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN land_NN ._.
89_CD under_IN a_DT Jamadar_NNP (_( three_CD Jamadars_NNP and_CC one_CD senior_JJ Havildar_NNP being_VBG utilized_VBN )_) who_WP had_VBD to_TO see_VB that_IN orders_NNS were_VBD carried_VBN out_RP ,_, occasionally_RB visit_VBP the_DT line_NN ,_, and_CC once_RB in_IN every_DT 24_CD hours_NNS either_RB by_IN day_NN or_CC by_IN night_NN at_IN irregular_JJ hours_NNS go_VBP over_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN their_PRP$ division_NN ._.
The_DT line_NN was_VBD again_RB divided_VBN in_IN two_CD major_JJ divisions_NNS and_CC placed_VBN under_IN the_DT Inspec-_JJ tors_NNS who_WP had_VBD to_TO visit_VB their_PRP$ respective_JJ beats_NNS on_IN four_CD nights_NNS and_CC two_CD days_NNS during_IN each_DT week_NN and_CC at_IN such_JJ irregular_JJ hours_NNS as_IN they_PRP deemed_VBD fit_NN ._.
The_DT Inspectors_NNPS ,_, each_DT ,_, also_RB had_VBD a_DT small_JJ detective_JJ party_NN under_IN an_DT Amaldar_NNP who_WP could_MD be_VB utilized_VBN by_IN being_VBG sent_VBN out_RP to_TO pay_VB surprise_NN visits_NNS along_IN the_DT line_NN ,_, or_CC should_MD any_DT particular_JJ sentry_NN or_CC beat_NN come_VBN under_IN suspicion_NN could_MD be_VB sent_VBN out_RP quietly_RB to_TO watch_VB behind_IN the_DT said_VBD sentry_NN or_CC beat_NN ,_, and_CC arrest_JJS any_DT one_CD improperly_JJ let_NN through_IN ._.
As_IN such_PDT an_DT arrest_NN would_MD lead_VB to_TO the_DT dismissal_NN of_IN the_DT offending_VBG sentry_NN ,_, and_CC possibly_RB to_TO his_PRP$ prosecution_NN ,_, no_DT sentry_NN was_VBD safe_JJ if_IN he_PRP attempted_VBD to_TO accept_VB a_DT bribe_NN ._.
*_JJ *_NNP *_NNP *_NNP *_NNP *_NNP *_NNP You_PRP will_MD thus_RB see_VB that_IN the_DT line_NN being_VBG strongly_RB guarded_VBN by_IN sentries_NNS ,_, about_RB 1_CD to_TO 1/4_CD of_IN a_DT mile_NN ,_, constantly_RB patrolled_VBN by_IN Amaldars_NNP ,_, and_CC regularly_RB visited_VBN by_IN the_DT supervising_JJ staff_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD absolutely_RB impossible_JJ for_IN per-_JJ sons_NNS to_TO get_VB across_IN during_IN the_DT day_NN unperceived_VBD and_CC next_JJ to_TO impossible_JJ for_IN them_PRP to_TO do_VB so_RB at_IN night_NN ._.
Now_RB as_IN all_PDT the_DT roads_NNS were_VBD guarded_VBN ,_, and_CC as_IN ordinary_JJ passengers_NNS would_MD not_RB be_VB able_JJ to_TO find_VB their_PRP$ way_NN over_IN the_DT fields_NNS at_IN night_NN and_CC when_WRB in_IN addition_NN to_TO finding_VBG their_PRP$ way_NN ,_, they_PRP would_MD have_VB had_VBN to_TO evade_VB a_DT strongly_RB guarded_VBN cordon_NN ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN that_IN the_DT task_NN of_IN crossing_VBG the_DT cordon_NN was_VBD ,_, for_IN ordinary_JJ persons_NNS ,_, rendered_VBD impossible_JJ at_IN night_NN also_RB even_RB for_IN healthy_JJ persons_NNS ._.
About_IN 40_CD persons_NNS who_WP attempted_VBD to_TO evade_VB the_DT cordon_NN at_IN various_JJ times_NNS were_VBD detained_VBN and_CC prosecuted_VBN and_CC convicted_VBN ._.
The_DT villagers_NNS assisted_VBN in_IN making_VBG the_DT patrol_NN path_NN and_CC erected_VBD the_DT ``_`` Kacha_NNP ``_`` mandwas_NN required_VBN on_IN moving_VBG the_DT line_NN forward_RB to_TO the_DT terri-_JJ torial_JJ frontier_NN ._.
No_DT persons_NNS have_VBP been_VBN arrested_VBN as_IN having_VBG evaded_VBD the_DT cordon_NN by_IN villagers_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT patels_NNS ,_, etc._FW ,_, were_VBD put_VBN on_IN the_DT watch_NN for_IN them_PRP and_CC would_MD have_VB done_VBN so_RB had_VBD the_DT necessity_NN arisen_RB ,_, as_IN they_PRP and_CC their_PRP$ villa-_JJ gers_NNS ,_, after_IN they_PRP realized_VBD the_DT danger_NN from_IN contagion_NN or_CC infection_NN ,_, became_VBD extremely_RB keen_JJ on_IN keeping_VBG their_PRP$ villages_NNS ``_`` free_JJ from_IN strangers_NNS ._. ''_''
The_DT best_JJS proof_NN of_IN the_DT efficiency_NN of_IN the_DT cordon_NN and_CC the_DT co-operation_NN of_IN the_DT villagers_NNS is_VBZ the_DT immunity_NN of_IN the_DT Pardi_NNP Taluka_NNP ,_, and_CC especially_RB the_DT frontier_JJ British_JJ villages_NNS when_WRB compared_VBN with_IN the_DT 3,000_CD cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN that_WDT have_VBP occurred_VBN within_IN the_DT Damaun_NNP territory_NN ._.

With_IN reference_NN to_TO your_PRP$ letter_NN No_DT ._.
4_CD of_IN the_DT 5th_JJ instant_NN ,_, I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO enclose_VB a_DT note_NN which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP made_VBN showing_VBG the_DT preliminary_JJ requirements_NNS for_IN isolation_NN and_CC quarantine_NN sheds_NNS ._.

Suggestions_NNS for_IN Hospital_NNP sheds_NNS ._.
I_PRP think_VBP that_IN the_DT hospital_NN sheds_NNS might_MD be_VB 18_CD feet_NNS by_IN 6_CD feet_NNS ,_, with_IN side_NN walls_NNS 8_CD feet_NNS high_JJ ,_, and_CC a_DT sloping_NN roof_NN ,_, the_DT centre_JJ pole_NN of_IN which_WDT would_MD rise_VB say_VB 6_CD feet_NNS above_IN the_DT wall_NN ._.
This_DT would_MD accommodate_VB 4_CD patients_NNS ,_, giving_VBG over_IN 600_CD cubic_JJ feet_NNS of_IN space_NN to_TO each_DT ._.
I_PRP would_MD have_VB a_DT doorway_NN 6_CD 4_CD feet_NNS provided_VBN with_IN a_DT mat_JJ door_NN in_IN each_DT side_NN wall_NN and_CC an_DT opening_NN about_IN 2_CD feet_NNS square_JJ ,_, with_IN a_DT mat_NN shutter_NN at_IN each_DT end_NN ,_, placed_VBD about_IN 5_CD feet_NNS from_IN the_DT ground_NN ._.
Taking_VBG each_DT bed_NN as_IN 6_CD 4_CD feet_NNS ,_, there_EX would_MD be_VB 4_CD feet_NNS between_IN the_DT beds_NNS ,_, while_IN each_DT would_MD be_VB 2_CD feet_NNS from_IN the_DT wall_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT central_JJ pas-_JJ sage_NN 6_CD feet_NNS wide_JJ would_MD be_VB provided_VBN between_IN the_DT feet_NNS of_IN the_DT beds_NNS ._.

spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN land_NN ._.
91_CD These_DT rough_JJ sketches_NNS show_VBP the_DT general_JJ idea_NN and_CC how_WRB the_DT beds_NNS would_MD be_VB placed_VBN ._.
The_DT walls_NNS should_MD be_VB of_IN reeds_NNS or_CC thatch_NN ,_, not_RB mud_NN ._.
Such_JJ walls_NNS allow_VBP perflation_NN of_IN air_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN sufficient_JJ bedding_VBG would_MD not_RB be_VB too_RB cold_JJ ._.
*_VB A_NNP moveable_JJ screen_NN of_IN thatch_NN ,_, 6_CD feet_NNS by_IN 5_CD ,_, should_MD be_VB kept_VBN in_IN readiness_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN if_IN a_DT female_JJ patient_NN were_VBD admitted_VBN ,_, privacy_NN could_MD be_VB effected_VBN ._.
*_VB An_DT observation_NN shed_VBN for_IN two_CD beds_NNS should_MD be_VB also_RB provided_VBN ,_, say_VBP 18_CD feet_NNS by_IN 8_CD ,_, with_IN but_CC one_CD door_NN ._.
A_DT hut_NN of_IN similar_JJ construction_NN about_IN 12_CD feet_NNS square_JJ would_MD be_VB needed_VBN for_IN the_DT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP ._.

found_VBN by_IN inspecting_VBG Medical_JJ Officers_NNS at_IN Khanpur_NNP ,_, Sher_NNP Shah_NNP ,_, Raewind_NNP ,_, Rewari_NNP or_CC Bhatinda_NNP to_TO have_VB symptoms_NNS of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN :_: -The_JJ Com-_NNP missioned_VBD Medical_NNP Officers_NNPS who_WP will_MD be_VB stationed_VBN at_IN Khanpur_NNP and_CC Rewari_NNP will_MD exercise_VB their_PRP$ discretion_NN in_IN determining_VBG whether_IN any_DT such_JJ person_NN shall_MD be_VB detained_VBN or_CC sent_VBN on_IN to_TO the_DT next_JJ Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ._.

at_IN Khanpur_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT copy_NN of_IN the_DT note_NN of_IN requirements_NNS forwarded_VBN with_IN your_PRP$ letter_NN No_DT ._.

2_CD ._.
The_DT Hospital_NNP Assistants_NNS at_IN the_DT three_CD other_JJ inspecting_VBG stations_NNS will_MD not_RB be_VB authorized_VBN to_TO detain_VB European_JJ or_CC Eurasian_JJ passengers_NNS ._.

95_CD 2_CD ._.
The_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP does_VBZ not_RB at_IN present_JJ propose_NN to_TO issue_VB any_DT regulations_NNS under_IN section_NN 2_CD ,_, and_CC intends_VBZ that_DT Local_JJ Governments_NNS should_MD issue_VB them_PRP where_WRB they_PRP are_VBP required_VBN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP ,_, how-_JJ ever_RB ,_, to_TO say_VB with_IN reference_NN to_TO section_NN 2_CD ,_, sub-section_NN (_( 2_CD )_) (_( b_NN )_) ,_, that_IN His_PRP$ Excellency_NN in_IN Council_NNP is_VBZ of_IN opinion_NN that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ essential_JJ that_IN the_DT medical_JJ inspection_NN of_IN passengers_NNS in_IN trains_NNS coming_VBG from_IN the_DT direction_NN of_IN infected_JJ districts_NNS should_MD be_VB complete_JJ and_CC that_IN this_DT can_MD only_RB be_VB effected_VBN by_IN the_DT removal_NN of_IN the_DT passengers_NNS to_TO the_DT platform_NN and_CC indi-_JJ vidual_JJ inspection_NN there_RB by_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN ._.
For_IN this_DT purpose_NN the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP thinks_VBZ that_IN a_DT Commissioned_NNP Medical_NNP officer_NN should_MD be_VB appointed_VBN at_IN Assansole_NNP ,_, and_CC I_PRP am_VBP to_TO ask_VB that_IN ,_, if_IN His_PRP$ Honour_CD the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP has_VBZ no_DT objection_NN ,_, this_DT may_MD be_VB arranged_VBN for_IN ._.
The_DT special_JJ inspection_NN at_IN Assansole_NNP need_MD not_RB interfere_VB with_IN any_DT subsidiary_NN inspections_NNS of_IN a_DT less_RBR complete_JJ character_NN at_IN other_JJ places_NNS which_WDT the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP may_MD prescribe_VB ._.
The_DT Govern-_NNP ment_NN of_IN India_NNP think_VBP that_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB undesirable_JJ to_TO construct_VB an_DT isola-_JJ tion_NN hospital_NN at_IN Assansole_NNP where_WRB there_EX is_VBZ a_DT large_JJ community_NN connected_VBN with_IN the_DT railway_NN ,_, but_CC a_DT small_JJ hospital_NN for_IN suspected_JJ cases_NNS ,_, and_CC separate_JJ huts_NNS for_IN the_DT accommodation_NN of_IN persons_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ,_, should_MD be_VB provided_VBN at_IN same_JJ place_NN in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN to_TO be_VB approved_VBN by_IN the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP ._.

1_CD ._.
Quarantine_NN can_MD be_VB imposed_VBN if_IN a_DT ship_NN has_VBZ touched_VBN at_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN or_CC is_VBZ itself_PRP infected_JJ ._.
``_`` 2_CD ._.
The_DT vessels_NNS which_WDT now_RB bring_VBP Cutch_NNP Mandvi_NNP people_NNS do_VBP touch_RB at_IN Salaya_NNP ,_, ._.
which_WDT is_VBZ itself_PRP a_DT heavily_RB infected_VBN port_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD to_TO stop_VB that_DT traffic_NN that_IN the_DT quarantine_NN rules_NNS against_IN vessels_NNS were_VBD proposed_VBN ._.
During_IN the_DT rains_NNS no_DT Cutch_NNP Mandvi_NNP people_NNS can_MD arrive_VB by_IN sea_NN in_IN any_DT Karachi_NNP vessels_NNS except_IN the_DT ones_NNS that_WDT call_VBP at_IN Salaya_NNP ,_, as_IN steamers_NNS will_MD not_RB put_VB in_IN at_IN any_DT Cutch_NNP or_CC Kathiawr_NNP ports_NNS except_IN Salaya_NNP ,_, and_CC even_RB that_DT port_NN is_VBZ a_DT dangerous_JJ one_CD in_IN the_DT south-west_JJ monsoon_NN ._.
Therefore_RB there_EX need_VBP be_VB no_DT quarantine_NN against_IN Karachi_NNP vessels_NNS unless_IN they_PRP touch_VBP at_IN Salaya_NNP ._.
``_`` 3_CD ._.
As_IN ,_, however_RB ,_, Shepherd_NNP and_CC Company_NNP have_VBP now_RB decided_VBN only_RB to_TO run_VB one_CD steamer_JJR a_DT fortnight_NN from_IN Karachi_NNP vi_NNP Salaya_NNP ;_: and_CC as_IN the_DT Venice_NNP Conference_NNP Rules_NNP apparently_RB do_VBP not_RB ,_, even_RB in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN vessels_NNS less_RBR than_IN ten_VB days_NNS out_RP from_IN infected_JJ port_NN ,_, contemplate_VB strict_JJ quarantine_NN against_IN the_DT vessel_NN itself_PRP ,_, we_PRP think_VBP that_IN our_PRP$ proposal_NN to_TO quarantine_VB vessels_NNS from_IN ports_NNS between_IN Karachi_NNP and_CC Diu_NNP may_MD ,_, for_IN the_DT present_JJ ,_, be_VB shelved_VBN ,_, and_CC passengers_NNS from_IN such_JJ ports_NNS be_VB treated_VBN as_IN now_RB ,_, i.e._FW ,_, segregation_NN in_IN camp_NN on_IN shore_NN ,_, and_CC vessels_NNS given_VBN pratique_NNS after_IN disembarkation_NN of_IN the_DT passengers_NNS ._.
The_DT fact_NN also_RB that_IN vessels_NNS conveying_VBG infected_JJ people_NNS and_CC cargo_NN should_MD not_RB be_VB treated_VBN more_RBR severely_RB than_IN trains_NNS under_IN similar_JJ circumstances_NNS should_MD be_VB taken_VBN into_IN consideration_NN ._.
``_`` 4_CD ._.
It_PRP should_MD ,_, however_RB ,_, be_VB remembered_VBN that_IN after_IN the_DT cessation_NN of_IN the_DT rains_NNS free_JJ communication_NN will_MD again_RB take_VB place_NN between_IN Bombay_NNP and_CC all_DT Cutch_NNP and_CC Kathiawar_NNP ports_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP would_MD be_VB well_RB if_IN rules_NNS were_VBD drawn_VBN ?_. APP_NNP ._.
VIII_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN land_NN ._.
103_CD up_RB and_CC held_VBN in_IN readiness_NN for_IN future_JJ contingencies_NNS ;_: and_CC these_DT rules_NNS should_MD be_VB on_IN lines_NNS which_WDT ,_, whilst_VBD permitting_VBG quarantine_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN also_RB empowers_VBZ the_DT removal_NN of_IN that_DT quarantine_NN when_WRB passengers_NNS have_VBP been_VBN removed_VBN ._.
The_DT above_NN ,_, I_PRP think_VBP ,_, will_MD meet_VB the_DT case_NN and_CC keep_VB us_PRP prepared_JJ for_IN any_DT emergency_NN ._. ''_''

``_`` Memoranda_NNP to_TO the_DT Chairman_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP Plague_NNP Committee_NNP ,_, the_DT Commis-_NNP sioner_NN ,_, N._NNP D._NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN Ahmedabad_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
P._NNP -902-P._NNP ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 7th_CD July_NNP 1897_CD :_: -_: Forwards_NNS ,_, for_IN information_NN ,_, the_DT following_JJ copy_NN of_IN a_DT memorandum_NN of_IN the_DT measures_NNS for_IN protecting_VBG the_DT Kathiawar_NNP State_NNP from_IN plague_JJ infection_NN from_IN Cutch_NN :_: -_: ``_`` In_IN view_NN of_IN the_DT recent_JJ virulent_NN outbreak_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT Native_NNP State_NNP of_IN Cutch_NNP ,_, it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN necessary_JJ to_TO take_VB special_JJ precautionary_JJ steps_NNS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT introduction_NN of_IN plague_NN into_IN other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP ._.
At_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN the_DT outbreak_NN the_DT principal_JJ danger_NN lay_NN in_IN the_DT infection_NN being_VBG carried_VBN by_IN passengers_NNS leaving_VBG Cutch_NNP ports_NNS by_IN steamer_NN or_CC craft_NN ,_, and_CC measures_NNS were_VBD accordingly_RB adopted_VBN to_TO detain_VB under_IN observation_NN all_DT persons_NNS arriving_VBG at_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, Karachi_NNP ,_, and_CC other_JJ ports_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ,_, who_WP might_MD ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT local_JJ Plague_NNP Authorities_NNP ,_, be_VB considered_VBN 'suspicious_JJ ._. 1_CD ._.
Khana.-I_NNP arrived_VBD at_IN 5-11_CD P.M._NNP and_CC left_VBD at_IN 6-20_CD P.M._NNP on_IN 24th_CD March_NNP ._.
Surgeon-Captain_NNP Dyson_NNP ,_, Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, Bengal_NNP ,_, and_CC Surgeon-Captains_NNP Calvert_NNP and_CC Jay-Gould_NNP ,_, and_CC Surgeon-Lieutenant_NNP Peck_NNP ,_, the_DT three_CD officers_NNS posted_VBD here_RB for_IN inspection_NN duty_NN ,_, met_VBD me_PRP at_IN the_DT station_NN and_CC showed_VBD me_PRP over_IN the_DT segregation_NN camp_NN ,_, a_DT very_RB accurate_JJ ?_. APP_NNP ._.
VIII_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN land_NN ,_, 105_CD description_NN of_IN which_WDT ,_, together_RB with_IN inspection_NN and_CC disinfecting_VBG arrange-_JJ ments_NNS ,_, etc._NN ,_, is_VBZ given_VBN in_IN the_DT accompanying_VBG note_NN by_IN Surgeon-Captain_NNP Dyson_NNP ._.
The_DT distribution_NN of_IN water_NN by_IN pipes_NNS and_CC more_RBR efficient_JJ steam-_JJ ing_VBG arrangements_NNS will_MD shortly_RB be_VB completed_VBN ._.
There_EX had_VBD been_VBN 364_CD admissions_NNS to_TO date_NN and_CC there_EX were_VBD 22_CD suspects_NNS in_IN the_DT camp_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN my_PRP$ visit_NN ,_, two_CD of_IN whom_WP were_VBD in_IN hospital_NN ,_, one_CD suffering_NN from_IN pneumonia_NN and_CC the_DT other_JJ from_IN chicken-pox_NN ._.
I_PRP saw_VBD the_DT passengers_NNS in_IN the_DT 6-20_JJ P.M._NNP train_NN inspected_VBD and_CC was_VBD satisfied_VBN with_IN the_DT thoroughness_NN of_IN the_DT inspection_NN ._.
Seven_NNP first_RB and_CC second_JJ class_NN and_CC 363_CD third_JJ class_NN passengers_NNS were_VBD examined_VBN ._.
No_DT complaints_NNS were_VBD made_VBN ._.
So_RB far_RB no_DT cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN have_VBP been_VBN discovered_VBN ._.
The_DT lowest_JJS number_NN of_IN passengers_NNS inspected_VBN on_IN any_DT one_CD day_NN was_VBD 1,799_CD and_CC the_DT highest_JJS 4,067_CD ._.
The_DT lighting_VBG arrangements_NNS were_VBD defective_JJ ,_, but_CC electric_JJ light_NN will_MD soon_RB be_VB in_IN operation_NN at_IN a_DT special_JJ inspection_NN platform_NN which_WDT was_VBD nearly_RB completed_VBN and_CC at_IN which_WDT only_RB trains_VBZ from_IN up-country_NN will_MD stop_VB ._.
2_CD ._.
Manikpur.-I_NNP reached_VBD this_DT station_NN at_IN 6_CD P.M._NNP on_IN the_DT 25th_CD and_CC remained_VBD there_EX till_VB 9-14_CD the_DT next_JJ morning_NN ._.
Only_RB two_CD trains_NNS from_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP direction-one_NN at_IN 7-24_JJ A.M._NNP and_CC the_DT other_JJ at_IN 7-5_JJ P.M_NNP -are_NNP examined_VBD each_DT day_NN ._.
There_EX are_VBP no_DT night_NN trains_NNS ._.
I_PRP was_VBD present_JJ at_IN the_DT inspection_NN of_IN two_CD trains_NNS ,_, the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN passengers_NNS examined_VBD being_VBG 360_CD ,_, of_IN whom_WP about_IN 15_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
were_VBD from_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.
The_DT examining_JJ staff_NN consists_VBZ of_IN one_CD Commissioned_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Surgeon-Lieutenant_NNP Dawes_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT native_JJ female_NN nurse_NN ;_: the_DT former_JJ examines_NNS all_PDT the_DT men_NNS and_CC feels_VBZ the_DT pulses_NNS of_IN the_DT females_NNS ,_, whose_WP$ examination_NN is_VBZ completed_VBN by_IN the_DT nurse_NN ._.
The_DT examinations_NNS were_VBD carefully_RB made_VBN ._.
There_EX were_VBD no_DT purdah_JJ women_NNS and_CC no_DT complaints_NNS ._.
One_CD hospital_NN assistant_NN is_VBZ in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT segregation_NN camp_NN and_CC is_VBZ present_JJ at_IN inspections_NNS to_TO take_VB over_RP any_DT suspects_NNS or_CC plague_NN cases_NNS that_WDT may_MD have_VB to_TO be_VB detained_VBN ._.
The_DT camp_NN consists_VBZ of_IN tents_NNS and_CC huts_NNS for_IN Europeans_NNPS and_CC natives_NNS with_IN hospital_JJ properly_RB isolated_VBN ,_, but_CC as_IN only_RB two_CD suspects_NNS had_VBD so_RB far_RB been_VBN detained_VBN ,_, the_DT hospital_NN assistant_NN has_VBZ had_VBN little_JJ to_TO do_VB ._.
The_DT small_JJ number_NN of_IN ``_`` suspects_NNS ``_`` at_IN this_DT station_NN is_VBZ probably_RB due_JJ to_TO effective_JJ inspections_NNS at_IN Jubbulpur_NNP and_CC Itarsi_NNP ._.
The_DT drinking_NN water_NN is_VBZ here_RB the_DT great_JJ difficulty_NN ._.
Europeans_NNS get_VBP theirs_PRP from_IN Allahabad_NNP and_CC natives_NNS use_VBP water_NN from_IN the_DT railway_NN well_RB and_CC a_DT neighbouring_JJ tank_NN ,_, both_DT of_IN which_WDT are_VBP drying_VBG up_RP ._.
The_DT station_NN is_VBZ badly_RB lighted_VBN ._.
The_DT medical_JJ officer_NN keeps_VBZ no_DT diary_NN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP directed_VBN him_PRP to_TO do_VB so_RB ,_, entering_VBG the_DT number_NN of_IN passengers_NNS examined_VBD each_DT day_NN ,_, especially_RB c_VBZ 14_CD ?_. 106_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
VIII_NNP ._.
noting_VBG the_DT number_NN from_IN Bombay_NNP and_CC to_TO send_VB a_DT copy_NN of_IN the_DT diary_JJ each_DT week_NN to_TO his_PRP$ superior_JJ officer_NN ._.
The_DT staff_NN is_VBZ sufficient_JJ and_CC no_DT new_JJ passenger_NN is_VBZ allowed_VBN to_TO enter_VB the_DT train_NN till_IN the_DT inspection_NN is_VBZ completed_VBN ._.
3_CD ._.
Itarsi.-Surgeon-Colonel_NNP Hutcheson_NNP ,_, Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, Central_NNP Provinces_NNPS ,_, joined_VBD me_PRP at_IN Jubbulpur_NNP ,_, where_WRB I_PRP learned_VBD there_EX is_VBZ a_DT platform_JJ inspection_NN of_IN all_DT passengers_NNS from_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP direction_NN ,_, conducted_VBN by_IN a_DT Native_NNP Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP and_CC hospital_NN assistant_NN ,_, but_CC I_PRP did_VBD not_RB consider_VB it_PRP necessary_JJ to_TO remain_VB and_CC see_VB how_WRB it_PRP was_VBD done_VBN ._.
We_PRP reached_VBD Itarsi_NNP at_IN 6-45_JJ A.M._NNP on_IN 27th_CD and_CC left_VBD again_RB at_IN 9-40_JJ A.M_NNP ._.
The_DT staff_NN here_RB consists_VBZ of_IN a_DT Commissioned_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, Surgeon-Captain_NNP Bourke_NNP ,_, a_DT female_JJ hospital_NN assistant_NN for_IN examining_VBG passengers_NNS ,_, a_DT Native_NNP Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP and_CC Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP for_IN camp_NN and_CC other_JJ duties_NNS ._.
Hospital_NN and_CC segregation_NN arrangements_NNS for_IN Europeans_NNPS and_CC natives_NNS are_VBP sufficient_JJ ,_, except_IN that_IN a_DT hospital_NN for_IN women_NNS is_VBZ required_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT camp_NN is_VBZ well_RB situated_VBN and_CC water-supply_JJ satisfac-_JJ tory_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ an_DT incinerator_NN for_IN the_DT destruction_NN of_IN excreta_NN and_CC other_JJ infected_JJ substances_NNS ._.
There_EX are_VBP no_DT means_NNS of_IN disinfecting_VBG clothing_NN or_CC bedding_VBG except_IN by_IN boiling_VBG ,_, but_CC so_RB far_RB suspected_JJ articles_NNS of_IN this_DT kind_NN have_VBP been_VBN burned_VBN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP suggested_VBN that_IN some_DT clothing_NN and_CC bedding_NN should_MD be_VB kept_VBN in_IN stock_NN to_TO replace_VB any_DT destroyed_NN ._.
There_EX were_VBD 10_CD men_NNS and_CC 3_CD women_NNS suspects_NNS in_IN camp_NN ,_, and_CC since_IN 17th_CD February_NNP ,_, when_WRB Dr._NNP Bourke_NNP assumed_VBD charge_NN ,_, 49_CD have_VBP been_VBN detained_VBN ;_: none_NN of_IN these_DT have_VBP developed_VBN into_IN plague_NN cases_NNS ,_, though_IN a_DT plague_NN case_NN ,_, which_WDT proved_VBD fatal_JJ ,_, was_VBD taken_VBN out_IN of_IN the_DT train_NN on_IN February_NNP 16th_CD ._.
Before_IN that_DT 10_CD cr_NN 12_CD cases_NNS are_VBP said_VBD to_TO have_VB occurred_VBN ,_, but_CC the_DT information_NN is_VBZ not_RB reliable_JJ and_CC there_EX are_VBP no_DT records_NNS ._.
Three_CD trains_NNS are_VBP examined_VBN here_RB daily_RB ,_, at_IN 8-10_JJ A.M._NNP ,_, 4-35_JJ P.M._NNP and_CC 9-49_JJ P.M_NNP ,_, so_RB that_IN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT night_NN duty_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Bourke_NNP calculates_VBZ that_IN about_IN 500_CD passengers_NNS are_VBP examined_VBN daily_RB ._.
I_PRP saw_VBD the_DT examina-_JJ tion_NN of_IN the_DT 8-10_JJ train_NN in_IN which_WDT were_VBD 121_CD passengers_NNS and_CC was_VBD satisfied_VBN with_IN it_PRP ._.
I_PRP also_RB examined_VBD on_IN my_PRP$ return_NN on_IN 30th_CD in_IN the_DT 4-35_JJ P.M._NNP train_NN ._.
On_IN this_DT occasion_NN the_DT carriages_NNS had_VBD not_RB been_VBN locked_VBN at_IN the_DT last_JJ stop-_JJ ping_VBG place_NN ,_, and_CC passengers_NNS were_VBD able_JJ to_TO get_VB out_RP before_IN examination_NN ._.
I_PRP drew_VBD attention_NN to_TO this_DT ._.
I_PRP discovered_VBD at_IN this_DT station_NN that_IN passenger_NN carriages_NNS are_VBP attached_VBN to_TO goods_NNS trains_NNS on_IN various_JJ railway_NN lines_NNS and_CC not_RB being_VBG scheduled_VBN the_DT presengers_NNS thus_RB conveyed_VBN are_VBP likely_JJ to_TO evade_VB inspection_NN ._.

The_DT staff_NN consists_VBZ of_IN one_CD Commissioned_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, two_CD Military_JJ Assistant_NNP Surgeons_NNP and_CC five_CD hospital_NN assistants_NNS ,_, and_CC I_PRP found_VBD hospital_NN assistants_NNS assisting_VBG at_IN the_DT inspections_NNS ._.

This_DT was_VBD about_IN to_TO be_VB remedied_VBN ._.

5_CD ._.

VIII_NNP ._.
I_PRP was_VBD by_IN the_DT courtesy_NN of_IN the_DT Surgeon-General_JJ ,_, to_TO whom_WP my_PRP$ thanks_NNS are_VBP due_JJ ,_, met_VBN by_IN Surgeon-Major_NNP Street_NNP ,_, D.S.O._NNP ,_, Deputy_NNP Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, and_CC Surgeon-Captain_NNP Prall_NNP ,_, Acting_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Surgeon-General_NNP ,_, also_RB by_IN the_DT two_CD commissioned_VBD Inspecting_NNP Medical_NNP Officers_NNP ,_, Surgeon-Lieutenants_NNP Walton_NNP and_CC Dixon_NNP ,_, and_CC shown_VBN over_IN the_DT segregation_NN camp_NN ._.

He_PRP is_VBZ also_RB in_IN charge_NN of_IN all_DT stores_NNS and_CC equipments_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ issue_NN ,_, brings_VBZ to_TO the_DT notice_NN of_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN persons_NNS who_WP are_VBP destitute_JJ and_CC have_VBP to_TO be_VB fed_VBN at_IN Government_NNP expense_NN ._.
He_PRP keeps_VBZ a_DT daily_JJ report_NN book_NN for_IN the_DT information_NN of_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN in_IN charge_NN ._.
The_DT medical_JJ officer_NN in_IN charge_NN being_VBG on_IN inspection_NN duty_NN every_DT other_JJ night_NN and_CC part_NN of_IN each_DT day_NN has_VBZ to_TO rely_VB greatly_RB on_IN the_DT Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP in_IN looking_VBG after_IN the_DT camp_NN ._.
He_PRP ,_, however_RB ,_, personally_RB each_DT morning_NN ,_, having_VBG given_VBN orders_NNS the_DT previous_JJ evening_NN ,_, examines_VBZ all_DT suspects_NNS paraded_VBN for_IN discharge_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, after_IN satisfying_VBG himself_PRP as_IN to_TO their_PRP$ health_NN ,_, countersigns_VBP their_PRP$ railway_NN tickets_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN filed_VBN in_IN the_DT office_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN admission_NN ._.
Subsequently_RB he_PRP inspects_VBZ the_DT camp_NN in_IN company_NN with_IN the_DT Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP and_CC Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP ,_, and_CC sees_VBZ all_DT quarantined_JJ persons_NNS ,_, listens_VBZ to_TO complaints_NNS ,_, etc._FW ,_, etc_FW ._.
At_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN his_PRP$ parade_NN all_DT suspects_NNS are_VBP summoned_VBN by_IN a_DT gong_NN and_CC stand_NN in_IN front_NN of_IN their_PRP$ huts_NNS ._.
To_TO facilitate_VB these_DT orders_NNS being_VBG carried_VBN out_RP by_IN persons_NNS unaccustomed_VBN to_TO discipline_VB ,_, the_DT bunniah_NN 's_POS shop_NN is_VBZ closed_VBN during_IN this_DT parade_NN and_CC open_VB again_RB immediately_RB after_IN it_PRP ._.
At_IN present_JJ the_DT camp_NN contains_VBZ no_DT plague_NN cases_NNS ,_, and_CC therefore_RB also_RB no_DT contact_NN cases_NNS ,_, but_CC it_PRP contains_VBZ a_DT number_NN of_IN coolies_NNS doing_VBG construc-_JJ tion_NN work_NN ._.
Under_IN the_DT above_JJ circumstances_NNS very_RB strict_JJ quarantine_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB enforced_VBN ._.
Once_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, construction_NN is_VBZ finished_VBN ,_, the_DT various_JJ camps_NNS can_MD ,_, at_IN any_DT moment_NN ,_, be_VB strictly_RB segregated_VBN and_CC com-_JJ munication_NN stopped_VBD ._.
On_IN completion_NN of_IN the_DT new_JJ bunniah_NN 's_POS shop_NN between_IN the_DT ``_`` suspect_JJ ''_'' and_CC ``_`` contact_NN ''_'' camps_NNS ,_, separate_JJ hours_NNS will_MD be_VB fixed_VBN for_IN the_DT occupants_NNS of_IN each_DT camp_NN to_TO obtain_VB their_PRP$ daily_JJ supplies_NNS ._.
With_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO keeping_VBG the_DT camps_NNS as_RB dry_JJ as_IN possible_JJ ,_, suspects_NNS are_VBP not_RB supplied_VBN with_IN bathing_JJ water_NN ,_, but_CC are_VBP allowed_VBN to_TO bathe_VB in_IN the_DT large_JJ tank_NN at_IN two_CD separate_JJ ghats_NNS ,_, constables_NNS being_VBG stationed_VBN over_IN each_DT ghat_NN to_TO prevent_VB any_DT water_NN (_( which_WDT is_VBZ not_RB fit_JJ for_IN consumption_NN )_) being_VBG carried_VBN away_RB for_IN drinking_NN or_CC cooking_NN purposes_NNS ._.
Police.-The_NNP police_NNS force_NN on_IN duty_NN consists_VBZ of-_JJ 1_CD European_JJ Inspector_NNP of_IN the_DT Bengal_NNP Police_NNP ._.

Statistics.-Inspection_NN began_VBD on_IN the_DT 15th_JJ February_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT average_JJ daily_JJ number_NN of_IN passengers_NNS examined_VBN is_VBZ 3,027_CD ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN suspect_JJ passengers_NNS who_WP have_VBP been_VBN detained_VBN in_IN camp_NN up_RB to_TO date_NN is_VBZ 273_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT maximum_JJ number_NN quarantined_VBN on_IN any_DT one_CD day_NN was_VBD 135_CD ._.
These_DT figures_NNS are_VBP largely_RB due_JJ to_TO the_DT followers_NNS of_IN the_DT Gloucestershire_NNP Regiment_NNP ,_, 71_CD ,_, and_CC to_TO two_CD ships_NNS '_POS crews_NNS paid_VBD off_RP in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, viz._NN ,_, 43_CD and_CC 33_CD respectively_RB ._.
Disinfecting_VBG apparatus.-Pending_VBG the_DT arrival_NN of_IN a_DT more_RBR elaborate_JJ disinfecting_NN apparatus_NN ,_, which_WDT will_MD be_VB ready_JJ by_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT month_NN the_DT following_VBG arrangements_NNS have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN ._.
A_DT steam-boiler_NN has_VBZ been_VBN set_VBN up_RP in_IN which_WDT steam_NN up_IN to_TO 50_CD lbs_NNS ._.
to_TO 100_CD lbs_NNS ._.
pressure_NN can_MD be_VB generated_VBN ._.
Steam_NN from_IN this_DT boiler_NN is_VBZ passed_VBN into_IN an_DT iron_NN tank_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT the_DT clothes_NNS to_TO be_VB disinfected_VBN are_VBP hung_VBN on_IN iron_NN rods_NNS ._.
This_DT is_VBZ a_DT ``_`` current_JJ steam_NN ''_'' disinfector_NN only_RB ,_, the_DT tank_NN not_RB being_VBG made_VBN to_TO stand_VB pressure_NN ._.
The_DT clothes_NNS are_VBP steamed_VBN for_IN 20_CD minutes_NNS ._.
Since_IN the_DT bacillus_NN of_IN plague_NN is_VBZ non-mobile_JJ ,_, non-sporing_JJ ,_, and_CC is_VBZ killed_VBN by_IN expo-_JJ sure_NN to_TO a_DT temperature_NN of_IN 60_CD C._NNP for_IN 5_CD minutes_NNS (_( Klein_NNP )_) or_CC by_IN exposure_NN to_TO a_DT temperature_NN of_IN 80_CD C._NNP (_( Kitasato_NNP )_) ,_, I_PRP believe_VBP the_DT above_JJ procedure_NN to_TO be_VB sufficient_JJ ,_, provided_VBD too_RB many_JJ clothes_NNS are_VBP not_RB introduced_VBN into_IN the_DT tank_NN at_IN once_RB ._.
In_IN practice_NN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN found_VBN that_IN ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT trying_VBG nature_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN ,_, the_DT tank_NN becomes_VBZ very_RB hot_JJ ._.
The_DT Hospital_NNP Assist-_NNP ant_NN who_WP has_VBZ been_VBN placed_VBN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT disinfection_NN is_VBZ inclined_VBN to_TO overload_VB it_PRP with_IN clothes_NNS ,_, so_RB as_IN to_TO finish_VB his_PRP$ work_NN quickly_RB and_CC get_VB away_RB from_IN the_DT heat_NN surrounding_VBG the_DT engine_NN and_CC boiler_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN suspect_JJ cases_NNS should_MD increase_VB ,_, we_PRP will_MD probably_RB have_VB to_TO obtain_VB the_DT loan_NN of_IN the_DT services_NNS of_IN a_DT European_JJ non-commissioned_JJ officer_NN or_CC other_JJ European_JJ who_WP may_MD be_VB trusted_VBN to_TO implicitly_RB carry_VB out_RP the_DT orders_NNS given_VBN him_PRP ,_, since_IN the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN clothes_NNS is_VBZ important_JJ ,_, and_CC should_MD be_VB thoroughly_RB carried_VBN out_RP ,_, and_CC this_DT under_IN native_JJ supervision_NN must_MD always_RB be_VB a_DT matter_NN of_IN doubt_NN ._.
I_PRP attach_VBP copies_NNS of_IN the_DT general_JJ rules_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN prescribed_VBN for_IN the_DT guidance_NN of_IN medical_JJ officers_NNS in_IN charge_NN of_IN quarantine_JJ camps_NNS in_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, and_CC also_RB for_IN the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN infected_JJ railway_NN carriages_NNS ._.

3_CD ._.

7_CD ._.

8_CD ._.

They_PRP fear_VBP that_IN as_RB soon_RB as_IN it_PRP became_VBD known_VBN that_IN a_DT red_JJ ticket_NN marked_VBD the_DT holder_NN as_IN suspected_VBN ,_, passengers_NNS would_MD evade_VB the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN the_DT scheme_NN by_IN first_JJ taking_VBG ticket_NN to_TO place_VB within_IN uninfected_JJ area_NN and_CC then_RB alighting_VBG and_CC booking_VBG again_RB ._.

VIII_NNP ._.
Correspondence_NN regarding_VBG the_DT Disinfection_NN of_IN Baggage_NNP ._.
DISINFECTION_NN OF_IN THE_NNP BAGGAGE_NNP OF_NNP PASSENGERS_NNP TRAVELLING_NNP BY_NNP RAILWAY_NNP FROM_NNP PLAGUE-INFECTED_NNP AREAS_NNP ._.
No_DT ._.
90_CD ._.
No_DT ._.
970_CD ,_, dated_VBN Calcutta_NNP ,_, the_DT 6th_CD March_NNP 1897_CD ._.
From-J_NNP ._.
P._NNP HEWETT_NNP ,_, Esq._NNP ,_, C.I.E._NNP ,_, Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, Home_NNP Department_NNP ,_, To-The_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, General_NNP Department_NNP ._.
I_PRP am_VBP directed_VBN to_TO state_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT information_NN of_IN the_DT Governor_NNP in_IN Council_NNP ,_, that_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP have_VBP been_VBN considering_VBG the_DT subject_NN of_IN the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT luggage_NN of_IN passengers_NNS travelling_VBG by_IN railway_NN from_IN areas_NNS in_IN which_WDT plague_NN prevails_NNS ._.
Infection_NNP maybe_RB spread_VBD as_IN easily_RB by_IN the_DT contaminated_JJ clothes_NNS and_CC personal_JJ effects_NNS of_IN passen-_JJ gers_NNS as_IN by_IN the_DT passengers_NNS themselves_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN suspi-_JJ cious_JJ articles_NNS is_VBZ therefore_RB a_DT necessary_JJ adjunct_NN to_TO the_DT medical_JJ inspec-_JJ tion_NN of_IN passengers_NNS which_WDT is_VBZ made_VBN at_IN the_DT principal_JJ railway_NN stations_NNS along_IN the_DT lines_NNS of_IN communication_NN from_IN infected_JJ districts_NNS ._.
I_PRP am_VBP to_TO convey_VB the_DT following_JJ remarks_NNS regarding_VBG the_DT nature_NN and_CC extent_NN of_IN the_DT disinfection_NN which_WDT is_VBZ required_VBN in_IN order_NN to_TO be_VB effective_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT manner_NN in_IN which_WDT it_PRP should_MD be_VB carried_VBN out_RP ._.
4_CD ._.
By_IN the_DT Dresden_NNP Convention_NNP of_IN 1893_CD ,_, the_DT principles_NNS of_IN which_WDT are_VBP being_VBG supported_VBN by_IN the_DT delegates_NNS of_IN Her_NNP Majesty_NNP 's_POS Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP at_IN the_DT Conference_NN at_IN Venice_NNP ,_, disinfection_NN is_VBZ obligatory_JJ for_IN dirty_JJ linen_NN ,_, rags_NN ,_, clothes_NNS and_CC other_JJ goods_NNS forming_VBG part_NN of_IN luggage_NN being_VBG conveyed_VBN from_IN a_DT contaminated_JJ district_NN ,_, provided_VBD that_IN the_DT local_JJ sanitary_JJ authority_NN considers_NNS such_JJ articles_NNS to_TO be_VB contaminated_VBN ._.
The_DT most_RBS effectual_JJ method_NN of_IN disinfection_NN is_VBZ to_TO boil_VB the_DT articles_NNS to_TO be_VB disinfected_VBN in_IN water_NN or_CC to_TO subject_VB them_PRP to_TO the_DT action_NN of_IN steam_NN ._.
At_IN Khana_NNP on_IN the_DT East_NNP Indian_JJ Railway_NNP ,_, where_WRB special_JJ arrangements_NNS have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN for_IN the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN baggage_NN ,_, the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP are_VBP informed_VBN that_IN the_DT steam_NN is_VBZ generated_VBN by_IN a_DT large_JJ engine_NN on_IN wheels_NNS ._.
The_DT steam_NN is_VBZ passed_VBN through_IN a_DT pipe_NN into_IN a_DT 400_CD gallon_NN water_NN tank_NN ,_, inside_IN of_IN which_WDT are_VBP twelve_JJ iron_NN rods_NNS on_IN which_WDT the_DT articles_NNS to_TO be_VB disinfected_VBN are_VBP suspended_VBN ._.
Access_NN to_TO the_DT interior_NN of_IN the_DT tank_NN is_VBZ obtained_VBN through_IN a_DT manhole_NN at_IN the_DT top_NN ,_, The_DT tank_NN is_VBZ provided_VBN with_IN a_DT safety_NN valve_NN and_CC a_DT tap_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN letting_VBG off_RP the_DT water_NN which_WDT accumulates_VBZ ._.
A_DT cooking_NN range_NN is_VBZ about_IN to_TO be_VB added_VBN to_TO the_DT apparatus_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP of_IN Bengal_NNP hopes_VBZ to_TO have_VB a_DT disinfector_NN on_IN the_DT latest_JJS approved_JJ principles_NNS constructed_VBN within_IN three_CD weeks_NNS ._.
Until_IN arrangements_NNS can_MD be_VB made_VBN for_IN disinfecting_VBG by_IN boiling_VBG water_NN or_CC ?_. APP_NNP ._.
VIII_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN land_NN ._.
137_CD steam_NN ,_, articles_NNS of_IN luggage_NN can_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN by_IN placing_VBG them_PRP in_IN a_DT solution_NN of_IN two_CD parts_NNS of_IN hydrochloric_JJ acid_NN and_CC one_CD of_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN to_TO 1,000_CD parts_NNS of_IN water_NN for_IN an_DT hour_NN and_CC then_RB drying_VBG them_PRP in_IN the_DT sun_NN or_CC by_IN artificial_JJ heat_NN ,_, preferably_RB the_DT former_JJ method_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB necessary_JJ to_TO disinfect_VB in_IN this_DT manner_NN the_DT clothes_NNS and_CC personal_JJ effects_NNS of_IN persons_NNS who_WP are_VBP not_RB themselves_PRP suffering_VBG from_IN infection_NN or_CC show_VBP suspicious_JJ symptoms_NNS unless_IN such_JJ clothes_NNS and_CC personal_JJ effects_NNS are_VBP dirty_JJ or_CC in_IN such_JJ a_DT condition_NN as_IN to_TO raise_VB a_DT suspicion_NN that_IN they_PRP may_MD be_VB contaminated_VBN ._.
In_IN all_DT such_JJ cases_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, disinfection_NN should_MD ,_, the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP considers_NNS ,_, be_VB carried_VBN out_RP at_IN a_DT railway_NN station_NN near_IN the_DT frontier_NN of_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP and_CC Sind_NNP on_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT railway_NN lines_NNS leading_VBG from_IN those_DT Provinces_NNS to_TO other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN India_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT medical_JJ officers_NNS at_IN places_NNS where_WRB disinfection_NN takes_VBZ place_NN should_MD be_VB instructed_VBN to_TO exercise_VB the_DT widest_JJS discretion_NN so_RB as_IN to_TO render_VB it_PRP quite_RB impossible_JJ that_IN articles_NNS which_WDT may_MD be_VB contaminated_VBN shall_MD be_VB passed_VBN without_IN being_VBG disinfected_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ very_RB desirable_JJ that_IN the_DT disinfection_NN should_MD take_VB place_NN at_IN some_DT station_NN at_IN which_WDT the_DT train_NN arrives_VBZ during_IN the_DT day_NN ,_, amongst_RB other_JJ reasons_NNS because_IN sunlight_VBD itself_PRP acts_VBZ as_IN a_DT strong_JJ disinfectant_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
In_IN cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT disinfection_NN necessary_JJ under_IN these_DT orders_NNS can_MD not_RB otherwise_RB be_VB completed_VBN ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB necessary_JJ to_TO detain_VB a_DT por-_JJ tion_NN of_IN the_DT passengers_NNS until_IN the_DT departure_NN of_IN the_DT next_JJ train_NN ._.

From-The_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, General_NNP Depart-_NNP ment_NN ,_, To-The_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, Home_NNP Department_NNP ._.
Your_PRP$ letter_NN 970_CD of_IN 16th_CD March_NNP about_IN disinfecting_VBG clothes_NNS con-_JJ sidered_VBN by_IN our_PRP$ Surgeon-General_JJ and_CC special_JJ Medical_NNP Committee_NNP who_WP report_VBP that_IN any_DT disinfection_NN scheme_NN will_MD entail_VB detention_NN of_IN pas-_JJ sengers_NNS for_IN at_IN least_JJS 24_CD hours_NNS in_IN observation_NN or_CC quarantine_NN camp_NN ,_, and_CC think_VB detention_NN should_MD extend_VB to_TO seven_CD days_NNS as_IN Director_NNP General_NNP states_NNPS is_VBZ done_VBN at_IN Khana_NNP ._.
Are_JJ Government_NNP India_NNP prepared_VBD to_TO impose_VB suitable_JJ and_CC sufficient_JJ restrictions_NNS on_IN railway_NN booking_NN at_IN stations_NNS on_IN both_DT sides_NNS of_IN disinfection_NN stations_NNS ?_.
Otherwise_RB disinfection_NN and_CC detention_NN can_MD be_VB easily_RB evaded_VBN by_IN alighting_VBG at_IN another_DT station_NN and_CC taking_VBG short_JJ land_NN journey_NN before_IN re-booking_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP would_MD be_VB wasteful_JJ and_CC useless_JJ to_TO buy_VB apparatus_NN ,_, employ_JJ staff_NN and_CC establish_VB observation_NN camps_NNS proposed_VBN by_IN Surgeon-General_NNP ._.
As_IN to_TO duration_NN of_IN delay_NN caused_VBN by_IN disinfection_NN ,_, our_PRP$ experience_NN shows_VBZ it_PRP takes_VBZ four_CD hours_NNS at_IN Karachi_NNP and_CC less_JJR than_IN one_CD hour_NN at_IN Ahmedabad_NNP ._.

From-The_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, Home_NNP Department_NNP ,_, To-The_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, General_NNP Deparlment_NNP ._.
Your_PRP$ 1388_CD of_IN 9th_CD ._.
Government_NN of_IN India_NNP understand_VBP that_IN Bom-_NNP bay_JJ Government_NNP do_VBP not_RB accept_VB view_NN of_IN their_PRP$ Surgeon-General_JJ and_CC Special_NNP Medical_NNP Committee_NNP that_IN disinfection_NN scheme_NN will_MD entail_VB deten-_JJ tion_NN of_IN passengers_NNS for_IN twenty-four_JJ hours_NNS ._.
Time_NNP taken_VBN in_IN disinfect-_JJ ing_NN will_MD ,_, it_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, depend_VBP on_IN amount_NN of_IN plant_NN used_VBN ._.
It_PRP will_MD now_RB be_VB probably_RB impossible_JJ to_TO make_VB prompt_JJ ar-_JJ rangements_NNS for_IN disinfecting_VBG by_IN steam_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP suggest_VBP the_DT simple_JJ plan_NN of_IN boiling_VBG all_DT suspected_VBN articles_NNS ._.
Boiling_VBG pro-_JJ cess_NN should_MD not_RB take_VB more_JJR than_IN quarter_NN of_IN hour_NN and_CC drying_VBG process_NN an_DT hour_NN ._.
Orders_NNS as_IN to_TO description_VB apply_RB only_RB to_TO articles_NNS regarded_VBN by_IN the_DT medical_JJ officers_NNS as_IN suspicious_JJ and_CC will_MD be_VB carried_VBN out_RP at_IN places_NNS where_WRB medical_JJ inspection_NN of_IN passengers_NNS takes_VBZ place_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB necessary_JJ to_TO detain_VB train_NN or_CC all_DT passengers_NNS while_IN this_DT is_VBZ being_VBG done_VBN ._.

Report_NNP B._NNP I_PRP (_( to_TO company_NN Disinfection/30_NNP )_) ,_, dated_VBN Khnpur_NNP ,_, -July_RB 1897_CD From-SURGEON-LIEUTENANT_JJ C._NNP J._NNP MILNE_NNP ,_, M.B._NNP ,_, I.M.S._NNP ,_, Inspecting_NNP Medical_NNP Oficer_NNP ,_, Khnpur_NNP ,_, To-The_NNP Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, Mooltan_NNP ._.

2_CD ._.

39-A._JJ ,_, dated_VBD 2nd_CD April_NNP 1897_CD ,_, in_IN which_WDT I_PRP suggested_VBD the_DT detention_NN of_IN all_DT passengers_NNS (_( and_CC the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN their_PRP$ kits_NNS )_) for_IN 24_CD hours_NNS at_IN least_JJS if_IN a_DT ten_JJ days_NNS '_POS detention_NN could_MD not_RB be_VB enforced_VBN ._.

(_( b_NN )_) The_DT monthly_JJ disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT huts_NNS by_IN syringing_VBG with_IN I_PRP :_: 1,000_CD corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN solution_NN ._.

(_( c_NN )_) The_DT huts_NNS as_IN a_DT protection_NN from_IN the_DT elements_NNS ._.
(_( 1_CD )_) The_DT temperature.-With_JJ regard_NN to_TO the_DT heat_NN ,_, the_DT position_NN of_IN the_DT huts_NNS (_( facing_VBG the_DT east_NN )_) and_CC the_DT solidity_NN of_IN their_PRP$ roofs_NNS were_VBD a_DT considerable_JJ protection_NN from_IN the_DT hot_JJ rays_NNS of_IN the_DT midday_NN and_CC afternoon_NN sun_NN ._.

(_( 2_CD )_) Rain_NN and_CC Storms.-These_JJ are_VBP of_IN very_RB rare_JJ occurrence_NN ,_, but_CC this_DT year_NN have_VBP been_VBN more_RBR frequent_JJ than_IN for_IN many_JJ years_NNS past_IN ._.

The_DT addition_NN of_IN a_DT small_JJ verandah_NN cover_NN of_IN sarkhna_JJ grass_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN suggested_VBN would_MD be_VB of_IN immense_JJ help_NN not_RB only_RB as_IN a_DT protection_NN from_IN rain_NN ,_, but_CC also_RB aiding_VBG the_DT protection_NN from_IN the_DT sun_NN ._.
Should_MD the_DT camp_NN be_VB likely_JJ to_TO continue_VB for_IN any_DT length_NN of_IN time_NN ,_, this_DT addition_NN will_MD be_VB undertaken_VBN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP strongly_RB of_IN opinion_NN that_IN sleeper_JJR huts_NNS made_VBN in_IN the_DT form_NN carried_VBD out_RP are_VBP infinitely_RB more_RBR satisfactory_JJ than_IN grass_NN ones_NNS for_IN such_PDT a_DT purpose_NN as_IN ours_NN has_VBZ been_VBN ._.
The_DT water-sup-_JJ ply_NN ._.
5_CD ._.

VIII_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN land_NN ._.
159_CD (_( 2_CD )_) As_IN regards_NNS the_DT important_JJ matter_NN of_IN latrines_NNS ,_, the_DT system_NN originally_RB suggested_VBN and_CC adopted_VBN was_VBD that_IN of_IN an_DT enclosure_NN in_IN which_WDT a_DT number_NN of_IN receptacles_NNS were_VBD placed_VBN ._.
These_DT when_WRB soiled_NNS were_VBD to_TO be_VB carried_VBN away_RB at_IN once_RB to_TO the_DT trenches_NNS ,_, which_WDT were_VBD some_DT 70_CD yards_NNS distant_JJ ,_, by_IN the_DT attendant_JJ sweepers_NNS ._.
But_CC this_DT method_NN was_VBD quite_RB impracticable_JJ ._.
After_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN the_DT train_NN the_DT latrines_NNS were_VBD so_RB crowded_VBN that_IN do_VBP what_WP the_DT sweepers_NNS could_MD they_PRP were_VBD unable_JJ to_TO do_VB their_PRP$ work_NN quickly_RB enough_RB to_TO be_VB satisfactory_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT smell_NN ,_, etc._FW ,_, gave_VBD rise_NN to_TO frequent_JJ complaint_NN ._.
We_PRP then_RB made_VBD the_DT long_JJ trenches_NNS over_IN which_WDT the_DT men_NNS could_MD sit_VB ,_, and_CC this_DT system_NN has_VBZ proved_VBN admirable_JJ ._.
The_DT trenches_NNS are_VBP two_CD in_IN number_NN ,_, each_DT 50_CD yards_NNS long_JJ ,_, and_CC about_IN 80_CD men_NNS can_MD use_VB them_PRP at_IN once_RB ._.
All_PDT that_IN the_DT sweepers_NNS have_VBP to_TO do_VB is_VBZ to_TO run_VB along_IN the_DT line_NN and_CC throw_NN in_IN earth_NN and_CC carbolic_JJ powder_NN ._.
Since_IN this_DT system_NN has_VBZ been_VBN in_IN vogue_NN there_RB has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN the_DT slightest_JJS odour_JJ apparent_NN ._.
The_DT trenches_NNS have_VBP been_VBN visited_VBN daily_JJ once_RB or_CC twice_RB by_IN either_CC the_DT Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP or_CC myself_PRP ._.
For_IN the_DT reception_NN of_IN urine_NN ,_, a_DT number_NN of_IN flat_JJ gumlahs_NN ,_, one_CD foot_NN in_IN diameter_NN ,_, were_VBD placed_VBN in_IN the_DT latrines_NNS ._.
They_PRP were_VBD filled_VBN with_IN sawdust_NN (_( an_DT idea_NN suggested_VBN by_IN reading_VBG Dr._NNP Poore_NNP 's_POS paper_NN in_IN the_DT Journal_NNP of_IN State_NNP Medicine_NNP for_IN January_NNP 1897_CD )_) ._.
No_DT smell_NN was_VBD caused_VBN ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT day_NN the_DT sawdust_NN was_VBD burnt_VBN ._.
I_PRP have_VBP reason_NN to_TO think_VB ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT men_NNS used_VBD trenches_NNS for_IN urination_NN to_TO a_DT great_JJ extent_NN ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) A_DT ``_`` pucca_NN ''_'' incinerator_NN not_RB being_VBG considered_VBN advisable_JJ we_PRP built_VBD a_DT small_JJ cutcha_NN one_CD in_IN which_WDT condemned_VBD clothes_NNS and_CC the_DT other_JJ refuse_NN of_IN the_DT camp_NN were_VBD burnt_NNS ._.
The_DT disinfection_NN of_IN clothing_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
Since_IN the_DT tanks_NNS were_VBD erected_VBN disinfection_NN by_IN steam_NN of_IN the_DT men_NNS 's_POS clothing_NN at_IN least_JJS has_VBZ been_VBN adopted_VBN on_IN all_DT occasions_NNS ._.
