Women_NNS travelling_VBG alone_RB could_MD not_RB be_VB prevailed_VBN on_IN to_TO part_NN with_IN their_PRP$ clothing_NN ,_, and_CC so_RB steam_JJ disinfection_NN was_VBD only_RB used_VBN when_WRB they_PRP were_VBD willing_JJ to_TO hand_NN over_RP their_PRP$ clothes_NNS to_TO their_PRP$ husbands_NNS ,_, etc_FW ._.
I_PRP regret_VBP very_RB much_JJ that_IN I_PRP was_VBD unable_JJ to_TO obtain_VB a_DT thermometer_NN by_IN which_WDT the_DT exact_NN heat_NN in_IN the_DT tanks_NNS could_MD be_VB ascertained_VBN ._.
From_IN various_JJ observations_NNS (_( Parkes_NNP '_POS Hygiene_NNP ,_, vide_NN pages_NNS 440_CD et_NN seq._NN ,_, etc_FW ._. )_)

the_DT temperature_NN in_IN the_DT tanks_NNS rose_VBD to_TO 220-230_JJ F._NNP ,_, probably_RB nearer_IN the_DT latter_JJ figure_NN ._.

VIII_NNP ._.
State_NNP Medicine_NNP ,_, we_PRP find_VBP him_PRP stating_VBG ``_`` that_DT many_JJ of_IN the_DT pathogenic_JJ organisms_NNS (_( i.e._NN ,_, the_DT non-spore_JJ bearing_NN ones_NNS )_) have_VBP their_PRP$ thermal_JJ death-_JJ points_NNS for_IN 10_CD minutes_NNS exposure_VBP at_IN or_CC below_IN 60_CD C._NNP (_( 140_CD F._NNP )_) ._. ''_''
As_IN the_DT plague_NN bacillus_NN is_VBZ a_DT non-spore_JJ bearing_NN pathogenic_JJ organism_NN similar_JJ to_TO the_DT ones_NNS he_PRP mentions_VBZ ,_, I_PRP have_VBP but_CC little_JJ doubt_NN in_IN stating_VBG that_IN our_PRP$ steam_NN disinfection_NN at_IN six_CD pounds_NNS pressure_NN for_IN an_DT hour_NN was_VBD thoroughly_RB efficacious_JJ with_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT disease_NN in_IN question_NN ._.
Great_NNP care_NN was_VBD taken_VBN ,_, too_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT clothes_NNS be_VB loosely_RB tied_VBN up_RP and_CC loosely_RB packed_VBD so_RB as_IN to_TO ensure_VB the_DT penetration_NN of_IN the_DT steam_NN ._.
The_DT ablutionary_JJ arrangements_NNS ._.
8_CD ._.
One_CD of_IN the_DT hollow_JJ spaces_NNS between_IN the_DT rails_NNS near_IN an_DT engine-_JJ house_NN used_VBN for_IN working_VBG at_IN the_DT under_IN parts_NNS of_IN an_DT engine_NN proved_VBN ,_, when_WRB filled_VBN with_IN water_NN from_IN the_DT adjoining_VBG hydrant_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB a_DT most_RBS excellent_JJ swimming_NN bath_NN ._.
Many_JJ of_IN the_DT men_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, preferred_VBD the_DT shower_NN bath_NN afforded_VBN by_IN the_DT hydrant_NN ,_, and_CC either_DT method_NN was_VBD perfectly_RB satis-_JJ factory_NN ._.
The_DT medical_JJ inspections_NNS ._.
9_CD ._.
All_DT trains_NNS coming_VBG here_RB from_IN Karachi_NNP were_VBD inspected_VBN on_IN arrival_NN ._.
Obviously_RB sick_JJ persons_NNS were_VBD removed_VBN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN at_IN once_RB and_CC the_DT remainder_NN of_IN the_DT 3rd_CD and_CC Intermediate_NNP passengers_NNS were_VBD carefully_RB observed_VBN as_IN they_PRP passed_VBD from_IN the_DT train_NN into_IN the_DT landis_NN ._.
First_RB and_CC second_JJ class_NN passengers_NNS were_VBD invariably_RB examined_VBN on_IN the_DT platform_NN and_CC passed_VBD ,_, unless_IN their_PRP$ condition_NN or_CC the_DT state_NN of_IN their_PRP$ clothing_NN was_VBD absolutely_RB prohibitive_JJ ._.
The_DT persons_NNS booking_VBG from_IN Khnpur_NNP were_VBD similarly_RB inspected_VBN ._.
Every_DT day_NN at_IN 9_CD A.M._NNP ,_, after_IN all_DT clothes_NNS had_VBD been_VBN handed_VBN in_IN for_IN disinfection_NN and_CC every_DT person_NN had_VBD bathed_VBN ,_, a_DT thorough_JJ inspection_NN of_IN every_DT person_NN took_VBD place_NN ._.
Many_JJ cases_NNS of_IN slight_JJ fever_NN ,_, especially_RB in_IN the_DT earlier_JJR days_NNS ,_, were_VBD detected_VBN ,_, and_CC these_DT were_VBD either_RB detained_VBN in_IN special_JJ huts_NNS built_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, or_CC ,_, if_IN considered_VBN necessary_JJ ,_, were_VBD taken_VBN to_TO the_DT hospital_NN ._.
When_WRB a_DT passenger_NN had_VBD thus_RB been_VBN disinfected_VBN ,_, bathed_VBN and_CC passed_VBN ,_, he_PRP had_VBD Khnpur_NNP stamped_VBD on_IN the_DT back_NN of_IN his_PRP$ ticket_NN ._.
At_IN 5_CD P.M._NNP ,_, the_DT passengers_NNS from_IN the_DT preceding_VBG mail_NN and_CC mixed_JJ trains_NNS were_VBD let_VB off_RP ,_, each_DT person_NN being_VBG observed_VBN as_IN he_PRP left_VBD the_DT landing_NN and_CC his_PRP$ ticket_NN examined_VBD for_IN the_DT stamp_NN noted_VBD in_IN order_NN to_TO assure_VB us_PRP that_IN the_DT conditions_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ detention_NN had_VBD been_VBN fulfilled_VBN ._.
From_IN April_NNP 8th_CD to_TO July_NNP 8th_CD ,_, 13,876_CD persons_NNS had_VBD been_VBN detained-_JJ ,_, etc._FW ,_, in_IN the_DT landis_NN ._.
In_IN addition_NN to_TO this_DT I_PRP inspected_VBD about_RB 5,794_CD others_NNS on_IN the_DT platform_NN ,_, making_VBG a_DT grand_JJ total_NN of_IN 19,670_CD inspected_JJ during_IN that_DT time_NN ._.
Out_IN of_IN that_DT number_NN it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN necessary_JJ to_TO admit_VB into_IN hospital_NN under_IN observation_NN as_IN suspicious_JJ 19_CD persons_NNS ._.
Nine_CD of_IN these_DT were_VBD actually_RB sick_JJ ,_, the_DT remaining_VBG ten_NN being_VBG their_PRP$ companions_NNS ._.

VIII_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN land_NN ._.
The_DT nine_CD cases_NNS are_VBP certified_VBN in_IN the_DT Admission_NNP and_CC Discharge_NNP Book_NNP of_IN the_DT hospital_NN as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: Remittent_NN Fever_IN 4_CD Malarial_NNP cachexia_NN 1_CD Bronchitis_NNP 1_CD Tubercle_NNP of_IN lung_NN 2_CD Heat_NNP apoplexy_VBD 1_CD TOTAL_NNP 9_CD All_NNP of_IN these_DT recovered_VBN with_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT cases_NNS of_IN tubercle_NN of_IN the_DT lung_NN admitted_VBD into_IN hospital_NN in_IN a_DT moribund_NN condition_NN on_IN the_DT 4th_CD July_NNP and_CC who_WP succumbed_VBD on_IN the_DT 6th_CD ._.
No_DT case_NN of_IN actual_JJ plague_NN was_VBD detected_VBN during_IN the_DT period_NN ._.
The_DT last_JJ case_NN which_WDT affords_NNS grounds_NNS for_IN the_DT suspicion_NN that_IN it_PRP was_VBD a_DT case_NN of_IN so-called_JJ pneumonic_JJ form_NN of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN (_( so_RB ably_RB described_VBN by_IN Childe_NNP and_CC others_NNS ,_, the_DT reading_NN of_IN whose_WP$ experiences_NNS bias_VBP me_PRP in_IN this_DT opinion_NN )_) was_VBD a_DT man_NN who_WP died_VBD on_IN the_DT 9th_CD April_NNP and_CC who_WP was_VBD admitted_VBN with_IN symptoms_NNS of_IN fever_NN and_CC bronchitis_NN on_IN the_DT 7th_CD ._.
Every_DT case_NN admitted_VBN into_IN hospital_NN was_VBD treated_VBN with_IN the_DT same_JJ pre-_JJ cautions_NNS which_WDT would_MD have_VB been_VBN observed_VBN in_IN undoubted_JJ cases_NNS of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ._.
A_DT sepoy_NN of_IN the_DT 25th_JJ Bengal_NNP Infantry_NNP proceeding_VBG on_IN sick_JJ leave_VBP met_VBN with_IN an_DT accident_NN at_IN Hamai_NNP station_NN ._.
He_PRP arrived_VBD here_RB suffering_VBG from_IN acute_JJ synovitis_NN (_( right_JJ knee_NN )_) complicated_VBN by_IN a_DT suppurating_NN wound_NN which_WDT fortunately_RB did_VBD not_RB communicate_VB with_IN the_DT joint_NN ._.
Dr_NNP ._.
Rave_NNP permitted_VBD his_PRP$ admission_NN into_IN the_DT Railway_NNP Hospital_NNP on_IN the_DT 25th_CD April_NNP ,_, and_CC under_IN treatment_NN there_RB he_PRP recovered_VBD so_RB as_IN to_TO be_VB able_JJ to_TO proceed_VB on_IN his_PRP$ journey_NN on_IN the_DT 15th_CD of_IN May_NNP ._.
In_IN addition_NN to_TO these_DT no_DT less_JJR than_IN 155_CD cases_NNS of_IN fever_NN were_VBD detected_VBN ._.
These_DT were_VBD trivial_JJ and_CC mostly_RB due_JJ to_TO the_DT heat_NN of_IN the_DT journey_NN ,_, etc_FW ._.
Retention_NN in_IN the_DT huts_NNS for_IN the_DT purpose_NN built_VBN midway_RB between_IN the_DT hospital_NN and_CC the_DT landis_NN for_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD days_NNS sufficed_VBD to_TO prove_VB the_DT nature_NN of_IN the_DT case_NN ,_, and_CC these_DT patients_NNS were_VBD discharged_VBN as_RB soon_RB as_IN they_PRP had_VBD recovered_VBN ._.
None_NN of_IN them_PRP ever_RB required_VBD transference_NN to_TO hos-_JJ pital_NN ._.
Surprise_NN has_VBZ been_VBN expressed_VBN at_IN the_DT small_JJ number_NN admitted_VBN into_IN hospital_NN ,_, but_CC people_NNS are_VBP oblivious_JJ to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_WDT natives_VBZ ,_, or_CC in_IN fact_NN any_DT one_CD ,_, will_MD rarely_RB travel_VB when_WRB sick_JJ ,_, and_CC certainly_RB not_RB at_IN such_PDT a_DT time_NN as_IN the_DT present_JJ ,_, when_WRB detention_NN ,_, etc._FW ,_, were_VBD being-_JJ enforced_VBN ._.
The_DT women_NNS 's_POS enclosure_NN ._.
10_CD ._.

VIII_NNP ._.
of_IN the_DT female_JJ enclosure_NN ._.
Mr._NNP Crosthwaite_NNP requested_VBD me_PRP ,_, as_IN he_PRP had_VBD so_RB much_JJ to_TO do_VB with_IN the_DT men_NNS ,_, to_TO generally_RB supervise_VB all_DT matters_NNS connected_VBN with_IN the_DT women_NNS and_CC children_NNS ._.
Female_NNP Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP Hydari_NNP Begum_NNP met_VBD the_DT trains_NNS along_IN with_IN ourselves_NNS and_CC took_VBD charge_NN of_IN the_DT women_NNS 's_POS carriage_NN at_IN once_RB ._.

On_IN the_DT occasions_NNS of_IN my_PRP$ entering_VBG the_DT zanana_NN ,_, the_DT purdah_JJ women_NNS were_VBD placed_VBN in_IN a_DT screened_JJ hut_NN ,_, and_CC queries_NNS ,_, if_IN necessary_JJ ,_, transmitted_VBN through_IN the_DT Assistant_NNP ._.

Women_NNS very_RB rarely_RB trusted_VBD their_PRP$ clothes_NNS out_IN of_IN their_PRP$ sight_NN even_RB to_TO their_PRP$ husbands_NNS ,_, etc._NN ,_, but_CC as_RB often_RB as_IN possible_JJ this_DT was_VBD done_VBN and_CC the_DT steam_NN tank_NN employed_VBN ._.
Male_JJ passengers_NNS who_WP had_VBD women-_JJ kind_NN in_IN the_DT ``_`` zanana_NN ``_`` were_VBD only_RB allowed_VBN to_TO converse_VB with_IN them_PRP at_IN some_DT distance_NN from_IN the_DT entrance_NN to_TO the_DT enclosure_NN ._.

With_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN myself_NN when_WRB summoned_VBN and_CC accompanied_VBN by_IN the_DT Assistant_NNP ,_, I_PRP have_VBP reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN the_DT rule_NN excluding_VBG all_DT male_JJ passengers_NNS from_IN the_DT precincts_NNS of_IN the_DT zanana_NN has_VBZ never_RB been_VBN transgressed_VBN ._.
No_DT cases_NNS of_IN serious_JJ illness_NN have_VBP been_VBN found_VBN among_IN the_DT women_NNS ._.
A_DT weakly_JJ infant_NN born_VBN before_IN its_PRP$ time_NN and_CC only_RB 2_CD or_CC 3_CD weeks_NNS old_JJ died_VBD shortly_RB after_IN its_PRP$ arrival_NN at_IN Khnpur_NNP on_IN a_DT very_RB hot_JJ day_NN ._.
The_DT matter_NN was_VBD reported_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT usual_JJ precautions_NNS taken_VBN ._.

Food_NN ._.
II_NNP ._.
The_DT matter_NN of_IN food_NN has_VBZ been_VBN a_DT most_RBS serious_JJ one_CD for_IN every-_JJ body_NN here_RB ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ seemingly_RB impossible_JJ to_TO get_VB good_JJ fresh_JJ meat_NN during_IN the_DT hot_JJ weather_NN ._.

force_NN on_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP ,_, Baroda_NNP and_CC Central_NNP India_NNP Railway_NNP for_IN the_DT disin-_JJ fection_NN of_IN a_DT carriage_NN used_VBN by_IN a_DT person_NN suffering_VBG from_IN a_DT contagious_JJ disease_NN ._.

2_CD ._.
Rule_NN 10_CD (_( f_NN )_) of_IN the_DT rules_NNS in_IN question_NN provides_VBZ that_IN ``_`` when_WRB evacuations_NNS ,_, etc._FW ,_, of_IN the_DT infected_JJ person_NN have_VBP contaminated_VBN the_DT floor_NN or_CC seats_NNS of_IN a_DT carriage_NN ,_, but_CC not_RB otherwise_RB ,_, it_PRP should_MD be_VB washed_VBN with_IN carbolic_JJ acid_JJ solution_NN ,_, consisting_VBG of_IN a_DT wineglassful_NN of_IN carbolic_JJ acid_NN mixed_VBN in_IN a_DT gallon_NN of_IN boiling_VBG water_NN ._. ''_''
This_DT rule_NN falls_VBZ far_RB short_JJ of_IN the_DT rules_NNS in_IN force_NN on_IN other_JJ railways_NNS (_( for_IN instance_NN ,_, the_DT North-Western_JJ Railway_NNP ,_, the_DT Oudh_NNP and_CC Rohilkhand_NNP Railway_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Indian_JJ Midland_NNP Railway_NNP )_) ,_, which_WDT provide_VBP that_IN when_WRB a_DT carriage_NN is_VBZ being_VBG disinfected_VBN every_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT woodwork_NN must_MD be_VB washed_VBN over_IN with_IN boiling_JJ water_NN ,_, containing_VBG in_IN each_DT gallon_NN a_DT wineglassful_NN of_IN carbolic_JJ acid_NN ._.

3_CD ._.

III_NNP of_IN 1897_CD (_( an_DT Act_NNP to_TO provide_VB for_IN the_DT better_JJR prevention_NN of_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN Dangerous_NNP Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP )_) for_IN observance_NN by_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP ,_, Baroda_NNP and_CC Central_NNP India_NNP Railway_NNP Com-_NNP pany_NN within_IN the_DT limits_NNS of_IN the_DT North-Western_JJ Provinces_NNS and_CC Oudh_NNP :_: -_: 1_CD ._.
When_WRB a_DT case_NN of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN has_VBZ been_VBN detected_VBN in_IN a_DT rail-_JJ way_NN carriage_NN ,_, the_DT carriage_NN shall_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN in_IN the_DT manner_NN provided_VBD in_IN the_DT rules_NNS dealing_VBG with_IN ordinary_JJ contagious_JJ diseases_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.
In_IN addition_NN ,_, carbolic_JJ acid_NN powder_NN shall_MD be_VB sprinkled_VBN on_IN the_DT floors_NNS and_CC seats_NNS ,_, or_CC the_DT interior_JJ woodwork_NN of_IN the_DT carriages_NNS shall_MD be_VB thoroughly_RB washed_VBN with_IN a_DT solution_NN of_IN perchloride_NN of_IN mercury_NN (_( 1_CD in_IN 1,000_CD )_) or_CC with_IN ,_, a_DT carbolic_JJ acid_NN solution_NN (_( a_DT wineglassful_NN to_TO a_DT gallon_NN )_) ._.
3_CD ._.

4_CD ._.
A_DT sufficient_JJ supply_NN of_IN disinfectants_NNS shall_MD be_VB kept_VBN at_IN all_DT stations_NNS ._.

The_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP have_VBP had_VBN under_IN consideration_NN the_DT advisability_NN of_IN cleansing_VBG all_DT vehicles_NNS conveying_VBG passengers_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ ?_. 166_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
VIII_NNP ._.
luggage_NN from_IN districts_NNS affected_VBN with_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN to_TO other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN India_NNP ,_, and_CC are_VBP of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN all_DT such_JJ vehicles_NNS is_VBZ absolutely_RB necessary_JJ as_IN a_DT precautionary_JJ measure_NN against_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN infection_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
For_IN this_DT purpose_NN it_PRP is_VBZ considered_VBN imperative_JJ that_IN vehicles_NNS in_IN which_WDT suspected_VBD or_CC declared_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN have_VBP occurred_VBN should_MD be_VB stopped_VBN at_IN ,_, and_CC not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO run_VB further_RB than_IN ,_, either_CC the_DT station_NN at_IN which_WDT such_JJ cases_NNS are_VBP removed_VBN from_IN the_DT carriage_NN or_CC the_DT nearest_JJS medi-_JJ cal_JJ inspection_NN station_NN ,_, -preferably_RB the_DT former_JJ if_IN the_DT process_NN of_IN disin-_JJ fection_NN can_MD be_VB promptly_RB and_CC satisfactorily_RB carried_VBD out_IN there_RB ,_, -while_JJ non-suspect_JJ vehicles_NNS should_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN at_IN the_DT medical_JJ inspection_NN station_NN nearest_JJS to_TO the_DT boundary_NN of_IN infected_JJ areas_NNS ._.
This_DT need_NN involve_VBZ no_DT detention_NN to_TO the_DT latter_JJ beyond_IN that_DT necessary_JJ for_IN their_PRP$ actual_JJ dis-_JJ infection_NN ,_, the_DT inspection_NN of_IN the_DT occupants_NNS and_CC the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN their_PRP$ baggage_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP accordingly_RB desire_VBZ that_IN ,_, subject_JJ to_TO the_DT foregoing_NN remarks_NNS ,_, the_DT Administration_NNP (_( s_PRP )_) of_IN the_DT railway_NN (_( s_JJ )_) under_IN the_DT control_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN /your_NNP control_NN be_VB requested_VBN to_TO disinfect_VB all_DT vehicles_NNS conveying_VBG passengers_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ baggage_NN from_IN areas_NNS infected_VBN with_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN in_IN the_DT following_JJ manner_NN :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) Vehicles_NNP in_IN which_WDT cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN have_VBP not_RB been_VBN detected-_JJ Third_NNP and_CC intermediate_JJ class_NN carriages_NNS ,_, goods_NNS ,_, vehicles_NNS carry-_VBP ing_VBG passengers_NNS and_CC luggage_VB vans.-The_JJ interior_JJ woodwork_NN ,_, espe-_JJ cially_RB the_DT floors_NNS and_CC seats_NNS ,_, to_TO be_VB thoroughly_RB washed_VBN with_IN a_DT solution_NN of_IN perchloride_NN of_IN mercury_NN (_( 1_CD in_IN 1,000_CD )_) ,_, or_CC with_IN a_DT carbolic_JJ acid_NN solution_NN (_( a_DT wineglassful_NN to_TO a_DT gallon_NN )_) applied_VBD with_IN a_DT mop_NN ;_: the_DT doors_NNS and_CC windows_NNS to_TO be_VB opened_VBN and_CC the_DT vehicles_NNS exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT air_NN ,_, First_NNP and_CC second_JJ class_NN carriages.-The_NN floors_NNS and_CC woodwork_NN to_TO be_VB treated_VBN as_IN above_NN ,_, the_DT cushions_NNS being_VBG also_RB brushed_VBN and_CC thoroughly_RB cleaned_VBN ._.
(_( b_NN )_) Carriages_NNPS in_IN which_WDT cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN have_VBP been_VBN detected-_JJ (_( i_NN )_) These_DT ,_, after_IN being_VBG detached_VBN from_IN the_DT train_NN ,_, should_MD be_VB thoroughly_RB washed_VBN with_IN soft_JJ soap_NN and_CC lime-water_NN ._.

4_CD ._.
I_PRP have_VBP not_RB issued_VBN any_DT orders_NNS at_IN present_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN the_DT reason_NN that_IN I_PRP am_VBP of_IN the_DT opinion_NN that_IN what_WP is_VBZ asked_VBN is_VBZ practically_RB impossible_JJ and_CC because_IN I_PRP hope_VBP you_PRP will_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO ask_VB Government_NNP to_TO reconsider_VB the_DT order_NN ._.
We_PRP must_MD of_IN course_NN disinfect_VBP all_DT carriages_NNS in_IN which_WDT cases_NNS have_VBP been_VBN detected_VBN ,_, but_CC ,_, while_IN that_DT is_VBZ troublesome_JJ enough_RB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ what_WP we_PRP do_VBP now_RB ,_, and_CC have_VBP always_RB done_VBN ,_, since_IN the_DT plague_NN began_VBD ._.
The_DT burn-_JJ ing_VBG the_DT cushions_NNS and_CC repainting_VBG the_DT interior_NN of_IN first_JJ and_CC second_JJ class_NN carriages_NNS seems_VBZ not_RB to_TO be_VB really_RB necessary_JJ ._.
5_CD ._.
With_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT Bombay_NNP ,_, Baroda_NNP and_CC Central_NNP India_NNP Rail-_NNP way_NN action_NN in_IN the_DT matter_NN ,_, they_PRP are_VBP more_RBR favourably_RB placed_VBN than_IN we_PRP are_VBP ._.
The_DT whole_NN of_IN their_PRP$ broad-gauge_JJ line_NN is_VBZ in_IN the_DT infected_JJ area_NN ,_, and_CC passengers_NNS have_VBP always_RB to_TO change_VB ,_, in_IN consequence_NN of_IN the_DT break_NN of_IN gauge_NN ,_, at_IN Ahmedabad_NNP ._.
I_PRP find_VBP that_IN they_PRP have_VBP proposed_VBN that_IN at_IN that_DT place_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ within_IN the_DT infected_JJ area_NN ,_, the_DT passengers_NNS shall_MD change_VB into_IN the_DT disinfected_JJ trains_NNS ._.
But_CC the_DT Bombay_NNP ,_, Baroda_NNP and_CC Central_NNP India_NNP Railway_NNP are_VBP in_IN an_DT essentially_RB different_JJ position_NN on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT break_NN of_IN gauge_NN ,_, to_TO that_DT in_IN which_WDT we_PRP are_VBP placed_VBN ,_, and_CC I_PRP believe_VBP that_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP ,_, Baroda_NNP and_CC Central_NNP India_NNP Railway_NNP will_MD protest_VB if_IN they_PRP are_VBP required_VBN to_TO disin-_JJ fect_JJ their_PRP$ trains_NNS ,_, and_CC change_VB the_DT passengers_NNS at_IN any_DT station_NN other_JJ than_IN Ahmedabad_NNP ,_, for_IN they_PRP will_MD then_RB be_VB in_IN somewhat_RB the_DT same_JJ posi-_JJ tion_NN as_IN we_PRP are_VBP ._.

VIII_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN land_NN ._.
171_CD 6_CD ._.
The_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP say_VBP that_IN the_DT orders_NNS need_VBP involve_VBP no_DT detention_NN to_TO the_DT vehicles_NNS beyond_IN that_DT necessary_JJ for_IN the_DT actual_JJ disin-_JJ fection_NN ,_, the_DT inspection_NN of_IN the_DT occupants_NNS and_CC the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN their_PRP$ baggage_NN ._.
But_CC it_PRP seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN overlooked_VBN that_IN this_DT will_MD take_VB ,_, with_IN a_DT train_NN of_IN sixteen_NN or_CC eighteen_NN or_CC twenty_NN vehicles_NNS ,_, such_PDT a_DT delay_NN as_IN will_MD upset_VB all_DT possible_JJ hope_NN of_IN punctuality_NN ,_, and_CC our_PRP$ trains_NNS will_MD miss_VB connection_NN with_IN those_DT of_IN other_JJ railways_NNS at_IN junctions_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT confu-_JJ sion_NN will_MD be_VB very_RB great_JJ ._.
The_DT insides_NNS of_IN the_DT carriages_NNS are_VBP to_TO be_VB washed_VBN with_IN the_DT prescribed_JJ disinfectant_NN applied_VBN with_IN a_DT mop_NN ,_, the_DT doors_NNS and_CC windows_NNS to_TO be_VB opened_VBN and_CC exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT air_NN ._.
This_DT with_IN the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT baggage_NN which_WDT must_MD first_RB be_VB removed_VBN from_IN the_DT carriages_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT subsequeut_JJ drying_NN of_IN the_DT interior_NN of_IN the_DT carri-_JJ ages_NNS and_CC return_NN of_IN the_DT baggage_NN ,_, can_MD not_RB be_VB done_VBN in_IN a_DT little_JJ while_NN as_IN seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB considered_VBN possible_JJ by_IN the_DT Government_NNP ._.
The_DT public_NN will_MD decidedly_RB object_VB to_TO return_VB into_IN carriages_NNS which_WDT are_VBP wet_JJ with_IN this_DT not_RB agreeable_JJ disinfecting_VBG prescription_NN ._.
The_DT difficulty_NN will_MD be_VB all_PDT the_DT greater_JJR at_IN night_NN ,_, when_WRB especially_RB first_JJ and_CC second_JJ class_NN passengers_NNS will_MD object_VB to_TO being_VBG turned_VBN out_RP in_IN ,_, during_IN the_DT rains_NNS ,_, the_DT downpour_NN which_WDT we_PRP frequently_RB have_VBP to_TO encounter_VB ,_, and_CC which_WDT of_IN itself_PRP will_MD make_VB the_DT drying_NN of_IN the_DT carriages_NNS a_DT long_JJ process_NN ._.
These_DT are_VBP not_RB fanciful_JJ objections_NNS but_CC are_VBP real_JJ difficulties_NNS ._.

RESOLUTION.-The_JJ following_NN rules_NNS applicable_JJ to_TO quarantine_VB at_IN Panchgani_NNP and_CC Mahabaleshwar_NNP have_VBP been_VBN communicated_VBN to_TO the_DT Super-_JJ intendents_NNS of_IN those_DT places_NNS with_IN a_DT request_NN that_IN copies_NNS might_MD be_VB posted_VBN up_RP at_IN the_DT quarantine_NN stations_NNS and_CC other_JJ conspicuous_JJ places_NNS :_: -_: Public_JJ Notice_NNP ._.
The_DT following_JJ temporary_JJ regulations_NNS are_VBP prescribed_VBN by_IN Government_NNP under_IN Act_NNP III_NNP of_IN 1897_CD :_: -_: 1_CD ._.
The_DT Chief_NNP Plague_NNP Authorities_NNP at_IN Mahabaleshvar_NNP shall_MD be_VB the_DT Superintendent_NNP and_CC Mr._NNP H._NNP N._NNP Alexander_NNP ,_, and_CC at_IN Panchgani_NNP the_DT Superintendent_NNP and_CC Surgeon-Captain_NNP Bedford_NNP ._.
2_CD ._.
All_DT medical_JJ subordinates_NNS working_VBG under_IN their_PRP$ orders_NNS and_CC all_DT officers_NNS or_CC persons_NNS specially_RB appointed_VBN by_IN them_PRP in_IN writing_VBG shall_MD be_VB plague_JJ authorities_NNS for_IN the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN those_DT and_CC all_DT general_JJ rules_NNS under_IN Act_NNP III_NNP of_IN 1897_CD ._.
3_CD ._.
Quarantine_NN camps_NNS shall_MD be_VB established_VBN at_IN or_CC near_IN Panchgani_NNP and_CC Mahabaleshwar_NNP by_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Plague_NNP Authorities_NNP of_IN those_DT places_NNS and_CC shall_MD be_VB managed_VBN by_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Plague_NNP Authorities_NNP or_CC persons_NNS specially_RB deputed_VBN by_IN them_PRP for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._.
Every_DT person_NN placed_VBN in_IN quarantine_JJ shall_MD be_VB bound_VBN to_TO reside_VB in_IN the_DT quarantine_NN camp_NN assigned_VBN to_TO him_PRP or_CC her_PRP$ and_CC to_TO obey_VB the_DT regulations_NNS framed_VBN by_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Plague_NNP Authorities_NNP for_IN that_DT camp_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
All_DT persons_NNS coming_VBG up_RB from_IN the_DT plains_NNS by_IN any_DT road_NN or_CC path_VB shall_MD be_VB quarantined_VBN unless_IN either_DT specially_RB or_CC generally_RB exempted_VBN ._.
5_CD ._.
The_DT following_NN is_VBZ a_DT list_NN of_IN persons_NNS generally_RB exempted_VBN :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) All_DT Government_NNP servants_NNS travelling_VBG on_IN duty_NN ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) All_DT servants_NNS of_IN Europeans_NNPS who_WP produce_VBP certificates_NNS from_IN their_PRP$ employs_NNS or_CC a_DT medical_JJ man_NN that-_NN (_( a_DT )_) they_PRP have_VBP been_VBN inoculated_VBN ,_, or_CC (_( b_NN )_) they_PRP have_VBP been_VBN in_IN good_JJ health_NN for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS previously_RB and_CC will_MD on_IN arrival_NN be_VB sent_VBN to_TO the_DT Superintendent_NNP ,_, or_CC other_JJ officer_NN appointed_VBN by_IN him_PRP for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, for_IN medical_JJ in-_JJ spection_NN at_IN such_JJ times_NNS as_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP prescribes_NN ._.

6_CD ._.

1496/955-B._JJ ,_, dated_JJ 17th_CD March_NNP 1897_CD ,_, I_PRP took_VBD charge_NN of_IN the_DT duties_NNS of_IN Chief_NNP Plague_NNP Authority_NNP at_IN Mahableshwar_NNP on_IN the_DT 18th_CD March_NNP 1897_CD ._.
These_DT duties_NNS terminated_VBD on_IN the_DT 29th_CD May_NNP ._.
Under_IN the_DT rules_NNS in_IN force_NN few_JJ persons_NNS were_VBD prevented_VBN from_IN entering_VBG Maha-_NNP bleshwar_NN direct_NN :_: persons_NNS admitted_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, were_VBD subject_JJ to_TO daily_JJ inspection_NN at_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Hospital_NNP until_IN eight_CD days_NNS had_VBD elapsed_VBN from_IN the_DT time_NN they_PRP had_VBD left_VBN their_PRP$ home_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD really_RB only_JJ persons_NNS over_IN whom_WP it_PRP would_MD have_VB been_VBN almost_RB impossible_JJ to_TO keep_VB any_DT real_JJ supervision_NN ,_, who_WP had_VBD to_TO finish_VB their_PRP$ eight_CD days_NNS in_IN the_DT observation_NN camps_NNS before_IN they_PRP were_VBD admitted_VBN into_IN Mahableshwar_NNP ._.
I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO sub_VB ._.
mit_NN a_DT few_JJ remarks_NNS on_IN the_DT working_NN of_IN these_DT rules_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.
General_NNP arrangements.-On_NN taking_VBG charge_NN I_PRP at_IN once_RB began_VBD making_VBG enquiries_NNS regarding_VBG all_PDT the_DT possible_JJ ways_NNS by_IN which_WDT people_NNS might_MD get_VB into_IN Mahableshwar_NNP and_CC wrote_VBD to_TO the_DT Superintendent_NNP of_IN Police_NNP ,_, Satara_NNP ,_, for_IN police_NN ._.
Mr._NNP MacTie_NNP supplied_VBD me_PRP promptly_RB with_IN 2_CD jamadars_NNS ,_, 3_CD naicks_NNS and_CC 27_CD constables_NNS ,_, and_CC this_DT force_NN ,_, together_RB with_IN 2_CD jamadars_NNS and_CC 5_CD constables_NNS already_RB present_VBP on_IN plague_NN duty_NN ,_, enabled_VBD me_PRP to_TO establish_VB what_WP I_PRP considered_VBD would_MD be_VB an_DT effective_JJ protection_NN to_TO Mahableshwar_NNP ._.
In_IN consultation_NN with_IN Surgeon-Major_JJ Monks_NNS I_PRP arranged_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) The_DT Chorpani_NNP Camp_NNP continued_VBD to_TO work_VB as_IN it_PRP was_VBD doing_VBG when_WRB I_PRP took_VBD charge_NN ._.
This_DT camp_NN is_VBZ situated_VBN 21/2_CD miles_NNS from_IN Mahableshwar_NNP on_IN the_DT Satara_NNP Road_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD ,_, when_WRB I_PRP took_VBD charge_NN ,_, being_VBG used_VBN by_IN Surgeon-Major_JJ Monks_NNP as_IN an_DT observation_NN camp_NN ._.
His_PRP$ intention_NN was_VBD to_TO use_VB it_PRP as_IN such_JJ until_IN plague_JJ cases_NNS appeared_VBD when_WRB it_PRP was_VBD to_TO be_VB turned_VBN into_IN a_DT hospital_NN camp_NN ._.
Surgeon-Major_JJ Monks_NNP had_VBD caused_VBN a_DT camp_NN to_TO be_VB erected_VBN at_IN Machutra_NNP ,_, 41/2_CD miles_NNS from_IN Mahablesh-_NNP war_NN on_IN the_DT Satara_NNP Road_NNP ,_, which_WDT was_VBD to_TO be_VB used_VBN as_IN the_DT obser-_JJ vation_NN camp_NN ,_, when_WRB Chorpani_NNP became_VBD the_DT hospital_NN camp_NN ._.
?_. 176_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
VIII_NNP ._.
(_( b_NN )_) The_DT Ling_NNP Mala_NNP Post_NNP ,_, 3_CD miles_NNS from_IN Mahableshwar_NNP on_IN the_DT Panchgani_NNP Road_NNP ,_, started_VBN by_IN Surgeon-Major_JJ Monks_NNP ,_, was_VBD maintained_VBN ._.
To_TO this_DT post_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, I_PRP added_VBD two_CD out-_JJ posts_NNS ,_, one_CD on_IN Kate_NNP 's_POS point_NN road_NN which_WDT commanded_VBD foot_NN paths_NNS leading_VBG from_IN the_DT Krishna_NNP Valley_NNP and_CC one_CD ,_, about_IN a_DT mile_NN from_IN the_DT Ling_NNP Mala_NNP Post_NNP in_IN the_DT direction_NN of_IN Panch-_NNP gani_NN ,_, which_WDT commanded_VBD a_DT small_JJ though_IN much-used_JJ foot-_JJ path_NN leading_VBG into_IN Mahableshwar_NNP ._.
(_( c_NN )_) I_PRP established_VBD a_DT post_NN at_IN old_JJ Mahableshwar_NNP to_TO prevent_VB persons_NNS coming_VBG up_RB from_IN the_DT Krishna_NNP Valley_NNP and_CC thus_RB getting_VBG into_IN Mahableshwar_NNP ._.
(_( d_NN )_) I_PRP enlarged_VBD the_DT small_JJ post_NN at_IN Metalya_NNP ,_, 4_CD miles_NNS from_IN Maha-_NNP bleshwar_NN on_IN the_DT FitzGerald_NNP Ght_NNP road_NN ,_, started_VBN by_IN Surgeon-_NNP Major_NNP Monks_NNP ,_, and_CC added_VBD two_CD outposts_NNS ,_, one_CD at_IN the_DT head_NN of_IN a_DT much-frequented_JJ jungle_NN path_NN leading_VBG from_IN Wara_NNP to_TO the_DT FitzGerald_NNP Ght_NNP road_NN and_CC one_CD at_IN the_DT place_NN where_WRB the_DT Par_NNP Ght_NNP path_NN crosses_VBZ the_DT FitzGerald_NNP Ght_NNP road_NN ._.
(_( e_NN )_) Lastly_RB I_PRP established_VBD a_DT post_NN near_IN Babington_NNP point_NN which_WDT com-_NN manded_VBD paths_NNS leading_VBG up_RP from_IN the_DT Royana_NNP Valley_NNP ._.
The_DT jamadars_NNS placed_VBN by_IN Surgeon-Major_JJ Monks_NNS in_IN charge_NN of_IN Chorpani_NNP Camp_NNP and_CC Ling_NNP Mala_NNP Post_NNP remained_VBD in_IN their_PRP$ places_NNS and_CC jamadars_NNS were_VBD appointed_VBN at_IN Metalya_NNP and_CC Babington_NNP Point_NNP ._.
These_DT jamadars_NNS were_VBD instructed_VBN to_TO submit_VB to_TO me_PRP daily_JJ reports_NNS showing_VBG who_WP had_VBD came_VBD to_TO their_PRP$ posts_NNS and_CC how_WRB they_PRP had_VBD disposed_VBN of_IN them_PRP ._.
The_DT Babington_NNP Point_NNP Post_NNP had_VBD little_JJ to_TO do_VB ,_, as_IN the_DT paths_NNS leading_VBG up_RP from_IN the_DT Royana_NNP Valley_NNP are_VBP hardly_RB good_JJ enough_RB for_IN pack_NN carriage_NN and_CC in_IN consequence_NN only_JJ persons_NNS coming_VBG up_RP with_IN supplies_NNS passed_VBN by_IN this_DT way_NN ._.
Neither_DT had_VBD the_DT Me-_NNP talya_NN Post_NNP much_RB to_TO do_VB as_IN few_JJ passengers_NNS came_VBD into_IN Ma-_NNP hableshwar_NN from_IN the_DT Konkan_NNP ._.
There_EX was_VBD ,_, however_RB ,_, a_DT good_JJ deal_NN of_IN cart_NN traffic_NN with_IN which_WDT the_DT post_NN had_VBD to_TO deal_VB ._.

3_CD ._.

VIII_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN land_NN ._.
177_CD present_JJ himself_PRP at_IN hospital_NN ._.
This_DT book_NN was_VBD returned_VBN to_TO me_PRP in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN the_DT day_NN ,_, and_CC at_IN a_DT glance_NN I_PRP could_MD see_VB who_WP had_VBD failed_VBN to_TO at-_JJ tend_NN for_IN inspection_NN ._.

4_CD ._.
Measures_NNS to_TO prevent_VB oppression_NN by_IN the_DT Police.-Mahableshwar_NNP is_VBZ to_TO a_DT great_JJ extent_NN dependent_NN for_IN its_PRP$ supplies_NNS on_IN the_DT villagers_NNS who_WP come_VBP up_RP the_DT hill_NN daily_RB and_CC who_WP had_VBD to_TO pass_VB my_PRP$ posts_NNS ._.
I_PRP was_VBD much_RB afraid_JJ that_IN such_JJ persons_NNS might_MD be_VB interfered_VBN with_IN by_IN the_DT police_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP therefore_RB made_VBD a_DT point_NN of_IN frequently_RB conversing_VBG with_IN these_DT people_NNS and_CC asking_VBG if_IN they_PRP had_VBD any_DT complaints_NNS to_TO make_VB ._.

5_CD ._.
Dandeghar_NNP observation_NN Camp.-This_NNP camp_NN which_WDT was_VBD close_JJ to_TO Panchgani_NNP was_VBD opened_VBN on_IN the_DT 2nd_CD April_NNP ._.

He_PRP issued_VBD red_JJ tickets_NNS to_TO those_DT who_WP were_VBD to_TO enter_VB Mahableshwar_NNP ,_, yellow_JJ tickets_NNS to_TO those_DT who_WP had_VBD been_VBN in_IN quarantine_NN and_CC blue_JJ tickets_NNS to_TO cartmen_NNS ._.

6_CD ._.

7_CD ._.
Machutra_NNP Camp.-This_NNP camp_NN was_VBD first_RB used_VBN on_IN the_DT 31st_CD March_NNP ._.

8_CD ._.
Plague_NNP case.-Only_RB one_CD case_NN of_IN plague_NN occurred_VBD ._.
On_IN the_DT 27th_CD March_NNP a_DT Marwari_NNP and_CC two_CD women_NNS arrived_VBD from_IN Poona_NNP and_CC were_VBD sent_VBN to_TO the_DT observation_NN camp_NN at_IN Chorpani_NNP ._.
One_CD of_IN the_DT women_NNS was_VBD suffering_VBG from_IN fever_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN ,_, which_WDT proved_VBD to_TO be_VB ordinary_JJ fever_NN ._.
On_IN the_DT afternoon_NN of_IN the_DT 30th_CD the_DT other_JJ woman_NN got_VBD fever_RB ._.
I_PRP heard_VBP of_IN this_DT on_IN the_DT morning_NN of_IN the_DT 31st_CD and_CC ,_, finding_VBG that_IN the_DT temperature_NN was_VBD un-_JJ usually_RB high_JJ ,_, came_VBD to_TO the_DT conclusion_NN that_IN it_PRP was_VBD probably_RB a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN though_IN no_DT glandular_JJ swellings_NNS were_VBD then_RB observable_JJ ._.
Surgeon-_JJ Major_NNP Monks_NNP and_CC I_PRP agreed_VBD that_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB unwise_JJ to_TO run_VB any_DT risks_NNS ,_, and_CC we_PRP settled_VBD to_TO move_VB all_PDT the_DT persons_NNS ,_, over_IN 70_CD in_IN number_NN ,_, who_WP were_VBD under_IN observation_NN in_IN the_DT camp_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT Machutra_NNP Camp_NNP ._.
This_DT ,_, with_IN the_DT assistance_NN of_IN the_DT chief_NN constable_JJ ,_, I_PRP arranged_VBD for_IN ,_, and_CC by_IN the_DT evening_VBG the_DT Machutra_NNP Camp_NNP was_VBD in_IN working_VBG order_NN ._.

9_CD ._.

VIII_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN land_NN ._.
179_CD an_DT hospital_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP might_MD be_VB argued_VBN that_IN only_JJ persons_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN infectious_JJ diseases_NNS would_MD occupy_VB the_DT rooms_NNS ._.
This_DT may_MD be_VB ,_, so_IN that_IN I_PRP can_MD only_RB say_VB that_IN it_PRP was_VBD a_DT great_JJ satisfaction_NN to_TO me_PRP ,_, as_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB I_PRP fancy_JJ to_TO any_DT one_CD actually_RB engaged_VBN in_IN plague_NN work_NN ,_, to_TO see_VB any_DT place_NN or_CC thing_NN suspected_VBN of_IN harbouring_VBG microbes_NNS destroyed_VBN by_IN fire_NN ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ cold_VBN at_IN night_NN on_IN the_DT Mahableswar_NNP Hills_NNP and_CC these_DT huts_NNS were_VBD decidedly_RB draughty_JJ ._.
Single-sided_JJ huts_NNS are_VBP hardly_RB sufficient_JJ protection_NN against_IN wind_NN or_CC rain_NN ._.

A_DT good_JJ deal_NN of_IN work_NN in_IN this_DT connection_NN was_VBD carried_VBN out_RP ._.

Knowing_VBG that_DT local_JJ villagers_NNS could_MD not_RB get_VB by_IN the_DT post_NN without_IN trouble_NN ,_, people_NNS would_MD appear_VB at_IN the_DT post_NN carrying_VBG a_DT bundle_NN of_IN grass_NN or_CC sticks_NNS and_CC pretend_VBP that_IN they_PRP came_VBD from_IN close_JJ by_IN ._.

3_CD each_DT ._.

Police_NNP Officers.-I_NNP think_VBP it_PRP right_RB here_RB to_TO ask_VB for_IN some_DT recogni-_JJ tion_NN of_IN the_DT services_NNS of_IN the_DT jamadars_NNS in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT Machutra_NNP ,_, Ling_NNP Mala_NNP and_CC Metalya_NNP Posts_NNP ._.

This_DT work_NN was_VBD very_RB hard_JJ and_CC was_VBD really_RB of_IN a_DT very_RB responsible_JJ character_NN ;_: it_PRP was_VBD further_JJ work_NN where_WRB subordinates_NNS are_VBP liable_JJ to_TO be_VB tempted_VBN and_CC to_TO misuse_VB the_DT powers_NNS given_VBN -to_VBP them_PRP ._.

RESOLUTION.-As_NNP a_DT temporary_JJ regulation_NN ,_, His_PRP$ Excellency_NNP the_DT Governor_NNP in_IN Council_NNP is_VBZ pleased_VBN ,_, under_IN Act_NNP III_NNP of_IN 1897_CD ,_, to_TO prescribe_VB that_IN all_DT pilgrimages_NNS and_CC fairs_NNS are_VBP prohibited_VBN in_IN the_DT Thana_NNP and_CC Poona_NNP Districts_NNP pending_VBG further_JJ orders_NNS ._.

A_DT religious_JJ fair_NN ,_, known_VBN as_IN the_DT Singhast_NNP Mela_NNP ,_, is_VBZ held_VBN once_RB in_IN twelve_CD years_NNS at_IN Ujjain_NNP and_CC is_VBZ usually_RB attended_VBN by_IN three_CD or_CC four_CD hundred_CD thousand_NN ,_, chiefly_NN Sadhus_NNP and_CC mendicants_NNS ,_, from_IN all_DT parts_NNS of_IN India_NNP ._.
The_DT period_NN for_IN this_DT fair_NN is_VBZ from_IN the_DT 17th_CD April_NNP to_TO the_DT 16th_CD May_NNP 1897_CD ,_, the_DT dates_NNS given_VBN being_VBG those_DT of_IN the_DT full_JJ moon_NN in_IN months_NNS Cheth_NNP and_CC Basakh_NNP ._.
Arrangements_NNS were_VBD being_VBG made_VBN more_JJR than_IN a_DT year_NN ago_RB for_IN the_DT great_JJ influx_NN of_IN people_NNS expected_VBN at_IN Ujjain_NNP ,_, but_CC ,_, in_IN October_NNP 1896_CD ,_, when_WRB famine_NN threatened_VBD ,_, Maharaja_NNP Sindhia_NNP issued_VBD orders_NNS prohibiting_VBG the_DT Singhast_NNP Mela_NNP at_IN Ujjain_NNP ,_, and_CC notices_NNS where_WRB printed_VBN by_IN His_PRP$ Highness_NNP and_CC for-_NN warded_VBD to_TO me_PRP for_IN wide_JJ circulation_NN ._.
I_PRP sent_VBD copies_NNS in_IN November_NNP 1896_CD to_TO all_DT Local_JJ Governments_NNS and_CC Administrations_NNS and_CC to_TO all_DT Railways_NNP in_IN India_NNP ,_, and_CC reminders_NNS were_VBD sent_VBN in_IN March_NNP 1897_CD ._.

I_PRP have_VBP therefore_RB in_IN consultation_NN with_IN Sarsoobah_NNP of_IN Malwa_NNP and_CC with_IN Sindhia_NNP 's_POS consent_NN ,_, arranged_VBD that_IN these_DT Sadhus_NNP shall_MD bathe_VB on_IN 17th_CD April_NNP in_IN Sipra_NNP at_IN Ujjain_NNP under_IN strict_JJ rules_NNS as_IN to_TO encampment_VB outside_JJ city_NN ,_, sanitary_JJ arrangements_NNS and_CC promises_NNS of_IN leaving_VBG Uj-_NNP jain_NN on_IN 18th_CD April_NNP ._.

3_CD ._.

7_CD ._.
I_PRP found_VBD it_PRP impossible_JJ to_TO insist_VB on_IN the_DT Sadhus_NNP not_RB going_VBG to_TO Ujjain_VB ,_, because_IN they_PRP had_VBD become_VBN very_RB numerous_JJ ,_, were_VBD intensely_RB fanatical_JJ and_CC determined_VBD to_TO go_VB to_TO Ujjain_VB at_IN all_DT hazards_NNS ,_, and_CC because_IN 300_CD armed_VBD Sadhus_NNP had_VBD lately_RB arrived_VBN from_IN Burhanpore_NNP in_IN the_DT Central_NNP Provinces_NNPS and_CC others_NNS equally_RB armed_VBN had_VBD left_VBN Rutlam_NNP for_IN Ujjain_NNP ._.

VIII_NNP ._.
The_DT Singhast_NNP fair_NN has_VBZ been_VBN stopped_VBN this_DT year_NN ._.

The_DT approaches_NNS to_TO Ujjain_VB and_CC the_DT halting_NN places_NNS and_CC the_DT assemblage_NN grounds_NNS are_VBP very_RB strictly_RB guarded_VBN ._.
The_DT Lambardars_NNP ,_, Patwaris_NNP ,_, and_CC Chaukidars_NNP of_IN all_DT villages_NNS have_VBP been_VBN warned_VBN not_RB to_TO allow_VB Sadhus_NNP to_TO stop_VB in_IN their_PRP$ villages_NNS or_CC proceed_VB towards_NNS Ujjain_NNP ,_, but_CC to_TO persuade_VB them_PRP to_TO return_VB ._.

The_DT result_NN of_IN all_PDT these_DT precautions_NNS is_VBZ seen_VBN in_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN no_DT Sadhu_NNP who_WP has_VBZ come_VBN from_IN Maffassil_NNP to_TO join_VB in_IN the_DT fair_NN can_MD be_VB seen_VBN at_IN Ujjain_NNP ._.

The_DT Singhast_NNP Mela_NNP at_IN Ujjain_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN positively_RB prohibited_VBN by_IN His_PRP$ Highness_NNP the_DT Maharaja_NNP Sindia_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT entry_NN of_IN any_DT pilgrims_NNS will_MD most_VB certainly_RB be_VB prevented_VBN (_( by_IN force_NN if_IN necessary_JJ )_) into_IN the_DT city_NN ._.

VIII_NNP ._. ]_NN

132_CD ._.
Extract_NN from_IN a_DT letter_NN from_IN His_PRP$ Highness_NNP the_DT Amir_NNP of_IN Afghanistan_NNP ,_, to_TO His_PRP$ Excel-_JJ lency_NN the_DT Viceroy_NNP ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 8th_CD April_NNP 1897_CD ._.
As_IN regards_NNS necessary_JJ precautions_NNS for_IN the_DT prevention_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, Your_NNP Excellency_NNP writes_VBZ that_IN we_PRP should_MD endeavour_VB to_TO guard_VB against_IN the_DT plague_NN spreading_VBG from_IN one_CD place_NN to_TO another_DT ,_, and_CC that_IN if_IN the_DT plague_NN should_MD appear_VB ,_, which_WDT God_NNP forbid_NN ,_, in_IN Afghanistan_NNP ,_, I_PRP should_MD inform_VB Your_PRP$ Excellency_NN with_IN the_DT least_JJS possible_JJ delay_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN with_IN the_DT aid_NN of_IN doctors_NNS measures_NNS might_MD be_VB taken_VBN to_TO stamp_VB out_RP the_DT disease_NN ._.
My_PRP$ kind_NN friend_NN ,_, the_DT proper_JJ measures_NNS are_VBP those_DT which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN under-_JJ taken_VBN both_DT by_IN the_DT illustrious_JJ British_JJ Government_NNP and_CC myself_PRP ,_, under_IN which_WDT travellers_NNS are_VBP detained_VBN for_IN a_DT certain_JJ fixed_JJ number_NN of_IN days_NNS at_IN each_DT post_NN and_CC kept_VB under_IN observation_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN any_DT person_NN affected_VBN with_IN this_DT disease_NN may_MD not_RB go_VB from_IN one_CD country_NN to_TO another_DT ._.
But_CC as_IN everything_NN lies_VBZ in_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN the_DT Supreme_NNP Creator_NNP ,_, I_PRP am_VBP offering_VBG prayers_NNS to_TO Him_VB that_IN His_PRP$ Exalted_NNP Majesty_NNP may_MD remove_VB the_DT ?_. 200_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
VIII_NNP ._.
life-destroying_JJ calamity_NN from_IN all_DT countries_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN all_PDT the_DT creatures_NNS of_IN God_NNP may_MD remain_VB safe_JJ from_IN it_PRP ._.

REGULATIONS_NNP ENFORCED_NNP IN_NNP PERSIA_NNP ._.
NO_DT ._.
133_CD ._.
Translation_NN of_IN Rules_NNP regarding_VBG Sanitary_JJ posts_NNS to_TO be_VB established_VBN on_IN the_DT frontiers_NNS N_NNP of_IN Afghanistan_NNP and_CC Baluchistan_NNP by_IN Command_NNP of_IN His_PRP$ Majesty_NNP Muzaffar-ud-_NNP Din_NNP Shah_NNP ._.
(_( His_PRP$ Majesty_NNP the_DT Shah_NNP )_) actuated_VBN by_IN his_PRP$ Royal_NNP favour_NN and_CC kindness_NN towards_IN the_DT subjects_NNS of_IN the_DT high_JJ Government_NNP of_IN Persia_NNP hereby_NN issues_NNS stringent_JJ orders_NNS that_IN in_IN addition_NN to_TO the_DT steps_NNS already_RB taken_VBN at_IN the_DT Persian_NNP Gulf_NNP ports_NNS for_IN the_DT prevention_NN of_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN plague_NN from_IN India_NNP to_TO Persia_VB the_DT following_JJ measures_NNS shall_MD also_RB be_VB adopted_VBN :_: -All_NN along_IN the_DT frontier_NN of_IN Afghanistan_NNP and_CC Baluchistan_NNP sanitary_JJ posts_NNS shall_MD be_VB established_VBN as_IN detailed_JJ below_IN :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) On_IN the_DT frontiers_NNS of_IN Afghanistan.-His_NNP Majesty_NNP the_DT Shah-in-_NNP Shah_NNP issues_NNS stringent_JJ orders_NNS that_IN all_DT roads_NNS ,_, passages_NNS ,_, mountain_NN passes_NNS and_CC paths_NNS shall_MD be_VB closed_VBN by_IN means_NNS of_IN troops-infantry_NN and_CC cavalry-_NN with_IN the_DT exception_NN of-_JJ I.-The_NNP main_JJ road_NN coming_VBG northward_RB from_IN Herat_NNP to_TO Meshed_NNP ._.
II.-And_NNP the_DT other_JJ main_JJ road_NN between_IN Kandahar_NNP and_CC Birjand_NNP coming_VBG southward_RB to_TO Kirman_NNP and_CC Yezd_NNP ,_, which_WDT shall_MD re-_VB main_JJ open_JJ ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) On_IN the_DT frontier_NN of_IN Baluchistan.-_NNP Although_IN guarding_VBG this_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN is_VBZ comparatively_RB difficult_JJ ,_, yet_RB in_IN consideration_NN of_IN the_DT comparatively_RB small_JJ traffic_NN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB very_RB important_JJ ._.
A_DT strong_JJ sanitary_JJ post_NN shall_MD be_VB established_VBN on_IN the_DT road_NN coming_VBG from_IN Baluchis-_NNP tan_NN to_TO Bampur_NNP and_CC Bam_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT number_NN of_IN Karawals_NNP (_( guards_NNS )_) and_CC Karasuran_NNP (_( patrols_NNS )_) shall_MD then_RB take_VB great_JJ care_NN that_IN not_RB a_DT single_JJ soul_NN shall_MD cross_VB except_IN by_IN this_DT road_NN ,_, all_DT other_JJ small_JJ roads_NNS being_VBG closed_VBN ._.

VIII_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN land_NN ._.
201_CD On_IN each_DT of_IN these_DT three_CD roads_NNS which_WDT shall_MD remain_VB open_JJ ,_, sanitary_JJ posts_NNS ,_, consisting_VBG of_IN cavalry_NN ,_, infantry_NN and_CC doctors_NNS ,_, with_IN all_DT requisites_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN medicines_NNS and_CC other_JJ things_NNS ,_, etc._NN ,_, shall_MD be_VB established_VBN in_IN Persian_NNP territory_NN ,_, and_CC travellers_NNS and_CC merchandise_NN passing_NN through_IN those_DT places_NNS shall_MD be_VB carefully_RB inspected_VBN and_CC examined_VBN ,_, and_CC ,_, in_IN case_NN of_IN necessity_NN ,_, placed_VBN under_IN quarantine_NN ._.
Sanitary_JJ Posts_NNS ._.
(_( 1_CD )_) Establishment_NN of_IN sanitary_JJ posts.-Sanitary_JJ posts_NNS shall_MD be_VB established_VBN at_IN places_NNS near_IN drinking_NN water_NN either_CC in_IN gardens_NNS or_CC tents_NNS at_IN least_JJS a_DT thousand_JJ metres_NNS from_IN dwelling_VBG houses_NNS or_CC villages_NNS ._.
Each_DT sanitary_JJ post_NN shall_MD consist_VB of_IN the_DT following_JJ officials_NNS :_: -_: I.-One_JJ head_NN of_IN department_NN with_IN officers_NNS and_CC soldiers_NNS required_VBN for_IN carrying_VBG out_RP orders_NNS and_CC looking_VBG after_IN affairs_NNS ._.
II.-Two_JJ doctors-one_NN for_IN inspection_NN and_CC examination_NN of_IN travel-_JJ lers_NNS and_CC the_DT other_JJ for_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN patients_NNS infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN in_IN case_NN of_IN necessity_NN ._.
III.-Persons_NNS in_IN attendance_NN for_IN carrying_VBG out_RP the_DT orders_NNS of_IN doctors_NNS ._.
The_DT head_NN of_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ posts_NNS and_CC the_DT doctors_NNS attached_VBD to_TO his_PRP$ department_NN shall_MD be_VB personally_RB responsible_JJ for_IN performing_VBG their_PRP$ duties_NNS properly_RB and_CC with_IN great_JJ care_NN ._.
Especially_RB the_DT head_NN of_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ post_NN shall_MD take_VB care_NN that_IN the_DT doctors_NNS perform_VBP their_PRP$ duties_NNS properly_RB ,_, carefully_RB inspect_JJ and_CC examine_JJ travellers_NNS and_CC do_VBP not_RB act_VB against_IN law_NN in_IN case_NN they_PRP should_MD be_VB placed_VBN under_IN quarantine_NN or_CC in_IN case_NN of_IN merchandise_NN being_VBG allowed_VBN to_TO pass_VB the_DT sanitary_JJ post_NN ;_: similarly_RB that_IN different_JJ parties_NNS of_IN travellers_NNS in_IN the_DT order_NN of_IN their_PRP$ arrivals_NNS be_VB separated_VBN from_IN each_DT other_JJ ,_, and_CC those_DT suffering_VBG from_IN or_CC suspected_VBN of_IN being_VBG infected_VBN with_IN the_DT disease_NN be_VB formed_VBN into_IN separate_JJ groups_NNS and_CC not_RB located_VBN with_IN each_DT other_JJ ._.
The_DT head_NN of_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ post_NN and_CC the_DT chief_JJ doctor_NN shall_MD submit_VB separately_RB a_DT weekly_JJ report_NN of_IN their_PRP$ work_NN containing_VBG an_DT account_NN of_IN daily_JJ occurrences_NNS ,_, numbers_NNS of_IN travellers_NNS and_CC patients_NNS and_CC persons_NNS placed_VBN under_IN quarantine_NN to_TO the_DT Governor_NNP ,_, who_WP shall_MD forward_VB it_PRP to_TO the_DT Minister_NNP concerned_VBD ._.
The_DT articles_NNS necessary_JJ to_TO be_VB procured_VBN and_CC kept_VB ready_JJ at_IN each_DT sanitary_JJ post_NN are_VBP as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: I.-A_JJ special_JJ tent_NN for_IN each_DT head_NN (_( of_IN sanitary_JJ post_NN )_) and_CC other_JJ tents_NNS for_IN troops_NNS and_CC others_NNS ._.
II.-A_JJ tent_NN for_IN storing_VBG medicines_NNS and_CC articles_NNS necessary_JJ for_IN disinfection_NN ,_, III.-A_NNP lazaretto_NN divided_VBD into_IN three_CD different_JJ sets_NNS of_IN tents_NNS (_( the_DT number_NN of_IN these_DT tents_NNS to_TO vary_VB according_VBG to_TO the_DT c_NN 26_CD ?_. 202_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.

(_( 2_CD )_) The_DT following_VBG are_VBP the_DT duties_NNS of_IN the_DT officials_NNS of_IN sanitary_JJ posts_NNS :_: -_: The_DT senior_JJ of_IN the_DT two_CD doctors_NNS of_IN a_DT sanitary_JJ post_NN shall_MD inspect_VB and_CC examine_VB travellers_NNS ._.
The_DT other_JJ doctor_NN shall_MD treat_VB and_CC look_VB after_IN persons_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC besides_IN this_DT he_PRP shall_MD undertake_VB the_DT work_NN of_IN disinfection_NN ._.
The_DT latter_NN with_IN his_PRP$ attendants_NNS shall_MD take_VB up_RP quarters_NNS quite_RB apart_RB from_IN others_NNS ,_, viz._NN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD always_RB live_VB in_IN the_DT group_NN of_IN tents_NNS set_VBN apart_RB for_IN persons_NNS infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ,_, entirely_RB separate_JJ and_CC away_RB from_IN other_JJ groups_NNS of_IN tents_NNS ._.
These_DT tents_NNS shall_MD be_VB at_IN a_DT distance_NN of_IN at_IN least_JJS three_CD hundred_JJ metres_NNS from_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ post_NN ._.
None_NN of_IN the_DT persons_NNS belonging_VBG to_TO this_DT group_NN of_IN tents_NNS shall_MD have_VB any_DT intercourse_NN with_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ post_NN ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ baggage_NN and_CC other_JJ necessaries_NNS shall_MD also_RB be_VB quite_RB separate_JJ ._.
No_DT one_CD shall_MD cross_VB the_DT frontier_NN at_IN night_NN ._.
The_DT head_NN of_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ post_NN shall_MD post_VB necessary_JJ sentries_NNS and_CC guards_NNS to_TO detain_VB travellers_NNS and_CC arrivals_NNS till_VBP day-break_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT same_JJ day_NN he_PRP shall_MD determine_VB how_WRB they_PRP are_VBP to_TO be_VB disposed_VBN of_IN ._.
When_WRB the_DT travellers_NNS arrive_VBP on_IN the_DT frontier_NN and_CC their_PRP$ starting_JJ places_NNS and_CC destinations_NNS are_VBP ascertained_VBN ,_, the_DT senior_JJ doctor_NN shall_MD examine_VB them_PRP one_CD by_IN one_CD ,_, and_CC without_IN delay_NN separate_VBP the_DT persons_NNS with_IN their_PRP$ baggage_NN who_WP are_VBP not_RB to_TO be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO cross_VB or_CC whom_WP it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO send_VB to_TO the_DT sanitary_JJ post_NN ,_, from_IN others_NNS ._.
The_DT other_JJ travel-_JJ lers_NNS who_WP are_VBP not_RB infected_VBN shall_MD be_VB placed_VBN under_IN 15_CD days_NNS '_POS quarantine_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, they_PRP shall_MD be_VB divided_VBN into_IN several_JJ parties_NNS of_IN a_DT hundred_JJ each_DT ,_, the_DT first_JJ arrivals_NNS taking_VBG precedence_NN over_IN those_DT who_WP arrive_VBP after_IN them_PRP ._.
During_IN these_DT 15_CD days_NNS ,_, if_IN anyone_NN be_VB seized_VBN with_IN plague_NN ,_, he_PRP or_CC she_PRP shall_MD be_VB sent_VBN ,_, with_IN his_PRP$ or_CC her_PRP$ baggage_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT lazaretto_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT tent_NN occupied_VBN by_IN him_PRP or_CC her_PRP$ shall_MD be_VB vacated_VBN and_CC disinfected_VBN and_CC then_RB removed_VBD to_TO another_DT place_NN ._.
The_DT companions_NNS of_IN the_DT patient_NN shall_MD be_VB kept_VBN under_IN observation_NN for_IN 15_CD days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT appearance_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT site_NN of_IN the_DT tent_NN shall_MD be_VB cleaned_VBN very_RB carefully_RB ._.
The_DT second_JJ doctor_NN and_CC his_PRP$ attendants_NNS shall_MD attend_VB the_DT patient_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, in_IN case_NN of_IN death_NN ,_, the_DT body_NN shall_MD be_VB buried_VBN at_IN the_DT *_NN 42_CD inches_NNS ._.
depth_NN of_IN a_DT zar*_NN at_IN least_JJS ,_, and_CC ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, lime_JJ shall_MD be_VB sprinkled_VBN over_IN it_PRP ._.
In_IN no_DT case_NN shall_MD dead_VB bodies_NNS be_VB removed_VBN to_TO distant_VB places_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT deceased_VBN 's_POS property_NN ,_, ?_. APP_NNP ._.
VIII_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN land_NN ._.
203_CD such_JJ as_IN clothes_NNS and_CC beddings_NNS ,_, shall_MD be_VB burnt_VBN without_IN delay_NN ._.
In_IN case_NN of_IN the_DT recovery_NN of_IN the_DT patient_NN he_PRP or_CC she_PRP shall_MD be_VB placed_VBN under_IN quaran-_JJ tine_NN for_IN a_DT month_NN ,_, and_CC his_PRP$ or_CC her_PRP$ clothes_NNS and_CC bedding_VBG shall_MD be_VB burnt_VBN ._.
In_IN case_NN of_IN a_DT person_NN being_VBG in_IN indigent_JJ circumstances_NNS fresh_JJ clothes_NNS shall_MD be_VB supplied_VBN to_TO him_PRP or_CC her_PRP ,_, and_CC he_PRP or_CC she_PRP shall_MD be_VB removed_VBN from_IN the_DT tent_NN of_IN patients_NNS to_TO another_DT tent_NN ._.
The_DT site_NN of_IN the_DT tents_NNS of_IN patients_NNS shall_MD be_VB changed_VBN and_CC cleaned_VBN at_IN short_JJ intervals_NNS ._.
Latrines_NNS shall_MD be_VB near_IN the_DT tents_NNS ,_, but_CC ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, on_IN the_DT side_NN opposite_NN to_TO the_DT direction_NN from_IN which_WDT the_DT local_JJ winds_NNS blow_NN ._.
These_DT latrines_NNS shall_MD be_VB narrow_JJ and_CC deep_JJ ditches_NNS far_RB away_RB from_IN drinking_VBG water_NN ,_, and_CC shall_MD be_VB daily_RB filled_VBN up_RP after_IN lime_JJ water_NN has_VBZ been_VBN poured_VBN into_IN them_PRP ._.
Filth_NNP and_CC other_JJ things_NNS which_WDT can_MD not_RB be_VB burnt_VBN by_IN fire_NN ,_, whatever_WDT they_PRP may_MD be_VB ,_, shall_MD also_RB be_VB thrown_VBN into_IN latrine_JJ ditches_NNS ._.
Arrangements_NNS for_IN Supplies_NNS and_CC Food_NNP ._.
The_DT Governors_NNPS of_IN districts_NNS shall_MD issue_VB necessary_JJ orders_NNS that_IN a_DT bazar_NN shall_MD be_VB held_VBN near_IN every_DT quarantine_NN post_NN where_WRB rice_NN ,_, wheat_NN ,_, sheep_NN ,_, vegetables_NNS ,_, and_CC all_DT other_JJ eatables_NNS and_CC fodder_NN required_VBN for_IN man_NN and_CC beast_VB shall_MD be_VB procured_VBN ,_, stored_VBN ,_, and_CC always_RB kept_VBD ready_JJ ._.
Another_DT bazar_NN shall_MD also_RB be_VB held_VBN for_IN the_DT Lazaretto_NNP quite_NN separate_JJ and_CC apart_RB from_IN the_DT other_JJ ._.
A_DT list_NN of_IN prices_NNS of_IN articles_NNS at_IN moderate_JJ rates_NNS shall_MD be_VB proclaimed_VBN and_CC hung_VBN up_RP in_IN order_NN to_TO prevent_VB excessive_JJ charges_NNS ._.
Poor_NNP patients_NNS shall_MD be_VB supplied_VBN with_IN food_NN and_CC medicines_NNS free_JJ of_IN charge_NN ._.
Great_NNP care_NN shall_MD be_VB taken_VBN about_IN drinking_NN water_NN ,_, which_WDT shall_MD not_RB be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO be_VB contaminated_VBN ;_: especially_RB corpses_VBZ and_CC clothes_NNS shall_MD not_RB be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO be_VB washed_VBN in_IN or_CC animals_NNS permitted_VBN to_TO enter_VB and_CC defile_VB the_DT spring_NN or_CC running_VBG drinking_JJ water_NN ._.
Persons_NNS infringing_VBG this_DT order_NN shall_MD be_VB liable_JJ to_TO severe_JJ punishment_NN ._.
The_DT best_JJS thing_NN would_MD be_VB to_TO fix_VB separate_JJ spots_NNS for_IN washing_VBG clothes_NNS and_CC watering_VBG animals_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO take_VB great_JJ care_NN in_IN cleaning_NN and_CC changing_VBG them_PRP at_IN short_JJ intervals_NNS ._.
Rules_NNS regarding_VBG Disinfection_NN ._.
I.-Clothes_NNS and_CC baggage_NN of_IN plague-stricken_JJ persons_NNS shall_MD be_VB burnt_VBN without_IN delay_NN ._.
II.-Clothes_NNS and_CC baggage_NN of_IN healthy_JJ travellers_NNS shall_MD be_VB washed_VBN and_CC disinfected_VBN before_IN they_PRP are_VBP discharged_VBN from_IN quarantine_NN ._.

Burning_NNP ._.
II_NNP ._.
Boiling_VBG in_IN water_NN for_IN an_DT hour_NN ._.

VII_NNP ._.
Sulphur_NNP about_IN a_DT man_NN to_TO be_VB burnt_VBN in_IN an_DT ordinary_JJ room_NN ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) Manner_NN of_IN carrying_VBG out_RP disinfection-_JJ Burning_NNP articles_NNS by_IN fire_NN in_IN an_DT open_JJ place_NN ._.
Boiling_NNP (_( articles_NNS )_) in_IN large_JJ caldrons_NNS ._.
All_DT chemical_JJ lotions_NNS can_MD be_VB prepared_VBN in_IN any_DT vessel_NN ,_, except_IN the_DT lotion_NN of_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN which_WDT spoils_VBZ metals_NNS and_CC which_WDT should_MD ,_, therefore_VB ,_, be_VB prepared_VBN in_IN glazed_JJ earthenware_NN vessels_NNS or_CC in_IN vessels_NNS of_IN the_DT like_JJ kind_NN a_DT miskal_NN of_IN common_JJ salt_NN being_VBG added_VBD to_TO every_DT man_NN of_IN the_DT lotion_NN ._.
Lime_JJ water_NN should_MD be_VB prepared_VBN by_IN diluting_VBG a_DT quantity_NN of_IN lime_NN in_IN the_DT double_JJ quantity_NN of_IN water_NN ._.
For_IN fumigation_NN with_IN sulphur.-Clothes_NNS and_CC articles_NNS of_IN that_DT kind_NN shall_MD be_VB hung_VBN up_RP on_IN ropes_NNS in_IN a_DT room_NN ,_, and_CC pounded_VBD sulphur_NN sprinkled_VBN on_IN firepans_NNS full_JJ of_IN fire_NN (_( placed_VBN under_IN them_PRP )_) ,_, all_DT openings_NNS in_IN the_DT room_NN being_VBG closed_VBN and_CC crevices_NNS in_IN doors_NNS ,_, etc._FW ,_, plastered_VBD over_IN with_IN mud_NN ._.
The_DT articles_NNS shall_MD be_VB removed_VBN after_IN twenty-four_JJ hours_NNS -_: (_( 3_CD )_) Disinfection_NN of_IN certain_JJ different_JJ articles-_NN I_PRP ._.
Articles_NNS not_RB made_VBN of_IN cotton_NN (_( such_JJ as_IN drawers_NNS ,_, handkerchiefs_NNS ,_, socks_NNS ,_, shawls_NN ,_, towels_NNS ,_, and_CC such_JJ like_IN )_) to_TO be_VB disinfected_VBN with_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN ,_, or_CC carbolic_JJ acid_NN ,_, or_CC sulphate_NN of_IN copper_NN ,_, or_CC to_TO be_VB boiled_VBN in_IN water_NN ._.
II_NNP ._.
Articles_NNS made_VBN of_IN wool_JJ [_NNS such_JJ as_IN banians_NNS ,_, coats_NNS ,_, trousers_NNS ,_, over-_JJ coats_NNS ,_, vests_NNS ,_, cloaks_NNS (_( aba_NN )_) ,_, and_CC the_DT like_JJ ]_NN to_TO be_VB disinfected_VBN with_IN the_DT above_JJ chemicals_NNS or_CC to_TO be_VB fumigated_VBN with_IN sulphur_NN ._.
III_NNP ._.
Articles_NNS made_VBN of_IN wax-cloth_JJ ,_, leather_NN ,_, skin_NN ,_, or_CC wood_NN ,_, or_CC articles_NNS joined_VBN ,_, glued_VBN ,_, pasted_VBD or_CC attached_VBN (_( to_TO other_JJ articles_NNS )_) to_TO be_VB disinfected_VBN with_IN the_DT above_JJ chemicals_NNS ,_, or_CC to_TO be_VB fumigated_VBN with_IN sulphur_NN ,_, but_CC not_RB to_TO be_VB boiled_VBN ._.
IV_NNP ._.
Clothes_NNS made_VBN of_IN or_CC lined_VBN with_IN skins_NNS or_CC furs_NNS ,_, all_DT kinds_NNS of_IN skins_NNS and_CC hides_NNS of_IN animals_NNS shall_MD not_RB be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO cross_VB the_DT frontier_NN (_( but_CC in_IN case_NN it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO pass_VB them_PRP )_) they_PRP shall_MD be_VB kept_VBN for_IN two_CD days_NNS and_CC nights_NNS in_IN lotion_NN of_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN ._.
V._NNP Baggage_NNP ,_, clothes_NNS and_CC beddings_NNS of_IN plague-stricken_JJ persons_NNS and_CC articles_NNS of_IN no_DT value_NN (_( such_JJ as_IN chopped_JJ straw_NN ,_, grass_NN ,_, old_JJ clothes_NNS waste_VBP paper_NN ,_, rags_NNS ,_, or_CC remaining_VBG of_IN medicines_NNS and_CC food_NN and_CC the_DT like_JJ )_) shall_MD be_VB burnt_VBN by_IN fire_NN which_WDT may_MD be_VB inflamed_VBN by_IN pouring_VBG kerosine_JJ oil_NN on_IN it_PRP ._.
VI_NNP ._.
On_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN the_DT post_NN papers_NNS and_CC important_JJ articles_NNS con-_NNS tained_VBD in_IN it_PRP shall_MD be_VB fumigated_VBN with_IN sulphur_NN ._.

VIII_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN land_NN ._.
205_CD VII_NNP ._.
Tents_NNS occupied_VBN by_IN plague-stricken_JJ persons_NNS shall_MD be_VB burnt_VBN after_IN the_DT abolition_NN of_IN quarantine_NN ._.
VIII_NNP ._.
All_DT other_JJ tents_NNS shall_MD be_VB washed_VBN by_IN lotion_NN of_IN corrosive_JJ subli-_JJ mate_NN ._.
IX_NNP ._.
For_IN the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN ground_NN and_CC sites_NNS of_IN tents_NNS ,_, the_DT surface_NN of_IN the_DT ground_NN should_MD be_VB covered_VBN with_IN dry_JJ dung_NN soaked_VBN in_IN kerosine_NN oil_NN which_WDT shall_MD be_VB set_VBN on_IN fire_NN ._.
X._JJ Discharges_NNP of_IN patients_NNS and_CC water_NN used_VBN for_IN washing_VBG shall_MD be_VB thrown_VBN into_IN latrine_JJ ditches_NNS without_IN delay_NN ,_, and_CC every_DT day_NN ,_, before_IN they_PRP are_VBP filled_VBN up_RP ,_, lotion_NN of_IN green_JJ vitriol_NN or_CC sulphate_NN of_IN copper_NN or_CC lime_VB shall_MD be_VB poured_VBN into_IN them_PRP ._.
XI_NN ._.
The_DT vessels_NNS which_WDT are_VBP liable_JJ to_TO be_VB stained_VBN shall_MD be_VB of_IN metal_NN and_CC every_DT time_NN after_IN use_NN they_PRP shall_MD be_VB washed_VBN with_IN lotion_NN of_IN carbolic_JJ acid_NN ._.
XII_NN ._.
Doctors_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ attendants_NNS and_CC the_DT comrades_NNS of_IN patients_NNS and_CC persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP just_RB recovered_VBN from_IN illness_NN shall_MD first_VB wash_VB all_DT their_PRP$ bodies_NNS several_JJ times_NNS with_IN hot_JJ water_NN and_CC soap_NN ,_, and_CC afterwards_NNS with_IN lotion_NN of_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN ._.
Their_PRP$ beards_NNS and_CC hair_NN shall_MD be_VB cut_VBN as_RB short_JJ as_IN possible_JJ ,_, or_CC at_IN least_JJS washed_JJ thoroughly_RB well_RB with_IN lotion_NN of_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN ._.
First_RB Warning_NNP ._.
Travellers_NNS not_RB abiding_VBG by_IN the_DT above_JJ regulations_NNS shall_MD be_VB turned_VBN back_RP by_IN force_NN and_CC not_RB allowed_VBN to_TO cross_VB the_DT frontier_NN ._.
Second_JJ Warning_NNP ._.
Doctors_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ attendants_NNS shall_MD take_VB great_JJ care_NN in_IN disinfecting_VBG themselves_PRP ._.
If_IN they_PRP take_VBP proper_JJ care_NN and_CC keep_VB themselves_PRP clean_JJ ,_, they_PRP are_VBP not_RB liable_JJ to_TO the_DT disease_NN and_CC can_MD enjoy_VB immunity_NN from_IN it_PRP ._.
For_IN instance_NN in_IN India_NNP none_NN of_IN the_DT doctors_NNS or_CC their_PRP$ attendants_NNS ,_, with_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN only_RB one_CD ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN seized_VBN with_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
Care_NN should_MD be_VB taken_VBN in_IN diet_JJ and_CC heavy_JJ meals_NNS should_MD be_VB avoided_VBN ,_, medicines_NNS like_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN or_CC carbolic_JJ acid_NN should_MD not_RB be_VB used_VBN in_IN such_JJ large_JJ proportions_NNS as_IN might_MD make_VB them_PRP poisonous_JJ ._.
PRECAUTIONARY_NNP MEASURES_NNP IN_NNP MESOPOTAMIA_NNP ._.

NO_DT ._.

From-The_JJ Acting_NNP Sanitary_NNP Inspector_NNP ,_, Baghdad_NNP ,_, To-Her_NNP Britannic_NNP Majesty_NNP 's_POS Consul-General_JJ ,_, Baghdad_NNP ._.
J'ai_NNP l'honneur_NN de_FW porter_FW a_DT votre_NN connaissance_NN que_NN par_NN decision_NN du_NN Conseil_NNP Superieur_NNP de_FW Sant_NNP ,_, transmise_NN hier_NN et_FW parvenue_NN tlgraphique-_JJ ment_NN ce_NN soir_NN ,_, l'entre_FW des_NNS voyageurs_VBP et_JJ cadavres_NNS provenant_VBP des_NNS Indes_NNP ,_, du_NN Baluchistan_NNP ,_, de_FW la_FW rive_JJ Persane_NNP du_NN Golfe_NNP de_IN Bassorah_NNP et_CC du_JJ l'itorale_NN depuis_NN Bassorah_NNP jusqu_NN '_'' Khanakin_NNP est_JJS interdite_NN ._.

Circular_JJ No_DT ._.

From-The_JJ Acting_NNP Sanitary_NNP Inspector_NNP ,_, Baghdad_NNP ,_, To-Her_NNP Britannic_NNP Majesty_NNP 's_POS Consul-General_JJ ,_, Baghdad_NNP ._.
Par_NNP dcision_NN du_NN Conseil_NNP du_NN Sant_NNP ,_, la_FW quarantaine_FW de_FW dix_FW jours_NNS impose_VBP aux_JJ provenances_NNS des_NNS Indes_NNP est_JJS porte_NN quinze_NN jours_NN ._.
La_NNP mesure_NN prohibitive_JJ dicte_NN contre_NN les_VBZ navires_NNS qui_JJ auraient_JJ presen-_JJ tes_NNS des_NNS cas_VBP de_IN peste_NN ,_, ou_JJ suspects_NNS de_IN cette_NN maladie_NN bord_IN pen-_JJ dant_JJ la_NN traverse_NN est_JJS maintenue_NN ,_, cependant_JJ dans_NNS le_VBP cas_JJ ou_NN la_NN peste_NN venait_NN se_NN manifester_NN soit_VBD parmi_JJ les_NNS passagers_NNS soit_VBP parmi_JJ l'quipage_NN ,_, aprs_NN I_PRP arrive_VBP du_JJ navire_NN au_NN lazaret_FW de_FW Bassorah_NNP ,_, navires_VBZ et_FW passagers_NNS seront_VBP soumis_JJ une_JJ quarantaine_NN de_IN dix_FW jours_NNS partir_VBP du_RB dernier_JJR cas_NN constat_NN ,_, avec_JJ dsinfection_NN trs_NN rigoureuse_NN des_VBZ hardes_NNS ,_, effets_NNS et_VBP ba-_JJ gages_NNS des_VBZ passagers_NNS et_FW de_FW l'quipage_NN ._.
Le_NNP navire_NN sera_NN dsinfect_NN et_FW l'eau_NN potable_JJ renouvelle_NN ._.

La_NNP mme_FW quarantaine_NN et_NN les_VBZ mmes_NNS mesures_NNS de_FW rigueur_FW seront_FW gale-_JJ ment_NN appliques_NNS aux_VBP navires_NNS provenant_JJ des_NNS ports_NNS du_RB littoral_JJ du_JJ Belou-_NNP chistan_NN jusqu_NN '_'' la_JJ frontire_NN de_IN la_FW Perse_NNP ._.
La_NNP mesure_NN de_FW prohibition_NN porte_NN contre_NN les_VBZ visiteurs_NNS chiites_NNS et_VBP les_NNS cadavres_NNS provenant_VBP des_NNS Indes_NNP est_JJS maintenue_NN ,_, et_CC elle_RB est_JJS en_NN outre_NN tendue_JJ aux_NN provenances_NNS du_VBP lit-_JJ toral_JJ du_NN Belouchistan_NNP ._.

1_CD ._.
Extract_NN from_IN the_DT Proceedings_NNP of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP in_IN the_DT Home_NNP Depart-_NNP ment_NN (_( Sanitary_NNP )_) ,_, -under_JJR date_NN Simla_NNP ,_, the_DT 9th_CD May_NNP 1879_CD ._.
READ_VB the_DT undermentioned_JJ papers_NNS on_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN Quarantine_NNP Rules_NNP for_IN Indian_JJ Ports_NNS :_: -_: Home_NN Department_NNP Resolution_NNP No_NNP ._.
