Despatch_NN from_IN Her_NNP Majesty_NNP 's_POS Secretary_NNP of_IN State_NNP for_IN India_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
200_CD ,_, dated_VBD 28th_CD November_NNP 1878_CD ._.
RESOLUTION_NNP ._.
In_IN Home_NNP Department_NNP Resolution_NNP of_IN 19th_CD September_NNP 1878_CD ,_, after_IN discussing_VBG the_DT whole_JJ question_NN of_IN quarantine_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT action_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN taken_VBN from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN on_IN that_DT subject_NN in_IN Indian_JJ ports_NNS ,_, the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP laid_VBD down_RB two_CD leading_JJ principles_NNS :_: First_NNP ,_, that_IN a_DT system_NN of_IN medical_JJ inspection_NN is_VBZ sufficient_JJ to_TO meet_VB the_DT case_NN of_IN all_DT vessels_NNS arriving_VBG with_IN persons_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN any_DT disease_NN which_WDT is_VBZ endemic_JJ in_IN this_DT country_NN ;_: and_CC secondly_RB ,_, that_IN quarantine_NN should_MD be_VB reserv-_JJ ed_NN for_IN occasions_NNS when_WRB there_EX is_VBZ danger_NN of_IN diseases_NNS being_VBG imported_VBN ,_, which_WDT are_VBP either_DT unknown_JJ or_CC not_RB commonly_RB rife_VB in_IN India-such_JJ ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, as_IN plague_NN and_CC yellow_JJ fever_NN ._.
Local_JJ Governments_NNS and_CC Admin-_JJ istrations_NNS were_VBD requested_VBN to_TO submit_VB draft_NN rules_NNS in_IN accordance_NN with_IN c_$ 27_CD ?_. 210_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
these_DT principles-one_JJ set_NN for_IN medical_JJ inspection_NN which_WDT might_MD ,_, if_IN it_PRP appeared_VBD necessary_JJ ,_, be_VB sanctioned_VBN under_IN Act_NNP I_PRP of_IN 1870_CD ,_, and_CC would_MD remain_VB continuously_RB in_IN force_NN ;_: and_CC another_DT set_NN for_IN quarantine_NN ,_, which_WDT should_MD be_VB provisional_JJ ,_, and_CC would_MD only_RB be_VB enforced_VBN ,_, if_IN occasion_NN should_MD arise_VB ,_, with_IN the_DT previous_JJ sanction_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ._.
2_CD ._.
Replies_NNS from_IN the_DT Local_JJ Governments_NNS ,_, with_IN sets_NNS of_IN rules_NNS propos-_JJ ed_NN by_IN them_PRP ,_, have_VBP been_VBN received_VBN ;_: and_CC in_IN the_DT meantime_NN a_DT despatch_NN has_VBZ also_RB come_VBN from_IN Her_NNP Majesty_NNP 's_POS Secretary_NNP of_IN State_NNP for_IN India_NNP acknow-_JJ ledging_VBG the_DT receipt_NN of_IN the_DT Resolution_NNP of_IN 19th_CD September_NNP 1878_CD ._.
Lord_NNP Cranbrook_NNP expresses_VBZ a_DT hope_NN that_IN quarantine_JJ ``_`` rules_NNS may_MD soon_RB be_VB drawn_VBN up_RP which_WDT shall_MD be_VB consistent_JJ with_IN the_DT views_NNS of_IN Her_NNP Majesty_NNP 's_POS Government_NNP and_CC applicable_JJ to_TO the_DT whole_NN of_IN India_NNP ._. ''_''
At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN ,_, he_PRP points_VBZ out_RP the_DT importance_NN of_IN meeting_VBG the_DT prejudices_NNS of_IN other_JJ States_NNPS as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, so_RB as_IN to_TO avoid_VB the_DT risk_NN of_IN restrictions_NNS being_VBG imposed_VBN on_IN vessels_NNS passing_VBG through_IN the_DT Red_NNP Sea_NNP ;_: and_CC he_PRP adds-_VBZ ``_`` With_IN regard_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, to_TO this_DT point_NN ,_, I_PRP would_MD especially_RB impress_VB on_IN you_PRP that_IN ,_, if_IN the_DT Indian_JJ ports_NNS were_VBD known_VBN to_TO be_VB maintained_VBN in_IN a_DT thor-_JJ oughly_JJ sanitary_JJ condition_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN a_DT complete_JJ system_NN were_VBD in_IN force_NN of_IN inspection_NN of_IN vessels_NNS arriving_VBG in_IN port_NN ,_, including_VBG isolation_NN of_IN any_DT persons_NNS on_IN board_NN who_WP might_MD be_VB sick_JJ from_IN disorders_NNS of_IN an_DT epidemic_JJ charac-_NN ter_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ that_IN the_DT susceptibilities_NNS of_IN other_JJ nations_NNS would_MD be_VB sufficiently_RB met_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN all_DT occasion_NN would_MD be_VB taken_VBN away_RB for_IN the_DT establishment_NN of_IN quarantine_NN at_IN any_DT time_NN in_IN India_NNP ._. ''_''
In_IN a_DT further_JJ des-_JJ patch_NN (_( No_UH ._.
22_CD ,_, dated_VBD 20th_CD February_NNP 1879_CD )_) on_IN a_DT kindred_VBN subject_NN ,_, the_DT Secretary_NNP of_IN State_NNP forwards_NNS with_IN approval_NN a_DT letter_NN from_IN the_DT Foreign_NNP Office_NNP ,_, urging_VBG that_IN the_DT enforcement_NN of_IN misapplied_JJ quarantine_NN rules_NNS at_IN Indian_JJ ports_NNS ``_`` materially_RB weakens_VBZ the_DT hands_NNS of_IN Her_NNP Majesty_NNP 's_POS Govern-_JJ ment_NN in_IN protesting_VBG against_IN bad_JJ quarantine_JJ arrangements_NNS at_IN places_NNS be-_JJ longing_NN to_TO foreign_JJ powers_NNS ._. ''_''
3_CD ._.
Of_IN the_DT rules_NNS submitted_VBN by_IN Local_JJ Governments_NNS ,_, those_DT for_IN Madras_NNP were_VBD drawn_VBN up_RP by_IN a_DT Committee_NNP ;_: but_CC the_DT rules_NNS for_IN medical_JJ inspection_NN appear_VB strict_JJ and_CC complicated_VBN ,_, and_CC they_PRP are_VBP mixed_JJ up_IN with_IN the_DT rules_NNS for_IN quarantine_JJ proper_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ of_IN primary_JJ importance_NN that_IN the_DT two_CD sets_NNS of_IN rules_NNS should_MD be_VB kept_VBN quite_RB distinct_JJ ,_, both_DT because_IN this_DT is_VBZ more_RBR con-_JJ venient_NN ,_, and_CC also_RB because_IN the_DT one_CD set_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB continuously_RB in_IN force_NN ,_, whereas_IN the_DT other_JJ set_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB specially_RB sanctioned_VBN only_RB when_WRB occasion_NN arises_NNS ._.
The_DT Bombay_NNP rules_NNS are_VBP also_RB open_JJ to_TO some_DT of_IN the_DT remarks_NNS stated_VBN above_IN ;_: and_CC they_PRP might_MD cause_VB annoyance_NN and_CC hardship_NN ._.
The_DT rules_NNS re-_VBP commended_VBN for_IN Calcutta_NNP were_VBD drawn_VBN up_RP by_IN a_DT Committee_NNP ;_: but_CC the_DT two_CD sets_NNS of_IN rules_NNS have_VBP not_RB been_VBN kept_VBN distinct_JJ as_IN they_PRP ought_MD to_TO be_VB ,_, and_CC they_PRP contain_VBP some_DT provisions_NNS which_WDT could_MD hardly_RB be_VB worked_VBN in_IN prac-_JJ tice_NN ._.
The_DT British_JJ Burma_NNP rules_NNS are_VBP simpler_JJ ,_, but_CC ,_, if_IN strictly_RB acted_VBN on_IN ,_, they_PRP might_MD do_VB mischief_VB without_IN conferring_VBG any_DT compensating_JJ benefit_NN ._.
?_. APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
211_CD The_DT rules_NNS for_IN the_DT Andaman_NNP and_CC Nicobar_NNP Islands_NNP make_VBP no_DT mention_NN of_IN quarantine_NN or_CC medical_JJ inspection_NN ._.
They_PRP are_VBP intended_VBN merely_RB to_TO preserve_VB discipline_NN among_IN the_DT convicts_NNS ,_, to_TO prevent_VB escapes_NNS and_CC landing_NN of_IN forbidden_JJ articles_NNS ._.
But_CC the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT Andamans_NNPS is_VBZ so_RB peculiar_JJ that_IN the_DT requirements_NNS of_IN that_DT Settlement_NNP may_MD be_VB left_VBN out_IN of_IN account_NN alto-_JJ gether_NN ._.
The_DT case_NN of_IN Aden_NNP is_VBZ under_IN separate_JJ consideration_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
After_IN considering_VBG all_PDT the_DT replies_NNS of_IN Local_JJ Governments_NNS and_CC the_DT rules_NNS submitted_VBN by_IN them_PRP ,_, the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP have_VBP caused_VBN to_TO be_VB prepared_VBN ,_, for_IN the_DT guidance_NN of_IN all_DT Local_JJ Governments_NNS ,_, two_CD separate_JJ sets_NNS of_IN rules_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP appended_VBN to_TO this_DT Resolution_NNP ._.
These_DT two_CD sets_NNS of_IN rules_NNS must_MD be_VB kept_VBN quite_RB distinct_JJ from_IN each_DT other_JJ ._.
The_DT Quarantine_NNP Rules_NNP (_( Appendix_NNP B_NNP )_) can_MD be_VB ,_, and_CC are_VBP hereby_VBN sanctioned_VBN under_IN Act_NNP I_PRP of_IN 1870_CD ;_: but_CC they_PRP will_MD only_RB be_VB brought_VBN into_IN operation_NN very_RB occasion-_JJ ally_NN ,_, with_IN sanction_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, which_WDT must_MD previously_RB be_VB obtained_VBN in_IN each_DT case_NN ._.
Such_JJ sanction_NN will_MD be_VB given_VBN only_RB in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, yellow_JJ fever_NN ,_, or_CC some_DT fatal_JJ epidemic_JJ not_RB ordinarily_RB prevalent_JJ among_IN Indian_JJ populations_NNS ._.
The_DT Medical_NNP Inspection_NNP Rules_NNP (_( Appendix_NNP A_NNP )_) ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, are_VBP intended_VBN for_IN every-day_JJ use_NN ;_: they_PRP do_VBP not_RB provide_VB for_IN any_DT quarantine_NN at_IN all_DT ;_: and_CC they_PRP should_MD be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN executive_JJ orders_NNS of_IN Government_NNP ._.
5_CD ._.
In_IN conclusion_NN ,_, the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP take_VB this_DT opportunity_NN of_IN pressing_VBG upon_IN the_DT Local_JJ Governments_NNS concerned_VBD the_DT great_JJ import-_JJ ance_NN of_IN attending_VBG to_TO the_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN of_IN Indian_JJ ports_NNS ,_, as_IN urged_VBN by_IN the_DT Secretary_NNP of_IN State_NNP ,_, and_CC also_RB the_DT good_JJ to_TO be_VB derived_VBN from_IN seeing_VBG that_IN all_DT vessels_NNS leaving_VBG the_DT port_NN are_VBP well_RB found_VBN in_IN stores_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, and_CC are_VBP in_IN every_DT other_JJ respect_NN in_IN a_DT condition_NN favourable_JJ to_TO the_DT health_NN of_IN both_DT passengers_NNS and_CC crew_NN ._.
ORDER.-Ordered_NNP ,_, that_IN this_DT Resolution_NNP ,_, with_IN the_DT appended_JJ Rules_NNP ,_, be_VB forwarded_VBN to_TO the_DT Governments_NNS of_IN Madras_NNP ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC Bengal_NNP ,_, the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP of_IN British_NNP Burma_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Superintendent_NNP of_IN Port_NNP Blair_NNP and_CC the_DT Nicobars_NNP ,_, for_IN information_NN and_CC guidance_NN ;_: and_CC that_IN a_DT copy_NN be_VB forwarded_VBN to_TO Her_NNP Majesty_NNP 's_POS Secretary_NNP of_IN State_NNP for_IN India_NNP ._.
APPENDIX_IN A_NNP ._.
THE_DT following_JJ Rules_NNP for_IN the_DT medical_JJ inspection_NN of_IN vessels_NNS are_VBP issued_VBN ,_, for_IN the_DT guidance_NN of_IN Port_NNP Officers_NNP ,_, Pilots_NNP ,_, and_CC Medical_NNP Officers_NNP of_IN Ports_NNP ,_, by_IN the_DT with_IN the_DT previous_JJ sanction_NN of_IN the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP :_: and_CC they_PRP will_MD take_VB effect_NN from_IN the_DT 1st_CD June_NNP 1879_CD in_IN the_DT ports_NNS of_IN I.-The_NNP master_NN of_IN every_DT vessel_NN on_IN board_NN of_IN which_WDT there_EX is_VBZ ,_, either_RB among_IN the_DT passengers_NNS or_CC crew_NN ,_, any_DT case_NN of_IN cholera_NN ,_, small-pox_JJ ,_, or_CC other_JJ epidemic_JJ disease_NN common_JJ in_IN India_NNP ,_, shall_MD report_VB such_JJ case_NN or_CC cases_NNS to_TO the_DT pilot_NN or_CC other_JJ boarding_JJ officer_NN at_IN the_DT earliest_JJS opportunity_NN ,_, or_CC ,_, in_IN the_DT ?_. 212_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
absence_NN of_IN a_DT pilot_NN or_CC other_JJ boarding_VBG officer_NN ,_, shall_MD hoist_VB a_DT signal_NN ,_, which_WDT shall_MD be_VB during_IN the_DT day_NN flag_VBD R_NNP of_IN the_DT Commercial_NNP Code_NNP at_IN the_DT main_JJ and_CC during_IN the_DT night_NN two_CD lighted_VBD lanterns_NNS ,_, one_CD over_IN the_DT other_JJ ,_, at_IN the_DT fore_NN ._.
II.-The_JJ Port_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, having_VBG received_VBN information_NN from_IN the_DT pilot_NN or_CC other_JJ boarding_VBG officer_NN ,_, or_CC by_IN signal_JJ ,_, that_IN any_DT case_NN of_IN such_JJ disease_NN is_VBZ on_IN board_NN ,_, shall_MD communicate_VB the_DT information_NN to_TO the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Port_NNP ._.
III.-The_JJ Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, as_RB early_RB as_IN possible_JJ after_IN receipt_NN of_IN this_DT information_NN ,_, shall_MD inspect_VB the_DT vessel_NN ,_, and_CC more_RBR especially_RB its_PRP$ sanitary_JJ condition_NN ;_: shall_MD inquire_VB into_IN the_DT circumstances_NNS attending_VBG the_DT case_NN or_CC cases_NNS of_IN the_DT said_VBD disease_NN ;_: and_CC shall_MD arrange_VB for_IN the_DT conveyance_NN of_IN all_DT persons_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN such_JJ disease_NN to_TO a_DT hospital_NN ,_, unless_IN the_DT sick_JJ person_NN or_CC his_PRP$ friends_NNS can_MD make_VB adequate_JJ provision_NN elsewhere_RB ._.
IV.-The_JJ latter_JJ part_NN of_IN Rule_NNP No_NNP ._.
III_NNP is_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, not_RB to_TO be_VB en-_JJ forced_VBN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN passengers_NNS bound_IN for_IN an_DT onward_JJ port_NN ,_, unless_IN under_IN the_DT clearest_JJS necessity_NN ;_: and_CC of_IN every_DT such_JJ case_NN a_DT special_JJ report_NN ,_, explaining_VBG the_DT reasons_NNS for_IN the_DT action_NN taken_VBN ,_, must_MD be_VB submitted_VBN to_TO the_DT Government_NNP ,_, V.-Where_NNP the_DT disease_NN or_CC diseases_NNS in_IN question_NN are_VBP limited_VBN to_TO one_CD or_CC two_CD cases_NNS ,_, the_DT vessel_NN shall_MD not_RB be_VB prohibited_VBN from_IN taking_VBG up_RP the_DT usual_JJ place_NN of_IN anchorage_NN in_IN the_DT harbour_NN ,_, nor_CC shall_MD the_DT passengers_NNS be_VB detained_VBN on_IN board_NN pending_VBG the_DT inspection_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ;_: but_CC the_DT master_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN shall_MD be_VB held_VBN responsible_JJ that_IN no_DT passenger_NN suspected_VBD of_IN having_VBG such_JJ disease_NN is_VBZ allowed_VBN to_TO depart_VB before_IN this_DT inspection_NN ._.
VI.-Where_JJ cases_NNS have_VBP been_VBN more_RBR numerous_JJ than_IN one_CD or_CC two_CD ,_, or_CC when_WRB ,_, from_IN their_PRP$ occurring_VBG on_IN pilgrim_NN or_CC emigrant_JJ ships_NNS ,_, or_CC for_IN other_JJ special_JJ reasons_NNS ,_, further_JJ precautions_NNS may_MD be_VB deemed_VBN advisable_JJ ,_, the_DT vessel_NN shall_MD anchor_VB in_IN the_DT place_NN appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ;_: and_CC none_NN of_IN the_DT passengers_NNS shall_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO leave_VB until_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP has_VBZ made_VBN his_PRP$ inspection_NN ._.
VII.-Vessels_NNS coming_VBG under_IN this_DT last_JJ rule_NN shall_MD be_VB thoroughly_RB cleansed_VBN and_CC fumigated_VBN ,_, under_IN the_DT directions_NNS of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN small-pox_NN ,_, it_PRP shall_MD also_RB be_VB his_PRP$ duty_NN to_TO vaccinate_VB or_CC have_VB vaccinated_VBN all_PDT those_DT on_IN board_NN who_WP appear_VBP to_TO require_VB this_DT protection_NN and_CC are_VBP willing_JJ to_TO accept_VB it_PRP ._.
APPENDIX_NNP B_NNP ._.
IN_NNP exercise_NN of_IN the_DT power_NN conferred_VBN by_IN Act_NNP I_PRP of_IN 1870_CD ,_, the_DT following_JJ Rules_NNP for_IN quarantine_NN against_IN plague_NN or_CC yellow_VB fever_WDT have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN ?_. APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
213_CD by_IN ,_, with_IN the_DT previous_JJ sanction_NN of_IN the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP ;_: they_PRP will_MD take_VB effect_NN from_IN the_DT in_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN :_: -_: I.-The_JJ commander_NN of_IN every_DT vessel_NN ,_, including_VBG buggalows_NNS or_CC other_JJ native_JJ craft_NN ,_, arriving_VBG from_IN a_DT port_NN where_WRB plague_NN or_CC yellow_JJ fever_NN pre-_NN vails_NNS ,_, shall_MD ,_, before_IN entering_VBG the_DT harbour_NN ,_, indicate_NN by_IN signal_JJ the_DT port_NN from_IN which_WDT she_PRP has_VBZ come_VBN ._.
II.-Such_JJ commander_NN shall_MD not_RB ,_, without_IN having_VBG first_RB obtained_VBN per-_JJ mission_NN as_IN hereinafter_NN provided_VBN ,_, allow_VB any_DT communication_NN either_RB with_IN the_DT pilot_NN boat_NN ,_, except_IN orally_RB ,_, or_CC with_IN the_DT shore_NN ,_, or_CC with_IN any_DT other_JJ vessel_NN or_CC boat_NN in_IN the_DT harbour_NN ._.
III.-Immediately_RB on_IN the_DT signal_NN of_IN such_JJ arrivals_NNS being_VBG made_VBN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT port_NN shall_MD go_VB alongside_IN the_DT vessel_NN ,_, and_CC ascertain_NN by_IN enquiry_NN from_IN the_DT commander_NN whether_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ then_RB suffering_VBG ,_, or_CC has_VBZ during_IN the_DT voyage_NN suffered_VBD ,_, from_IN plague_NN ;_: and_CC if_IN such_JJ officer_NN is_VBZ satisfied_VBN by_IN such_JJ enquiry_NNS that_IN no_DT such_JJ case_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD by_IN writing_VBG under_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB delivered_VBN to_TO the_DT commander_NN ,_, permit_VBP free_JJ communication_NN between_IN such_JJ vessel_NN and_CC the_DT shore_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN other_JJ vessels_NNS and_CC boats_NNS in_IN the_DT harbour_NN ._.
IV.-If_NNP the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD have_VB reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN any_DT such_JJ case_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD direct_VB the_DT commander_NN to_TO take_VB the_DT vessel_NN to_TO the_DT quarantine_JJ anchorage_NN duly_RB appointed_VBN and_CC notified_VBN by_IN Government_NNP ,_, there_EX to_TO remain_VB for_IN the_DT space_NN of_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT day_NN of_IN arrival_NN in_IN the_DT harbour_NN or_CC from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN the_DT latest_JJS case_NN of_IN illness_NN ,_, and_CC shall_MD further_RB direct_VB the_DT commander_NN to_TO pro-_JJ hibit_NN during_IN the_DT said_VBD fifteen_JJ days_NNS all_DT communication_NN ,_, except_VB such_JJ as_IN is_VBZ hereinafter_NN provided_VBN for_IN ,_, between_IN such_JJ vessel_NN and_CC the_DT shore_NN ,_, or_CC other_JJ vessels_NNS or_CC boats_NNS in_IN the_DT harbour_NN ._.
The_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD further_RB direct_VB the_DT removal_NN of_IN so_RB many_JJ of_IN the_DT passengers_NNS and_CC crew_NN as_RB may_MD not_RB be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN sickness_NN ,_, and_CC whose_WP$ services_NNS may_MD not_RB be_VB required_VBN on_IN board_NN the_DT ship_NN ,_, to_TO such_JJ particular_JJ spots_NNS as_IN may_MD from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN be_VB fixed_VBN upon_IN by_IN the_DT Local_JJ Government_NNP as_IN places_NNS of_IN quarantine_NN ,_, there_EX to_TO remain_VB for_IN a_DT space_NN of_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS ,_, or_CC ,_, in_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN a_DT case_NN of_IN sickness_NN ,_, for_IN a_DT space_NN of_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN ._.
V.-Any_JJ mails_NNS or_CC cargo_NN which_WDT may_MD be_VB brought_VBN by_IN any_DT vessel_NNS so_IN arriving_VBG shall_MD be_VB landed_VBN under_IN such_JJ precautions_NNS as_IN may_MD be_VB deemed_VBN necessary_JJ by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
VI.-It_NNP will_MD be_VB the_DT duty_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP of_IN Marine_NNP to_TO facili-_JJ tate_NN the_DT conveyance_NN to_TO the_DT vessel_NN in_IN quarantine_NN of_IN all_DT supplies_NNS of_IN provi-_JJ sions_NNS ,_, stores_NNS ,_, and_CC other_JJ articles_NNS required_VBN by_IN those_DT on_IN board_NN ._.

I_PRP am_VBP to_TO explain_VB that_IN similar_JJ rules_NNS are_VBP not_RB necessary_JJ for_IN the_DT Orissa_NNP Ports_NNP as_IN vessels_NNS from_IN Chinese_JJ ports_NNS do_VBP not_RB call_VB there_RB ._.
Notification_NN No_DT ._.
60_CD (_( Marine_NNP )_) ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 27th_CD July_NNP 1894_CD ._.
With_IN the_DT previous_JJ sanction_NN of_IN the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP the_DT following_VBG revised_VBD rules_NNS for_IN quarantine_NN against_IN plague_NN have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN by_IN the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP of_IN Bengal_NNP in_IN exercise_NN of_IN the_DT power_NN conferred_VBN by_IN section_NN 1_CD ,_, Act_NNP I_PRP of_IN 1870_CD ._.
These_DT rules_NNS have_VBP effect_NN ,_, as_IN a_DT temporary_JJ measure_NN ,_, from_IN 1st_CD August_NNP 1894_CD in_IN the_DT Port_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP :_: -_: I.-The_JJ Commander_NNP of_IN every_DT vessel_NN ,_, including_VBG buggalows_NNS or_CC other_JJ native_JJ craft_NN arriving_VBG from_IN Hong-Kong_NNP or_CC Canton_NNP ,_, shall_MD ,_, on_IN arrival_NN at_IN the_DT Sandheads_NNP ,_, hoist_VBP a_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN ,_, and_CC indicate_NN by_IN signal_JJ the_DT port_NN from_IN which_WDT she_PRP has_VBZ come_VBN ,_, and_CC shall_MD keep_VB such_JJ flag_NN and_CC signal_JJ flying_VBG until_IN permitted_VBN to_TO take_VB it_PRP down_RP as_IN hereinafter_NN provided_VBD ._.
The_DT Pilot_NNP on_IN boarding_VBG a_DT vessel_NN from_IN Hong-Kong_NNP or_CC Canton_NNP shall_MD direct_VB the_DT flag_NN prescribed_VBN above_IN to_TO be_VB hoisted_VBN if_IN it_PRP has_VBZ not_RB already_RB been_VBN done_VBN ._.
*_JJ N.B.-_NNP Pilotage_NNP is_VBZ compulsory_JJ for_IN all_DT vessels_NNS over_IN 100_CD tons_NNS in_IN the_DT Port_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP ._.
II_NNP -The_NNP Commander_NNP shall_MD not_RB ,_, without_IN first_JJ having_VBG obtained_VBN permission_NN as_IN hereinafter_NN provided_VBN ,_, allow_VB any_DT communica-_JJ tion_NN with_IN the_DT shore_NN or_CC any_DT other_JJ vessel_NN or_CC boat_NN ,_, excepting_VBG only_RB with_IN the_DT boat_NN supplying_VBG the_DT Pilots*_NNP from_IN the_DT Pilot_NNP Brig_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN that_DT case_NN com-_JJ munication_NN shall_MD be_VB limited_VBN to_TO receiving_VBG on_IN board_NN the_DT Pilot_NNP ,_, his_PRP$ leadsman_NN ,_, servant_NN and_CC baggage_NN ._.
III.-If_NNP there_EX is_VBZ any_DT case_NN of_IN sickness_NN on_IN board_NN and_CC the_DT Pilot_NNP has_VBZ reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ plague_JJ ,_, he_PRP shall_MD telegraph_VB to_TO the_DT Port_NNP Officer_NNP from_IN Saugor_NNP and_CC not_RB proceed_VB beyond_IN *_NNP Not_RB printed_VBD ._.

IX_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
215_CD Diamond_NNP Harbour_NNP without_IN the_DT permission_NN of_IN the_DT Port_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
IV.-If_NNP the_DT Pilot_NNP has_VBZ no_DT reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN there_EX is_VBZ any_DT one_CD suffering_NN from_IN the_DT plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD bring_VB the_DT vessel_NN up_IN the_DT river_NN to_TO Mateeabrooj_NNP ,_, and_CC shall_MD anchor_VB it_PRP there_EX till_VBZ the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP has_VBZ visited_VBN it_PRP ._.
V.-The_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, as_RB soon_RB as_IN he_PRP has_VBZ received_VBN information_NN of_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN at_IN Mateeabrooj_NNP ,_, shall_MD visit_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC ascertain_NN by_IN enquiry_NN from_IN the_DT Commander_NNP or_CC the_DT Medical_JJ Officer_NNP on_IN board_NN ,_, or_CC other_JJ sources_NNS of_IN information_NN ,_, whether_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG ,_, or_CC has_VBZ suffered_VBN ,_, from_IN the_DT plague_NN ._.
VI.-If_NNP the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP is_VBZ satisfied_JJ that_IN no_DT one_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG from_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, or_CC has_VBZ suffered_VBN from_IN the_DT plague_NN since_IN the_DT vessel_NN left_VBD Hong-Kong_NNP or_CC Canton_NNP port_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN the_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ been_VBN allowed_VBN pratique_NN at_IN Singapore_NNP ,_, he_PRP shall_MD allow_VB the_DT passengers_NNS to_TO land_VB ,_, but_CC shall_MD detain_VB the_DT vessel_NN at_IN Mateea-_NNP brooj_NN till_NN such_JJ measures_NNS have_VBP been_VBN taken_VBN for_IN the_DT disinfec-_JJ tion_NN of_IN the_DT mails_NNS and_CC cargo_NN and_CC hold_NN ,_, as_IN he_PRP may_MD consider_VB necessary_JJ ._.
VII.-When_NNP he_PRP is_VBZ satisfied_JJ that_IN the_DT necessary_JJ measures_NNS have_VBP been_VBN taken_VBN for_IN the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT mails_NNS ,_, cargo_NN and_CC hold_NN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD allow_VB the_DT mails_NNS and_CC cargo_NN to_TO be_VB landed_VBN ,_, and_CC shall_MD by_IN writing_VBG under_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB delivered_VBN to_TO the_DT Commander_NNP ,_, permit_NN such_JJ vessel_NN to_TO haul_VB down_RP the_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO proceed_VB upwards_NNS in_IN the_DT port_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO hold_VB free_JJ communica-_JJ tion_NN with_IN the_DT shore_NN and_CC with_IN vessels_NNS and_CC boats_NNS in_IN port_NN ._.
VIII.-If_NNP the_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN allowed_VBN pratique_NN at_IN Singapore_NNP ,_, or_CC if_IN through_IN her_PRP$ not_RB carrying_VBG a_DT qualified_JJ Medical_JJ Officer_NNP ,_, or_CC for_IN other_JJ reasons_NNS ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP is_VBZ not_RB satisfied_VBN that_IN no_DT one_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG ,_, or_CC has_VBZ suffered_VBN ,_, during_IN the_DT voyage_NN ,_, from_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD direct_VB the_DT Commander_NNP to_TO take_VB the_DT vessel_NN to_TO the_DT quarantine_JJ anchorage_NN at_IN Mateeabrooj_NNP or_CC elsewhere_RB duly_RB appointed_VBN by_IN the_DT Port_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, and_CC there_RB to_TO remain_VB for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN eight_CD days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN arrival_NN in_IN harbour_NN ._.
The_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD also_RB direct_VB the_DT Commander_NNP to_TO prohibit_VB ,_, during_IN the_DT period_NN for_IN which_WDT the_DT vessel_NN remains_VBZ at_IN the_DT quarantine_JJ anchorage_NN as_IN aforesaid_NN ,_, all_DT communication_NN except_VBD such_JJ as_IN is_VBZ hereinafter_NN provided_VBN for_IN between_IN such_JJ vessel_NN and_CC the_DT shore_NN ,_, or_CC other_JJ vessels_NNS and_CC boats_NNS in_IN the_DT harbour_NN ._.

IX_NNP ._.
time_NN when_WRB the_DT vessel_NN arrives_VBZ in_IN the_DT harbour_NN ,_, that_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG ,_, or_CC during_IN the_DT voyage_NN has_VBZ suffered_VBN ,_, from_IN plague_NN ,_, or_CC if_IN during_IN the_DT time_NN the_DT ship_NN is_VBZ in_IN quarantine_NN at_IN Mateeabrooj_NNP under_IN Rule_NNP VIII_NNP ,_, any_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN breaks_VBZ out_RP ,_, he_PRP shall_MD direct_VB the_DT Commander_NNP to_TO take_VB the_DT vessel_NN to_TO the_DT quarantine_JJ anchorage_NN at_IN Diamond_NNP Harbour_NNP or_CC elsewhere_RB ,_, and_CC there_RB to_TO remain_VB for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT day_NN of_IN arrival_NN in_IN the_DT harbour_NN ;_: and_CC shall_MD further_RB direct_VB that_IN during_IN such_JJ fifteen_JJ days_NNS inter-_JJ course_NN between_IN the_DT vessel_NN detained_VBN under_IN this_DT rule_NN or_CC Rule_NNP III_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT shore_NN or_CC other_JJ vessels_NNS and_CC boats_NNS in_IN the_DT harbour_NN shall_MD be_VB prohibited_VBN as_IN provided_VBN in_IN Rule_NNP II_NNP ._.
X.-If_NN during_IN the_DT period_NN a_DT vessel_NN is_VBZ at_IN the_DT quarantine_JJ anchorage_NN aforesaid_VBD any_DT case_NN or_CC cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN should_MD occur_VB on_IN board_NN ,_, the_DT said_VBD vessel_JJ shall_MD remain_VB in_IN quarantine_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN occurring_VBG ,_, and_CC be_VB subject_JJ to_TO all_PDT the_DT prohibitions_NNS provided_VBD for_IN in_IN Rule_NNP IX_NNP ._.
XI.-When_JJ any_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ been_VBN placed_VBN in_IN quarantine_NN as_IN aforesaid_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD direct_VB the_DT removal_NN of_IN so_RB many_JJ of_IN the_DT passengers_NNS and_CC crew_NN as_RB may_MD not_RB be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN illness_NN ,_, and_CC whose_WP$ services_NNS may_MD not_RB be_VB required_VBN on_IN board_NN the_DT vessel_NN ,_, to_TO such_JJ particular_JJ spots_NNS as_IN may_MD from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN be_VB selected_VBN by_IN the_DT Port_NNP Officer_NNP as_IN places_NNS of_IN quaran-_JJ tine_NN ,_, there_EX to_TO remain_VB for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN eight_CD days_NNS if_IN under_IN Rule_NNP VIII_NNP ,_, or_CC if_IN the_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ been_VBN placed_VBN in_IN quarantine_NN for_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS ._.
If_IN a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN occurs_NNS among_IN such_JJ passengers_NNS and_CC crew_NN during_IN any_DT such_JJ period_NN ,_, they_PRP shall_MD remain_VB in_IN a_DT place_NN of_IN quaran-_JJ tine_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN of_IN such_JJ illness_NN ._.
XII.-It_NN will_MD be_VB the_DT duty_NN of_IN the_DT Port_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO facilitate_VB the_DT con-_JJ veyance_NN to_TO all_DT vessels_NNS in_IN quarantine_NN of_IN such_JJ supplies_NNS of_IN provisions_NNS ,_, stores_NNS and_CC other_JJ articles_NNS as_IN may_MD be_VB required_VBN by_IN those_DT on_IN board_NN ._.

In_IN exercise_NN of_IN the_DT power_NN conferred_VBN by_IN Act_NNP I_PRP of_IN 1870_CD ,_, the_DT follow-_JJ ing_NN rules_NNS for_IN quarantine_NN against_IN plague_NN have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN by_IN the_DT Gov-_NNP ernment_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, with_IN the_DT previous_JJ sanction_NN of_IN the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP ,_, in_IN modification_NN of_IN those_DT published_VBN in_IN Government_NNP Notification_NNP No_NNP ._.
2641_CD ,_, dated_VBD 16th_CD July_NNP 1894_CD :_: they_PRP have_VBP effect_NN in_IN the_DT ports_NNS of_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ,_, including_VBG Sind_NNP ,_, as_IN a_DT temporary_JJ measure_NN :_: -_: I.-The_JJ Commander_NNP of_IN every_DT vessel_NN ,_, including_VBG buggalows_NNS or_CC other_JJ native_JJ craft_NN arriving_VBG at_IN ports_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presi-_NNP dency_NN ,_, including_VBG Sind_NNP ,_, from_IN Hong-Kong_NNP and_CC Canton_NNP ,_, shall_MD ,_, before_IN entering_VBG the_DT harbour_NN ,_, hoist_VB a_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN (_( or_CC if_IN entering_VBG a_DT port_NN at_IN night_NN time_NN ,_, show_VBP whatever_WDT quarantine_JJ light_NN signals_NNS are_VBP customary_JJ in_IN the_DT port_NN )_) and_CC indicate_JJ by_IN signal_VBG the_DT port_NN from_IN which_WDT such_JJ vessel_NN has_VBZ come_VBN ,_, and_CC shall_MD keep_VB such_JJ flag_NN and_CC signals_NNS flying_VBG until_IN permitted_VBN to_TO take_VB them_PRP down_RP as_RB hereinafter_NN provided_VBD ._.
The_DT pilot_NN on_IN going_VBG alongside_IN a_DT vessel_NN from_IN Hong-Kong_NNP and_CC Canton_NNP shall_MD direct_VB the_DT flag_NN prescribed_VBN above_IN to_TO be_VB hoisted_VBN ,_, if_IN it_PRP has_VBZ not_RB already_RB been_VBN done_VBN ._.
II.-Such_JJ Commander_NNP shall_MD not_RB ,_, without_IN first_JJ having_VBG obtained_VBN permission_NN as_IN hereinafter_NN provided_VBN ,_, allow_VB any_DT communica-_JJ tion_NN ,_, except_IN orally_RB ,_, with_IN the_DT shore_NN or_CC any_DT other_JJ vessel_NN or_CC boat_NN ,_, excepting_VBG with_IN the_DT boat_NN supplying_VBG pilots_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN that_DT case_NN communication_NN shall_MD be_VB limited_VBN to_TO receiving_VBG on_IN board_NN the_DT pilot_NN ,_, his_PRP$ servant_NN and_CC baggage_NN ._.
III.-On_JJ any_DT such_JJ arrival_NN being_VBG signalled_VBN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Port_NNP shall_MD ,_, as_RB soon_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, go_VB alongside_IN the_DT vessel_NN and_CC ascertain_NN by_IN enquiry_NN from_IN the_DT Commander_NNP whether_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG ,_, or_CC has_VBZ during_IN the_DT voyage_NN suffered_VBD ,_, from_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP is_VBZ satisfied_VBN by_IN such_JJ enquiry_NNS that_IN no_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG ,_, or_CC during_IN the_DT voyage_NN has_VBZ suffered_VBN ,_, from_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN the_DT ship_NN carries_VBZ a_DT qualified_JJ Medical_JJ Officer_NNP quaran-_NN tine_NN shall_MD be_VB dispensed_VBN with_IN ,_, and_CC pratique_NN granted_VBN ._.

XI_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT vessel_NN does_VBZ not_RB carry_VB a_DT qualified_JJ Medical_JJ Officer_NNP ,_, he_PRP shall_MD direct_VB the_DT Commander_NNP to_TO take_VB the_DT vessel_NN to_TO the_DT quarantine_JJ anchorage_NN duly_RB appointed_VBN and_CC notified_VBN by_IN Government_NNP ,_, and_CC there_RB to_TO remain_VB for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN eight_CD clear_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN arrival_NN in_IN the_DT harbour_NN ._.
The_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD also_RB direct_VB the_DT Commander_NNP to_TO prohi-_JJ bit_NN ,_, during_IN the_DT period_NN for_IN which_WDT the_DT vessel_NN remains_VBZ at_IN the_DT quarantine_JJ anchorage_NN as_IN aforesaid_NN ,_, all_DT communication_NN ,_, except_VB such_JJ as_IN is_VBZ hereinafter_NN provided_VBN for_IN ,_, between_IN such_JJ vessel_NN and_CC the_DT shore_NN or_CC other_JJ vessels_NNS and_CC boats_NNS in_IN the_DT harbour_NN ._.
IV.-If_NNP the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, as_IN the_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT enquiry_NN made_VBN under_IN paragraph_NN III_NNP above_IN ,_, shall_MD have_VB reason_NN to_TO believe_VB at_IN the_DT time_NN when_WRB the_DT vessel_NN arrives_VBZ in_IN the_DT harbour_NN that_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG ,_, or_CC during_IN the_DT voyage_NN has_VBZ suffered_VBN ,_, from_IN plague_NN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD direct_VB the_DT Commander_NNP to_TO take_VB the_DT vessel_NN to_TO the_DT quarantine_JJ anchorage_NN as_IN aforesaid_NN ,_, and_CC there_RB to_TO remain_VB for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT day_NN of_IN arrival_NN in_IN the_DT harbour_NN :_: and_CC shall_MD further_RB direct_VB that_IN during_IN such_JJ fifteen_JJ days_NNS intercourse_VBP between_IN the_DT said_VBD vessel_NN and_CC the_DT shore_NN ,_, or_CC other_JJ vessels_NNS and_CC boats_NNS in_IN the_DT harbour_NN ,_, shall_MD be_VB prohibited_VBN ,_, as_IN provided_VBN in_IN Rule_NNP III_NNP ._.
V.-If_NNP during_IN the_DT period_NN a_DT vessel_NN is_VBZ at_IN the_DT quarantine_JJ anchorage_NN aforesaid_VBD any_DT case_NN or_CC cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN should_MD occur_VB on_IN board_NN ,_, the_DT said_VBD vessel_JJ shall_MD remain_VB in_IN quarantine_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN termination_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN either_RB by_IN death_NN ,_, recovery_NN or_CC removal_NN from_IN the_DT vessel_NN ,_, and_CC be_VB subject_JJ to_TO all_PDT the_DT prohibitions_NNS provided_VBD for_IN in_IN Rules_NNP III_NNP and_CC IV_NNP ._.

The_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD also_RB direct_VB the_DT Commander_NNP to_TO prohibit_VB ,_, during_IN the_DT period_NN for_IN which_WDT the_DT vessel_NN remains_VBZ at_IN the_DT quarantine_JJ anchorage_NN as_IN aforesaid_NN ,_, all_DT communication_NN except_VBD such_JJ as_IN is_VBZ hereinafter_NN provided_VBN for_IN ,_, between_IN such_JJ vessel_NN and_CC the_DT shore_NN or_CC other_JJ vessels_NNS and_CC boats_NNS in_IN the_DT harbour_NN ._.

V.-If_NNP during_IN the_DT period_NN a_DT vessel_NN is_VBZ at_IN the_DT quarantine_JJ anchorage_NN aforesaid_VBD any_DT case_NN or_CC cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN should_MD occur_VB on_IN board_NN ,_, the_DT said_VBD vessel_JJ shall_MD remain_VB in_IN quarantine_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN termination_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN either_RB by_IN death_NN ,_, recovery_NN or_CC removal_NN from_IN the_DT vessel_NN and_CC be_VB subject_JJ to_TO all_PDT the_DT prohibitions_NNS provided_VBD for_IN in_IN Rules_NNP III_NNP and_CC IV_NNP ._.
VI.-When_NNP any_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ been_VBN placed_VBN in_IN quarantine_NN as_IN afore-_NN said_VBD ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD direct_VB the_DT removal_NN of_IN so_RB many_JJ of_IN the_DT passengers_NNS and_CC crew_NN as_RB may_MD not_RB be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN illness_NN ,_, and_CC whose_WP$ services_NNS may_MD not_RB be_VB required_VBN on_IN board_NN the_DT vessel_NN ,_, to_TO such_JJ particular_JJ spots_NNS as_IN may_MD from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN be_VB selected_VBN by_IN the_DT Resident_NNP as_IN places_NNS of_IN quaran-_JJ tine_NN ,_, there_EX to_TO remain_VB for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN eight_CD days_NNS ,_, or_CC if_IN the_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ been_VBN placed_VBN in_IN quarantine_NN for_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS ,_, for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS ._.
If_IN a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN occurs_NNS among_IN such_JJ passengers_NNS and_CC crew_NN during_IN any_DT such_JJ period_NN ,_, they_PRP shall_MD remain_VB in_IN a_DT place_NN of_IN quarantine_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN of_IN such_JJ illness_NN ._.

Rules_NNS at_IN Aden_NNP against_IN Assyr_NNP ._.
Notification_NN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, Home_NNP Department_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
353_CD ,_, dated_VBN Simla_NNP ,_, the_DT 22nd_CD October_NNP 1896_CD ._.
The_DT following_JJ rules_NNS for_IN quarantine_NN against_IN plague_NN which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN by_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Government_NNP in_IN exercise_NN of_IN the_DT power_NN conferred_VBN by_IN section_NN 1_CD ,_, Act_NNP 1_CD of_IN 1870_CD ,_, with_IN the_DT previous_JJ sanction_NN of_IN the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP ,_, are_VBP published_VBN for_IN general_JJ information_NN ._.
The_DT rules_NNS have_VBP effect_NN from_IN the_DT 3rd_CD October_NNP 1896_CD ,_, as_IN a_DT temporary_JJ measure_NN in_IN the_DT Ports_NNS of_IN Aden_NNP ,_, Perim_NNP and_CC the_DT Somali_NNP Coast_NNP :_: -_: I.-The_JJ Commander_NNP of_IN every_DT vessel_NN ,_, including_VBG buggalows_NNS or_CC other_JJ native_JJ craft_NN ,_, arriving_VBG at_IN Aden_NNP ,_, Perim_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Somali_NNP Coast_NNP from_IN Assyr_NNP between_IN Lith_NNP and_CC Lohaya_NNP shall_MD ,_, before_IN entering_VBG the_DT harbour_NN ,_, hoist_VB a_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN (_( or_CC if_IN entering_VBG a_DT port_NN at_IN night_NN time_NN ,_, show_VBP whatever_WDT quarantine_JJ light_NN signals_NNS are_VBP customary_JJ in_IN the_DT port_NN )_) and_CC indicate_JJ by_IN signal_VBG the_DT port_NN from_IN which_WDT such_JJ vessel_NN has_VBZ come_VBN ,_, and_CC shall_MD keep_VB such_JJ flag_NN and_CC signals_NNS flying_VBG until_IN permitted_VBN to_TO take_VB them_PRP down_RP as_RB hereinafter_NN provided_VBD ._.
The_DT pilot_NN on_IN going_VBG alongside_IN a_DT vessel_NN from_IN Assyr_NNP between_IN Lith_NNP and_CC Lohaya_NNP shall_MD direct_VB the_DT flag_NN prescribed_VBN above_IN to_TO be_VB hoisted_VBN ,_, if_IN it_PRP has_VBZ not_RB already_RB been_VBN done_VBN ._.
II.-Such_JJ Commander_NNP shall_MD not_RB ,_, without_IN first_JJ having_VBG obtained_VBN permission_NN as_IN hereinafter_NN provided_VBN ,_, allow_VB any_DT communi-_JJ cation_NN ,_, except_IN orally_RB ,_, with_IN the_DT shore_NN or_CC any_DT other_JJ vessel_NN or_CC boat_NN ,_, excepting_VBG with_IN the_DT boat_NN supplying_VBG pilots_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN that_DT case_NN communication_NN shall_MD be_VB limited_VBN to_TO receiving_VBG on_IN board_NN the_DT pilot_NN ,_, his_PRP$ servant_NN and_CC baggage_NN ._.
III.-On_JJ any_DT such_JJ arrival_NN being_VBG signalled_VBN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT port_NN shall_MD ,_, as_IN soon_RB possible_JJ ,_, go_VB alongside_IN the_DT vessel_NN and_CC ascertain_NN by_IN enquiry_NN from_IN the_DT Commander_NNP whether_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG ,_, or_CC has_VBZ during_IN the_DT voyage_NN suffered_VBD from_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP is_VBZ satisfied_VBN by_IN such_JJ enquiry_NNS that_IN no_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG ,_, or_CC during_IN the_DT voyage_NN has_VBZ suffered_VBN ,_, from_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN the_DT ship_NN carries_VBZ a_DT qualified_JJ Medical_JJ Officer_NNP ,_, quaran-_JJ tine_NN shall_MD be_VB dispensed_VBN with_IN ,_, and_CC pratique_NN granted_VBN ._.

233_CD shall_MD be_VB limited_VBN to_TO receiving_VBG on_IN board_NN the_DT Pilot_NNP ,_, his_PRP$ Leads-_JJ man_NN ,_, servant_JJ and_CC baggage_NN ._.
III.-If_NNP there_EX is_VBZ any_DT case_NN of_IN sickness_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Pilot_NNP has_VBZ reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ plague_JJ ,_, he_PRP shall_MD telegraph_VB to_TO the_DT Port_NNP Officer_NNP from_IN Saugor_NNP ,_, and_CC not_RB proceed_VB beyond_IN Diamond_NNP Harbour_NNP without_IN the_DT permission_NN of_IN the_DT Port_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
IV.-If_NNP the_DT Pilot_NNP has_VBZ no_DT reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN there_EX is_VBZ any_DT one_CD suffering_NN from_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD bring_VB the_DT vessel_NN up_IN the_DT river_NN to_TO Mateeabrooj_NNP ,_, and_CC shall_MD anchor_VB it_PRP there_EX till_VBZ the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP has_VBZ visited_VBN it_PRP ._.
V.-The_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, as_RB soon_RB as_IN he_PRP has_VBZ received_VBN information_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN at_IN Mateeabrooj_NNP ,_, shall_MD visit_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC ascertain_NN by_IN enquiry_NN from_IN the_DT Commander_NNP or_CC the_DT Medical_JJ Officer_NNP on_IN board_NN ,_, or_CC other_JJ sources_NNS of_IN information_NN ,_, whether_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG or_CC has_VBZ suffered_VBN from_IN plague_NN ._.
VI.-If_NNP the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP is_VBZ satisfied_JJ that_IN no_DT one_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ,_, or_CC has_VBZ suffered_VBN from_IN plague_NN since_IN the_DT vessel_NN left_VBD Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC if_IN the_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ been_VBN allowed_VBN pratique_NN at_IN any_DT intermediate_JJ port_NN including_VBG Colombo_NNP ,_, he_PRP shall_MD allow_VB the_DT passengers_NNS to_TO land_VB ,_, but_CC shall_MD detain_VB the_DT vessel_NN at_IN Mateeabrooj_NNP till_NN such_JJ measures_NNS have_VBP been_VBN taken_VBN for_IN the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT mails_NNS and_CC cargo_NN and_CC hold_NN as_IN he_PRP may_MD consider_VB necessary_JJ ._.
VII.-When_NNP he_PRP is_VBZ satisfied_JJ that_IN the_DT necessary_JJ measures_NNS have_VBP been_VBN taken_VBN for_IN the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT mails_NNS ,_, cargo_NN and_CC hold_NN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD allow_VB the_DT mails_NNS and_CC cargo_NN to_TO be_VB landed_VBN ,_, and_CC shall_MD by_IN writing_VBG under_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB delivered_VBN to_TO the_DT Commander_NNP ,_, permit_NN such_JJ vessel_NN to_TO haul_VB down_RP the_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO proceed_VB upwards_NNS in_IN the_DT Port_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO hold_VB free_JJ communication_NN with_IN the_DT shore_NN and_CC with_IN vessels_NNS and_CC boats_NNS in_IN port_NN ._.
VIII.-If_NNP the_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN allowed_VBN pratique_NN at_IN Colombo_NNP or_CC other_JJ intermediate_JJ ports_NNS ,_, or_CC if_IN through_IN her_PRP$ not_RB carry-_JJ ing_VBG a_DT qualified_JJ Medical_JJ Officer_NNP ,_, or_CC for_IN other_JJ reasons_NNS ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP is_VBZ not_RB satisfied_VBN that_IN no_DT one_NN on_IN board_NN has_VBZ suffered_VBN during_IN the_DT voyage_NN from_IN plague_NN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD direct_VB the_DT Commander_NNP to_TO take_VB the_DT vessel_NN to_TO the_DT quarantine_JJ anchorage_NN at_IN Mateeabrooj_NNP or_CC elsewhere_RB duly_RB appointed_VBN by_IN the_DT Port_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, there_EX to_TO remain_VB for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN eight_CD days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN arrival_NN in_IN harbour_NN ._.

IX_NNP ._.

Rules_NNS at_IN Ran-_NNP goon_NN against_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
The_DT following_JJ rules_NNS for_IN quarantine_NN against_IN plague_NN which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN by_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP of_IN Burma_NNP in_IN exercise_NN of_IN the_DT power_NN conferred_VBN by_IN section_NN 1_CD ,_, Act_NNP I_PRP of_IN 1870_CD ,_, with_IN the_DT previous_JJ sanction_NN of_IN the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP ,_, are_VBP published_VBN for_IN general_JJ information_NN ,_, ?_. 236_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
The_DT rules_NNS have_VBP effect_NN from_IN the_DT 20th_CD October_NNP 1896_CD ,_, as_IN a_DT temporary_JJ measure_NN in_IN the_DT Port_NNP of_IN Rangoon_NNP :_: -_: I.-The_JJ Commander_NNP of_IN every_DT vessel_NN ,_, including_VBG junks_NNS or_CC other_JJ native_JJ craft_NN ,_, arriving_VBG from_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, shall_MD ,_, on_IN arrival_NN at_IN the_DT pilot_NN brig_NN hoist_NN a_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN and_CC indicate_NN by_IN signal_JJ the_DT port_NN from_IN which_WDT she_PRP has_VBZ come_VBN ._.
II.-Such_JJ Commander_NNP shall_MD not_RB ,_, except_IN as_IN hereinafter_NN provided_VBN ,_, allow_VB any_DT communication_NN either_RB with_IN the_DT shore_NN or_CC with_IN any_DT other_JJ vessel_NN or_CC boat_NN except_IN with_IN the_DT boat_NN supplying_VBG a_DT pilot_NN from_IN the_DT pilot_NN brig_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN that_DT case_NN communication_NN shall_MD be_VB limited_VBN to_TO receiving_VBG on_IN board_NN the_DT pilot_NN ,_, his_PRP$ servant_NN ,_, if_IN any_DT ,_, and_CC baggage_NN ._.
III.-The_JJ pilot_NN shall_MD not_RB take_VB such_JJ vessel_NN higher_JJR than_IN Elephant_JJ Point_NNP ,_, but_CC shall_MD anchor_VB it_PRP there_RB until_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Port_NNP has_VBZ visited_VBN it_PRP and_CC ascertained_VBN by_IN enquiry_NN from_IN the_DT Commander_NNP whether_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG ,_, or_CC has_VBZ during_IN the_DT voyage_NN suffered_VBD ,_, from_IN plague_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP is_VBZ satisfied_VBN by_IN such_JJ enquiry_NNS that_IN no_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG ,_, or_CC during_IN the_DT voyage_NN has_VBZ suffered_VBN ,_, from_IN plague_NN ,_, or_CC if_IN the_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ undergone_VBN since_IN leaving_VBG Bombay_NNP a_DT quarantine_NN which_WDT is_VBZ properly_RB proved_VBN for_IN not_RB less_JJR than_IN eight_CD days_NNS at_IN Colombo_NNP or_CC some_DT other_JJ British_JJ port_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD ,_, by_IN writing_VBG under_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN to_TO be_VB delivered_VBN to_TO the_DT Commander_NNP ,_, permit_NN such_JJ vessel_NN to_TO haul_VB down_RP the_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN and_CC proceed_VB upwards_NNS in_IN the_DT port_NN and_CC hold_VB free_JJ communication_NN with_IN the_DT shore_NN and_CC with_IN vessels_NNS and_CC boats_NNS in_IN port_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT ship_NN has_VBZ not_RB undergone_JJ eight_CD days_NNS quarantine_VBP at_IN Colombo_NNP or_CC some_DT other_JJ British_JJ port_NN since_IN leaving_VBG Bombay_NNP ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD direct_VB the_DT Commander_NNP to_TO take_VB the_DT vessel_NN to_TO the_DT quarantine_JJ anchor-_JJ age_NN and_CC there_RB to_TO remain_VB for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN eight_CD days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN arrival_NN in_IN the_DT harbour_NN ._.

spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
237_CD the_DT vessel_NN to_TO the_DT quarantine_JJ anchorage_NN as_IN aforesaid_NN and_CC there_RB to_TO remain_VB for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT day_NN of_IN arrival_NN in_IN the_DT harbour_NN ;_: and_CC shall_MD further_RB direct_VB that_IN during_IN such_JJ fifteen_JJ days_NNS '_POS intercourse_NN between_IN the_DT said_VBD vessel_NN and_CC the_DT shore_NN or_CC other_JJ vessels_NNS and_CC boats_NNS in_IN the_DT harbour_NN shall_MD be_VB prohibited_VBN as_IN provided_VBN in_IN Rule_NNP III_NNP ._.
V.-If_NNP during_IN the_DT period_NN a_DT vessel_NN is_VBZ at_IN the_DT quarantine_JJ anchorage_NN aforesaid_VBD any_DT case_NN or_CC cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN should_MD occur_VB on_IN board_NN ,_, the_DT said_VBD vessel_JJ shall_MD remain_VB in_IN quarantine_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN occurring_VBG ,_, and_CC be_VB subject_JJ to_TO all_PDT the_DT prohibitions_NNS provided_VBD for_IN in_IN Rules_NNP III_NNP and_CC IV_NNP ._.

VII.-Any_JJ mails_NNS or_CC cargo_NN which_WDT may_MD be_VB brought_VBN by_IN any_DT vessel_NNS so_IN arriving_VBG shall_MD be_VB landed_VBN under_IN such_JJ precautions_NNS as_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD deem_VB necessary_JJ to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.

369_CD ,_, dated_VBD 29th_CD October_NNP 1896_CD :_: -_: III.-The_NN pilot_NN shall_MD not_RB take_VB such_JJ vessel_NN higher_JJR than_IN Elephant_JJ Point_NNP ,_, but_CC shall_MD anchor_VB it_PRP there_RB until_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Port_NNP has_VBZ visited_VBN it_PRP and_CC ascertained_VBN by_IN enquiry_NN from_IN the_DT commander_NN whether_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG ,_, or_CC has_VBZ during_IN the_DT voyage_NN suffered_VBD ,_, from_IN plague_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP is_VBZ satisfied_VBN by_IN such_JJ enquiry_NNS that_IN no_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG ,_, or_CC during_IN the_DT voyage_NN has_VBZ suffered_VBN ,_, from_IN plague_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD ,_, by_IN writing_VBG under_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN to_TO be_VB delivered_VBN to_TO the_DT commander_NN ,_, permit_NN such_JJ vessel_NN to_TO haul_VB down_RP the_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN and_CC proceed_VB upwards_NNS in_IN the_DT port_NN and_CC hold_VB free_JJ communication_NN with_IN the_DT shore_NN and_CC with_IN vessels_NNS and_CC boats_NNS in_IN port_NN ._.

Rules_NNS at_IN Madras_NNP against_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
THE_DT following_JJ rules_NNS for_IN quarantine_NN against_IN plague_NN ,_, which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN by_IN the_DT Madras_NNP Government_NNP in_IN exercise_NN of_IN the_DT power_NN con-_NN ferred_VBN by_IN section_NN 1_CD ,_, Act_NNP I_PRP of_IN 1870_CD ,_, with_IN the_DT previous_JJ sanction_NN of_IN the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP ,_, are_VBP published_VBN for_IN general_JJ information_NN ._.
The_DT rules_NNS have_VBP effect_NN from_IN the_DT 28th_CD October_NNP 1896_CD as_IN a_DT temporary_JJ measure_NN at_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN Madras_NNS :_: -_: I.-The_JJ Commander_NNP of_IN every_DT vessel_NN arriving_VBG from_IN Bombay_NNP shall_MD ,_, before_IN entering_VBG the_DT port_NN ,_, indicate_VB his_PRP$ arrival_NN by_IN signal_NN ._.
II.-Such_JJ Commander_NNP shall_MD not_RB ,_, except_IN as_IN hereinafter_NN provided_VBN ,_, allow_VB any_DT communication_NN ,_, either_RB with_IN the_DT pilot_NN boat_NN ,_, except_IN orally_RB or_CC with_IN the_DT shore_NN ,_, or_CC with_IN any_DT other_JJ vessel_NN or_CC boat_NN in_IN the_DT port_NN ._.
III.-Immediately_RB on_IN any_DT such_JJ arrival_NN being_VBG signalled_VBN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP (_( or_CC other_JJ Medical_NNP )_) Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT port_NN shall_MD go_VB alongside_IN the_DT vessel_NN and_CC ascertain_NN by_IN enquiry_NN from_IN the_DT Commander_NNP whether_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG ,_, or_CC has_VBZ during_IN the_DT voyage_NN suffered_VBD ,_, from_IN plague_NN ._.
If_IN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, pratique_NN may_MD be_VB granted_VBN at_IN the_DT discretion_NN of_IN the_DT Helth_NNP Officer_NNP whether_IN the_DT vessel_NN carries_VBZ a_DT qualified_JJ Medical_JJ Officer_NNP or_CC not_RB ._.
Pratique_NNP granted_VBD at_IN Colombo_NNP will_MD be_VB recognised_VBN ._.
IV.-If_NNP the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD have_VB reason_NN to_TO believe_VB at_IN the_DT time_NN when_WRB the_DT vessel_NN arrives_VBZ in_IN the_DT port_NN that_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffer-_JJ ing_NN ,_, or_CC during_IN the_DT voyage_NN has_VBZ suffered_VBN ,_, from_IN plague_NN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD direct_VB the_DT Commander_NNP to_TO take_VB the_DT vessel_NN to_TO the_DT quarantine_NN anchorage_NN ,_, and_CC there_RB to_TO remain_VB for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT day_NN of_IN arrival_NN in_IN the_DT port_NN ;_: and_CC shall_MD further_RB direct_VB that_IN ,_, during_IN such_JJ fifteen_JJ days_NNS '_POS intercourse_NN between_IN the_DT said_VBD vessel_NN and_CC the_DT shore_NN or_CC other_JJ vessels_NNS and_CC boats_NNS in_IN the_DT harbour_NN shall_MD be_VB prohibited_VBN ._.

V.-If_NNP ,_, during_IN the_DT period_NN a_DT vessel_NN is_VBZ at_IN the_DT quarantine_JJ anchorage_NN aforesaid_NN ,_, any_DT case_NN or_CC cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN should_MD occur_VB on_IN board_NN ,_, the_DT said_VBD vessel_JJ shall_MD remain_VB in_IN quarantine_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN occurring_VBG ,_, and_CC be_VB subject_JJ to_TO all_PDT the_DT prohibitions_NNS provided_VBD for_IN in_IN rule_NN IV_NNP ._.

243_CD hoist_NN a_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN ,_, and_CC indicate_NN by_IN signal_JJ the_DT port_NN from_IN which_WDT she_PRP has_VBZ come_VBN ,_, and_CC shall_MD keep_VB such_JJ flag_NN and_CC signal_JJ flying_VBG until_IN permitted_VBN to_TO take_VB it_PRP down_RP as_IN hereinafter_NN provided_VBD ._.
The_DT pilot_NN on_IN going_VBG alongside_IN a_DT vessel_NN from_IN Karachi_NNP shall_MD direct_VB the_DT flag_NN prescribed_VBN above_IN to_TO be_VB hoisted_VBN if_IN it_PRP has_VBZ not_RB already_RB been_VBN done_VBN ._.
*_JJ N.B.-Pilatage_NN is_VBZ commpulsory_JJ for_IN all_DT vessels_NNS over_IN 100_CD tons_NNS in_IN the_DT Port_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP ._.
II.-The_JJ Commander_NNP shall_MD not_RB ,_, without_IN first_JJ having_VBG obtained_VBN permis-_JJ sion_NN as_IN hereinafter_NN provided_VBN ,_, allow_VB any_DT communication_NN except_IN orally_RB with_IN the_DT shore_NN or_CC any_DT other_JJ vessel_NN or_CC boat_NN ,_, excepting_VBG only_RB with_IN the_DT boat_NN supplying_VBG the_DT Pilots*_NNP from_IN the_DT Pilot_NNP Brig_NNP and_CC in_IN that_DT case_NN communication_NN shall_MD be_VB limited_VBN to_TO receiving_VBG on_IN board_NN the_DT Pilot_NNP ,_, his_PRP$ Leadsman_NNP ,_, servant_NN and_CC baggage_NN ._.
III.-If_NNP there_EX is_VBZ any_DT case_NN of_IN sickness_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Pilot_NNP has_VBZ reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ plague_JJ ,_, he_PRP shall_MD telegraph_VB to_TO the_DT Port_NNP Officer_NNP from_IN Saugor_NNP ,_, and_CC not_RB proceed_VB beyond_IN Diamond_NNP Harbour_NNP without_IN the_DT permission_NN of_IN the_DT Port_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
IV.-If_NNP the_DT Pilot_NNP has_VBZ no_DT reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN there_EX is_VBZ any_DT one_CD suffering_NN from_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD bring_VB the_DT vessel_NN up_IN the_DT river_NN to_TO Mateeabrooj_NNP ,_, and_CC shall_MD anchor_VB it_PRP there_EX till_VBZ the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP has_VBZ visited_VBN it_PRP ,_, V.-The_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, as_RB soon_RB as_IN he_PRP has_VBZ received_VBN information_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN at_IN Mateeabrooj_NNP ,_, shall_MD visit_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC ascertain_NN by_IN enquiry_NN from_IN the_DT Commander_NNP or_CC the_DT Medical_JJ Officer_NNP on_IN board_NN ,_, or_CC other_JJ sources_NNS of_IN information_NN ,_, whether_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG or_CC has_VBZ suffered_VBN from_IN plague_NN ._.
VI.-If_NNP the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP is_VBZ satisfied_JJ that_IN no_DT one_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ,_, or_CC has_VBZ suffered_VBN from_IN plague_NN since_IN the_DT vessel_NN left_VBD Karachi_NNP ,_, and_CC if_IN the_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ been_VBN allowed_VBN pratique_NN at_IN any_DT intermediate_JJ port_NN including_VBG Colombo_NNP ,_, he_PRP shall_MD allow_VB the_DT passengers_NNS to_TO land_VB ,_, but_CC shall_MD detain_VB the_DT vessel_NN at_IN Mateeabrooj_NNP ,_, till_NN such_JJ measures_NNS have_VBP been_VBN taken_VBN for_IN the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT mails_NNS and_CC cargo_NN and_CC hold_NN as_IN he_PRP may_MD consider_VB necessary_JJ ._.
VII.-When_NNP he_PRP is_VBZ satisfied_JJ that_IN the_DT necessary_JJ measures_NNS have_VBP been_VBN taken_VBN for_IN the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT mails_NNS ,_, cargo_NN and_CC hold_NN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD allow_VB the_DT mails_NNS and_CC cargo_NN to_TO be_VB landed_VBN ,_, and_CC shall_MD by_IN writing_VBG under_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB delivered_VBN to_TO the_DT Commander_NNP ,_, permit_NN such_JJ vessel_NN to_TO haul_VB down_RP the_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO proceed_VB upwards_NNS in_IN the_DT Port_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO hold_VB free_JJ communication_NN with_IN the_DT shore_NN and_CC with_IN vessels_NNS and_CC boats_NNS in_IN Port_NNP ._.

IX_NNP ._.
shall_MD direct_VB the_DT Commander_NNP to_TO take_VB the_DT vessel_NN to_TO the_DT quarantine_JJ anchorage_NN at_IN Mateeabrooj_NNP or_CC elsewhere_RB duly_RB appointed_VBN by_IN the_DT Port_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, there_EX to_TO remain_VB for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN eight_CD days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN arrival_NN in_IN harbour_NN ._.

Rules_NNS at_IN Rangoon_NNP against_IN Karachi_NNP ._.
The_DT following_JJ rules_NNS for_IN quarantine_NN against_IN plague_NN which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN by_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Commissioner_NNP of_IN Burma_NNP in_IN exercise_NN of_IN the_DT power_NN conferred_VBN by_IN section_NN 1_CD ,_, Act_NNP I_PRP of_IN 1870_CD ,_, with_IN the_DT previous_JJ sanction_NN of_IN the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP ,_, are_VBP published_VBN for_IN general_JJ inform-_JJ ation_NN ._.
The_DT rules_NNS have_VBP effect_NN from_IN the_DT 1st_CD January_NNP 1897_CD as_IN a_DT temporary_JJ measure_NN at_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN Rangoon_NN :_: -_: I.-The_JJ commander_NN of_IN every_DT vessel_NN ,_, including_VBG junks_NNS or_CC other_JJ native_JJ craft_NN ,_, arriving_VBG from_IN Karachi_NNP ,_, shall_MD ,_, on_IN arrival_NN at_IN the_DT pilot_NN brig_NN ,_, hoist_VB a_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN and_CC indicate_NN by_IN signal_JJ the_DT port_NN from_IN which_WDT she_PRP has_VBZ come_VBN ._.
II.-Such_JJ commander_NN shall_MD not_RB ,_, except_IN as_IN hereinafter_NN provided_VBN ,_, allow_VB any_DT communication_NN either_RB with_IN the_DT shore_NN or_CC with_IN any_DT other_JJ vessel_NN or_CC boat_NN except_IN with_IN the_DT boat_NN supplying_VBG a_DT pilot_NN from_IN the_DT pilot_NN brig_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN that_DT case_NN communi-_JJ cation_NN shall_MD be_VB limited_VBN to_TO receiving_VBG on_IN board_NN the_DT pilot_NN ,_, his_PRP$ servant_NN ,_, if_IN any_DT ,_, and_CC baggage_NN ._.
III.-The_JJ pilot_NN shall_MD not_RB take_VB such_JJ vessel_NN higher_JJR than_IN Elephant_JJ Point_NNP ,_, but_CC shall_MD anchor_VB it_PRP there_RB until_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Port_NNP has_VBZ visited_VBN it_PRP and_CC ascertained_VBN by_IN inquiry_NN from_IN the_DT commander_NN whether_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG ,_, or_CC has_VBZ during_IN the_DT voyage_NN suffered_VBD ,_, from_IN plague_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP is_VBZ satisfied_VBN by_IN such_JJ enquiry_NNS that_IN no_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG ,_, or_CC during_IN the_DT voyage_NN has_VBZ suffered_VBN ,_, from_IN plague_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD ,_, by_IN writing_VBG under_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN to_TO be_VB delivered_VBN to_TO the_DT commander_NN ,_, permit_NN such_JJ vessel_NN to_TO haul_VB down_RP the_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN and_CC proceed_VB upwards_NNS in_IN the_DT port_NN and_CC hold_VB free_JJ communication_NN with_IN the_DT shore_NN and_CC with_IN vessels_NNS and_CC boats_NNS in_IN port_NN ._.
Provided_VBD that_IN ,_, if_IN the_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ under-_JJ gone_VBN since_IN leaving_VBG Karachi_NNP a_DT quarantine_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ pro-_JJ perly_RB proved_VBN ,_, for_IN not_RB less_JJR than_IN eight_CD days_NNS at_IN Colombo_NNP ,_, or_CC some_DT other_JJ British_JJ port_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD grant_VB such_JJ permission_NN as_IN aforesaid_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ not_RB undergone_JJ eight_CD days_NNS '_POS quarantine_NN at_IN Colombo_NNP or_CC some_DT other_JJ British_JJ port_NN since_IN leaving_VBG Karachi_NNP ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD direct_VB the_DT commander_NN to_TO take_VB the_DT vessel_NN to_TO the_DT quaran-_JJ tine_NN anchorage_NN and_CC there_RB to_TO remain_VB for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN eight_CD days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN arrival_NN in_IN the_DT harbour_NN ._.
In_IN such_JJ case_NN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD also_RB direct_VB the_DT commander_NN to_TO prohibit_VB ,_, during_IN the_DT period_NN for_IN which_WDT the_DT vessel_NN remains_VBZ at_IN the_DT quarantine_JJ anchorage_NN as_IN aforesaid_NN ?_. 246_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.

all_DT communication_NN ,_, except_VB such_JJ as_IN is_VBZ hereinafter_NN provided_VBN for_IN between_IN such_JJ vessel_NN and_CC the_DT shore_NN ,_, or_CC other_JJ vessels_NNS and_CC boats_NNS in_IN the_DT har-_JJ bour_NN ._.

Resolution_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.

His_PRP$ Excellency_NN the_DT Governor_NNP in_IN Council_NNP is_VBZ pleased_VBN to_TO make_VB the_DT following_JJ rules_NNS under_IN Act_NNP III_NNP of_IN 1897_CD ,_, and_CC to_TO publish_VB them_PRP for_IN general_JJ information_NN :_: -_: The_DT Bombay_NNP Plague_NNP Committee_NNP is_VBZ hereby_RB authorized_VBN to_TO appoint_VB persons_NNS as_IN plague_NN authorities_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.
Such_JJ plague_NN authorities_NNS are_VBP hereby_RB empowered_VBN to_TO medically_RB inspect_JJ persons_NNS coming_VBG to_TO Bombay_NNP Island_NNP by_IN sea_NN ,_, by_IN vessels_NNS ,_, includ-_JJ ing_VBG native_JJ craft_NN ,_, which_WDT have_VBP touched_VBN at_IN any_DT port_NN in_IN India_NNP between_IN Bhatkal_NNP and_CC a_DT line_NN ten_JJ miles_NNS north_RB of_IN Karachi_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO detain_VB or_CC send_VB for_IN detention_NN to_TO such_JJ hospitals_NNS or_CC other_JJ places_NNS as_IN may_MD be_VB appointed_VBN by_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Plague_NNP Committee_NNP for_IN the_DT purpose_NN any_DT persons_NNS whom_WP they_PRP find_VBP or_CC suspect_VBP to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT Master_NN of_IN every_DT vessel_NN ,_, including_VBG buggalows_NNS and_CC every_DT kind_NN of_IN native_JJ craft_NN arriving_VBG at_IN the_DT Port_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP from_IN or_CC having_VBG had_VBN communication_NN with_IN any_DT place_NN on_IN the_DT West_NNP Coast_NNP of_IN India_NNP between_IN Bhatkal_NNP and_CC a_DT line_NN ten_JJ miles_NNS north_RB of_IN Karachi_NNP ,_, on_IN board_NN of_IN which_WDT there_EX is_VBZ ,_, or_CC has_VBZ been_VBN during_IN the_DT voyage_NN from_IN which_WDT she_PRP is_VBZ arriving_VBG or_CC has_VBZ last_JJ arrived_VBN ,_, either_RB among_IN the_DT passengers_NNS or_CC crew_NN ,_, any_DT case_NN or_CC suspicious_JJ case_NN of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, or_CC if_IN one_CD or_CC more_JJR deaths_NNS from_IN any_DT cause_NN whatever_WDT shall_MD have_VB occurred_VBN on_IN board_NN on_IN the_DT said_VBD voyage_NN ,_, shall_MD report_VB the_DT same_JJ at_IN the_DT earliest_JJS possible_JJ moment_NN by_IN signal_NN to_TO the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Port_NNP or_CC through_IN the_DT Pilot_NNP or_CC Water_NNP Police_NNP ._.
4_CD ._.
If_IN the_DT vessel_NN is_VBZ coming_VBG into_IN port_NN ,_, the_DT Master_NNP shall_MD report_VB such_JJ cases_NNS to_TO the_DT Pilot_NNP or_CC other_JJ boarding_VBG officers_NNS at_IN the_DT earliest_JJS possible_JJ opportunity_NN ,_, or_CC if_IN she_PRP be_VB not_RB boarded_VBN ,_, or_CC is_VBZ already_RB at_IN anchor_NN within_IN port_NN limits_NNS ,_, shall_MD hoist_VB a_DT signal_NN ,_, which_WDT shall_MD be_VB ,_, during_IN the_DT day_NN ,_, the_DT flag_NN R_NNP of_IN the_DT Commercial_NNP Code_NNP at_IN the_DT main_JJ ,_, and_CC during_IN the_DT night_NN ,_, at_IN the_DT same_JJ place_NN ,_, 3_CD lights_NNS ,_, namely_RB ,_, red_JJ ,_, white_JJ and_CC red_JJ ,_, and_CC shall_MD also_RB verbally_RB by_IN an_DT officer_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN writing_NN ,_, inform_VB the_DT officer_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT ?_. 284_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.

5_CD ._.
Pending_VBG the_DT arrival_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Port_NNP ,_, the_DT Master_NNP shall_MD anchor_VB in_IN the_DT stream_NN ,_, and_CC shall_MD not_RB permit_VB the_DT departure_NN or_CC landing_NN of_IN any_DT of_IN his_PRP$ crew_NN or_CC passengers_NNS until_IN permitted_VBN to_TO do_VB so_RB by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Port_NNP ._.
6_CD ._.
The_DT Masters_NNP of_IN vessels_NNS to_TO which_WDT rule_NN 3_CD is_VBZ applicable_JJ and_CC the_DT Masters_NNS of_IN all_DT vessels_NNS arriving_VBG from_IN the_DT ports_NNS or_CC places_NNS inside_IN the_DT limits_NNS prescribed_VBN in_IN rule_NN 3_CD shall_MD only_RB permit_VB the_DT disembarkation_NN of_IN their_PRP$ crews_NNS and_CC passengers_NNS between_IN the_DT hours_NNS of_IN 6_CD A.M._NNP and_CC 6_CD P.M._NNP '_POS and_CC at_IN such_JJ bandars_NNS or_CC places_NNS as_IN may_MD be_VB directed_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Port_NNP ._.

RESOLUTION.-Under_NNP Act_NNP III_NNP of_IN 1897_CD the_DT Governor_NNP in_IN Council_NNP is_VBZ pleased_VBN to_TO prescribe_VB the_DT following_JJ rules_NNS and_CC to_TO authorise_VB the_DT Commissioners_NNP of_IN Divisions_NNP to_TO apply_VB them_PRP ,_, as_IN a_DT temporary_JJ measure_NN ,_, to_TO any_DT ports_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ,_, reporting_VBG to_TO Government_NNP from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN the_DT ports_NNS to_TO which_WDT he_PRP has_VBZ applied_VBN them_PRP :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) Any_DT vessel_NN ,_, except_IN ferry_JJ boats_NNS (_( to_TO which_WDT the_DT rules_NNS of_IN Govern-_NNP ment_NN Resolution_NNP No_NNP ._.
883-351-P._JJ ,_, dated_VBD 17th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ,_, apply_RB )_) arriving_VBG at_IN a_DT port_NN ,_, shall_MD anchor_VB at_IN a_DT place_NN fixed_VBN for_IN such_JJ purpose_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT passengers_NNS and_CC crew_VB shall_MD be_VB examined_VBN before_IN she_PRP is_VBZ granted_VBN entry_NN inwards_NNS and_CC is_VBZ allowed_VBN to_TO land_VB passengers_NNS or_CC cargo_NN ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) If_IN any_DT of_IN the_DT passengers_NNS or_CC crew_NNS are_VBP found_VBN by_IN the_DT plague_NN authority_NN to_TO be_VB plague-stricken_JJ ,_, the_DT patient_NN or_CC patients_NNS shall_MD be_VB removed_VBN to_TO the_DT nearest_JJS segregated_JJ hospital_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT vessel_NN shall_MD be_VB made_VBN to_TO proceed_VB to_TO the_DT place_NN set_VBN apart_RB for_IN the_DT anchorage_NN of_IN such_JJ vessel_NN ._.
Such_JJ vessels_NNS shall_MD not_RB communicate_VB with_IN the_DT shore_NN or_CC land_NN or_CC receive_VB cargo_NN for_IN the_DT period_NN of_IN eight_CD days_NNS ._.
Provisions_NNS ,_, etc._NN ,_, shall_MD be_VB sent_VBN to_TO her_PRP$ under_IN directions_NNS from_IN the_DT Port_NNP Officer_NNP or_CC other_JJ officer_NN appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN by_IN the_DT Commissioner_NNP of_IN the_DT Division_NNP and_CC shall_MD be_VB passed_VBN up_RP the_DT side_NN in_IN receptacles_NNS which_WDT shall_MD not_RB be_VB received_VBN back_RB ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) If_IN no_DT further_JJ plague_NN case_NN occurs_VBZ on_IN board_NN during_IN such_JJ period_NN of_IN eight_CD days_NNS ,_, she_PRP may_MD receive_VB pratique_NN ._.
If_IN other_JJ cases_NNS occur_VBP ,_, the_DT course_NN directed_VBN in_IN Rule_NNP (_( 2_CD )_) shall_MD be_VB followed_VBN for_IN a_DT further_JJ period_NN of_IN eight_CD days_NNS respectively_RB ._.
The_DT vessel_NN shall_MD not_RB receive_VB pratique_NN ,_, or_CC communicate_NN with_IN the_DT shore_NN or_CC receive_VB cargo_NN or_CC receive_JJ provisions_NNS otherwise_RB than_IN as_RB directed_VBN in_IN Rule_NNP (_( 2_CD )_) until_IN after_IN the_DT lapse_NN of_IN eight_CD days_NNS from_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN ._.

IX_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
249_CD (_( 4_CD )_) If_IN a_DT vessel_NN arrives_VBZ with_IN a_DT case_NN of_IN simple_JJ fever_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, the_DT above_IN rules-shall_NN apply_NN to_TO her_PRP$ ,_, but_CC the_DT detention_NN shall_MD be_VB for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN four_CD days_NNS ,_, subsequent_NN to_TO which_WDT ,_, if_IN no_DT plague_NN cases_NNS develope_VBP ,_, she_PRP may_MD be_VB granted_VBN entry_NN inwards_NNS ._.
(_( 5_CD )_) If_IN a_DT place_NN on_IN shore_NN suitable_JJ for_IN the_DT segregated_JJ accommodation_NN of_IN passengers_NNS is_VBZ available_JJ ,_, the_DT passengers_NNS from_IN vessels_NNS treated_VBN as_IN above_NN may_MD be_VB removed_VBN to_TO the_DT same_JJ and_CC placed_VBD there_EX under_IN observa-_JJ tion_NN instead_RB of_IN being_VBG detained_VBN on_IN board_NN ._.
(_( 6_CD )_) Cargo_NNP unloaded_VBD from_IN vessels_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN quarantined_VBN on_IN account_NN of_IN ascertained_JJ or_CC suspected_VBN plague_NN on_IN board_NN shall_MD be_VB removed_VBN by_IN the_DT consignee_NN to_TO a_DT place_NN set_VBN apart_RB for_IN the_DT purpose_NN and_CC exposed_VBN to_TO the_DT sun_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN three_CD days_NNS ,_, or_CC in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN cargo_NN which_WDT may_MD have_VB become_VBN damp_JJ until_IN such_JJ further_JJ period_NN as_IN may_MD be_VB necessary_JJ to_TO thoroughly_VB dry_JJ it_PRP ,_, after_IN which_WDT it_PRP may_MD be_VB taken_VBN possession_NN of_IN by_IN the_DT consignee_NN ._.
(_( 7_CD )_) Bedding_NNP ,_, rags_NN ,_, etc._FW ,_, may_MD not_RB be_VB landed_VBN from_IN vessels_NNS aforesaid_VBN and_CC if_IN landed_VBN shall_MD be_VB destroyed_VBN ._.
(_( 8_CD )_) Piece-goods_NNS and_CC other_JJ articles_NNS liable_JJ to_TO carry_VB infection_NN brought_VBN by_IN vessels_NNS aforesaid_VBN shall_MD be_VB fumigated_VBN or_CC otherwise_RB disinfected_VBN before_IN being_VBG carried_VBN away_RB by_IN the_DT consignee_NN ._.
(_( 9_CD )_) Any_DT grain_NN brought_VBD to_TO the_DT port_NN and_CC landed_VBD from_IN any_DT vessel_NN and_CC found_VBN by_IN a_DT Magistrate_NNP to_TO be_VB unfit_JJ for_IN human_JJ consumption_NN shall_MD be_VB destroyed_VBN ._.
(_( 10_CD )_) Any_DT port_NN may_MD be_VB declared_VBN to_TO be_VB an_DT infected_JJ port_NN by_IN the_DT District_NNP Magistrate_NNP ._.
Vessels_NNS arriving_VBG from_IN such_JJ ports_NNS ,_, even_RB if_IN no_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN on_IN board_NN ,_, shall_MD not_RB be_VB granted_VBN entry_NN inwards_NNS unless_IN or_CC until_IN eight_CD clear_JJ days_NNS have_VBP elapsed_VBN from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN her_PRP$ departure_NN from_IN the_DT aforesaid_NN port_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT vessel_NN arrives_VBZ before_IN the_DT expiry_NN of_IN such_JJ eight_CD days_NNS ,_, she_PRP shall_MD remain_VB at_IN the_DT anchorage_NN fixed_VBN for_IN such_JJ vessels_NNS until_IN such_JJ eight_CD days_NNS have_VBP elapsed_VBN ,_, subject_JJ to_TO the_DT condi-_JJ tions_NNS laid_VBD down_RB in_IN Rules_NNP 2_CD ,_, 5_CD ,_, and_CC 6_CD ,_, after_IN which_WDT ,_, if_IN no_DT plague_NN case_NN is_VBZ discovered_VBN on_IN board_NN ,_, she_PRP shall_MD obtain_VB pratique_NN ._.

(_( 3_CD )_) After_IN the_DT master_NN or_CC person_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ obtained_VBN any_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN or_CC certificate_NN under_IN the_DT provisions_NNS of_IN the_DT rules_NNS no_DT person_NN or_CC cargo_VB shall_MD be_VB admitted_VBN or_CC taken_VBN on_IN board_NN such_JJ vessel_NN before_IN she_PRP leaves_VBZ the_DT Port_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, unless_IN such_JJ vessel_NN is_VBZ again_RB inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT port_NN ,_, and_CC another_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN or_CC certificate_NN obtained_VBN from_IN such_JJ officer_NN by_IN the_DT master_NN or_CC person_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN such_JJ vessel_NN ._.

202_CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 4th_CD instant_NN ,_, the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP of_IN Bengal_NNP is_VBZ pleased_VBN to_TO prescribe_VB the_DT following_JJ regulations_NNS for_IN the_DT inspection_NN of_IN ships_NNS or_CC vessels_NNS leaving_VBG the_DT Port_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT detention_NN thereof_NN ,_, or_CC of_IN persons_NNS intending_VBG to_TO sail_VB therein_NN :_: -_: 1_CD ._.
Before_IN leaving_VBG the_DT port_NN all_DT vessels_NNS ,_, including_VBG buggalows_NNS and_CC other_JJ native_JJ crafts_NNS ,_, shall_MD be_VB inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, who_WP ,_, if_IN he_PRP finds_VBZ no_DT reason_NN for_IN suspecting_VBG that_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ infected_VBN with_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, shall_MD deliver_VB to_TO the_DT master_NN a_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN in_IN the_DT form_NN annexed_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
If_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG from_IN ,_, or_CC is_VBZ suspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO be_VB infected_VBN with_IN ,_, bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD order_NN the_DT vessel_NN to_TO be_VB detained_VBN for_IN not_RB less_JJR than_IN seven_CD days_NNS at_IN the_DT quarantine_JJ anchorage_NN appointed_VBN by_IN the_DT Port_NNP Officer_NNP and_CC to_TO be_VB thoroughly_RB disinfected_VBN before_IN departure_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN cause_VB any_DT person_NN suffering_VBG from_IN the_DT plague_NN to_TO be_VB removed_VBN to_TO a_DT plague_NN hospital_NN ,_, and_CC any_DT person_NN suspected_VBN of_IN being_VBG infected_VBN to_TO be_VB kept_VBN under_IN observation_NN for_IN not_RB less_JJR than_IN seven_CD days_NNS in_IN the_DT place_NN appointed_VBN for_IN this_DT purpose_NN by_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Board_NNP ._.
4_CD ._.
If_IN during_IN the_DT period_NN of_IN detention_NN no_DT fresh_JJ case_NN occurs_VBZ on_IN the_DT vessel_NN and_CC no_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN shows_VBZ suspicious_JJ symptoms_NNS ,_, the_DT vessel_NN may_MD be_VB permitted_VBN to_TO proceed_VB ;_: and_CC if_IN during_IN the_DT same_JJ period_NN the_DT persons_NNS detained_VBN under_IN observation_NN are_VBP proved_VBN not_RB to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN or_CC any_DT other_JJ infectious_JJ disease_NN ,_, they_PRP may_MD continue_VB their_PRP$ voyage_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
No_DT pilgrim_NN or_CC other_JJ native_JJ passenger_NN shall_MD leave_VB the_DT Port_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP for_IN any_DT port_NN in_IN the_DT Red_NNP Sea_NNP unless_IN he_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN under_IN continuous_JJ medical_JJ observation_NN for_IN at_IN least_JJS seven_CD days_NNS in_IN a_DT place_NN appoint-_JJ ed_NN by_IN the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP for_IN that_DT purpose_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ pronounced_VBN free_JJ from_IN infection_NN before_IN departure_NN by_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN such_JJ place_NN ._.

Should_MD the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Port_NNP be_VB of_IN opinion_NN that_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN of_IN any_DT vessel_NN so_RB inspected_JJ is_VBZ suffering_VBG from_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN or_CC is_VBZ not_RB free_JJ from_IN the_DT infection_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD refuse_VB to_TO give_VB a_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN as_IN aforesaid_NN unless_IN and_CC until_IN such_JJ person_NN and_CC his_PRP$ relations_NNS and_CC non-medical_JJ attendants_NNS are_VBP removed_VBN from_IN the_DT vessel_NN to_TO a_DT plague_JJ hospital_NN or_CC place_NN of_IN observation_NN appointed_VBN by_IN Government_NNP ,_, and_CC such_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT vessel_NN as_IN have_VBP been_VBN frequented_VBN by_IN such_JJ person_NN or_CC his_PRP$ relations_NNS and_CC attendants_NNS shall_MD have_VB been_VBN dis-_JJ infected_VBN to_TO the_DT satisfaction_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
If_IN the_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ no_DT medical_JJ officer_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD order_NN her_PRP$ to_TO be_VB detained_VBN for_IN not_RB less_JJR than_IN ten_JJ days_NNS at_IN the_DT quarantine_JJ anchorage_NN appointed_VBN by_IN the_DT Port_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO be_VB thoroughly_RB disinfected_VBN before_IN departure_NN ._.
If_IN during_IN the_DT period_NN of_IN detention_NN no_DT fresh_JJ case_NN occurs_VBZ on_IN the_DT vessel_NN and_CC no_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN shows_VBZ suspicious_JJ symptoms_NNS ,_, the_DT vessel_NN maybe_RB permitted_VBD to_TO proceed_VB ,_, and_CC if_IN during_IN the_DT same_JJ period_NN the_DT persons_NNS detained_VBN under_IN observation_NN are_VBP proved_VBN not_RB to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN or_CC any_DT other_JJ infectious_JJ disease_NN they_PRP may_MD continue_VB their_PRP$ voyage_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
After_IN the_DT master_NN or_CC person_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ obtained_VBN a_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN or_CC certificate_NN under_IN the_DT provisions_NNS of_IN these_DT rules_NNS ,_, no_DT person_NN or_CC cargo_VB shall_MD be_VB admitted_VBN or_CC taken_VBN on_IN board_NN such_JJ vessel_NN before_IN she_PRP leaves_VBZ the_DT port_NN unless_IN such_JJ vessel_NN is_VBZ again_RB inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Port_NNP and_CC another_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN obtained_VBN from_IN such_JJ officer_NN by_IN the_DT master_NN or_CC person_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN such_JJ vessel_NN ._.
5_CD ._.

4_CD ._.

5_CD ._.
