From-W._JJ PARSONS_NNP ,_, Esq._NNP ,_, Secretary_NNP ,_, Bengal_NNP Chamber_NNP of_IN Commerce_NNP ,_, To-The_NNP HON'BLE_NNP H._NNP H._NNP RISLEY_NNP ,_, I.C.S._NNP ,_, C.I.E._NNP ,_, Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Gov-_NNP ernment_NN of_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, Financial_NNP Department_NNP ._.
On_IN the_DT 28th_CD May_NNP I_PRP had_VBD the_DT honour_NN to_TO address_VB to_TO you_PRP the_DT following_VBG telegram_NN :_: -Telegram_NN begins_VBZ ._.
Representations_NNS have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN to_TO the_DT Committee_NNP that_WDT clause_VBD 4_CD of_IN Plague_NNP Notification_NNP Number_NNP 3_CD of_IN 25th_CD May_NNP will_MD entail_VB great_JJ inconvenience_NN and_CC delay_NN to_TO steamers_NNS sailing_VBG for_IN foreign_JJ ports_NNS and_CC also_RB cause_VBP great_JJ inconvenience_NN to_TO passengers_NNS who_WP would_MD have_VB to_TO embark_VB the_DT day_NN previous_JJ to_TO vessel_VB 's_POS sailing_NN ._.
Com-_NNP mittee_NN trust_NN His_PRP$ Honour_NNP will_MD agree_VB to_TO hold_VB working_NN of_IN clause_NN 4_CD in_IN abeyance_NN until_IN full_JJ representations_NNS have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN to_TO Government.-_NNP Telegram_NNP ends_VBZ ._.
And_CC have_VBP now_RB to_TO acknowledge_VB receipt_NN of_IN your_PRP$ message_NN of_IN 30th_CD ultimo_NNS in_IN reply_NN ,_, reading_VBG as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -Telegram_NN begins_VBZ ._.
Lieutenant-Governor_JJ can_MD not_RB suspend_VB rule_NN 4_CD of_IN revised_VBN Plague_NNP Notification_NNP 3_CD which_WDT is_VBZ in_IN force_NN both_DT in_IN Madras_NNP and_CC Bombay_NNP ,_, but_CC will_MD consider_VB any_DT representations_NNS submitted.-Telegram_JJ ends_NNS ._.
My_PRP$ telegram_NN was_VBD despatched_VBN in_IN consequence_NN of_IN an_DT urgent_JJ repre-_NN sentation_NN made_VBN by_IN the_DT Committee_NNP of_IN the_DT Liners_NNP '_POS Conference_NNP (_( which_WDT comprises_VBZ all_PDT the_DT regular_JJ lines_NNS of_IN vessels_NNS sailing_VBG from_IN this_DT port_NN )_) point-_NN ing_VBG out_RP that_IN under_IN rule_NN 4_CD of_IN Plague_NNP Notification_NNP No_NNP ._.
3_CD of_IN the_DT 25th_CD May_NNP no_DT cargo_NN or_CC passengers_NNS could_MD be_VB taken_VBN on_IN board_NN a_DT vessel_NN after_IN the_DT Bill_NNP of_IN Health_NNP had_VBD been_VBN granted_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN if_IN this_DT rule_NN were_VBD strictly_RB enforced_VBN ,_, it_PRP would_MD mean_VB ,_, ordinarily_RB ,_, an_DT extra_JJ delay_NN of_IN 24_CD hours_NNS to_TO the_DT vessel_NN ;_: possibly_RB in_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN a_DT vessel_NN finishing_VBG her_PRP$ loading_NN on_IN Saturday_NNP ,_, a_DT delay_NN of_IN two_CD days_NNS and_CC occasionally_RB if_IN the_DT vessel_NN missed_VBD a_DT tide_NN by_IN waiting_VBG for_IN the_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN and_CC the_DT port_NN clearance_NN ,_, a_DT delay_NN of_IN three_CD ,_, four_CD or_CC even_RB five_CD days_NNS according_VBG to_TO the_DT state_NN of_IN the_DT river_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT Committee_NNP of_IN the_DT Chamber_NNP and_CC the_DT Committee_NNP of_IN the_DT Liners_NNP '_POS Conference_NNP have_VBP no_DT desire_NN whatever_WDT to_TO ask_VB for_IN a_DT modification_NN of_IN any_DT regulations_NNS which_WDT appear_VBP to_TO Government_NNP absolutely_RB essential_JJ to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, but_CC ,_, as_IN pointed_VBN out_RP in_IN the_DT letter_NN received_VBD from_IN the_DT Secretary_NNP of_IN the_DT Liners_NNP '_POS Conference_NNP ,_, a_DT copy_NN of_IN which_WDT I_PRP enclose_VBP ,_, and_CC which_WDT contains_VBZ a_DT very_RB clear_JJ statement_NN of_IN the_DT position_NN as_IN it_PRP appears_VBZ from_IN the_DT point_NN of_IN view_NN of_IN steamers_NNS '_POS agents_NNS ,_, it_PRP was_VBD thought_VBN that_IN possibly_RB ,_, when_WRB the_DT present_JJ notification_NN was_VBD issued_VBN ,_, the_DT full_JJ consequences_NNS in_IN the_DT way_NN of_IN pecuniary_JJ loss_NN and_CC personal_JJ incon-_JJ venience_NN were_VBD hardly_RB realised_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN a_DT way_NN might_MD be_VB found_VBN of_IN altering_VBG the_DT rule_NN so_RB as_IN to_TO minimise_VB this_DT loss_NN and_CC inconvenience_VB with-_JJ out_IN in_IN any_DT way_NN increasing_VBG the_DT risk_NN of_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
The_DT Com-_NNP mittee_NN note_NN from_IN your_PRP$ telegram_NN that_IN the_DT same_JJ notification_NN is_VBZ now_RB in_IN force_NN both_DT in_IN Madras_NNP and_CC Bombay_NNP ;_: but_CC they_PRP would_MD point_VB out_RP that_IN although_IN a_DT certain_JJ amount_NN of_IN inconvenience_NN must_MD also_RB be_VB experienced_VBN in_IN those_DT APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
267_CD ports_NNS ,_, the_DT departure_NN of_IN vessels_NNS therefrom_EX is_VBZ not_RB surrounded_VBN by_IN the_DT same_JJ difficulties_NNS as_IN attach_NN to_TO a_DT port_NN like_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, one_CD hundred_VBD miles_NNS from_IN the_DT mouth_NN of_IN a_DT dangerous_JJ tidal_JJ river_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT Committee_NNP would_MD venture_NN to_TO suggest_VB for_IN the_DT consideration_NN of_IN Government_NNP that_IN the_DT provisions_NNS of_IN rule_NN 4_CD might_MD be_VB carried_VBN out_RP with_IN a_DT minimum_NN of_IN inconvenience_NN to_TO vessels_VB if_IN the_DT loading_NN of_IN cargo_NN (_( which_WDT is_VBZ not_RB inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP )_) were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO be_VB proceeded_VBN with_IN as_IN formerly_RB until_IN the_DT last_JJ moment_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP were_VBD permitted_VBN to_TO give_VB the_DT ordinary_JJ bill_NN of_IN health_NN to_TO enable_VB the_DT vessel_NN to_TO obtain_VB port_JJ clearance_NN and_CC leave_VB ,_, provided_VBN that_IN (_( if_IN passengers_NNS were_VBD carried_VBN )_) she_PRP be_VB accompanied_VBN down_IN the_DT river_NN to_TO any_DT point_NN which_WDT Government_NNP may_MD indicate_VB ,_, either_DT Garden_NNP Reach_NNP ,_, Budge_NNP Budge_NNP ,_, or_CC ,_, if_IN necessary_JJ ,_, Diamond_NNP Harbour_NNP by_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP 's_POS assist-_JJ ants_NNS ,_, who_WP shall_MD ,_, as_IN convenient_NN ,_, inspect_VBP the_DT ship_NN and_CC passengers_NNS and_CC grant_VB a_DT final_JJ bill_NN of_IN health_NN on_IN board_NN ._.
This_DT course_NN ,_, it_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO the_DT Committee_NNP ,_, would_MD ,_, to_TO a_DT great_JJ extent_NN ,_, meet_VB the_DT difficulties_NNS which_WDT have_VBP now_RB been_VBN submitted_VBN to_TO Government_NNP ,_, and_CC I_PRP am_VBP instructed_VBN to_TO add_VB that_IN the_DT suggestion_NN now_RB made_VBN has_VBZ the_DT approval_NN of_IN Mr._NNP Raker_NNP ,_, the_DT Collec-_NNP tor_NN of_IN Customs_NNP ,_, and_CC of_IN Dr._NNP Forsyth_NNP ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Port_NNP ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT Committee_NNP in_IN conclusion_NN would_MD venture_NN to_TO place_NN before_IN Government_NNP the_DT personal_JJ experience_NN of_IN the_DT Hon'ble_NNP Mr._NNP C._NNP Turner_NNP ,_, Vice-President_NNP of_IN the_DT Chamber_NNP ,_, who_WP recently_RB embarked_VBD at_IN Madras_NNP on_IN board_NN the_DT S.S._NNP Goorkha_NNP ._.
Mr._NNP Turner_NNP writes_VBZ as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: I_PRP was_VBD on_IN board_NN the_DT S.S._NNP Goorkha_NNP by_IN 11-30_JJ A.M._NNP and_CC all_DT cargo_NN work_NN was_VBD stopped_VBN at_IN 11-45_JJ ._.
The_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Port_NNP was_VBD on_IN board_NN and_CC made_VBD casual_JJ examination_NN of_IN the_DT passengers_NNS who_WP ,_, like_IN myself_PRP ,_, had_VBD embarked_VBN at_IN Madras_NNP ._.
He_PRP left_VBD the_DT ship_NN at_IN noon_NN to_TO give_VB his_PRP$ bill_NN of_IN health_NN to_TO the_DT agents_NNS '_POS clerk_NN ,_, who_WP then_RB had_VBD to_TO take_VB the_DT bill_NN to_TO the_DT Custom_NNP House_NNP and_CC obtain_VB a_DT port_JJ clearance_NN ._.
At_IN 12-30_JJ we_PRP received_VBD notice_RB that_IN as_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP had_VBD noticed_VBN passengers_NNS embarking_VBG subsequent_NN to_TO his_PRP$ inspection_NN ,_, he_PRP would_MD not_RB give_VB the_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN before_IN making_VBG another_DT inspection_NN between_IN 4_CD and_CC 5_CD P.M_NNP ._.
It_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN two_CD second_JJ class_NN passengers_NNS from_IN Calcutta_NNP had_VBD left_VBN the_DT ship_NN early_RB in_IN the_DT morning_NN unknown_JJ to_TO the_DT Commander_NNP ,_, and_CC return-_JJ ed_NN as_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP was_VBD landing_VBG on_IN the_DT pier_NN steps_NNS after_IN leaving_VBG the_DT Goorkha_NNP ._.
I_PRP presume_VBP he_PRP watched_VBD them_PRP on_IN board_NN and_CC then_RB wrote_VBD to_TO the_DT Agents_NNS ._.
We_PRP were_VBD thus_RB detained_VBN pending_VBG the_DT pleasure_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO visit_VB the_DT ship_NN again_RB ._.
He_PRP returned_VBD soon_RB after_IN 4_CD P.M._NNP ,_, and_CC we_PRP obtained_VBD port_JJ clearance_NN at_IN 5_CD P.M_NNP ._.
The_DT loss_NN of_IN this_DT time_NN meant_VBD arriving_VBG off_RP Colombo_NNP on_IN Wednesday_NNP morning_NN instead_RB of_IN Tuesday_NNP even-_JJ ing_NN ,_, and_CC was_VBD a_DT clear_JJ twelve_NN hours_NNS '_POS loss_NN to_TO the_DT ship_NN on_IN her_PRP$ home_NN passage_NN ._.
The_DT same_JJ thing_NN may_MD happen_VB again_RB at_IN any_DT time_NN ._.
368_CD Measures_NNS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
Dated_VBN Calcutta_NNP ,_, the_DT 28th_CD May_NNP 1897_CD ._.
From-The_NNP Secretary_NNP ,_, Liners_NNP '_POS Conference_NNP ,_, To-The_NNP Secretary_NNP ,_, Chamber_NNP of_IN Commerce_NNP ._.
In_IN continuation_NN of_IN my_PRP$ letter_NN of_IN yesterday_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN response_NN to_TO the_DT request_NN of_IN your_PRP$ Committee_NNP ,_, I_PRP address_VBP you_PRP more_RBR in_IN detail_NN with_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT new_JJ rules_NNS published_VBN in_IN the_DT Calcutta_NNP Gazette_NNP of_IN 26th_CD instant_NN ,_, page_NN 608_CD ,_, respecting_VBG Bills_NNS of_IN Health_NNP ._.
Under_IN these_DT rules_NNS ,_, paragraph_NN 4_CD ,_, no_DT cargo_NN or_CC passengers_NNS can_MD be_VB taken_VBN on_IN board_NN a_DT vessel_NN after_IN the_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN has_VBZ been_VBN granted_VBN ._.
To_TO those_DT conversant_JJ with_IN the_DT management_NN of_IN ships_NNS it_PRP would_MD at_IN once_RB be_VB apparent_JJ that_IN ,_, if_IN this_DT rule_NN is_VBZ adhered_VBN to_TO ,_, vessels_NNS must_MD be_VB detained_VBN 24_CD hours_NNS in_IN port_NN after_IN they_PRP are_VBP ready_JJ for_IN sea_NN ._.
But_CC in_IN order_NN to_TO make_VB this_DT generally_RB clear_JJ ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB necessary_JJ to_TO explain_VB that_IN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN the_DT invariable_JJ custom_NN to_TO obtain_VB the_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN ,_, port_VB clear-_JJ ance_NN ,_, etc._FW ,_, while_IN the_DT loading_NN is_VBZ being_VBG completed_VBN ,_, so_IN that_IN a_DT vessel_NN may_MD leave_VB the_DT next_JJ morning_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN steamers_NNS ,_, work_NN usually_RB goes_VBZ on_IN throughout_IN the_DT night_NN and_CC often_RB up_RB to_TO the_DT very_RB moment_NN of_IN starting_VBG ._.
Under_IN the_DT rule_NN now_RB issued_VBN this_DT can_MD not_RB be_VB done_VBN ,_, for_IN a_DT vessel_JJ com-_JJ pleting_VBG her_PRP$ loading_NN ,_, say_VBP this_DT Friday_NNP evening_NN ,_, in_IN place_NN of_IN clearing_VBG to-_JJ day_NN and_CC starting_VBG tomorrow_NN ,_, must_MD wait_VB until_IN then_RB for_IN the_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN which_WDT ,_, when_WRB obtained_VBN ,_, has_VBZ to_TO be_VB presented_VBN at_IN the_DT Custom_NNP House_NNP for_IN port_NN clearance_NN and_CC if_IN the_DT vessel_NN is_VBZ foreign_JJ bound_NN ,_, taken_VBN to_TO a_DT Consul_NNP for_IN countersignature_NN ._.
By_IN the_DT time_NN all_DT this_DT is_VBZ done_VBN it_PRP would_MD be_VB too_RB late_JJ for_IN a_DT start_NN and_CC the_DT ship_NN must_MD remain_VB where_WRB she_PRP is_VBZ till_JJ Sunday_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN a_DT ship_NN finishing_VBG her_PRP$ loading_NN on_IN a_DT Saturday_NNP ,_, two_CD days_NNS would_MD be_VB lost_VBN ,_, as_IN a_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN ,_, or_CC certainly_RB a_DT port_NN clearance_NN ,_, could_MD not_RB be_VB obtained_VBN on_IN a_DT Sunday_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT vessel_NN would_MD therefore_RB be_VB detained_VBN till_IN Tuesday_NNP ._.
It_PRP may_MD be_VB thought_VBN that_IN a_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN might_MD possibly_RB be_VB obtained_VBN at_IN a_DT sufficiently_RB early_JJ hour_NN to_TO enable_VB the_DT ship_NN to_TO leave_VB the_DT same_JJ day_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN is_VBZ only_RB a_DT preliminary_JJ to_TO the_DT port_JJ clearance_NN ;_: and_CC even_RB when_WRB no_DT Consul_NNP 's_POS signature_NN is_VBZ required_VBN ,_, by_IN the_DT time_NN the_DT Custom_NNP House_NNP is_VBZ open_JJ ,_, the_DT tide_NN would_MD usually_RB be_VB lost_VBN ._.
There_EX are_VBP frequently_RB ,_, moreover_RB ,_, two_CD or_CC more_JJR vessels_NNS clearing_VBG in_IN one_CD day_NN ,_, which_WDT would_MD naturally_RB delay_VB the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT dry_JJ weather_NN when_WRB the_DT water_NN in_IN the_DT river_NN is_VBZ low_JJ ,_, it_PRP frequently_RB happens_VBZ that_IN the_DT larger_JJR steamers_NNS have_VBP to_TO take_VB in_IN coals_NNS or_CC cargo_NN or_CC passengers_NNS ,_, or_CC all_DT three_CD ,_, at_IN Diamond_NNP Harbour_NNP ,_, after_IN having_VBG cleared_VBN in_IN Calcutta_NNP ._.
Under_IN the_DT new_JJ rules_NNS a_DT clearance_NN could_MD not_RB be_VB obtained_VBN before_IN leaving_VBG Calcutta_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT difficulty_NN of_IN getting_VBG a_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN ,_, etc._NN ,_, for_IN a_DT vessel_NN in_IN Diamond_NNP Harbour_NNP is_VBZ obvious_JJ ._.
APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
269_CD That_IN the_DT detention_NN of_IN a_DT day_NN or_CC more_JJR must_MD occur_VB under_IN the_DT new_JJ rules_NNS is_VBZ therefore_RB evident_JJ ,_, and_CC this_DT is_VBZ a_DT serious_JJ matter_NN for_IN all_DT vessels_NNS ;_: but_CC the_DT inconvenience_NN to_TO be_VB expected_VBN will_MD be_VB most_RBS generally_RB appreciated_VBN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN passengers_NNS ._.
Instead_RB of_IN joining_VBG the_DT ships_NNS as_IN hitherto_NN at_IN the_DT moment_NN of_IN departure_NN ,_, they_PRP will_MD now_RB have_VB to_TO go_VB on_IN board_NN the_DT previous_JJ morning_NN to_TO allow_VB the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO make_VB his_PRP$ inspection_NN and_CC issue_VB his_PRP$ certificate_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP will_MD have_VB to_TO remain_VB in_IN the_DT ship_NN at_IN her_PRP$ moorings_NNS in_IN practical_JJ quarantine_NN for_IN a_DT day_NN and_CC a_DT night_NN ._.
The_DT Liners_NNP '_POS Conference_NN has_VBZ every_DT sympathy_NN with_IN Government_NNP in_IN its_PRP$ endeavours_NN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN plague_NN ;_: but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ thought_VBN that_IN when_WRB issuing_VBG the_DT present_JJ notification_NN ,_, the_DT full_JJ consequences_NNS in_IN the_DT way_NN of_IN pecuniary_JJ loss_NN and_CC personal_JJ inconvenience_NN were_VBD hardly_RB realis-_JJ ed_NN ,_, and_CC I_PRP am_VBP desired_VBN to_TO request_VB that_IN your_PRP$ Chamber_NNP will_MD lay_VB the_DT facts_NNS before_IN the_DT Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bengal_NNP with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO some_DT modification_NN being_VBG made_VBN in_IN the_DT terms_NNS of_IN paragraph_NN IV_NNP ._.

2_CD ._.
The_DT orders_NNS give_VBP effect_NN to_TO a_DT proposal_NN of_IN the_DT Bengal_NNP Chamber_NNP of_IN Commerce_NNP that_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP should_MD be_VB permitted_VBN to_TO give_VB the_DT ordinary_JJ bill_NN of_IN health_NN to_TO enable_VB the_DT vessel_NN to_TO obtain_VB port_JJ clearance_NN and_CC leave_VB ,_, provided_VBN that_IN when_WRB passengers_NNS are_VBP carried_VBN ,_, she_PRP be_VB accom-_JJ panied_VBN down_IN the_DT river_NN by_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT assistants_NNS of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, who_WP shall_MD inspect_VB the_DT ship_NN and_CC passengers_NNS ,_, and_CC grant_VB a_DT final_JJ bill_NN of_IN health_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
I_PRP am_VBP to_TO observe_VB that_IN the_DT arrangements_NNS which_WDT involve_VBP the_DT examination_NN of_IN passengers_NNS on_IN board_NN ship_NN are_VBP opposed_VBN to_TO the_DT provisions_NNS of_IN Chapter_NN I_PRP ,_, Section_NNP II_NNP ,_, of_IN the_DT regulation_NN appended_VBD to_TO the_DT Venice_NNP Sanitary_NNP Convention_NNP of_IN 1897_CD ._.

IX_NNP ._.
effected_VBN on_IN shore_NN prior_JJ to_TO departure_NN ._.
Under_IN the_DT terms_NNS of_IN the_DT Con-_NNP vention_NN foreign_JJ Governments_NNS may_MD extend_VB their_PRP$ precautions_NNS to_TO arrivals_NNS from_IN uninfected_JJ portions_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN if_IN the_DT Government_NNP does_VBZ not_RB take_VB measures_NNS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT infection_NN of_IN ships_NNS leaving_VBG healthy_JJ ports_NNS ._.
There_EX is_VBZ a_DT possibility_NN ,_, probably_RB regarded_VBN by_IN the_DT authorities_NNS in_IN Europe_NNP as_IN greater_JJR than_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB regarded_VBN in_IN India_NNP ,_, of_IN infected_JJ persons_NNS com-_JJ ing_VBG from_IN infected_VBN areas_NNS to_TO embark_VB at_IN healthy_JJ ports_NNS such_JJ as_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP therefore_NN determined_VBD that_IN an_DT examination_NN should_MD be_VB made_VBN of_IN all_DT persons_NNS embarking_VBG from_IN a_DT healthy_JJ port_NN to_TO Europe_NNP ,_, with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO ascertain_VB whether_IN they_PRP come_VBP from_IN an_DT infected_JJ area_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN so_RB ,_, whether_IN they_PRP are_VBP infected_VBN or_CC likely_JJ to_TO be_VB infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ._.
For_IN the_DT same_JJ reasons_NNS the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP consider_VBP that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ very_RB desirable_JJ that_IN the_DT examination_NN should_MD take_VB place_NN exactly_RB in_IN the_DT manner_NN prescribed_VBN by_IN the_DT Convention_NNP ._.
Furthermore_RB if_IN the_DT examination_NN is_VBZ not_RB made_VBN until_IN the_DT passengers_NNS are_VBP on_IN board_NN ,_, then_RB the_DT discovery_NN of_IN a_DT plague_NN case_NN will_MD necessitate_VB the_DT vessel_NN being_VBG treated_VBN as_IN infected_JJ when_WRB she_PRP proceeds_VBZ on_IN her_PRP$ journey_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
In_IN view_NN of_IN these_DT considerations_NNS the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP will_MD be_VB glad_JJ if_IN ,_, with_IN the_DT permission_NN of_IN His_PRP$ Honour_NNP the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP ,_, the_DT orders_NNS issued_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bengal_NNP are_VBP modified_VBN so_RB as_IN to_TO require_VB the_DT examination_NN of_IN all_DT persons_NNS sailing_VBG on_IN the_DT vessel_NN to_TO take_VB place_NN on_IN shore_NN prior_JJ to_TO departure_NN ._.
The_DT Governor-General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP considers_NNS that_WDT with_IN a_DT sufficient_JJ staff_NN of_IN inspecting_VBG medical_JJ officers_NNS examination_NN on_IN shore_NN in_IN the_DT manner_NN prescribed_VBN by_IN the_DT Venice_NNP Conven-_NNP tion_NN should_MD not_RB cause_VB any_DT serious_JJ delay_NN in_IN the_DT departure_NN of_IN vessels_NNS nor_CC any_DT serious_JJ inconvenience_NN to_TO the_DT passengers_NNS ;_: and_CC His_PRP$ Excellency_NN in_IN Council_NNP trusts_NNS that_IN ,_, if_IN this_DT has_VBZ not_RB already_RB been_VBN done_VBN ,_, arrangements_NNS will_MD be_VB made_VBN to_TO minimise_VB the_DT inconvenience_NN by_IN the_DT appointment_NN of_IN a_DT sufficient_JJ staff_NN ._.

REGULATIONS_NN ._.
1_CD ._.
No_DT person_NN shall_MD be_VB permitted_VBN to_TO embark_VB on_IN board_NN a_DT vessel_NN within_IN any_DT such_JJ port_NN bound_NN for_IN any_DT port_NN out_IN of_IN India_NNP who_WP has_VBZ within_IN the_DT preceding_VBG ten_JJ days_NNS resided_VBN in_IN or_CC visited_VBD a_DT part_NN of_IN India_NNP believed_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT port_NN to_TO be_VB infected_VBN by_IN the_DT plague_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
No_DT vessel_NN shall_MD leave_VB any_DT such_JJ port_NN for_IN any_DT port_NN out_IN of_IN India_NNP until_IN she_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT port_NN and_CC the_DT master_NN or_CC person_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN such_JJ vessel_NN has_VBZ obtained_VBN a_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN or_CC certificate_NN in_IN the_DT form_NN given_VBN below_IN from_IN such_JJ officer_NN that_IN the_DT master_NN or_CC person_NN in_IN charge_NN ,_, officers_NNS ,_, crew_NN and_CC passengers_NNS (_( if_IN any_DT )_) of_IN such_JJ vessel_NNS are_VBP free_JJ from_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
Should_MD the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT port_NN be_VB of_IN opinion_NN that_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN of_IN any_DT vessel_NN so_RB inspected_JJ is_VBZ suffering_VBG from_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN or_CC is_VBZ not_RB free_JJ from_IN the_DT infection_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD refuse_VB to_TO give_VB a_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN or_CC certificate_NN as_IN aforesaid_NN unless_IN and_CC until_IN such_JJ person_NN is_VBZ removed_VBN from_IN the_DT vessel_NN and_CC such_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT vessel_NN as_IN has_VBZ been_VBN frequented_VBN by_IN such_JJ person_NN shall_MD have_VB been_VBN disin-_JJ fected_VBN to_TO the_DT satisfaction_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
4_CD ._.
After_IN the_DT master_NN or_CC person_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ obtained_VBN a_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN or_CC certificate_NN under_IN the_DT provisions_NNS of_IN these_DT rules_NNS ,_, no_DT person_NN or_CC cargo_VB shall_MD be_VB admitted_VBN or_CC taken_VBN on_IN board_NN such_JJ vessel_NN before_IN ?_. 272_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
she_PRP leaves_VBZ the_DT port_NN unless_IN such_JJ vessel_NN is_VBZ again_RB inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT port_NN and_CC another_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN or_CC certificate_NN obtained_VBN from_IN such_JJ officer_NN by_IN the_DT master_NN or_CC person_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN such_JJ vessel_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
No_DT port_NN clearance_NN shall_MD be_VB delivered_VBN to_TO any_DT vessel_NN bound_NN from_IN any_DT such_JJ port_NN to_TO any_DT port_NN out_IN of_IN India_NNP unless_IN and_CC until_IN the_DT master_NN or_CC person_NN in_IN charge_NN thereof_VBP shall_MD produce_VB the_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN or_CC certificate_NN so_RB to_TO be_VB obtained_VBN as_IN aforesaid_NN ;_: and_CC it_PRP shall_MD be_VB the_DT duty_NN of_IN Customs_NNP officers_NNS to_TO refuse_VB delivery_NN of_IN the_DT port_NN clearance_NN without_IN the_DT production_NN of_IN such_JJ bill_NN of_IN health_NN or_CC certificate_NN ._.
6_CD ._.

30_CD ,_, dated_VBD 12th_CD instant_NN ,_, seem_VBP to_TO me_PRP most_RBS undesirable_JJ ._.
The_DT method_NN adopted_VBN by_IN these_DT is_VBZ virtually_RB that_IN of_IN penning_VBG up_RP the_DT sick_JJ and_CC healthy_JJ in_IN an_DT infected_JJ ship_NN alike_RB ,_, notwithstanding_VBG the_DT discretion_NN given_VBN to_TO the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN Health_NNP ._.
This_DT course_NN has_VBZ not_RB in_IN practice_NN proved_VBN successful_JJ ._.
So_RB long_RB as_IN men_NNS have_VBP money_NN with_IN free_JJ wills_NNS and_CC means_NNS of_IN locomotion_NN ,_, they_PRP will_MD defy_VB such_JJ measures_NNS of_IN quarantine_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT very_RB sense_NN of_IN safety_NN which_WDT such_JJ apparently_RB stringent_JJ measures_NNS elicit_VBP ,_, conduces_NNS to_TO failure_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ nothing_NN more_RBR likely_JJ to_TO hamper_VB trade_NN ,_, and_CC spread_VBD disease_NN than_IN a_DT defective_JJ system_NN of_IN quarantine_NN ._.
Such_JJ measures_NNS are_VBP in_IN strong_JJ contrast_NN ?_. 276_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
to_TO those_DT possible_JJ on_IN land_NN ._.
If_IN it_PRP were_VBD necessary_JJ to_TO hem_VB up_RP sick_JJ and_CC healthy_JJ alike_NN in_IN a_DT ship_NN ,_, why_WRB not_RB also_RB so_RB detain_VB the_DT occupants_NNS of_IN a_DT train_NN ?_.

:_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) Regulations_NNPS as_IN to_TO shipping.-I_JJ think_NN that_IN the_DT definition_NN given_VBN in_IN clauses_NNS (_( 2_CD )_) ,_, (_( 3_CD )_) and_CC (_( 4_CD )_) of_IN section_NN 3_CD of_IN Indian_JJ Ports_NNP Act_NNP X_NNP of_IN 1889_CD of_IN the_DT terms_NNS ``_`` Port_NNP officer_NN ,_, ''_'' ``_`` vessel_NN ''_'' and_CC ``_`` Master_NNP ''_'' should_MD be_VB subs-_JJ tituted_VBN for_IN the_DT definition_NN proposed_VBN by_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) Respecting_VBG the_DT hoisting_NN of_IN flags_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ proposed_VBN that_IN flag_NN Q_NNP shall_MD be_VB hoisted_VBN on_IN board_NN of_IN an_DT infected_JJ ship_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN a_DT black_JJ flag_NN shall_MD be_VB hoisted_VBN below_IN flag_NN Q_NNP under_IN certain_JJ conditions_NNS ,_, but_CC as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ proposed_VBN that_IN a_DT vessel_NN shall_MD be_VB deemed_VBN infected_JJ with_IN plague_NN in_IN which_WDT there_EX is_VBZ ,_, or_CC has_VBZ been_VBN during_IN the_DT voyage_NN ,_, or_CC during_IN the_DT stay_NN of_IN such_JJ vessel_NN in_IN a_DT port_NN in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN such_JJ voyage_NN ,_, any_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, it_PRP would_MD be_VB necessary_JJ ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT instructions_NNS contained_VBN in_IN the_DT concluding_VBG part_NN of_IN 1_CD (_( a_DT )_) ,_, for_IN the_DT second_JJ flag_NN to_TO be_VB displayed_VBN ._.
If_IN this_DT is_VBZ so_RB ,_, when_WRB should_MD flag_VB Q_NNP be_VB alone_RB shown_VBN ?_.
With_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT ``_`` black_JJ ''_'' flag_NN ,_, I_PRP would_MD point_VB out_RP that_IN vessels_NNS are_VBP not_RB supplied_VBN with_IN flags_NNS of_IN that_DT colour_NN ._.
I_PRP would_MD suggest_VB flag_NN R_NNP (_( the_DT flag_NN used_VBN to_TO denote_VB the_DT presence_NN of_IN cholera_NN ,_, small-pox_JJ or_CC other_JJ epidemic_JJ disease_NN on_IN board_NN ship_NN )_) being_VBG used_VBN instead_RB ._.

No_DT signal_NN is_VBZ proposed_VBN to_TO meet_VB the_DT case_NN of_IN an_DT infected_JJ vessel_NN arriving_VBG at_IN a_DT port_NN ?_. APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._. ]_NN

Telegram_NNP No_NNP ._.
1290_CD (_( Sanitary_NNP )_) ,_, dated_VBN Simla_NNP ,_, the_DT 14th_CD April_NNP 1897_CD ._.
From-The_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, Home_NNP Department_NNP ,_, To-The_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Madras_NNP ,_, Marine_NNP Department_NNP ._.
Your_PRP$ telegram_NN dated_VBD 3rd_CD ._.
Government_NN of_IN India_NNP agree_VBP to_TO proposal_NN of_IN Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, Madras_NNP ,_, that_IN rules_NNS should_MD issue_VB under_IN Act_NNP 3_CD of_IN 1897_CD that_IN all_DT passengers_NNS from_IN infected_JJ ship_NN should_MD be_VB landed_VBN ,_, sick_JJ being_VBG sent_VBN to_TO isolation_VB hospital_NN ._.
They_PRP are_VBP not_RB however_RB able_JJ to_TO agree_VB that_IN healthy_JJ should_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO proceed_VB to_TO their_PRP$ destination_NN and_CC there_EX kept_VBN under_IN observation_NN in_IN accordance_NN with_IN general_JJ order_NN of_IN English_NNP Local_NNP Government_NNP Board_NNP of_IN 1890_CD ,_, the_DT reason_NN being_VBG that_IN one_CD of_IN principal_JJ objects_NNS of_IN quarantine_JJ regulations_NNS imposed_VBN on_IN Indian_JJ ports_NNS is_VBZ to_TO prevent_VB quarantine_NN in_IN Europe_NNP of_IN ships_NNS sailing_VBG from_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC if_IN European_JJ powers_NNS understood_VBD that_IN quarantine_NN was_VBD not_RB rigorously_RB enforced_VBN at_IN Madras_NNP ,_, neither_CC that_IN port_NN nor_CC others_NNS at_IN which_WDT vessels_NNS proceeding_VBG from_IN it_PRP might_MD touch_VB on_IN way_NN to_TO Europe_NNP would_MD be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN uninfected_JJ ._.
Healthy_NNP should_MD therefore_RB be_VB detained_VBN under_IN observation_NN in_IN suitable_JJ isolation_NN shelter_NN for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN date_NN of_IN landing_VBG or_CC from_IN last_JJ subsequent_JJ case_NN ._.
Clothing_NN of_IN passengers_NNS and_CC other_JJ susceptible_JJ articles_NNS should_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN before_IN passengers_NNS allowed_VBN to_TO leave_VB ._.
Please_NNP send_VB copy_NN of_IN rules_NNS for_IN publication_NN in_IN Gazette_NNP of_IN India_NNP stating_VBG date_NN from_IN which_WDT they_PRP take_VBP effect_NN ._.
Order_NN thereon_NN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP cf_NN Madras_NNP ._.
Ordered_VBN that_IN the_DT following_JJ notification_NN be_VB published_VBN in_IN the_DT Fort_NNP St._NNP George_NNP and_CC all_DT Maritime_NNP District_NNP Gazettes_VBZ :_: -_: NOTIFICATION_NN ._.
In_IN exercise_NN of_IN the_DT powers_NNS delegated_VBD to_TO him_PRP by_IN the_DT Governor-Gen-_NNP eral_NN in_IN Council_NNP under_IN section_NN 2_CD ,_, sub-section_NN (_( 3_CD )_) of_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Dis-_NNP eases_VBZ Act_NNP ,_, 1897_CD ,_, His_PRP$ Excellency_NNP the_DT Governor_NNP in_IN Council_NNP is_VBZ pleased_VBN to_TO prescribe_VB ,_, under_IN the_DT said_VBD Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ,_, the_DT following_VBG temporary_JJ regulations_NNS to_TO be_VB observed_VBN in_IN all_DT ports_NNS of_IN the_DT Madras_NNP ?_. 278_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
Presidency_NN ._.
These_DT regulations_NNS will_MD come_VB into_IN effect_NN from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN publication_NN thereof_NN and_CC will_MD supersede_VB the_DT regulations_NNS now_RB in_IN force_NN under_IN Act_NNP 1_CD of_IN 1870_CD ._.
Definitions_NNS ._.
In_IN these_DT regulations-_JJ ``_`` Vessel_NNP ''_'' includes_VBZ anything_NN made_VBN for_IN conveyance_NN by_IN water_NN or_CC human_JJ beings_NNS or_CC of_IN property_NN ._.
``_`` Port_JJ officer_NN ''_'' includes_VBZ any_DT person_NN acting_VBG under_IN the_DT authority_NN of_IN Government_NNP in_IN charge_NN of_IN Port_NNP discipline_NN ._.
``_`` Master_NN ,_, ''_'' when_WRB used_VBN in_IN relation_NN to_TO any_DT vessel_NN ,_, means_VBZ any_DT person_NN (_( except_IN a_DT pilot_NN or_CC harbour_PRP$ master_NN )_) having_VBG for_IN the_DT time_NN being_VBG the_DT charge_NN or_CC control_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN ._.
``_`` Sanitary_JJ authority_NN ''_'' means_VBZ the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN the_DT district_NN ,_, and_CC every_DT Municipal_NNP Council_NNP and_CC Local_NNP Board_NNP ,_, the_DT area_NN under_IN whose_WP$ jurisdiction_NN includes_VBZ or_CC abuts_NNS on_IN any_DT part_NN of_IN a_DT customs_NNS port_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT jurisdiction_NN of_IN every_DT Sanitary_JJ authority_NN shall_MD ,_, for_IN the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN these_DT regulations_NNS ,_, extend_VBP to_TO seaward_VB for_IN a_DT distance_NN of_IN three_CD miles_NNS beyond_IN low_JJ water_NN mark_NN on_IN all_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT coast_NN line_NN bounding_VBG the_DT area_NN ordi-_JJ narily_RB under_IN its_PRP$ jurisdiction_NN ._.
``_`` Port_NNP Health_NNP officer_NN ''_'' includes_VBZ any_DT duly_RB qualified_JJ medical_JJ practi-_NN tioner_NN appointed_VBN by_IN a_DT Sanitary_JJ authority_NN or_CC by_IN the_DT Local_JJ Government_NNP to_TO act_VB in_IN the_DT execution_NN of_IN these_DT regulations_NNS ._.
For_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN these_DT regulations_NNS ,_, every_DT vessel_NN shall_MD be_VB deemed_VBN infected_JJ with_IN plague_NN in_IN which_WDT there_EX is_VBZ ,_, or_CC has_VBZ been_VBN ,_, during_IN the_DT voyage_NN then_RB in_IN progress_NN or_CC presently_RB concluded_VBN ,_, or_CC during_IN the_DT stay_NN of_IN such_JJ vessel_NN in_IN a_DT port_NN in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN such_JJ a_DT voyage_NN ,_, any_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
I.-Flags_NNS to_TO be_VB hoisted_VBN by_IN vessels_NNS infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ._.
1_CD ._.
(_( a_DT )_) The_DT master_NN of_IN every_DT vessel_NN infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN shall_MD ,_, when_WRB within_IN three_CD miles_NNS of_IN the_DT coast_NN of_IN any_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT Madras_NNP Presi-_NNP dency_NN ,_, cause_NN to_TO be_VB hoisted_VBN at_IN the_DT foremasthead_NN the_DT Commercial_NNP Code_NNP flag_NN Q_NNP being_VBG a_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN ,_, and_CC shall_MD keep_VB the_DT same_JJ displayed_NN during_IN the_DT whole_JJ time_NN between_IN sunrise_NN and_CC sunset_NN ._.
If_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN such_JJ vessel_NN be_VB at_IN the_DT time_NN sick_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, the_DT master_NN shall_MD also_RB hoist_VB the_DT Commercial_NNP Code_NNP flag_NN R_NNP below_IN the_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN Q_NNP ._.
Any_DT such_JJ vessel_NN arriving_VBG at_IN a_DT port_NN after_IN dark_JJ shall_MD hoist_VB on_IN coming_VBG to_TO an_DT anchor_NN one_CD white_JJ light_NN at_IN the_DT foremasthead_NN and_CC one_CD red_JJ light_NN at_IN the_DT mainmasthead_NN ._.
(_( b_NN )_) He_PRP shall_MD before_IN arriving_VBG at_IN an_DT anchorage_NN free_JJ his_PRP$ vessel_NN from_IN bilge_JJ water_NN and_CC pass_NN fresh_JJ sea_NN water_NN over_IN the_DT parts_NNS that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN in_IN contact_NN with_IN such_JJ bilge_NNS wate_VBP 1_CD ?_. APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
279_CD II.-Regulations_NNS as_IN to_TO detention_NN by_IN Port_NNP Officers_NNP ._.
2_CD ._.
If_IN a_DT Port_NNP officer_NN on_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN any_DT vessel_NN ascertains_VBZ from_IN the_DT master_NN of_IN such_JJ vessel_NNS or_CC otherwise_NN has_VBZ reason_NN to_TO suspect_VB that_IN the_DT vessel_NN is_VBZ infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD detain_VB such_JJ vessel_NN ,_, and_CC order_NN the_DT master_NN forthwith_NN to_TO moor_VB or_CC anchor_VB the_DT same_JJ in_IN such_JJ position_NN as_IN may_MD be_VB appointed_VBN under_IN regulation_NN 6_CD ._.
3_CD ._.
While_IN such_JJ vessel_NNS shall_MD be_VB so_RB detained_JJ ,_, no_DT person_NN shall_MD leave_VB the_DT same_JJ ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT Port_NNP officer_NN detaining_VBG any_DT vessel_NN as_IN aforesaid_JJ shall_MD forth-_JJ with_IN give_JJ notice_NN thereof_NN and_CC of_IN the_DT cause_NN of_IN such_JJ detention_NN to_TO the_DT Sanitary_NNP authority_NN of_IN the_DT port_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
Such_JJ detention_NN by_IN the_DT Port_NNP officer_NN shall_MD cease_VB as_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT vessel_NN shall_MD have_VB been_VBN duly_RB visited_JJ and_CC examined_VBN by_IN the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP officer_NN or_CC ,_, if_IN the_DT vessel_NN shall_MD ,_, upon_IN such_JJ examination_NN ,_, be_VB found_VBN to_TO be_VB infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ,_, as_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT same_JJ shall_MD be_VB moored_VBN or_CC anchored_VBN in_IN pursuance_NN of_IN regulations_NNS 6_CD and_CC 10_CD ;_: provided_VBD that_IN ,_, if_IN the_DT examination_NN be_VB not_RB commenced_VBN within_IN twelve_NN hours_NNS after_IN notice_RB given_VBN as_IN aforesaid_NN ,_, the_DT vessel_NN shall_MD ,_, on_IN expiration_NN of_IN the_DT said_VBD twelve_NN hours_NNS ,_, be_VB released_VBN from_IN detention_NN ._.
In_IN such_JJ latter_JJ case_NN ,_, the_DT Port_NNP officer_NN shall_MD send_VB immediate_JJ information_NN to_TO the_DT Sanitary_NNP authorities_NNS of_IN the_DT port_NN to_TO which_WDT the_DT vessel_NN is_VBZ bound_VBN or_CC at_IN which_WDT she_PRP is_VBZ next_JJ about_IN to_TO call_VB ._.
III.-Regulations_NNS as_IN to_TO Sanitary_NNP Authorities_NNP ._.
6_CD ._.
Every_DT Sanitary_JJ authority_NN within_IN whose_WP$ jurisdiction_NN a_DT port_NN exists_VBZ shall_MD ,_, as_RB speedily_RB as_IN practicable_JJ ,_, with_IN the_DT approval_NN of_IN the_DT Port_NNP officer_NN ,_, fix_VB some_DT place_NN where_WRB vessels_NNS may_MD be_VB moored_VBN or_CC anchored_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN regulation_NN ro_NN ;_: and_CC shall_MD make_VB provision_NN for_IN the_DT recep-_JJ tion_NN of_IN plague_NN patients_NNS and_CC persons_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN illness_NN removed_VBN under_IN regulations_NNS 13_CD and_CC 14_CD ._.
The_DT place_NN to_TO be_VB fixed_VBN as_IN aforesaid_NN ,_, where_WRB any_DT vessel_NN may_MD be_VB moored_VBN or_CC anchored_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN regu-_JJ lation_NN lo_NN ,_, shall_MD be_VB some_DT place_NN within_IN the_DT jurisdiction_NN of_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP authority_NN ,_, unless_IN the_DT Local_JJ Government_NNP otherwise_NN orders_NNS ,_, in_IN which_WDT case_NN the_DT place_NN so_RB fixed_JJ shall_MD ,_, for_IN the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN these_DT regulations_NNS ,_, be_VB deemed_VBN to_TO be_VB within_IN such_JJ jurisdiction_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
It_PRP shall_MD be_VB the_DT duty_NN of_IN the_DT Port_NNP officer_NN on_IN the_DT approach_NN to_TO the_DT port_NN of_IN an_DT infected_JJ vessel_NN to_TO make_VB the_DT fact_NN known_VBN to_TO the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP officer_NN who_WP shall_MD forthwith_VB visit_NN and_CC examine_VB the_DT vessel_NN ,_, in_IN regard_NN to_TO which_WDT such_JJ notice_NN shall_MD have_VB been_VBN given_VBN ,_, for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN ascertain-_JJ ing_VBG whether_IN she_PRP is_VBZ infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ._.
8_CD ._.
The_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP officer_NN if_IN he_PRP has_VBZ reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN any_DT vessel_NN which_WDT has_VBZ arrived_VBN or_CC is_VBZ within_IN the_DT jurisdiction_NN of_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP authority_NN ,_, whether_IN examined_VBN by_IN the_DT Port_NNP officer_NN or_CC not_RB is_VBZ infected_VBN with_IN ?_. 280_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
plague_NN or_CC has_VBZ come_VBN from_IN a_DT place_NN where_WRB plague_NN prevails_VBZ ,_, shall_MD visit_VB and_CC examine_VB such_JJ vessel_NNS ,_, for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN ascertaining_VBG whether_IN she_PRP is_VBZ so_RB infected_JJ ;_: and_CC the_DT master_NN of_IN such_JJ vessel_JJ shall_MD permit_VB the_DT same_JJ to_TO be_VB so_RB visited_JJ and_CC examined_VBD ._.
9_CD ._.
If_IN the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP officer_NN ,_, on_IN making_VBG such_JJ examination_NN as_IN aforesaid_NN ,_, whether_IN under_IN regulation_NN 7_CD or_CC under_IN regulation_NN 8_CD ,_, be_VB of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT vessel_NN is_VBZ infected_VBN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD forthwith_VB give_VB a_DT certificate_NN in_IN duplicate_NN in_IN the_DT following_JJ form_NN ,_, or_CC to_TO the_DT like_JJ effect_NN ,_, and_CC shall_MD deliver_VB one_CD copy_NN to_TO the_DT master_NN and_CC transmit_VB the_DT other_JJ to_TO the_DT Sanitary_NNP authority_NN ._.
He_PRP shall_MD also_RB give_VB immediate_JJ information_NN of_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN to_TO the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP of_IN Madras_NNP ._.
Certificate_NNP ._.
day_NN of_IN 189_CD I_PRP hereby_VBP certify_VB that_IN I_PRP have_VBP examined_VBN the_DT vessel_NN ,_, of_IN now_RB lying_VBG in_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN (_( or_CC detained_VBN at_IN )_) and_CC that_IN I_PRP find_VBP that_IN she_PRP is_VBZ infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ._.
Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
10_CD ._.
The_DT master_NN of_IN any_DT vessel_NN so_RB certified_VBD to_TO be_VB infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN shall_MD thereupon_VB moor_NN or_CC anchor_VB her_PRP at_IN the_DT place_NN fixed_VBN for_IN that_DT purpose_NN under_IN regulation_NN 6_CD where_WRB she_PRP shall_MD remain_VB until_IN the_DT requirements_NNS of_IN these_DT regulations_NNS have_VBP been_VBN duly_RB fulfilled_VBN ._.
11_CD ._.
No_DT person_NN shall_MD leave_VB any_DT such_JJ vessel_NN until_IN the_DT examination_NN hereinafter_NN mentioned_VBD shall_MD have_VB been_VBN made_VBN ._.
12_CD ._.
The_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP officer_NN shall_MD ,_, as_RB soon_RB as_IN possible_JJ after_IN any_DT such_JJ vessel_NN has_VBZ been_VBN certified_VBN to_TO be_VB infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ,_, examine_VB every_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN the_DT same_JJ and_CC in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN any_DT person_NN suffer-_JJ ing_NN from_IN plague_NN ,_, or_CC from_IN any_DT illness_NN which_WDT the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP officer_NN sus-_JJ pects_NNS may_MD prove_VB to_TO be_VB plague_NN ,_, shall_MD certify_VB accordingly_RB ._.
Every_DT person_NN who_WP shall_MD not_RB be_VB so_RB certified_VBN by_IN him_PRP shall_MD be_VB permitted_VBN to_TO land_NN and_CC shall_MD be_VB detained_VBN under_IN observation_NN in_IN a_DT suitable_JJ isolation_NN camp_NN or_CC other_JJ place_NN for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN his_PRP$ landing_NN or_CC from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ subsequent_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN which_WDT may_MD occur_VB among_IN the_DT persons_NNS detained_VBN in_IN such_JJ camp_NN or_CC place_NN ,_, whichever_WP date_NN may_MD be_VB latest_JJS ,_, after_IN which_WDT he_PRP shall_MD be_VB released_VBN if_IN certified_VBN by_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP on_IN the_DT spot_NN to_TO be_VB free_JJ from_IN plague_NN ._.
13_CD ._.
Every_DT person_NN certified_VBN by_IN the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP officer_NN to_TO be_VB suffer-_JJ ing_VBG from_IN plague_NN shall_MD be_VB removed_VBN ,_, if_IN his_PRP$ condition_NN admit_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, to_TO some_DT isolation_NN hospital_NN or_CC other_JJ suitable_JJ place_NN appointed_VBN for_IN that_DT purpose_NN by_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP authority_NN ;_: and_CC no_DT person_NN so_RB removed_VBD shall_MD leave_VB such_JJ hospital_NN or_CC place_NN ,_, until_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Medical_NNP officer_NN present_NN at_IN the_DT spot_NN shall_MD have_VB certified_VBN that_IN such_JJ person_NN is_VBZ free_JJ from_IN the_DT said_VBD disease_NN ._.
?_. APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
281_CD If_IN any_DT person_NN suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB removed_VBN ,_, the_DT vessel_NN shall_MD remain_VB subject_JJ ,_, for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN this_DT regulation_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT control_NN of_IN the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP officer_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT infected_JJ person_NN shall_MD not_RB be_VB re-_JJ moved_VBN from_IN or_CC leave_VB the_DT vessel_NN ,_, except_IN with_IN the_DT consent_NN in_IN writing_NN of_IN the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP officer_NN ._.
14_CD ._.
Any_DT person_NN certified_VBN by_IN the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP officer_NN to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN illness_NN ,_, which_WDT such_JJ officer_NN suspects_NNS may_MD prove_VB to_TO be_VB plague_JJ ,_, may_MD either_RB be_VB detained_VBN on_IN board_NN the_DT vessel_NN for_IN any_DT period_NN not_RB exceeding_VBG four_CD days_NNS ,_, or_CC may_MD be_VB taken_VBN ,_, either_DT immediately_RB or_CC at_IN any_DT time_NN within_IN the_DT said_VBD period_NN of_IN four_CD days_NNS to_TO some_DT hospital_NN ,_, observation_NN camp_NN ,_, or_CC ward_NN or_CC other_JJ suitable_JJ place_NN appointed_VBN for_IN that_DT purpose_NN by_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP authority_NN ,_, and_CC detained_VBD there_EX for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN ten_JJ days_NNS ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN it_PRP may_MD be_VB ascertained_VBN whether_IN the_DT illness_NN is_VBZ or_CC is_VBZ not_RB plague_JJ ._.
Any_DT such_JJ person_NN who_WP ,_, while_IN so_RB detained_JJ ,_, shall_MD be_VB certified_VBN by_IN a_DT competent_JJ Medical_JJ officer_NN to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ,_, shall_MD be_VB dealt_VBN with_IN as_RB provided_VBN by_IN regulation_NN 13_CD ._.
15_CD ._.
The_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP officer_NN shall_MD ,_, in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN every_DT vessel_NN cer-_JJ tified_VBD to_TO be_VB infected_VBN ,_, give_VB such_JJ directions_NNS and_CC take_VB such_JJ steps_NNS as_IN may_MD appear_VB to_TO him_PRP to_TO be_VB necessary_JJ for_IN preventing_VBG the_DT spread_NN of_IN infection_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT master_NN of_IN the_DT said_VBD vessel_JJ shall_MD forthwith_VB carry_NN into_IN execution_NN such_JJ directions_NNS as_IN shall_MD be_VB so_RB given_VBN to_TO him_PRP ._.
16_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN any_DT death_NN from_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN such_JJ vessel_NNS while_IN detained_VBN under_IN regulation_NN 10_CD ,_, the_DT master_NN shall_MD ,_, as_IN directed_VBN by_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP authority_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP officer_NN ,_, either_CC cause_VB the_DT dead_JJ body_NN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN out_RP to_TO sea_VB and_CC committed_VBN to_TO the_DT deep_JJ properly_RB loaded_VBN to_TO prevent_VB its_PRP$ rising_NN ,_, or_CC shall_MD deliver_VB it_PRP into_IN the_DT charge_NN of_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP authority_NN for_IN disposal_NN ,_, if_IN the_DT former_JJ procedure_NN be_VB not_RB in_IN accordance_NN with_IN caste_NN or_CC race_NN customs_NNS ._.
17_CD ._.
The_DT master_NN shall_MD cause_VB any_DT articles_NNS that_WDT may_MD have_VB been_VBN soiled_VBN with_IN plague_NN discharges_NNS to_TO be_VB destroyed_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT clothing_NN and_CC bedding_NN and_CC other_JJ articles_NNS of_IN personal_JJ use_NN likely_JJ to_TO retain_VB infection_NN which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN used_VBN by_IN any_DT person_NN who_WP has_VBZ suffered_VBN from_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN such_JJ vessel_NN ,_, or_CC who_WP ,_, having_VBG left_VBN such_JJ vessel_NN ,_, shall_MD have_VB suffered_VBN from_IN plague_NN during_IN the_DT stay_NN of_IN such_JJ vessel_NN in_IN the_DT port_NN to_TO be_VB also_RB destroyed_VBN ;_: and_CC if_IN the_DT master_NN shall_MD have_VB neglected_VBN to_TO do_VB so_RB before_IN the_DT vessel_NN arrives_VBZ in_IN port_NN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD forthwith_VB ,_, upon_IN the_DT direction_NN of_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP authority_NN or_CC the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP officer_NN ,_, cause_VBP the_DT same_JJ to_TO be_VB destroyed_VBN ;_: and_CC if_IN the_DT said_VBD master_NN neglect_NN to_TO comply_VB with_IN such_JJ direction_NN within_IN a_DT reasonable_JJ time_NN ,_, the_DT Sanitary_NNP authority_NN shall_MD cause_VB the_DT same_JJ to_TO be_VB carried_VBN into_IN execution_NN ._.
18_CD ._.
The_DT master_NN shall_MD cause_VB the_DT vessel_NN to_TO be_VB disinfected_VBN and_CC every_DT article_NN therein_NN ,_, other_JJ than_IN those_DT last_JJ described_VBD which_WDT may_MD probably_RB be_VB c_JJ 36_CD ?_. 282_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB disinfected_VBN or_CC destroyed_VBN ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT directions_NNS of_IN the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP officer_NN ._.
19_CD ._.
Provided_VBN facilities_NNS exist_VBP for_IN obtaining_VBG suitable_JJ water_NN in_IN the_DT port_NN ,_, the_DT master_NN shall_MD ,_, on_IN the_DT requisition_NN of_IN the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP officer_NN ,_, cause_VBP all_DT tanks_NNS to_TO be_VB completely_RB emptied_VBN and_CC cleaned_VBN and_CC disinfected_VBN in_IN such_JJ manner_NN as_IN the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP officer_NN may_MD direct_VB ._.
20_CD ._.
Any_DT mails_NNS or_CC cargo_NN which_WDT may_MD be_VB brought_VBN by_IN any_DT vessel_NNS so_IN arriving_VBG shall_MD be_VB landed_VBN under_IN such_JJ precautions_NNS as_IN the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP officer_NN may_MD deem_VB necessary_JJ to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
21_CD ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB the_DT duty_NN of_IN the_DT Port_NNP officer_NN to_TO facilitate_VB the_DT convey-_JJ ance_NN to_TO all_DT vessels_NNS detained_VBN under_IN regulations_NNS 6_CD and_CC 10_CD of_IN such_JJ supplies_NNS of_IN provisions_NNS ,_, stores_NNS or_CC other_JJ articles_NNS as_IN may_MD be_VB required_VBN by_IN those_DT on_IN board_NN ._.
Such_JJ supplies_NNS will_MD be_VB placed_VBN on_IN the_DT boats_NNS of_IN the_DT vessel_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB subsequently_RB removed_VBN by_IN members_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ crews_NNS ._.
22_CD ._.
All_DT expenses_NNS incurred_VBN by_IN any_DT Sanitary_JJ authority_NN in_IN carrying_VBG out_RP these_DT regulations_NNS shall_MD be_VB defrayed_VBN from_IN Municipal_NNP or_CC District_NNP or_CC Taluk_NNP funds_NNS in_IN such_JJ proportions_NNS as_IN the_DT District_NNP Collector_NNP may_MD ,_, subject_VB to_TO the_DT orders_NNS of_IN the_DT Local_JJ Government_NNP ,_, direct_NN ._.
23_CD ._.
Any_DT person_NN disobeying_NN or_CC contravening_VBG any_DT of_IN the_DT foregoing_JJ regulations_NNS shall_MD be_VB deemed_VBN to_TO have_VB committed_VBN an_DT offence_NN punishable_JJ under_IN section_NN 188_CD of_IN the_DT Indian_JJ Penal_NNP Code_NNP ,_, and_CC shall_MD be_VB liable_JJ on_IN conviction_NN to_TO be_VB punished_VBN with_IN imprisonment_NN of_IN either_DT description_NN for_IN a_DT term_NN which_WDT may_MD extend_VB to_TO six_CD months_NNS or_CC with_IN fine_JJ which_WDT may_MD extend_VB to_TO one_CD thousand_NN rupees_VBZ or_CC with_IN both_DT ._.
No_DT ._.

From-The_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, Home_NNP Department_NNP ,_, To-The_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Madras_NNP ,_, Local_NNP and_CC Municipal_NNP Department_NNP ._.
Madras_JJ Government_NNP G._NNP O_NNP ._.
363_CD ,_, dated_VBD 22nd_CD ,_, prescribing_VBG quaran-_JJ tine_NN rules_NNS in_IN supersession_NN of_IN those_DT in_IN force_NN under_IN Act_NNP 1_CD of_IN 1870_CD ._.

P._NNP HEWETT_NNP ,_, Esq._NNP ,_, C.I.E._NNP ,_, Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, Home_NNP Department_NNP ,_, To-The_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, General_NNP Department_NNP ._.

The_DT Chief_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Burma_NNP ._.
I_PRP am_VBP directed_VBN to_TO forward_VB ,_, for_IN the_DT information_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP Madras_NNP a_DT copy_NN of_IN a_DT translation_NN of_IN the_DT Convention_NNP framed_VBD at_IN the_DT Sani-_NNP Bengal_NNP Burma_NNP tary_JJ Conference_NNP recently_RB held_VBD at_IN Venice_NNP for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN consi-_JJ dering_NN measures_NNS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT regulations_NNS prescribed_VBN by_IN the_DT present_JJ Convention_NNP are_VBP based_VBN on_IN the_DT conclusions_NNS of_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Conferences_NNPS of_IN Venice_NNP ,_, 1892_CD ;_: Dresden_NNP ,_, 1893_CD ;_: and_CC Paris_NNP ,_, 1894_CD ;_: these_DT conclusions_NNS have_VBP been_VBN modi-_JJ fied_VBN to_TO meet_VB the_DT special_JJ pecularities_NNS of_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN accordance_NN with_IN modern_JJ scientific_JJ views_NNS regarding_VBG sanitary_JJ precautions_NNS for_IN the_DT prevention_NN of_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN epidemic_JJ disease_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT following_NN are_VBP the_DT most_RBS important_JJ points_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT pre-_NN sent_VBD Convention_NNP differs_NNS from_IN the_DT previous_JJ Conventions_NNS on_IN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ based_VBN :_: -_: (_( i_NN )_) The_DT fact_NN that_IN the_DT period_NN of_IN incubation_NN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN may_MD be_VB considerably_RB longer_JJR than_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN cholera_NN has_VBZ led_VBN to_TO several_JJ important_JJ modifications_NNS ._.
By_IN the_DT Venice_NNP Conference_NNP of_IN 1892_CD the_DT period_NN of_IN incubation_NN for_IN cholera_NN was_VBD fixed_VBN at_IN five_CD days_NNS ._.
Proposals_NNS have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN to_TO fix_VB the_DT period_NN of_IN incubation_NN for_IN plague_NN as_RB high_JJ as_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT period_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN adopted_VBN by_IN the_DT Conference_NNP for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN regulations_NNS ,_, is_VBZ ten_JJ days_NNS ._.
?_. 284_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
(_( ii_NN )_) The_DT list_NN of_IN articles_NNS of_IN commerce_NN which_WDT may_MD be_VB considered_VBN ``_`` susceptible_JJ ''_'' has_VBZ been_VBN considerably_RB increased_VBN ;_: but_CC it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN left_VBN to_TO the_DT option_NN of_IN the_DT Governments_NNS concerned_VBN to_TO allow_VB or_CC prohibit_VB the_DT importation_NN of_IN the_DT commodities_NNS ,_, on_IN the_DT ``_`` susceptible_JJ ''_'' list_NN ,_, no_DT article_NN being_VBG subject_JJ to_TO abso-_JJ lute_JJ prohibition_NN ._.
(_( iii_NN )_) It_PRP provides_VBZ that_IN the_DT modern_JJ principles_NNS of_IN disinfection_NN should_MD be_VB substituted_VBN for_IN the_DT obsolete_JJ system_NN of_IN land_NN quarantine_NN ,_, but_CC ,_, with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO the_DT protection_NN of_IN countries_NNS which_WDT may_MD find_VB it_PRP difficult_JJ to_TO thus_RB protect_VB their_PRP$ borders_NNS ,_, each_DT of_IN the_DT Governments_NNS who_WP are_VBP parties_NNS to_TO the_DT Convention_NNP is_VBZ at_IN liberty_NN to_TO close_VB its_PRP$ frontiers_NNS to_TO travellers_NNS and_CC merchandise_NN ._.
(_( iv_NN )_) It_PRP embodies_VBZ the_DT provisions_NNS of_IN the_DT Paris_NNP Convention_NNP on_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN the_DT regulation_NN of_IN the_DT pilgrim_NN traffic_NN ,_, but_CC in_IN several_JJ respects_NNS those_DT provisions_NNS have_VBP been_VBN altered_VBN in_IN the_DT directions_NNS for_IN which_WDT the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP have_VBP con-_NN tended_VBN ._.
A_DT separate_JJ communication_NN will_MD be_VB sent_VBN on_IN this_DT subject_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT first_JJ chapter_NN of_IN the_DT Convention_NNP deals_NNS with_IN the_DT measures_NNS for_IN the_DT prevention_NN of_IN plague_NN which_WDT are_VBP to_TO be_VB adopted_VBN outside_IN Europe_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT first_JJ place_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ laid_VBN down_RP that_IN the_DT Governments_NNPS who_WP adhere_RB to_TO the_DT Convention_NNP are_VBP to_TO notify_VB to_TO other_JJ Governments_NNPS the_DT existence_NN of_IN plague_NN within_IN their_PRP$ several_JJ jurisdictions_NNS ,_, and_CC must_MD communicate_VB to_TO them_PRP a_DT statement_NN of_IN the_DT measures_NNS of_IN prevention_NN that_WDT are_VBP being_VBG carried_VBN out_IN to_TO prevent_VB its_PRP$ diffusion_NN ._.
This_DT requirement_NN as_IN to_TO notifi-_JJ cation_NN is_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, subject_JJ to_TO certain_JJ important_JJ conditions_NNS ._.
Thus_RB the_DT area_NN to_TO be_VB deemed_VBN infected_JJ is_VBZ strictly_RB limited_VBN to_TO the_DT actual_JJ dis-_JJ trict_NN ,_, town_NN ,_, village_NN ,_, etc._NN ,_, where_WRB the_DT disease_NN prevails_VBZ ;_: and_CC no_DT locality_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB deemed_VBN infected_JJ merely_RB on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT importation_NN into_IN it_PRP of_IN a_DT few_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN which_WDT have_VBP led_VBN to_TO no_DT diffusion_NN of_IN the_DT malady_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
The_DT Regulations_NNP next_JJ deal_NN with_IN the_DT measures_NNS to_TO be_VB taken_VBN on_IN the_DT departure_NN of_IN vessels_NNS from_IN infected_JJ ports_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ laid_VBN down_RP that_DT every_DT person_NN sailing_VBG on_IN the_DT vessel_NN must_MD be_VB examined_VBN on_IN shore_JJR imme-_NN diately_RB before_IN embarkation_NN by_IN a_DT medical_JJ officer_NN appointed_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP and_CC that_IN the_DT Consular_NNP authority_NN interested_JJ in_IN the'ship_NN may_MD be_VB present_JJ at_IN the_DT inspection_NN ._.
All_DT infected_VBN and_CC suspected_VBN articles_NNS must_MD be_VB subjected_VBN to_TO careful_JJ disinfection_NN on_IN shore_NN and_CC in_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP medical_JJ officer_NN in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT rules_NNS for_IN disinfection_NN prescribed_VBN in_IN Chapter_NNP III_NNP of_IN the_DT Annexure_NNP to_TO the_DT Con-_NNP vention_NN and_CC no_DT persons_NNS showing_VBG symptoms_NNS of_IN plague_NN may_MD be_VB per-_JJ mitted_VBN to_TO embark_VB ._.

spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
285_CD Rules_NNS have_VBP been_VBN issued_VBN by_IN the_DT Governments_NNS of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, Madras_NNP and_CC Bengal_NNP under_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ,_, 1897_CD ,_, which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN in_IN force_NN for_IN some_DT time_NN ,_, prescribing_VBG precautions_NNS to_TO be_VB taken_VBN on_IN the_DT departure_NN of_IN vessels_NNS ._.
The_DT rules_NNS framed_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bom-_NNP bay_NN ,_, which_WDT are_VBP in_IN force_NN at_IN the_DT ports_NNS of_IN Bombay_NNP and_CC Karachi_NNP ,_, pres-_JJ cribe_NN medical_JJ inspection_NN and_CC the_DT removal_NN from_IN the_DT vessel_NN of_IN any_DT per-_JJ son_NN suspected_VBD to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN dangerous_JJ epidemic_JJ disease_NN ._.
The_DT rules_NNS framed_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Madras_NNP ,_, which_WDT are_VBP in_IN force_NN at_IN the_DT principal_JJ ports_NNS of_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP ,_, authorise_VB the_DT grant_NN of_IN a_DT bill-of-_JJ health_NN after_IN medical_JJ inspection_NN ,_, the_DT removal_NN of_IN any_DT person_NN suspected_VBN to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN or_CC not_RB to_TO be_VB free_JJ from_IN plague_JJ infection_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT infected_JJ portions_NNS of_IN the_DT ship_NN ._.
The_DT rules_NNS framed_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, which_WDT are_VBP in_IN force_NN at_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, prescribe_RB medical_JJ inspection_NN ,_, the_DT removal_NN of_IN persons_NNS suffering_VBG or_CC suspected_VBN to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT detention_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN from_IN which_WDT such_JJ persons_NNS have_VBP been_VBN removed_VBN for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN seven_CD days_NNS ,_, after_IN the_DT lapse_NN of_IN which_WDT the_DT vessel_NN may_MD proceed_VB if_IN no_DT fresh_JJ case_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN ._.
In_IN order_NN that_IN the_DT obligations_NNS imposed_VBN by_IN the_DT Convention_NNP may_MD be_VB fulfilled_VBN at_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN it_PRP is_VBZ essential_JJ that_IN the_DT medical_JJ inspec-_JJ tion_NN and_CC disinfection_NN should_MD be_VB conducted_VBN exactly_RB in_IN the_DT manner_NN pre-_JJ scribed_VBN by_IN the_DT regulations_NNS and_CC summarised_VBN above_IN ._.
The_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP consider_VBP that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ also_RB desirable_JJ that_IN all_DT non-professional_JJ attendants_NNS and_CC relatives_NNS of_IN any_DT persons_NNS ,_, who_WP on_IN examination_NN appear_NN to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ,_, shall_MD be_VB prevented_VBN from_IN embarking_VBG ._.
If_IN after_IN the_DT medical_JJ examination_NN has_VBZ been_VBN completed_VBN and_CC all_PDT the_DT passen-_JJ gers_NNS and_CC crew_NNS are_VBP on_IN board_NN ,_, a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN occurs_NNS ,_, the_DT patient_NN and_CC his_PRP$ non-professional_JJ attendants_NNS and_CC relations_NNS must_MD be_VB landed_VBN and_CC isolated_VBN on_IN the_DT first_JJ opportunity_NN ._.
The_DT ship_NN will_MD then_RB become_VB an_DT infected_JJ vessel_NN within_IN the_DT definition_NN given_VBN below_IN in_IN paragraph_NN 7_CD ._.
Although_IN the_DT ports_NNS of_IN Madras_NNP and_CC Calcutta_NNP are_VBP not_RB infected_VBN ,_, the_DT Local_JJ Governments_NNS have_VBP ,_, with_IN the_DT approval_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, made_VBD the_DT special_JJ rules_NNS for_IN medical_JJ inspection_NN referred_VBD to_TO above_VB ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ desirable_JJ that_IN they_PRP should_MD be_VB assimilated_VBN ,_, in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN vessels_NNS sailing_VBG for_IN ports_NNS out_IN of_IN India_NNP ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ to_TO those_DT which_WDT will_MD ,_, under_IN the_DT terms_NNS of_IN the_DT Convention_NNP ,_, have_VBP to_TO be_VB adopted_VBN at_IN the_DT infected_JJ ports_NNS of_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.
Bombay_NNP I_PRP am_VBP to_TO request_VB that_IN the_DT rules_NNS issued_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Madras_NNP Burma_NNP may_MD be_VB altered_VBN in_IN accordance_NN with_IN these_DT instructions_NNS ._.
The_DT rules_NNS ?_. 286_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
should_MD be_VB made_VBN applicable_JJ to_TO all_DT infected_VBN ports_NNS in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.
6_CD ._.
The_DT rules_NNS regarding_VBG pilgrim-ships_NNS which_WDT form_VBP the_DT next_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT regulations_NNS will_MD ,_, as_IN stated_VBN in_IN paragraph_NN 3_CD above_IN ,_, be_VB dealt_VBN with_IN in_IN a_DT separate_JJ communication_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
The_DT regulations_NNS for_IN the_DT control_NN of_IN the_DT general_JJ traffic_NN in_IN the_DT Red_NNP Sea_NNP and_CC the_DT Suez_NNP Canal_NNP are_VBP based_VBN on_IN the_DT threefold_JJ classification_NN of_IN ships_NNS into_IN healthy_JJ ,_, suspected_JJ and_CC infected_JJ adopted_VBN in_IN the_DT Venice_NNP Con-_NNP vention_NN of_IN 1892_CD ,_, with_IN the_DT modifications_NNS rendered_VBD necessary_JJ owing_NN to_TO the_DT period_NN of_IN incubation_NN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN having_VBG been_VBN fixed_VBN at_IN ten_JJ days_NNS ._.
Healthy_JJ vessels_NNS are_VBP those_DT which_WDT have_VBP left_VBN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS or_CC more_JJR and_CC have_VB had_VBN no_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN ;_: suspected_VBN vessels_NNS are_VBP those_DT on_IN which_WDT ,_, though_IN cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN have_VBP occurred_VBN ,_, no_DT fresh_JJ case_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN within_IN twelve_NN days_NNS ;_: and_CC infected_VBN vessels_NNS are_VBP those_DT on_IN which_WDT plague_NN has_VBZ been_VBN present_JJ within_IN twelve_JJ days_NNS of_IN arrival_NN ._.
The_DT period_NN of_IN twelve_JJ days_NNS is_VBZ arrived_VBN at_IN ,_, as_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT seven_CD days_NNS '_POS period_NN in_IN the_DT Convention_NN of_IN 1892_CD ,_, by_IN adding_VBG two_CD days_NNS to_TO the_DT period_NN of_IN incubation_NN ._.
A_DT healthy_JJ vessel_NN thus_RB becomes_RB entitled_VBN to_TO free_VB pratique_NN at_IN a_DT port_NN at_IN which_WDT it_PRP arrives_VBZ ten_JJ days_NNS or_CC more_JJR after_IN leaving_VBG an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT adoption_NN of_IN this_DT period_NN has_VBZ the_DT serious_JJ result_NN that_IN fast_NN vessels_NNS sailing_VBG from_IN Bombay_NNP will_MD arrive_VB at_IN the_DT Suez_NNP Canal_NNP before_IN pratique_NN can_MD be_VB granted_VBN ._.
This_DT difficulty_NN has_VBZ been_VBN satisfactorily_RB overcome_VBN by_IN permitting_VBG healthy_JJ vessels_NNS to_TO pass_VB through_IN the_DT Canal_NNP in_IN quarantine_NN and_CC to_TO complete_VB in_IN the_DT Mediterranean_NNP the_DT ten_JJ days_NNS necessary_JJ to_TO receiving_VBG free_JJ pratique_NN at_IN a_DT port_NN of_IN arrival_NN ._.
Vessels_NNS passing_VBG through_IN the_DT Canal_NNP in_IN quarantine_NN may_MD ,_, subject_VB to_TO the_DT use_NN of_IN electric_JJ light_NN ,_, coal_NN in_IN quarantine_NN at_IN Port_NNP Said_NNP by_IN night_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN by_IN day_NN ,_, and_CC passengers_NNS may_MD embark_VB in_IN quarantine_NN at_IN that_DT port_NN ._.
The_DT rules_NNS for_IN infected_JJ and_CC suspected_JJ ships_NNS follow_VBP those_DT of_IN the_DT Venice_NNP Convention_NNP of_IN 1892_CD ._.
Vessels_NNS carrying_VBG a_DT doctor_NN and_CC a_DT disinfecting_NN stove_NN are_VBP allowed_VBN to_TO pass_VB through_IN the_DT Canal_NNP in_IN quarantine_NN after_IN ,_, in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN infected_JJ vessels_NNS ,_, landing_VBG those_DT suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN and_CC persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP been_VBN in_IN actual_JJ contact_NN with_IN the_DT sick_NN or_CC with_IN infected_JJ articles_NNS and_CC after_IN disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT infected_JJ compart-_JJ ment_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN ._.
Vessels_NNS without_IN a_DT doctor_NN and_CC disinfecting_NN stove_NN are_VBP detained_VBN at_IN Moses_NNP '_POS Wells_NNP ._.
Such_JJ vessels_NNS if_IN suspected_VBN are_VBP detained_VBN for_IN the_DT period_NN required_VBN for_IN disinfection_NN and_CC for_IN ascertaining_VBG the_DT con-_JJ dition_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN 's_POS health_NN ,_, while_IN ,_, if_IN infected_VBN ,_, the_DT passengers_NNS are_VBP detained_VBN on_IN shore_NN under_IN observation_NN for_IN a_DT maximum_JJ period_NN of_IN ten_JJ days_NNS ._.
The_DT medical_JJ and_CC sanitary_JJ staff_NN at_IN Moses_NNP '_POS Wells_NNP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB in-_JJ creased_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN carrying_VBG out_IN these_DT regulations_NNS ._.

The_DT last_JJ matter_NN to_TO notice_VB in_IN the_DT chapter_NN of_IN the_DT regulations_NNS dealing_VBG with_IN the_DT measures_NNS to_TO be_VB adopted_VBN against_IN the_DT plague_NN outside_IN Europe_NNP is_VBZ that_IN of_IN the_DT measures_NNS to_TO be_VB taken_VBN in_IN the_DT Persian_NNP Gulf_NNP ._.
The_DT conclusions_NNS of_IN the_DT Conference_NN on_IN this_DT question_NN differ_VBP greatly_RB from_IN those_DT embodied_VBN in_IN the_DT Paris_NNP Convention_NNP ._.
Healthy_JJ vessels_NNS reaching_VBG Ormuz_NNP before_IN the_DT expiration_NN of_IN ten_JJ days_NNS since_IN they_PRP last_JJ touched_VBD at_IN a_DT port_NN infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN must_MD either_VB complete_JJ that_IN period_NN at_IN Ormuz_NNP or_CC may_MD ,_, after_IN medical_JJ inspection_NN ,_, continue_VBP their_PRP$ voyage_NN up_RP the_DT Gulf_NNP or_CC the_DT Shatt-ul-Arab_JJ ,_, provided_VBD they_PRP do_VBP so_RB in_IN quarantine_NN for_IN such_JJ term_NN as_IN is_VBZ required_VBN to_TO complete_VB the_DT ten_JJ days_NNS ._.
The_DT same_JJ provision_NN will_MD apply_VB to_TO suspected_VBN vessels_NNS ,_, that_DT is_VBZ vessels_NNS on_IN which_WDT there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, but_CC no_DT fresh_JJ case_NN for_IN twelve_NN days_NNS ,_, subject_JJ to_TO sub-_JJ mission_NN to_TO certain_JJ processes_NNS of_IN disinfection_NN ,_, etc._FW ,_, at_IN Ormuz_NNP ;_: and_CC infected_VBN vessels_NNS will_MD ,_, after_IN landing_VBG their_PRP$ sick_NN ,_, together_RB with_IN those_DT persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP been_VBN in_IN actual_JJ contact_NN with_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC after_IN disin-_JJ fection_NN of_IN that_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN deemed_VBD to_TO be_VB infected_VBN ,_, likewise_RB have_VBP permission_NN to_TO proceed_VB on_IN their_PRP$ voyage_NN in_IN quarantine_NN ._.
The_DT final_JJ arrangements_NNS as_IN to_TO the_DT sanitary_JJ station_NN at_IN Ormuz_NNP are_VBP to_TO be_VB a_DT matter_NN of_IN agreement_NN between_IN the_DT Turkish_NNP aud_NN Persian_JJ Governments_NNP ,_, and_CC until_IN these_DT arrangements_NNS are_VBP completed_VBN a_DT temporary_JJ sanitary_JJ station_NN will_MD be_VB established_VBN on_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT islands_NNS in_IN the_DT Straits_NNP of_IN Ormuz_NNP ._.
9_CD ._.
The_DT second_JJ chapter_NN of_IN the_DT regulation_NN deals_NNS with_IN the_DT measures_NNS to_TO be_VB adopted_VBN by_IN the_DT European_JJ Governments_NNS who_WP have_VBP assented_VBN to_TO the_DT terms_NNS of_IN the_DT Convention_NNP ._.
The_DT provisions_NNS relating_VBG to_TO notification_NN have_VB been_VBN mentioned_VBN in_IN paragraph_NN 4_CD above_IN ._.
Allusion_NN has_VBZ also_RB been_VBN made_VBN in_IN paragraph_NN 3_CD to_TO the_DT regulations_NNS regarding_VBG the_DT importation_NN of_IN merchandise_NN ._.
This_DT matter_NN requires_VBZ some_DT further_JJ notice_NN ._.
The_DT following_NN are_VBP the_DT commodities_NNS which_WDT are_VBP classed_VBN as_IN susceptible_JJ and_CC the_DT import_NN of_IN which_WDT may_MD be_VB prohibited_VBN :_: (_( 1_CD )_) Used_VBN body_NN linen_NN ,_, clothes_NNS ,_, bedding_NN and_CC other_JJ personal_JJ effects_NNS ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) Rags_NNP ,_, including_VBG rags_NNS compressed_VBN by_IN hydraulic_JJ pressure_NN and_CC transported_VBN in_IN bales_NNS as_IN merchandise_NN ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) Used_VBN sacking_NN ,_, carpets_NNS ,_, and_CC old_JJ embroidery_NN ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) Green_NNP and_CC untanned_VBD hides_NNS and_CC skins_NNS ._.
(_( 5_CD )_) Animal_NNP refuse_NN ,_, claws_NN ,_, hoofs_NN ,_, horsehair_NN ,_, hair_NN of_IN animals_NNS gen-_JJ erally_RB ,_, raw_JJ silk_NN and_CC wool_NN ._.
(_( 6_CD )_) Human_NNP hair_NN ._.
The_DT prohibition_NN of_IN import_NN is_VBZ only_RB to_TO be_VB enforced_VBN at_IN the_DT option_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP concerned_VBD ._.
The_DT only_JJ articles_NNS which_WDT must_MD of_IN neces-_JJ sity_NN be_VB subjected_VBN on_IN arrival_NN to_TO any_DT precautionary_JJ measures_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN disinfection_NN ,_, are_VBP clothing_VBG ,_, bedding_VBG and_CC similar_JJ articles_NNS ,_, which_WDT have_VBP ?_. 288_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.

The_DT portion_NN of_IN Chapter_NNP II_NNP which_WDT relates_VBZ to_TO traffic_NN by_IN sea_NN and_CC the_DT measures_NNS to_TO be_VB adopted_VBN at_IN ports_NNS of_IN arrival_NN is_VBZ of_IN great_JJ interest_NN ,_, not_RB only_RB because_IN of_IN its_PRP$ direct_JJ bearing_NN on_IN the_DT conditions_NNS of_IN intercourse_NN between_IN India_NNP and_CC Europe_NNP ,_, but_CC also_RB because_IN it_PRP contains_VBZ the_DT conclu-_JJ sions_NNS of_IN the_DT Conference_NNP on_IN the_DT important_JJ subject_NN of_IN the_DT quarantine_NN of_IN vessels_NNS ._.
The_DT threefold_JJ division_NN of_IN vessels_NNS ,_, referred_VBD to_TO above_VB ,_, is_VBZ maintained_VBN in_IN this_DT chapter_NN ._.
The_DT regulations_NNS respecting_VBG infected_JJ vessels_NNS are_VBP that_IN the_DT sick_NN are_VBP to_TO be_VB landed_VBN and_CC isolated_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT remainder_NN of_IN those_DT on_IN board_NN to_TO be_VB subjected_VBN ,_, at_IN the_DT discretion_NN of_IN the_DT local_JJ author-_JJ ity_NN ,_, either_RB to_TO ``_`` observation_NN ''_'' or_CC to_TO ``_`` surveillance_VB ''_'' for_IN a_DT period_NN which_WDT is_VBZ not_RB to_TO exceed_VB ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
The_DT term_NN ``_`` observation_NN ''_'' means_VBZ the_DT detention_NN under_IN obser-_JJ vation_NN of_IN the_DT person_NN either_DT on_IN board_NN a_DT ship_NN or_CC in_IN a_DT place_NN of_IN segre-_JJ gation_NN on_IN shore_NN ._.
Persons_NNS subjected_VBD to_TO ``_`` surveillance_NN ''_'' are_VBP not_RB to_TO be_VB isolated_VBN ,_, but_CC are_VBP to_TO be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO proceed_VB at_IN once_RB to_TO their_PRP$ destination_NN where_WRB they_PRP are_VBP to_TO remain_VB under_IN medical_JJ supervision_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN an_DT infected_JJ ship_NN the_DT dirty_JJ linen_NN and_CC other_JJ effects_NNS of_IN the_DT passengers_NNS and_CC crew_NN which_WDT the_DT local_JJ sanitary_JJ authorities_NNS may_MD consider_VB likely_JJ to_TO be_VB contaminated_VBN ,_, must_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN ._.
So_RB also_RB must_MD the_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT ship_NN where_WRB the_DT sick_NN have_VBP resided_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT local_JJ authorities_NNS may_MD require_VB a_DT more_RBR extensive_JJ disinfection_NN to_TO be_VB carried_VBN out_RP ._.
Lastly_RB the_DT bilge-water_NN must_MD be_VB thrown_VBN out_RP after_IN disinfection_NN and_CC fresh_JJ drinking-water_NN supplied_VBN ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN suspected_JJ vessels_NNS ,_, a_DT medical_JJ inspection_NN and_CC the_DT same_JJ process_NN of_IN disinfection_NN ,_, discharge_NN of_IN bilge-water_NN and_CC supply_NN of_IN fresh_JJ drinking-water_NN is_VBZ prescribed_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ further_RBR recommended_VBD that_IN the_DT crew_NN and_CC passengers_NNS should_MD be_VB subjected_VBN to_TO ``_`` surveillance_VB ''_'' for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN arrival_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN ._.

The_DT quarantine_NN rules_NNS made_VBN by_IN the_DT Governments_NNS of_IN Madras_NNP ,_, Bengal_NNP and_CC Burma_NNP under_IN the_DT powers_NNS conferred_VBN by_IN section_NN 1_CD ,_, Act_NNP I_PRP of_IN 1870_CD ,_, with_IN the_DT previous_JJ sanction_NN of_IN the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Coun-_NNP cil_NN to_TO protect_VB their_PRP$ ports_NNS from_IN being_VBG regarded_VBN by_IN the_DT European_JJ powers_NNS as_IN infected_JJ ,_, prescribe_JJ fifteen_JJ days_NNS '_POS quarantine_NN for_IN all_DT vessels_NNS in_IN which_WDT a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN is_VBZ found_VBN on_IN arrival_NN ,_, or_CC on_IN which_WDT it_PRP is_VBZ believed_VBN that_IN a_DT case_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN during_IN the_DT voyage_NN ,_, with_IN this_DT exception_NN that_IN the_DT rules_NNS for_IN Calcutta_NNP apparently_RB prescribe_VBZ only_RB eight_CD days_NNS '_POS quarantine_NN in_IN the_DT latter_JJ case_NN ._.

The_DT period_NN of_IN fifteen_JJ days_NNS '_POS quarantine_NN was_VBD fixed_VBN in_IN view_NN of_IN the_DT possibility_NN that_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT Governments_NNS in_IN Europe_NNP might_MD not_RB regard_VB quarantine_NN as_IN effective_JJ if_IN it_PRP were_VBD prescribed_VBN for_IN a_DT shorter_JJR period_NN ,_, but_CC now_RB that_IN the_DT Conference_NNP has_VBZ authoritatively_RB pronounced_VBN that_IN the_DT period_NN of_IN incubation_NN may_MD be_VB taken_VBN at_IN ten_JJ days_NNS ,_, the_DT period_NN of_IN observa-_JJ tion_NN should_MD be_VB reduced_VBN from_IN fifteen_NN to_TO ten_VB days_NNS ._.

Having_VBG decided_VBN to_TO concert_VB measures_NNS for_IN the_DT prevention_NN of_IN the_DT introduction_NN and_CC spread_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN the_DT necessary_JJ sanitary_JJ supervision_NN of_IN the_DT Red_NNP Sea_NNP and_CC Persian_NNP Gulf_NNP traffic_NN ,_, have_VBP nominated_VBN their_PRP$ plenipotentiaries_NNS as_IN follows_VBZ :_: -_: [_NN Here_RB follow_VBP the_DT names_NNS of_IN the_DT plenipotentiaries_NNS nominated_VBN by_IN the_DT several_JJ Governments_NNP ._. ]_NN
These_DT plenipotentiaries_NNS ,_, having_VBG exchanged_VBN their_PRP$ full_JJ powers_NNS ,_, and_CC found_VBD them_PRP in_IN due_JJ and_CC proper_JJ form_NN ,_, are_VBP agreed_VBN on_IN the_DT following_JJ regu-_JJ lations_NNS with_IN regard_NN to_TO districts_NNS infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN regard_NN to_TO arrivals_NNS from_IN those_DT districts_NNS :_: 1_CD ._.
The_DT measures_NNS described_VBN in_IN the_DT General_NNP Sanitary_NNP Regulations_NNP for_IN the_DT prevention_NN of_IN the_DT introduction_NN and_CC spread_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, annex-_JJ ed_NN to_TO the_DT present_JJ Convention_NNP ,_, are_VBP adopted_VBN and_CC have_VBP the_DT same_JJ force_NN as_IN if_IN they_PRP were_VBD embodied_VBN in_IN it_PRP ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT proper_JJ authorities_NNS in_IN Morocco_NNP will_MD be_VB requested_VBN to_TO apply_VB ,_, to_TO the_DT ports_NNS of_IN that_DT country_NN ,_, measures_NNS in_IN conformity_NN with_IN those_DT prescribed_VBN in_IN the_DT above_NN mentioned_VBD rules_NNS ._.
3_CD ._.
Those_DT countries_NNS which_WDT have_VBP not_RB taken_VBN part_NN in_IN the_DT Conference_NNP ,_, or_CC which_WDT have_VBP not_RB signed_VBN the_DT Convention_NNP ,_, may_MD ,_, on_IN demand_NN ,_, be_VB per-_JJ mitted_VBN to_TO become_VB parties_NNS to_TO it_PRP ._.
APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
293_CD The_DT fact_NN will_MD be_VB notified_VBN ,_, through_IN diplomatic_JJ channels_NNS ,_, to_TO the_DT Italian_JJ Government_NNP ,_, and_CC by_IN the_DT latter_NN to_TO the_DT other_JJ Governments_NNS who_WP are_VBP parties_NNS to_TO the_DT Convention_NNP ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT present_JJ Convention_NNP will_MD remain_VB in_IN force_NN for_IN five_CD years_NNS ,_, dat-_JJ ing_NN from_IN the_DT exchange_NN of_IN ratifications_NNS ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB renewed_VBN every_DT five_CD years_NNS ,_, by_IN tacit_JJ consent_NN ,_, unless_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT high_JJ contracting_NN parties_NNS notifies_NNS ,_, six_CD months_NNS before_IN the_DT expiration_NN of_IN the_DT aforesaid_JJ period_NN of_IN five_CD years_NNS ,_, its_PRP$ intention_NN to_TO withdraw_VB from_IN it_PRP ._.
In_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT powers_NNS withdrawing_VBG from_IN the_DT Conven-_NNP tion_NN ,_, this_DT withdrawal_NN will_MD only_RB effect_NN that_DT power_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
The_DT high_JJ contracting_NN parties_NNS reserve_VBP to_TO themselves_PRP the_DT right_NN of_IN suggesting_NN ,_, through_IN diplomatic_JJ channels_NNS ,_, any_DT modifications_NNS which_WDT they_PRP may_MD deem_VB necessary_JJ in_IN the_DT Convention_NNP or_CC its_PRP$ annexures_NNS ._.
The_DT Convention_NNP will_MD be_VB ratified_VBN ;_: the_DT ratifications_NNS will_MD be_VB deposited_VBN at_IN Rome_NNP ,_, as_RB soon_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, and_CC ,_, at_IN the_DT latest_JJS ,_, within_IN one_CD year_NN from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN signature_NN ._.
In_IN witness_JJ whereof_IN the_DT respective_JJ plenipotentiaries_NNS have_VBP signed_VBN and_CC sealed_VBN the_DT Convention_NNP ._.
Executed_VBN at_IN Venice_NNP ,_, in_IN eighteen_JJ parts_NNS ,_, on_IN the_DT 19th_CD March_NNP 1897_CD ._.
GENERAL_NNP RULES_NNP FOR_IN THE_NNP PREVENTION_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP INTRODUCTION_NNP AND_NNP SPREAD_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP PLAGUE_NNP ._.
CHAPTER_NN I_PRP ._.
Measures_NNS to_TO be_VB taken_VBN out_IN of_IN Europe_NNP ._.
I_PRP ._.
NOTIFICATION_NN ._.
The_DT Government_NNP of_IN each_DT country_NN which_WDT adheres_VBZ to_TO the_DT present_JJ Convention_NNP will_MD notify_VB to_TO the_DT Governments_NNS of_IN the_DT other_JJ countries_NNS ,_, by_IN telegram_NN ,_, the_DT appearance_NN of_IN any_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN their_PRP$ territories_NNS in_IN accordance_NN with_IN section_NN I_PRP ,_, Chapter_NNP II_NNP ,_, ``_`` Measures_NNS to_TO be_VB taken_VBN in_IN Europe_NNP ._. ''_''
Sections_NNS 2_CD ,_, 3_CD and_CC 4_CD of_IN the_DT same_JJ chapter_NN are_VBP also_RB applic-_JJ able_JJ out_IN of_IN Europe_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ also_RB desirable_JJ that_IN the_DT measures_NNS prescribed_VBN for_IN countries_NNS in_IN Europe_NNP in_IN order_NN to_TO keep_VB the_DT signatories_NNS of_IN the_DT Convention_NNP informed_NN of_IN an_DT outbreak_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, and_CC also_RB the_DT means_NNS adopted_VBN to_TO prevent_VB its_PRP$ propagation_NN ,_, and_CC importation_NN into_IN uninfected_JJ countries_NNS ,_, should_MD be_VB applied_VBN in_IN other_JJ countries_NNS ._.
