II_NNP ._.
SANITARY_NNP MEASURES_NNP FOR_NNP SHIPS_NNP SAILING_NNP FROM_NNP INFECTED_NNP PORTS_NNP ._.
MEASURES_NNP APPLICABLE_NNP BOTH_NNP TO_NNP ORDINARY_NNP VESSELS_NNP AND_NNP TO_NNP PILGRIM_NNP SHIPS_NNP ._.
1_CD ._.
Compulsory_NNP individual_JJ medical_JJ inspection_NN ,_, by_IN day_NN ,_, on_IN shore_NN ,_, at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN embarkation_NN ,_, during_IN such_JJ period_NN as_IN may_MD be_VB necessary_JJ ,_, by_IN a_DT doctor_NN appointed_VBN by_IN public_JJ authority_NN ,_, on_IN each_DT person_NN sailing_VBG on_IN the_DT ship_NN ._.
The_DT Consular_NNP authority_NN interested_JJ in_IN the_DT ship_NN may_MD be_VB present_JJ at_IN this_DT inspection_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
Compulsory_NN and_CC rigorous_JJ disinfection_NN ,_, on_IN shore_NN ,_, under_IN the_DT superintendence_NN of_IN a_DT doctor_NN appointed_VBN by_IN public_JJ authority_NN ,_, of_IN every_DT contaminated_VBN or_CC suspected_VBN article_NN in_IN the_DT manner_NN prescribed_VBN in_IN paragraph_NN 5_CD ,_, Chapter_NNP III_NNP of_IN the_DT annexure_NN to_TO this_DT Convention_NNP ._.
3_CD ._.
Prevention_NN of_IN the_DT embarkation_NN of_IN any_DT person_NN showing_VBG symptoms_NNS of_IN plague_NN ._.
PILGRIM_NNP SHIPS_NNP ._.
1_CD ._.
When_WRB there_EX is_VBZ plague_NN in_IN the_DT port_NN ,_, embarkation_NN on_IN board_NN pilgrim_JJ ships_NNS must_MD not_RB take_VB place_NN ,_, until_IN the_DT pilgrims_NNS collected_VBN in_IN groups_NNS have_VBP been_VBN subjected_VBN to_TO an_DT inspection_NN sufficient_NN to_TO ascertain_VB that_IN none_NN of_IN them_PRP are_VBP suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB understood_JJ that_IN in_IN carrying_VBG out_RP this_DT measure_NN each_DT Gov-_NNP ernment_NN may_MD take_VB into_IN account_NN local_JJ considerations_NNS and_CC conditions_NNS ._.
*_RB 2_CD ._.
Pilgrims_NNS must_MD possess_VB the_DT means_NNS absolutely_RB necessary_JJ for_IN the_DT accomplishment_NN of_IN the_DT pilgrimage_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT voyage_NN out_RP and_CC for_IN the_DT return_NN voyage_NN and_CC for_IN the_DT sojourn_NN in_IN the_DT holy_JJ places_NNS ,_, if_IN local_JJ circum-_JJ stances_NNS permit_NN of_IN this_DT rule_NN being_VBG enforced_VBN ._.
MEASURES_NNP TO_NNP BE_NNP TAKEN_NNP ON_NNP BOARD_NNP PILGRIM_NNP SHIPS_NNP ._.
SECTION_NNP I.-General_JJ Rules_NNP ._.
Art_NN ._.
1.-The_JJ following_JJ regulations_NNS are_VBP applicable_JJ to_TO pilgrim_VB ships_NNS which_WDT carry_VBP Muhammadan_NNP pilgrims_NNS to_TO or_CC from_IN the_DT Hedjaz_NNP or_CC the_DT Persian_JJ Gulf_NNP ._.
Art_NN ._.
2.-A_JJ ship_NN is_VBZ not_RB to_TO be_VB considered_VBN a_DT pilgrim_JJ ship_NN although_IN ,_, in_IN addition_NN to_TO her_PRP$ ordinary_JJ passengers_NNS ,_, among_IN whom_WP may_MD be_VB included_VBN pilgrims_NNS of_IN the_DT upper_JJ classes_NNS ,_, it_PRP carries_VBZ pilgrims_NNS of_IN the_DT lowest_JJS class_NN in_IN a_DT less_JJR proportion_NN than_IN one_CD pilgrim_JJ per_IN 100_CD tons_NNS gross_JJ ._.
*_IN The_DT Conference_NNP has_VBZ decided_VBN ,_, for_IN instance_NN ,_, that_DT ,_, in_IN the_DT Dutch_JJ Indies_NNPS ,_, this_DT inspection_NN may_MD be_VB made_VBN on_IN boardship_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN departure_NN ._.

spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
295_CD Art_NNP ._.

Art_NN ._.
4.-Steamers_NNS only_RB are_VBP permitted_VBN to_TO carry_VB pilgrims_NNS on_IN long_JJ voyages_NNS ._.
The_DT carriage_NN of_IN pilgrims_NNS by_IN other_JJ ships_NNS on_IN such_JJ voyages_NNS is_VBZ prohibited_VBN ._.
Pilgrim_NNP ships_NNS ,_, on_IN coasting_VBG service_NN ,_, intended_VBN for_IN short_JJ passages_NNS called_VBN ``_`` coasting_NN voyages_NNS ,_, ''_'' must_MD obey_VB the_DT instructions_NNS contained_VBN in_IN the_DT special_JJ rules_NNS mentioned_VBN in_IN article_NN 3_CD ._.
SECTION_NN II.-Measures_NNS to_TO be_VB taken_VBN before_IN departure_NN ._.
Art_NN ._.
5.-The_JJ captain_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN default_NN the_DT proprietor_NN or_CC agent_NN of_IN every_DT pilgrim_NN ship_NN ,_, is_VBZ bound_VBN to_TO declare_VB to_TO the_DT appointed_VBN authority*_NN of_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN departure_NN his_PRP$ intention_NN to_TO embark_VB pilgrims_NNS ,_, at_IN least_JJS three_CD days_NNS before_IN departure_NN ._.
This_DT declaration_NN must_MD state_NN the_DT proposed_VBN date_NN of_IN departure_NN and_CC destination_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN ._.
Art_NN ._.
6.-On_JJ receipt_NN of_IN this_DT declaration_NN ,_, the_DT appointed_VBN authority_NN will_MD proceed_VB ,_, at_IN the_DT expense_NN of_IN the_DT captain_NN ,_, to_TO inspect_VB and_CC measure_VB the_DT vessel_NN ._.
The_DT Consular_NNP authority_NN interested_JJ in_IN the_DT ship_NN may_MD be_VB present_JJ at_IN this_DT inspection_NN ._.
The_DT inspection_NN need_MD not_RB be_VB performed_VBN if_IN the_DT captain_NN is_VBZ already_RB furnished_VBN with_IN an_DT official_JJ certificate_NN of_IN measurement_NN ,_, unless_IN it_PRP is_VBZ believed_VBN that_IN this_DT document_NN no_RB longer_RB corresponds_VBZ to_TO the_DT actual_JJ state_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN ._.
Art_NN ._.
7.-The_JJ appointed_VBN authority_NN must_MD not_RB permit_VB the_DT departure_NN of_IN a_DT pilgrim_JJ ship_NN until_IN he_PRP has_VBZ satisfied_VBN himself_PRP :_: (_( a_DT )_) That_IN the_DT ship_NN has_VBZ been_VBN thoroughly_RB cleaned_VBN and_CC ,_, if_IN necessary_JJ ,_, disinfected_VBN ._.
(_( b_NN )_) That_IN the_DT ship_NN is_VBZ in_IN a_DT condition_NN to_TO undertake_VB the_DT voyage_NN with-_JJ out_IN danger_NN ,_, that_IN she_PRP is_VBZ properly_RB manned_VBN ,_, equipped_VBN and_CC ventilated_VBN ,_, and_CC provided_VBD with_IN a_DT sufficient_JJ number_NN of_IN boats_NNS ;_: that_IN there_EX is_VBZ on_IN board_NN nothing_NN that_WDT is_VBZ ,_, or_CC is_VBZ likely_JJ to_TO be-_JJ come_NN ,_, injurious_JJ to_TO the_DT health_NN or_CC safety_NN of_IN the_DT passengers_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT upper_JJ and_CC lower_JJR decks_NNS are_VBP of_IN wood_NN ,_, or_CC of_IN iron_NN sheathed_VBN in_IN wood_NN ._.
*_IN The_DT appointed_VBN authority_NN is_VBZ :_: in_IN British_NNP India_NNP ,_, an_DT officer_NN appointed_VBN on_IN this_DT behalf_NN by_IN the_DT Local_JJ Government_NNP (_( Native_JJ Passengers_NNP Ships_NNP Act_NNP ,_, 1887_CD ,_, article_NN 7_CD )_) ;_: in_IN the_DT Dutch_JJ Indies_NNP ,_, the_DT captain_NN of_IN the_DT port_NN ;_: in_IN Turkey_NNP ,_, the_DT sanitary_JJ authority_NN ;_: in_IN Austro-Hungary_NNP ,_, the_DT port_JJ officer_NN ;_: in_IN Italy_NNP ,_, the_DT captain_NN of_IN the_DT port_NN ;_: in_IN France_NNP ,_, Tunis_NNP and_CC Spain_NNP ,_, the_DT sani-_JJ tary_JJ authority_NN ;_: in_IN Egypt_NNP ,_, the_DT sanitary_JJ ,_, quarantine_JJ ,_, etc._FW ,_, authority_NN ._.

IX_NNP (_( c_NN )_) That_IN there_EX is_VBZ on_IN board_NN ,_, properly_RB stowed_VBN away_RB ,_, over_IN and_CC above_IN the_DT rations_NNS for_IN the_DT crew_NN ,_, sufficient_JJ food_NN and_CC fuel_NN for_IN all_PDT the_DT pilgrims_NNS ,_, during_IN the_DT declared_JJ duration_NN of_IN the_DT voyage_NN ._.
(_( d_NN )_) That_IN the_DT drinking-water_NN is_VBZ of_IN good_JJ quality_NN and_CC from_IN a_DT source_NN protected_VBN from_IN contamination_NN ;_: that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ in_IN sufficient_JJ quan-_JJ tity_NN ;_: that_IN the_DT tanks_NNS for_IN drinking-water_NN are_VBP safe_JJ from_IN all_DT contamination_NN and_CC so_RB closed_VBD that_IN the_DT distribution_NN of_IN water_NN can_MD only_RB be_VB made_VBN by_IN taps_NNS or_CC pumps_NNS ._.
(_( e_NN )_) That_IN the_DT vessel_NN carries_VBZ a_DT condenser_NN ,_, capable_JJ of_IN distilling_VBG a_DT minimum_JJ quantity_NN of_IN 1_CD gallon_NN of_IN water_NN per_IN diem_NN ,_, for_IN every_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, including_VBG crew_NN ._.
(_( f_NN )_) That_IN the_DT ship_NN possesses_VBZ a_DT disinfecting_NN stove_NN ,_, certified_VBN to_TO be_VB safe_JJ and_CC efficacious_JJ ._.
(_( g_NN )_) That_DT ,_, in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT rules_NNS laid_VBP down_RP in_IN articles_NNS II_NNP and_CC 23_CD ,_, the_DT vessel_NN carries_VBZ a_DT diplomaed_NN and_CC licensed_VBD doctor_NN ,_, *_NNP appointed_VBD either_RB by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN the_DT country_NN to_TO which_WDT she_PRP belongs_VBZ or_CC by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN the_DT port_NN where_WRB the_DT pilgrims_NNS embark_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN she_PRP carries_VBZ medical_JJ stores_NNS ._.
(_( h_NN )_) That_IN the_DT deck_NN is_VBZ free_JJ from_IN merchandise_NN and_CC all_DT encum-_JJ brances_NNS ._.
(_( i_NN )_) That_IN the_DT arrangements_NNS on_IN board_NN are_VBP such_JJ as_IN to_TO allow_VB of_IN the_DT measures_NNS prescribed_VBN in_IN section_NN III_NNP being_VBG carried_VBN out_RP ._.
Art_NN ._.
8.-The_JJ captain_NN will_MD cause_VB notices_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT languages_NNS com-_VBP monly_RB spoken_VBN by_IN the_DT pilgrims_NNS ,_, to_TO be_VB posted_VBN up_RP in_IN a_DT conspicuous_JJ place_NN ,_, accessible_JJ to_TO all_DT concerned_VBN ,_, showing_VBG :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) the_DT destination_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN ;_: (_( 2_CD )_) the_DT daily_JJ ration_NN of_IN food_NN and_CC water_NN allowed_VBN to_TO each_DT pilgrim_NN ;_: (_( 3_CD )_) the_DT price_NN of_IN articles_NNS not_RB included_VBN in_IN the_DT daily_JJ ration_NN ,_, which_WDT can_MD be_VB procured_VBN on_IN extra_JJ payment_NN ._.
Art_NN ._.

10.-The_JJ appointed_VBN authority_NN will_MD take_VB stringent_JJ measures_NNS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT embarkation_NN of_IN any_DT suspicious_JJ person_NN or_CC article_NN ,_, *_NN in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT rules_NNS laid_VBP down_RP for_IN precautions_NNS to_TO be_VB taken_VBN in_IN ports_NNS ._.
SECTION_NN III.-Precaution_NN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN on_IN the_DT voyage_NN ._.
Art_NN ._.
11.-Every_JJ ship_NN embarking_VBG pilgrims_NNS should_MD have_VB on_IN board_NN a_DT licensed_VBN doctor_NN ,_, appointed_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN the_DT country_NN to_TO which_WDT the_DT ship_NN belongs_VBZ ,_, or_CC by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN the_DT port_NN where_WRB the_DT pilgrims_NNS are_VBP embarked_VBN ._.
A_DT second_JJ doctor_NN should_MD be_VB carried_VBN when_WRB the_DT number_NN of_IN pilgrims_NNS exceeds_NNS 1,000_CD ._.
Art_NN ._.
12.-The_JJ doctor_NN must_MD inspect_VB the_DT pilgrims_NNS ,_, tend_VBP the_DT sick_NN ,_, and_CC see_VBP that_IN sanitary_JJ rules_NNS are_VBP observed_VBN on_IN board_NN ._.
He_PRP must_MD ,_, in_IN particular-_NN (_( 1_CD )_) satisfy_NN himself_PRP that_IN the_DT rations_NNS issued_VBN to_TO the_DT pilgrims_NNS are_VBP of_IN good_JJ quality_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT quantity_NN agreed_VBD on_IN ,_, and_CC that_IN they_PRP are_VBP properly_RB cooked_VBN ;_: (_( 2_CD )_) satisfy_NN himself_PRP that_IN the_DT rules_NNS in_IN article_NN 20_CD ,_, regarding_VBG the_DT dis-_JJ tribution_NN of_IN water_NN ,_, are_VBP observed_VBN ;_: (_( 3_CD )_) if_IN not_RB satisfied_VBN as_IN to_TO the_DT quality_NN of_IN the_DT drinking-water_NN ,_, call_VB the_DT attention_NN of_IN the_DT captain_NN ,_, in_IN writing_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT rules_NNS in_IN article_NN 21_CD ;_: (_( 4_CD )_) satisfy_NN himself_PRP that_IN the_DT vessel_NN is_VBZ always_RB kept_JJ clean_JJ ,_, and_CC particularly_RB that_IN the_DT latrines_NNS are_VBP cleaned_VBN out_RP ,_, in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT directions_NNS in_IN article_NN 18_CD ;_: (_( 5_CD )_) satisfy_NN himself_PRP that_IN the_DT pilgrims_NNS '_POS quarters_NNS are_VBP kept_VBN healthy_JJ ,_, and_CC ,_, in_IN case_NN of_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN infectious_JJ disease_NN ,_, that_DT disinfection_NN is_VBZ carried_VBN out_IN in_IN the_DT manner_NN prescribed_VBN in_IN article_NN 19_CD ;_: (_( 6_CD )_) keep_VB a_DT diary_NN of_IN all_DT sanitary_JJ matters_NNS during_IN the_DT voyage_NN and_CC submit_NN this_DT diary_NN to_TO the_DT appointed_VBN authority_NN at_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN arrival_NN ._.
Art_NN ._.
13.-The_JJ vessel_NN must_MD be_VB capable_JJ of_IN accommodating_VBG the_DT pil-_JJ grims_NNS in_IN the_DT between_IN decks_NNS ._.

III_NNP ._.
MEASURES_NNP TO_NNP BE_NNP TAKEN_NNP TO_NNP PREVENT_NNP THE_NNP IMPORTATION_NNP OF_NNP PLAGUE_NNP ._.
(_( 1_CD )_) BY_NNP LAND_NNP ._.
The_DT measures_NNS to_TO be_VB taken_VBN ,_, on_IN land_NN ,_, with_IN respect_NN to_TO travellers_NNS and_CC goods_NNS from_IN regions_NNS infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ,_, should_MD conform_VB to_TO the_DT sanitary_JJ principles_NNS laid_VBP down_RB in_IN this_DT Convention_NN ._.
Modern_NNP methods_NNS of_IN disin-_JJ fection_NN should_MD be_VB substituted_VBN for_IN land_NN quarantine_NN ._.
For_IN this_DT purpose_JJ stoves_NNS and_CC other_JJ means_NNS of_IN disinfection_NN should_MD be_VB established_VBN at_IN selected_VBN posts_NNS on_IN the_DT routes_NNS followed_VBN by_IN travellers_NNS ._.
Similar_JJ methods_NNS should_MD be_VB adopted_VBN on_IN railways_NNS ,_, constructed_VBD or_CC in_IN course_NN of_IN construction_NN ._.
Merchandise_NN should_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN according_VBG to_TO the_DT principles_NNS adopted_VBN by_IN this_DT Convention_NNP ._.
Each_DT Government_NNP is_VBZ at_IN liberty_NN to_TO close_VB its_PRP$ frontiers_NNS to_TO passengers_NNS and_CC goods_NNS ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) BY_NNP SEA_NNP ._.
A.-MEASURES_NNP TO_NNP BE_NNP TAKEN_NNP IN_NNP THE_NNP RED_NNP SEA_NNP ._.
Art_NN ._.
1.-Healthy_JJ ships.-_NN (_( a_DT )_) After_IN the_DT medical_JJ inspection_NN ,_, ships_NNS passed_VBD as_IN healthy_JJ ,_, will_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO proceed_VB at_IN once_RB ,_, whatever_WP the_DT nature_NN of_IN their_PRP$ bill-of-health_NN ._.
The_DT ship_NN must_MD ,_, however_RB ,_, have_VBP completed_VBN ,_, or_CC must_MD complete_VB ,_, ten_VB full_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN departure_NN from_IN the_DT last_JJ infected_JJ port_NN at_IN which_WDT she_PRP has_VBZ touched_VBN ._.
The_DT only_JJ treatment_NN the_DT authorities_NNS of_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN arrival_NN may_MD apply_VB to_TO such_JJ ships_NNS ,_, consists_VBZ in_IN the_DT measures_NNS prescribed_VBN for_IN suspected_VBN ships_NNS (_( medical_JJ inspection_NN ,_, disinfection_NN of_IN soiled_JJ linen_NN ,_, pumping_VBG out_RP the_DT bilge-_JJ water_NN ,_, and_CC substituting_VBG good_JJ drinking-water_NN for_IN that_DT stored_VBD on_IN board_NN )_) ._.
(_( b_NN )_) Ordinary_NNP healthy_JJ ships_NNS will_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO pass_VB through_IN the_DT Suez_NNP Canal_NNP ,_, in_IN quarantine_NN ._.
They_PRP will_MD complete_VB in_IN the_DT Mediterranean_NNP the_DT ten_JJ days_NNS '_POS period_NN of_IN observation_NN ._.
Ships_NNP carrying_VBG a_DT doctor_NN and_CC a_DT stove_NN will_MD not_RB be_VB disinfected_VBN before_IN the_DT passage_NN in_IN quarantine_NN ._.
Art_NN ._.
2.-Suspected_JJ ships.-Suspected_JJ ships_NNS are_VBP those_DT on_IN board_NN which_WDT there_EX have_VBP been_VBN cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN departure_NN ,_, or_CC during_IN the_DT voyage_NN ,_, but_CC no_DT new_JJ case_NN for_IN 12_CD days_NNS ._.

303_CD treated_VBN in_IN a_DT different_JJ manner_NN according_VBG as_IN to_TO whether_IN or_CC not_RB they_PRP have_VBP on_IN board_NN a_DT doctor_NN and_CC disinfecting_VBG apparatus_NN (_( stove_NN )_) ._.
(_( a_DT )_) Ships_NNP having_VBG a_DT doctor_NN and_CC disinfecting_VBG apparatus_NN (_( stove_VB )_) ful-_NN filling_VBG the_DT required_JJ conditions_NNS ,_, will_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO pass_VB through_IN the_DT Suez_NNP Canal_NNP ,_, in_IN quarantine_NN ,_, in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT rules_NNS prescribed_VBN for_IN the_DT passage_NN ._.
(_( b_NN )_) Suspected_VBD ships_NNS ,_, having_VBG neither_DT doctor_NN nor_CC disinfecting_VBG appa-_JJ ratus_NN (_( stove_NN )_) on_IN board_NN ,_, will_MD ,_, before_IN being_VBG allowed_VBN to_TO pass_VB through_IN the_DT Canal_NNP in_IN quarantine_NN ,_, be_VB detained_VBN at_IN Moses_NNP '_POS Wells_NNP for_IN the_DT time_NN neces-_JJ sary_JJ to_TO disinfect_VB soiled_JJ linen_NN ,_, personal_JJ linen_NN and_CC other_JJ susceptible_JJ articles_NNS ,_, and_CC to_TO ensure_VB that_IN the_DT ship_NN is_VBZ in_IN a_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN ._.

3.-Infected_JJ ships_NNS ,_, that_WDT is_VBZ to_TO say_VB ,_, those_DT with_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, or_CC on_IN which_WDT cases_NNS have_VBP occurred_VBN within_IN 12_CD days_NNS ._.

(_( b_NN )_) Ships_VBZ with_IN a_DT doctor_NN and_CC disinfecting_VBG apparatus_NN (_( stove_VB )_) .-Ships_NNS with_IN a_DT doctor_NN and_CC disinfecting_VBG apparatus_NN will_MD be_VB detained_VBN at_IN Moses_NNP '_POS Wells_NNP ._.

4_CD ._.

5_CD ._.

6_CD ._.

7_CD ._.

8_CD ._.
When_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ absolutely_RB necessary_JJ for_IN ships_NNS ,_, passing_VBG in_IN quarantine_NN ,_, to_TO coal_VB at_IN Port_NNP Said_NNP ,_, they_PRP must_MD do_VB so_RB at_IN a_DT place_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB fixed_VBN by_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Board_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT necessary_JJ isolation_NN and_CC sanitary_JJ super-_JJ vision_NN can_MD be_VB secured_VBN ._.

(_( 2_CD )_) The_DT Homeward_NNP voyage_NN ._.
Art_NN ._.
1.-Any_JJ ship_NN coming_VBG from_IN a_DT port_NN of_IN the_DT Hedjaz_NNP or_CC from_IN any_DT other_JJ port_NN on_IN the_DT Arabian_NNP coast_NN of_IN the_DT Red_NNP Sea_NNP ,_, infected_VBD with_IN plague_NN having_VBG on_IN board_NN pilgrims_NNS or_CC any_DT similar_JJ collection_NN of_IN persons_NNS bound_IN for_IN Suez_NNP or_CC for_IN a_DT Mediterranean_NNP port_NN ,_, must_MD proceed_VB to_TO El-Tor_NNP ,_, there_EX to_TO undergo_VB the_DT prescribed_JJ observation_NN as_IN detailed_JJ below_IN ._.
The_DT disembarkation_NN and_CC disinfection_NN of_IN passengers_NNS ,_, baggage_NN and_CC susceptible_JJ goods_NNS will_MD then_RB be_VB effected_VBN ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN personal_JJ effects_NNS ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT ship_NN ._.
Art_NN ._.
2.-Ships_JJ bringing_NN back_RP pilgrims_NN will_MD only_RB be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO pass_VB through_IN the_DT Canal_NNP in_IN quarantine_NN ._.
Egyptian_JJ pilgrims_NNS after_IN leav-_JJ ing_VBG El-Tor_JJ must_MD disembark_VB at_IN Ras_NNP Mallap_NNP ,_, or_CC some_DT other_JJ place_NN appointed_VBN by_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Board_NNP ,_, there_EX to_TO undergo_VB three_CD days_NNS '_POS observa-_JJ tion_NN and_CC a_DT medical_JJ inspection_NN ,_, before_IN being_VBG given_VBN free_JJ pratique_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN a_DT suspicious_JJ case_NN occuring_VBG on_IN board_NN during_IN the_DT voyage_NN from_IN El-Tor_NNP to_TO Suez_NNP ,_, the_DT ship_NN will_MD be_VB repulsed_VBN to_TO El-Tor_NNP ._.
Art_NN ._.
3.-Agents_NNS of_IN navigation_NN companies_NNS and_CC captains_NNS of_IN ships_NNS are_VBP warned_VBN that_IN ,_, after_IN the_DT completion_NN of_IN the_DT observation_NN at_IN the_DT sani-_JJ tary_JJ station_NN of_IN El-Tor_NNP and_CC at_IN Ras_NNP Mallap_NNP ,_, only_RB Egyptian_JJ pilgrims_NNS will_MD be_VB permitted_VBN to_TO leave_VB the_DT ship_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN to_TO return_VB to_TO their_PRP$ homes_NNS ._.
Only_RB pilgrims_VBZ with_IN a_DT certificate_NN of_IN residence_NN ,_, issued_VBN by_IN an_DT Egyptian_JJ authority_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT prescribed_JJ form_NN ,_, will_MD be_VB recog-_JJ nised_VBN as_IN Egyptians_NNS or_CC as_IN residents_NNS of_IN Egypt_NNP ._.

Non-Egyptian_JJ pilgrims_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN Turks_NNP ,_, Russians_NNP ,_, Persians_NNPS ,_, Tuni-_NNP sians_NNS ,_, Algerians_NNPS ,_, Moors_NNPS ,_, etc._FW ,_, may_MD not_RB ,_, after_IN quitting_VBG El-Tor_NNP ,_, be_VB dis-_JJ embarked_VBN in_IN an_DT Egyptian_JJ port_NN ._.

Art_NN ._.
4.-If_JJ it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB reported_VBN that_IN plague_NN exists_NNS in_IN the_DT Hedjaz_NNP ,_, or_CC has_VBZ existed_VBN during_IN the_DT pilgrimage_NN ,_, vessels_NNS will_MD be_VB subjected_VBN ,_, at_IN Jebel-_NNP Tor_NNP ,_, to_TO the_DT rules_NNS prescribed_VBN at_IN Kamaran_NNP for_IN healthy_JJ ships_NNS ._.

IX_NNP ._.
The_DT pilgrims_NNS will_MD be_VB disembarked_VBN ;_: they_PRP will_MD wash_VB or_CC take_VB a_DT sea-_JJ bath_NN ;_: their_PRP$ soiled_JJ linen_NN ,_, the_DT portion_NN of_IN their_PRP$ personal_JJ effects_NNS and_CC baggage_NN ,_, open_JJ ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ authority_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT suspi-_JJ cion_NN of_IN contamination_NN ,_, will_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN ;_: the_DT duration_NN of_IN these_DT operations_NNS ,_, including_VBG the_DT disembarkation_NN and_CC embarkation_NN ,_, should_MD not_RB exceed_VB 72_CD hours_NNS ._.
If_IN plague_NN is_VBZ reported_VBN to_TO exist_VB in_IN the_DT Hedjaz_NNP or_CC to_TO have_VB existed_VBN during_IN the_DT pilgrimage_NN ,_, vessels_NNS will_MD be_VB subjected_VBN ,_, at_IN Jebel-Tor_NNP ,_, to_TO the_DT rules_NNS prescribed_VBN at_IN Kamaran_NNP for_IN infected_JJ ships_NNS ._.

The_DT disinfection_NN will_MD be_VB thoroughly_RB carried_VBN out_RP ._.
The_DT other_JJ passengers_NNS will_MD be_VB disembarked_VBN ,_, and_CC isolated_VBN by_IN groups_NNS ,_, as_RB small_JJ as_IN possible_JJ ,_, so_IN that_IN if_IN the_DT plague_NN breaks_VBZ out_RP in_IN one_CD group_NN the_DT whole_JJ party_NN will_MD not_RB be_VB affected_VBN ._.
The_DT soiled_JJ linen_NN ,_, personal_JJ effects_NNS ,_, and_CC clothes_NNS of_IN the_DT crew_NN and_CC passengers_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT ship_NN ,_, will_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN ._.
The_DT local_JJ sanitary_JJ authority_NN will_MD declare_VB if_IN the_DT discharge_NN of_IN the_DT heavy_JJ baggage_NN and_CC cargo_NN is_VBZ necessary_JJ ,_, and_CC if_IN the_DT whole_JJ ship_NN must_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN ,_, or_CC a_DT portion_NN only_RB ._.
All_PDT the_DT pilgrims_NNS will_MD be_VB kept_VBN under_IN observation_NN for_IN 12_CD full_JJ days_NNS ,_, counting_VBG from_IN the_DT day_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT operation_NN of_IN disinfection_NN was_VBD com-_JJ pleted_JJ ._.

They_PRP will_MD be_VB subjected_VBN to_TO the_DT preventive_JJ measures_NNS and_CC treatment_NN laid_VBD down_RB for_IN such_JJ ships_NNS ._.

)_) ,_, and_CC will_MD only_RB be_VB given_VBN free_JJ pratique_NN after_IN a_DT favourable_JJ medical_JJ inspection_NN ._.

B.-MEASURES_NNP TO_NNP BE_NNP TAKEN_NNP IN_NNP THE_NNP PERSIAN_NNP GULF_NNP ._.
I.-Sanitary_JJ rules_NNS for_IN vessels_NNS entering_VBG the_DT Persian_NNP Gulf_NNP ._.
Any_DT ship_NN with_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, or_CC on_IN board_NN which_WDT one_CD or_CC more_JJR cases_NNS have_VBP occurred_VBN within_IN 12_CD days_NNS ,_, will_MD be_VB considered_VBN infected_JJ ._.
Any_DT ship_NN on_IN board_NN which_WDT there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN departure_NN ,_, or_CC during_IN the_DT voyage_NN ,_, but_CC on_IN which_WDT no_DT fresh_JJ case_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN for_IN 12_CD days_NNS ,_, will_MD be_VB considered_VBN suspected_JJ ._.
Any_DT ship_NN ,_, even_RB though_IN coming_VBG from_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ had_VBN no_DT death_NN ,_, or_CC case_NN of_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, either_CC before_IN departure_NN ,_, during_IN the_DT voyage_NN ,_, or_CC on_IN arrival_NN ,_, will_MD be_VB considered_VBN as_IN healthy_JJ ._.
?_. 316_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
Infected_VBN ships_NNS will_MD be_VB subjected_VBN to_TO the_DT following_JJ rules_NNS :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) The_DT sick_NN will_MD be_VB immediately_RB disembarked_VBN and_CC isolated_VBN ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) The_DT other_JJ persons_NNS on_IN board_NN should_MD also_RB ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, be_VB dis-_JJ embarked_JJ and_CC kept_VBD under_IN observation_NN ,_, for_IN a_DT period_NN varying_VBG according_VBG to_TO the_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN ,_, but_CC which_WDT must_MD not_RB exceed_VB ten_JJ days_NNS ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) The_DT soiled_JJ linen_NN and_CC personal_JJ effects_NNS of_IN the_DT crew_NN and_CC passen-_JJ gers_NNS ,_, which_WDT ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ authority_NN of_IN the_DT port_NN should_MD be_VB considered_VBN as_IN infected_VBN ,_, will_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN ,_, as_IN also_RB the_DT ship_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT contaminated_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN ._.
A_DT more_RBR thorough_JJ disinfection_NN may_MD be_VB ordered_VBN by_IN the_DT local_JJ sanitary_JJ authorities_NNS ._.
Suspected_VBN ships_NNS will_MD be_VB subjected_VBN to_TO the_DT following_JJ measures_NNS :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) Medical_NNP inspection_NN ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) The_DT soiled_JJ linen_NN and_CC personal_JJ effects_NNS of_IN the_DT crew_NN and_CC passengers_NNS ,_, which_WDT ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT local_JJ sanitary_JJ authority_NN ,_, may_MD be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN contaminated_VBN ,_, should_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) Disinfection_NN of_IN all_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT ship_NN which_WDT have.been_NN inhabited_VBN by_IN patients_NNS or_CC suspicious_JJ cases_NNS ._.
A_DT more_RBR thorough_JJ disinfec-_JJ tion_NN may_MD be_VB ordered_VBN by_IN the_DT local_JJ sanitary_JJ authority_NN ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) Pumping_VBG out_RP the_DT bilge-water_NN after_IN disinfection_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT substi-_JJ tution_NN of_IN good_JJ drinking-water_NN for_IN the_DT water_NN stored_VBD on_IN board_NN ._.
(_( 5_CD )_) The_DT crew_NN and_CC passengers_NNS should_MD be_VB kept_VBN under_IN observation_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN ten_JJ days_NNS ,_, commencing_VBG from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN on_IN board_NN ._.
Healthy_JJ ships_NNS will_MD be_VB given_VBN free_JJ pratique_NN at_IN once_RB ,_, irrespective_NN of_IN the_DT nature_NN of_IN the_DT bill-of-health_NN ._.
Such_JJ ships_NNS must_MD ,_, however_RB ,_, in_IN all_DT cases_NNS ,_, have_VBP completed_VBN ,_, or_CC must_MD complete_VB ,_, ten_VB full_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN departure_NN from_IN the_DT last_JJ infected_JJ port_NN at_IN which_WDT they_PRP have_VBP touched_VBN ._.
The_DT only_JJ measures_VBZ the_DT authority_NN of_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN arrival_NN may_MD apply_VB to_TO healthy_JJ ships_NNS are_VBP those_DT prescribed_NNS for_IN suspected_VBN ships_NNS (_( medical_JJ inspection_NN ,_, disinfection_NN ,_, pumping_VBG out_RP the_DT bilge-water_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT sub-_JJ stitution_NN of_IN good_JJ drinking-water_NN for_IN the_DT water_NN stored_VBD on_IN board_NN )_) ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB understood_JJ that_IN the_DT appointed_VBN authority_NN of_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN arrival_NN may_MD always_RB demand_VB a_DT declaration_NN on_IN oath_NN from_IN the_DT doctor_NN ,_, or_CC failing_VBG him_PRP ,_, from_IN the_DT captain_NN ,_, that_IN there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN no_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN on_IN the_DT ship_NN since_IN her_PRP$ departure_NN ._.
In_IN deciding_VBG on_IN the_DT extent_NN to_TO which_WDT effect_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB given_VBN to_TO the_DT measures_NNS prescribed_VBN above_IN ,_, the_DT authorities_NNS of_IN the_DT port_NN should_MD take_VB into_IN consideration_NN the_DT fact_NN that_IN there_EX is_VBZ a_DT doctor_NN or_CC a_DT disinfecting_NN apparatus_NN (_( stove_NN )_) on_IN board_NN the_DT ships_NNS coming_VBG under_IN the_DT three_CD headings_NNS mentioned_VBN above_IN ._.

IX_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
317_CD Special_JJ measures_NNS may_MD be_VB prescribed_VBN for_IN ships_NNS in_IN an_DT insanitary_JJ condition_NN ._.
Goods_NNS arriving_VBG by_IN sea_NN should_MD be_VB treated_VBN in_IN the_DT same_JJ way_NN as_IN goods_NNS transported_VBN by_IN land_NN ,_, as_IN regards_NNS disinfection_NN ,_, prohibition_NN of_IN import_NN ,_, transit_NN ,_, and_CC quarantine_NN ._.
Any_DT ship_NN objecting_VBG to_TO submit_VB to_TO the_DT obligations_NNS imposed_VBN by_IN the_DT authority_NN of_IN the_DT port_NN is_VBZ free_JJ to_TO put_VB back_RB to_TO sea_NN ._.
The_DT disembarkation_NN of_IN goods_NNS may_MD be_VB authorised_VBN after_IN the_DT follow-_JJ ing_NN necessary_JJ precautions_NNS :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) Isolation_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN ,_, crew_NN ,_, and_CC passengers_NNS ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) Pumping_VBG out_RP the_DT bilge-water_NN after_IN disinfection_NN ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) Substitution_NN of_IN good_JJ drinking-water_NN for_IN the_DT water_NN stored_VBD on_IN board_NN ._.
The_DT disembarkation_NN of_IN passengers_NNS wishing_VBG to_TO land_NN may_MD also_RB be_VB authorised_VBN ,_, on_IN condition_NN that_IN they_PRP submit_VBP to_TO the_DT measures_NNS prescribed_VBN by_IN the_DT local_JJ authorities_NNS ._.
II.-Sanitary_JJ posts_NNS in_IN the_DT Persian_NNP Gulf_NNP ._.
There_EX are_VBP two_CD places_NNS in_IN the_DT Persian_NNP Gulf_NNP suitable_JJ for_IN the_DT estab-_JJ lishment_NN of_IN sanitary_JJ posts-one_NN in_IN the_DT Straits_NNP of_IN Ormuz_NNP (_( the_DT Island_NNP of_IN Ormuz_NNP ,_, the_DT Island_NNP of_IN Kishm_NNP ,_, or_CC ,_, failing_VBG these_DT ,_, a_DT place_NN to_TO be_VB settled_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ vicinity_NN )_) ;_: the_DT other_JJ at_IN a_DT place_NN to_TO be_VB settled_VBN in_IN the_DT neigh-_JJ bourhood_NN of_IN Bassorah_NNP ._.
The_DT sanitary_JJ post_NN in_IN the_DT Straits_NNP of_IN Ormuz_NNP should_MD be_VB provided_VBN with_IN at_IN least_JJS two_CD doctors_NNS ,_, sanitary_JJ officers_NNS and_CC guards_NNS and_CC appliances_NNS for_IN disinfection_NN ._.
A_DT small_JJ hospital_NN should_MD also_RB be_VB constructed_VBN ._.
A_DT big_JJ lazaretto_NN and_CC apparatus_NN for_IN disinfecting_VBG goods_NNS should_MD be_VB constructed_VBN at_IN the_DT post_NN near_IN Bassorah_NNP with_IN a_DT medical_JJ staff_NN of_IN several_JJ doctors_NNS ._.
Before_IN entering_VBG the_DT Persian_NNP Gulf_NNP ,_, ships_VBZ must_MD touch_VB at_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ post_NN in_IN the_DT Straits_NNP of_IN Ormuz_NNP ._.
They_PRP will_MD there_RB be_VB subjected_VBN to_TO the_DT sanitary_JJ measures_NNS prescribed_VBN by_IN the_DT rules_NNS ._.
If_IN there_EX are_VBP any_DT plague_JJ cases_NNS on_IN board_NN ,_, the_DT sick_NN will_MD be_VB disembarked_VBN ._.
Ships_NNS wishing_VBG to_TO proceed_VB at_IN once_RB up_IN the_DT Shatt-el-Arab_NNP will_MD be_VB per-_JJ mitted_VBN ,_, if_IN the_DT period_NN of_IN observation_NN is_VBZ not_RB completed_VBN ,_, to_TO continue_VB their_PRP$ voyage_NN ,_, through_IN the_DT Persian_NNP Gulf_NNP and_CC the_DT Shatt-el-Arab_NNP in_IN quarantine_NN ._.
A_DT sanitary_JJ officer_NN and_CC two_CD sanitary_JJ guards_NNS ,_, taken_VBN on_IN board_NN at_IN Ormuz_NNP ,_, will_MD keep_VB a_DT watch_NN on_IN the_DT ship_NN as_RB far_RB as_IN Bassorah_NNP ,_, where_WRB a_DT second_JJ medical_JJ inspection_NN will_MD be_VB made_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT necessary_JJ disinfection_NN will_MD be_VB carried_VBN out_RP ._.
Ships_NNS wishing_VBG to_TO disembark_VB passengers_NNS or_CC goods_NNS at_IN Persian_JJ ports_NNS will_MD be_VB permitted_VBN to_TO do_VB so_RB at_IN Bushire_NNP ,_, when_WRB suitable_JJ sanitary_JJ arrange-_JJ ments_NNS have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN ;_: until_IN then_RB ,_, they_PRP must_MD land_VB their_PRP$ passengers_NNS and_CC goods_NNS at_IN Ormuz_NNP or_CC Bassorah_NNP ._.
?_. 318_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB understood_JJ that_IN a_DT healthy_JJ ship_NN will_MD be_VB granted_VBN free_JJ pratique_NN at_IN the_DT ports_NNS of_IN the_DT Persian_NNP Gulf_NNP ten_VBD days_NNS after_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN departure_NN from_IN the_DT last_JJ infected_JJ ports_NNS at_IN which_WDT she_PRP has_VBZ touched_VBN ,_, pro-_JJ vided_VBD that_IN she_PRP is_VBZ shown_VBN to_TO be_VB healthy_JJ on_IN arrival_NN ._.
The_DT sanitary_JJ posts_NNS at_IN Ormuz_NNP and_CC Bassorah_NNP will_MD be_VB under_IN the_DT con-_JJ trol_NN of_IN the_DT Constantinople_NNP Board_NNP of_IN Health_NNP ._.
The_DT Ottoman_NNP and_CC Per-_NNP sian_JJ Governments_NNP will_MD come_VB to_TO an_DT agreement_NN with_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT post_NN at_IN Ormuz_NNP ._.
Until_IN the_DT Ottoman_NNP and_CC Persian_JJ Governments_NNS have_VBP arrived_VBN at_IN this_DT agreement_NN ,_, a_DT sanitary_JJ post_NN will_MD be_VB established_VBN as_IN a_DT temporary_JJ measure_NN in_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT islands_NNS in_IN the_DT Straits_NNP of_IN Ormuz_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Board_NNP of_IN Health_NNP will_MD post_VB doctors_NNS and_CC sanitary_JJ guards_NNS at_IN this_DT place_NN ._.
These_DT guards_NNS will_MD accompany_VB ships_NNS passing_VBG in_IN quarantine_NN up_IN the_DT Shatt-el-_NNP Arab_NNP to_TO the_DT post_NN established_VBN in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN Bassorah_NNP ._.
The_DT Constantinople_NNP Board_NNP of_IN Health_NNP will_MD also_RB organise_VB without_IN delay_NN sanitary_JJ posts_NNS at_IN Khanikin_NNP and_CC Kizil_NNP Dize_NNP ,_, near_IN Bayazid_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT Perso-Turkish_JJ and_CC Russo-Turkish_JJ frontiers_NNS ._.
CHAPTER_NN II_NNP ._.
Measures_NNS to_TO be_VB taken_VBN in_IN Europe_NNP ._.
SECTION_NN I.-Measures_NNS to_TO be_VB taken_VBN to_TO keep_VB the_DT Governments_NNP which_WDT are_VBP parties_NNS to_TO the_DT Convention_NNP acquainted_VBD with_IN the_DT existence_NN of_IN an_DT epidemic_NN of_IN Plague_NNP ,_, and_CC with_IN the_DT means_NNS taken_VBN to_TO prevent_VB its_PRP$ spread_NN and_CC its_PRP$ importation_NN into_IN healthy_JJ countries_NNS ._.
Notification_NN and_CC subsequent_JJ communications_NNS ._.
The_DT Government_NNP of_IN an_DT infected_JJ country_NN must_MD notify_VB to_TO the_DT other_JJ Governments_NNPS the_DT existence_NN of_IN all_DT cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN ._.
This_DT measure_NN is_VBZ essential_JJ ._.
It_PRP will_MD only_RB be_VB of_IN real_JJ use_NN ,_, if_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN the_DT infected_JJ country_NN is_VBZ itself_PRP informed_VBN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN and_CC suspicious_JJ cases_NNS occurring_VBG in_IN its_PRP$ territory_NN ._.
It_PRP can_MD not_RB ,_, therefore_RB ,_, be_VB too_RB strongly_RB impressed_VBN on_IN the_DT different_JJ Governments_NNS that_WDT doctors_NNS should_MD be_VB obliged_VBN to_TO report_VB all_DT cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN ._.
The_DT notification_NN should_MD state_NN the_DT existence_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN ,_, the_DT places_NNS where_WRB they_PRP have_VBP occurred_VBN ,_, the_DT date_NN of_IN their_PRP$ appearance_NN ,_, the_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS reported_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS ._.
The_DT notification_NN should_MD be_VB made_VBN to_TO the_DT diplomatic_JJ or_CC consular_JJ agents_NNS in_IN the_DT capital_NN of_IN the_DT infected_JJ country_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN countries_NNS not_RB represented_VBN there_RB ,_, the_DT notification_NN should_MD be_VB made_VBN ,_, by_IN telegram_NN ,_, direct_JJ to_TO the_DT foreign_JJ Governments_NNS ._.
This_DT first_JJ notification_NN should_MD be_VB followed_VBN by_IN subsequent_JJ regular_JJ communications_NNS ,_, with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO keep_VB the_DT Governments_NNP informed_NN of_IN the_DT ?_. APP_NNP ._.

spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
319_CD course_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_NN ._.
These_DT communications_NNS should_MD be_VB made_VBN at_IN least_JJS once_RB a_DT week_NN ._.
The_DT reports_NNS concerning_VBG the_DT outbreak_NN and_CC course_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN should_MD be_VB as_RB complete_JJ as_IN possible_JJ ._.
They_PRP should_MD ,_, in_IN particular_JJ ,_, state_NN the_DT measures_NNS taken_VBN to_TO check_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ and_CC should_MD give_VB ,_, in_IN detail_NN ,_, the_DT preventive_JJ measures_NNS adopted_VBN ,_, with_IN regard_JJ to-_JJ sanitary_NN or_CC medical_JJ inspection_NN ;_: isolation_NN ;_: disinfection_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT measures_NNS prescribed_VBN with_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT departure_NN of_IN ships_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT export_NN of_IN susceptible_JJ articles_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB understood_JJ that_IN neighbouring_VBG countries_NNS reserve_VBP to_TO them-_JJ selves_NNS the_DT right_NN to_TO make_VB special_JJ arrangements_NNS ,_, with_IN the_DT object_NN of_IN organising_VBG an_DT exchange_NN of_IN direct_JJ information_NN between_IN the_DT principal_JJ administrative_JJ officers_NNS on_IN their_PRP$ frontiers_NNS ._.
The_DT Government_NNP of_IN each_DT country_NN must_MD publish_VB ,_, immediately_RB ,_, the_DT measures_NNS which_WDT it_PRP decides_VBZ to_TO adopt_VB with_IN regard_NN to_TO arrivals_NNS from_IN an_DT infected_JJ country_NN or_CC local_JJ area_NN ._.
The_DT information_NN must_MD be_VB at_IN once_RB communicated_VBN to_TO the_DT diplomatic_JJ or_CC consular_JJ agent_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN affected_VBD ,_, resident_NN in_IN the_DT capital_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT absence_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT capital_NN ,_, of_IN a_DT diplomatic_JJ or_CC consular_JJ agency_NN ,_, the_DT communication_NN should_MD be_VB made_VBN direct_JJ to_TO the_DT Government_NNP interested_JJ ._.
The_DT withdrawal_NN of_IN the_DT measures_NNS ,_, or_CC any_DT modifications_NNS which_WDT may_MD be_VB made_VBN in_IN them_PRP ,_, must_MD be_VB communicated_VBN in_IN the_DT same_JJ manner_NN ._.
SECTION_NN II.-Conditions_NNS under_IN which_WDT a_DT local_JJ area*_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB con-_JJ sidered_VBN infected_JJ or_CC healthy_JJ ._.
Any_DT area_NN in_IN which_WDT a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN has_VBZ been_VBN officially_RB reported_VBN to_TO exist_VB will_MD be_VB considered_VBN to_TO be_VB infected_VBN ._.
Any_DT area_NN in_IN which_WDT plague_NN has_VBZ existed_VBN will_MD cease_VB to_TO be_VB considered_VBN as_IN infected_JJ when_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ officially_RB reported_VBN that_IN no_DT death_NN or_CC fresh_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN has_VBZ taken_VBN place_NN for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS after_IN the_DT recovery_NN or_CC death_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN ,_, provided_VBD that_IN the_DT necessary_JJ disinfection_NN has_VBZ been_VBN carried_VBN out_RP ._.
Preventive_JJ measures_NNS will_MD be_VB taken_VBN in_IN the_DT infected_JJ territory_NN as_RB soon_RB as_IN cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN are_VBP officially_RB reported_VBN ._.
These_DT measures_NNS will_MD be_VB discontinued_VBN as_RB soon_RB as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ officially_RB stated_VBN that_IN the_DT area_NN has_VBZ again_RB become_VBN healthy_JJ ._.
*_VB A_DT local_JJ area_NN means_VBZ a_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT territory_NN of_IN a_DT country_NN placed_VBN under_IN a_DT recog-_NN nised_JJ administrative_JJ authority_NN ;_: as_IN ,_, for_IN instance_NN ,_, a_DT province_NN ,_, a_DT Local_JJ Government_NNP ,_, a_DT district_NN ,_, a_DT department_NN ,_, a_DT canton_NN ,_, an_DT island_NN ,_, a_DT commune_NN ,_, a_DT town_NN ,_, a_DT village_NN ,_, a_DT harbour_NN ,_, an_DT area_NN reclaimed_VBD from_IN the_DT sea_NN ,_, etc._FW ,_, whatever_WDT may_MD be_VB the_DT extent_NN and_CC population_NN of_IN the_DT portion_NN of_IN territory_NN ._.

SECTION_NNP III.-Necessity_NNP of_IN restricting_VBG to_TO the_DT infected_JJ local_JJ areas_NNS the_DT measures_NNS taken_VBN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_NN ._.
The_DT precautionary_JJ measures_NNS should_MD be_VB confined_VBN to_TO the_DT infected_VBN tract_NN and_CC the_DT Governments_NNS concerned_VBN should_MD only_RB apply_VB them_PRP to_TO per-_JJ sons_NNS and_CC goods_NNS from_IN infected_JJ areas_NNS ._.
But_CC the_DT obligation_NN to_TO restrict_VB precautions_NNS to_TO the_DT infected_JJ area_NN exists_VBZ only_RB on_IN the_DT express_JJ condition_NN that_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN the_DT infect-_JJ ed_JJ country_NN takes_VBZ the_DT necessary_JJ measures_NNS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT exportation_NN of_IN susceptible_JJ articles_NNS derived_VBN from_IN the_DT infected_JJ area_NN ._.
No_DT restrictive_JJ measure_NN should_MD be_VB enforced_VBN against_IN persons_NNS and_CC goods_NNS from_IN an_DT infected_JJ area_NN ,_, if_IN they_PRP left_VBD it_PRP at_IN least_JJS five_CD days_NNS before_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
SECTION_NNP IV.-Goods_NNP and_CC articles_NNS which_WDT may_MD be_VB considered_VBN ``_`` suscep-_JJ tible_JJ ''_'' with_IN reference_NN to_TO the_DT rules_NNS regarding_VBG the_DT prohibition_NN of_IN import_NN and_CC transit_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT rules_NNS regarding_VBG disinfection_NN ._.
I-Import_NNP and_CC transit_NN ._.
The_DT following_NN is_VBZ a_DT list_NN of_IN the_DT susceptible_JJ articles_NNS and_CC goods_NNS ,_, the_DT importation_NN of_IN which_WDT may_MD be_VB prohibited_VBN :_: -_: 1_CD ._.
Used_VBN linen_NN ,_, clothing_NN ,_, personal_JJ effects_NNS and_CC bedding_NN ._.
When_WRB these_DT articles_NNS are_VBP carried_VBN as_IN baggage_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN consequence_NN of_IN a_DT change_NN of_IN abode_NN (_( household_JJ goods_NNS )_) they_PRP are_VBP subjected_VBN to_TO special_JJ treatment_NN ._.
Soldiers_NNS '_POS and_CC sailors_NNS '_POS kits_NNS ,_, returned_VBN to_TO their_PRP$ country_NN ,_, after_IN their_PRP$ death_NN ,_, should_MD be_VB treated_VBN in_IN the_DT same_JJ way_NN as_IN the_DT articles_NNS named_VBN above_IN ._.
2_CD ._.
Rags_NNP ,_, not_RB excepting_VBG rags_NNS compressed_VBN by_IN hydraulic_JJ force_NN ,_, which_WDT are_VBP carried_VBN as_IN merchandise_NN in_IN bales_NNS ._.
3_CD ._.
Old_NNP sacking_NN ,_, carpets_NNS and_CC old_JJ embroidery_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
Raw_NNP hides_NNS ,_, untanned_JJ and_CC fresh_JJ skins_NNS ._.
5_CD ._.

6_CD ._.
Human_NNP hair_NN ._.
The_DT transit_NN of_IN susceptible_JJ goods_NNS or_CC articles_NNS packed_VBN in_IN such_JJ a_DT way_NN that_IN they_PRP can_MD not_RB be_VB handled_VBN on_IN the_DT way_NN should_MD not_RB be_VB forbidden_VBN ._.
Similarly_RB ,_, when_WRB merchandise_NN or_CC susceptible_JJ articles_NNS are_VBP transported_VBN in_IN such_JJ a_DT manner_NN that_IN they_PRP can_MD not_RB have_VB come_VBN into_IN contact_NN with_IN infected_JJ objects_NNS during_IN the_DT journey_NN ,_, their_PRP$ transit_NN throngh_IN an_DT infected_JJ local_JJ area_NN should_MD not_RB bar_VB their_PRP$ importation_NN into_IN the_DT country_NN to_TO which_WDT they_PRP are_VBP consigned_VBN ._.

321_CD The_DT rules_NNS regarding_VBG the_DT prohibition_NN of_IN the_DT import_NN of_IN susceptible_JJ goods_NNS and_CC articles_NNS will_MD not_RB be_VB applied_VBN in_IN cases_NNS where_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ proved_VBN to_TO the_DT satisfaction_NN of_IN the_DT appointed_VBN authority_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN to_TO which_WDT they_PRP are_VBP consigned_VBN that_IN they_PRP were_VBD despatched_VBN at_IN least_JJS five_CD days_NNS before_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
Merchandise_NNP must_MD not_RB be_VB kept_VBN in_IN quarantine_NN on_IN land_NN frontiers_NNS ._.
Absolute_NNP prohibition_NN or_CC disinfection_NN are_VBP the_DT only_JJ measures_NNS which_WDT may_MD be_VB taken_VBN ._.
II.-Disinfection_NN ._.
Baggage.-Disinfection_NN will_MD be_VB compulsory_VBN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN soiled_JJ linen_NN ,_, wearing_VBG apparel_NN ,_, clothes_NNS and_CC articles_NNS carried_VBD as_IN personal_JJ baggage_NN or_CC household_NN goods_NNS ,_, coming_VBG from_IN a_DT local_JJ area_NN ,_, declared_VBD infected_VBN ,_, and_CC which_WDT the_DT local_JJ sanitary_JJ authority_NN deems_NNS contaminated_VBN ._.
Merchandise.-Disinfection_NN will_MD only_RB be_VB enforced_VBN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN merchandise_NN and_CC articles_NNS which_WDT the_DT local_JJ sanitary_JJ authority_NN considers_NNS contaminated_VBD ,_, or_CC whose_WP$ importation_NN may_MD be_VB prohibited_VBN ._.
It_PRP rests_VBZ with_IN the_DT authorities_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN to_TO which_WDT the_DT articles_NNS are_VBP consigned_VBN to_TO settle_VB the_DT manner_NN by_IN which_WDT and_CC place_NN in_IN which_WDT disinfec-_JJ tion_NN should_MD be_VB carried_VBN out_RP ._.
The_DT disinfection_NN should_MD be_VB carried_VBN out_RP so_RB as_IN to_TO injure_VB the_DT articles_NNS as_RB little_JJ as_IN possible_JJ ._.
Each_DT country_NN will_MD settle_VB the_DT question_NN of_IN the_DT compensation_NN to_TO be_VB paid_VBN for_IN damages_NNS resulting_VBG from_IN disinfection_NN ._.
Letters_NNS and_CC correspondence_NN ,_, printed_JJ matter_NN ,_, books_NNS ,_, newspapers_NNS ,_, business_NN documents_NNS (_( not_RB including_VBG parcels_NNS received_VBN through_IN the_DT post_NN )_) ,_, should_MD be_VB subject_JJ to_TO no_DT restriction_NN or_CC disinfection_NN ._.
SECTION_NN V.-Measures_NNS to_TO be_VB taken_VBN on_IN land_NN frontiers_NNS ._.
Railway_NNP traffic_NN ._.
Travellers_NNS ._.
Passenger_NN carriages_NNS and_CC mail_NN and_CC luggage_NN vans_NNS should_MD not_RB be_VB detained_VBN on_IN the_DT frontiers_NNS ._.
If_IN a_DT carriage_NN is_VBZ infected_VBN ,_, it_PRP should_MD be_VB detached_VBN from_IN the_DT train_NN to_TO be_VB disinfected_VBN ,_, either_RB at_IN the_DT frontier_NN ,_, or_CC at_IN the_DT nearest_JJS stopping_NN place_NN ,_, if_IN this_DT can_MD be_VB arranged_VBN ._.
Goods_NNS vans_NNS should_MD be_VB treated_VBN in_IN the_DT same_JJ way_NN ._.
Land_NNP quarantine_NN will_MD no_RB longer_RB be_VB enforced_VBN ._.
Only_JJ persons_NNS pre-_JJ senting_VBG symptoms_NNS of_IN plague_NN should_MD be_VB detained_VBN ._.
This_DT principle_NN does_VBZ not_RB affect_VB the_DT right_NN of_IN each_DT country_NN to_TO close_VB ,_, if_IN necessary_JJ ,_, any_DT part_NN of_IN its_PRP$ frontiers_NNS ._.
The_DT railway_NN staff_NN should_MD keep_VB a_DT watch_NN on_IN the_DT travellers_NNS '_POS health_NN ._.
Medical_JJ intervention_NN will_MD be_VB confined_VBN to_TO an_DT inspection_NN of_IN the_DT travel-_JJ lers_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT care_NN of_IN the_DT sick_NN ._.

Where_WRB there_EX is_VBZ a_DT medical_JJ inspection_NN ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB combined_VBN ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN is_VBZ practicable_JJ ,_, with_IN the_DT custom-house_NN inspection_NN ,_, so_RB as_IN to_TO detain_VB the_DT passengers_NNS as_IN short_JJ a_DT time_NN as_IN possible_JJ ._.
On_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN travellers_NNS from_IN an_DT infected_JJ area_NN at_IN their_PRP$ destination_NN ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB found_VBN very_RB desirable_JJ to_TO keep_VB them_PRP under_IN supervision_NN for_IN 10_CD days_NNS ,_, counting_VBG from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN departure_NN ._.
The_DT measures_NNS to_TO be_VB taken_VBN in_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT crossing_NN of_IN the_DT frontiers_NNS by_IN the_DT railway_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Post_NNP Office_NNP staff_NN should_MD be_VB settled_VBN by_IN the_DT administrations_NNS concerned_VBN ._.
They_PRP should_MD be_VB arranged_VBN so_RB as_IN not_RB to_TO interrupt_VB the_DT regular_JJ service_NN ._.
Governments_NNS reserve_VBP to_TO themselves_PRP the_DT right_JJ to_TO take_VB special_JJ measures_NNS with_IN regard_NN to_TO certain_JJ classes_NNS of_IN people_NNS ,_, especially-_JJ A.-Gipsies_NNS and_CC vagabonds_NNS ._.
B.-Emigrants_NNS and_CC persons_NNS travelling_VBG or_CC crossing_VBG the_DT frontier_NN in_IN large_JJ bodies_NNS ._.
SECTION_NN VI.-Special_JJ rule_NN for_IN Frontier_NNP Tracts_NNP ._.
The_DT regulation_NN of_IN the_DT frontier_NN traffic_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT questions_NNS involved_VBN in_IN this_DT traffic_NN ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT adoption_NN of_IN exceptional_JJ measures_NNS of_IN supervision_NN ,_, must_MD be_VB left_VBN to_TO special_JJ arrangement_NN between_IN neighbouring_VBG countries_NNS ._.
SECTION_JJ VII.-_NNP Water-ways_NNP ,_, rivers_NNS ,_, canals_NNS and_CC lakes_NNS ._.
The_DT task_NN of_IN regulating_NN by_IN special_JJ arrangements_NNS the_DT sanitary_JJ rules_NNS for_IN water-ways_NNS must_MD be_VB left_VBN to_TO the_DT Governments_NNS of_IN the_DT countries_NNS bor-_JJ dering_VBG such_JJ water-ways_NNS ._.
SECTION_NNP VIII.-Ocean_NNP traffic_NN ._.
Measures_NNS to_TO be_VB taken_VBN at_IN ports_NNS ._.
Any_DT ship_NN with_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, or_CC on_IN board_NN which_WDT one_CD or_CC more_JJR cases_NNS have_VBP taken_VBN place_NN within_IN 12_CD days_NNS ,_, will_MD be_VB considered_VBN infected_JJ ._.
Any_DT ship_NN on_IN board_NN which_WDT there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN departure_NN ,_, or_CC during_IN the_DT voyage_NN ,_, but_CC on_IN which_WDT no_DT fresh_JJ case_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN for_IN 12_CD days_NNS ,_, will_MD be_VB considered_VBN as_IN suspected_VBN ._.
Any_DT ship_NN ,_, even_RB though_IN coming_VBG from_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ had_VBN no_DT death_NN ,_, or_CC case_NN of_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, either_CC before_IN departure_NN ,_, dur-_JJ ing_VBG the_DT voyage_NN ,_, or_CC on_IN arrival_NN ,_, will_MD be_VB considered_VBN as_IN healthy_JJ ._.
Infected_VBN ships_NNS are_VBP subject_JJ to_TO the_DT following_JJ rules_NNS :_: -_: 1_CD ._.
The_DT sick_NN will_MD be_VB immediately_RB disembarked_VBN and_CC isolated_VBN ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT other_JJ persons_NNS on_IN board_NN should_MD also_RB ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, be_VB disem-_JJ barked_VBN and_CC kept_VBN under_IN observation_NN or_CC surveillance_NN *_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN *_IN Note.-The_NNP expression_NN ``_`` observation_NN ''_'' means_VBZ isolation_NN of_IN the_DT passengers_NNS ,_, either_DT on_IN board_NN a_DT ship_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN a_DT lazaretto_NN till_NN they_PRP have_VBP obtained_VBN free_JJ pratique_NN ._.
The_DT expression_NN ``_`` surveillance_NN ''_'' means_VBZ that_IN the_DT passengers_NNS will_MD not_RB be_VB isolated_VBN ;_: they_PRP will_MD at_IN once_RB obtain_VB free_JJ pratique_NN ,_, but_CC on_IN arriving_VBG at_IN their_PRP$ destination_NN they_PRP will_MD be_VB kept_VBN under_IN medical_JJ surveillance_NN ._.
?_. APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
323_CD varying_VBG according_VBG to_TO the_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN ,_, but_CC which_WDT must_MD not_RB exceed_VB ten_JJ days_NNS ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT soiled_JJ linen_NN and_CC personal_JJ effects_NNS of_IN the_DT crew_NN and_CC passengers_NNS which_WDT ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ authority_NN of_IN the_DT port_NN ,_, may_MD be_VB con-_JJ sidered_VBN as_IN infected_VBN ,_, will_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT bilge-water_NN will_MD be_VB pumped_VBN out_RP after_IN disinfection_NN ,_, and_CC good_JJ drinking-water_NN will_MD be_VB substituted_VBN for_IN the_DT water_NN stored_VBD on_IN board_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
All_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT ship_NN which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN inhabited_VBN by_IN plague_NN patients_NNS should_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN ._.
More_RBR thorough_JJ disinfection_NN may_MD be_VB ordered_VBN by_IN the_DT local_JJ sanitary_JJ authority_NN ._.
Suspected_VBN ships_NNS are_VBP subject_JJ to_TO the_DT following_JJ measures_NNS :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) Medical_NNP inspection_NN ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) Disinfection_NN ;_: the_DT soiled_JJ linen_NN and_CC personal_JJ effects_NNS of_IN the_DT crew_NN and_CC passengers_NNS ,_, which_WDT ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT local_JJ sanitary_JJ authority_NN ,_, may_MD be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN contaminated_VBN ,_, should_MD be_VB dis-_JJ infected_VBN ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) Pumping_VBG out_RP the_DT bilge-water_NN after_IN disinfection_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT substi-_JJ tution_NN of_IN good_JJ drinking-water_NN for_IN the_DT water_NN stored_VBD on_IN board_NN ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) Disinfection_NN of_IN all_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT ship_NN which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN inhabited_VBN by_IN plague_NN patients_NNS ._.
More_RBR thorough_JJ disinfection_NN may_MD be_VB ordered_VBN by_IN the_DT local_JJ sanitary_JJ authority_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ recommended_VBN that_IN a_DT watch_NN should_MD be_VB kept_VBN over_IN the_DT health_NN of_IN the_DT crew_NN and_CC passengers_NNS for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN arrival_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ also_RB recommended_VBN that_IN the_DT crew_NN should_MD not_RB be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO land_VB ,_, except_IN on_IN duty_NN ._.
Healthy_JJ ships_NNS will_MD be_VB given_VBN free_JJ pratique_NN at_IN once_RB ,_, irrespective_NN of_IN the_DT nature_NN of_IN the_DT bill-of-health_NN ._.
The_DT only_JJ measures_NNS which_WDT the_DT authorities_NNS of_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN arrival_NN may_MD enforce_VB with_IN regard_NN to_TO such_JJ ships_NNS consist_VBP in_IN those_DT which_WDT are_VBP prescribed_VBN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN suspected_VBN ships_NNS (_( medical_JJ inspection_NN ,_, disinfection_NN ,_, pump-_JJ ing_VBG out_RP the_DT bilge-water_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT substitution_NN of_IN good_JJ drinking-water_NN for_IN the_DT water_NN stored_VBD on_IN board_NN )_) ,_, except_IN that_IN the_DT measures_NNS prescribed_VBN for_IN the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN itself_PRP may_MD not_RB be_VB enforced_VBN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN healthy_JJ ships_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ recommended_VBN that_IN the_DT crew_NN and_CC passengers_NNS should_MD be_VB kept_VBN under_IN medical_JJ supervision_NN for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT ship_NN left_VBD an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ also_RB recommended_VBN that_IN the_DT crew_NN should_MD not_RB be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO land_VB except_IN on_IN duty_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB understood_JJ that_IN the_DT appointed_VBN authority_NN of_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN arrival_NN may_MD always_RB demand_VB a_DT declaration_NN ,_, on_IN oath_NN ,_, from_IN the_DT doctor_NN ?_. 324_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.

of_IN the_DT ship_NN ,_, or_CC failing_VBG him_PRP ,_, from_IN the_DT captain_NN ,_, that_IN there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN no_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN on_IN the_DT ship_NN since_IN her_PRP$ departure_NN ._.
In_IN deciding_VBG on_IN the_DT extent_NN to_TO which_WDT effect_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB given_VBN to_TO the_DT measures_NNS prescribed_VBN above_IN ,_, the_DT authorities_NNS of_IN the_DT port_NN should_MD take_VB into_IN consideration_NN the_DT fact_NN that_IN there_EX is_VBZ a_DT doctor_NN ,_, or_CC a_DT disinfecting_JJ appara-_JJ tus_NN (_( stove_NN )_) on_IN board_NN the_DT ships_NNS coming_VBG under_IN the_DT three_CD headings_NNS men-_JJ tioned_VBN above_IN ._.
Special_JJ measures_NNS may_MD be_VB prescribed_VBN for_IN crowded_JJ ships_NNS ,_, particularly_RB for_IN emigrant_JJ ships_NNS ,_, or_CC any_DT other_JJ ship_NN which_WDT appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB in_IN an_DT insanitary_JJ state_NN ._.
Goods_NNS arriving_VBG by_IN sea_NN should_MD be_VB treated_VBN in_IN the_DT same_JJ way_NN as_IN goods_NNS arriving_VBG by_IN land_NN ,_, as_IN regards_NNS disinfection_NN ,_, prohibition_NN of_IN import_NN ,_, transit_NN ,_, and_CC quarantine_NN ._.
Any_DT ship_NN objecting_VBG to_TO submit_VB to_TO the_DT obligations_NNS imposed_VBN by_IN the_DT authority_NN of_IN the_DT port_NN will_MD be_VB free_JJ to_TO put_VB back_RB to_TO sea_NN ._.
The_DT disembarkation_NN of_IN goods_NNS may_MD be_VB authorised_VBN ,_, after_IN the_DT following_JJ necessary_JJ precautions_NNS have_VBP been_VBN taken_VBN :_: -_: (_( 1_CD )_) Isolation_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN ,_, crew_NN and_CC passengers_NNS ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) Pumping_VBG out_RP the_DT bilge-water_NN after_IN disinfection_NN ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) Substitution_NN of_IN good_JJ drinking-water_NN for_IN the_DT water_NN stored_VBD on_IN board_NN ._.
The_DT disembarkation_NN of_IN passengers_NNS wishing_VBG to_TO land_NN may_MD also_RB be_VB authorised_VBN on_IN condition_NN that_IN they_PRP submit_VBP to_TO the_DT measures_NNS prescribed_VBN by_IN the_DT local_JJ authorities_NNS ._.
Each_DT country_NN should_MD supply_VB at_IN least_JJS on_IN port_NN on_IN each_DT of_IN its_PRP$ seaboards_NNS ,_, with_IN the_DT organisation_NN and_CC equipment_NN necessary_JJ to_TO enable_VB it_PRP to_TO receive_VB a_DT ship_NN ,_, whatever_WDT its_PRP$ sanitary_JJ state_NN ._.
Coasting_VBG vessels_NNS will_MD be_VB subject_JJ to_TO special_JJ rules_NNS ,_, to_TO be_VB drawn_VBN up_RP conjointly_RB by_IN the_DT countries_NNS concerned_VBN ._.
SECTION_NN IX.-Measures_NNS to_TO be_VB taken_VBN with_IN regard_NN to_TO ships_NNS coming_VBG from_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN and_CC ascending_VBG the_DT Danube_NNP ._.
Until_IN the_DT town_NN of_IN Sulina_NNP is_VBZ provided_VBN with_IN good_JJ drinking-water_NN ,_, the_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN of_IN ships_NNS ascending_VBG the_DT river_NN will_MD be_VB subject_JJ to_TO thorough_JJ sanitary_JJ supervision_NN ._.
Overcrowding_NN of_IN passengers_NNS will_MD be_VB strictly_RB forbidden_JJ ._.
Ships_NNS entering_VBG Roumania_NNP by_IN the_DT Danube_NNP will_MD be_VB detained_VBN for_IN medical_JJ inspection_NN ,_, and_CC until_IN disinfection_NN has_VBZ been_VBN completed_VBN ._.
Ships_NNS arriving_VBG at_IN Sulina_NNP must_MD ,_, before_IN being_VBG permitted_VBN to_TO ascend_VB the_DT Danube_NNP ,_, undergo_JJ one_CD or_CC more_JJR medical_JJ inspections_NNS by_IN day_NN ._.
Each_DT morning_NN ,_, at_IN a_DT given_VBN hour_NN the_DT doctor_NN will_MD satisfy_VB himself_PRP as_IN to_TO the_DT state_NN of_IN health_NN of_IN all_DT persons_NNS on_IN the_DT boat_NN ,_, and_CC will_MD not_RB permit_VB it_PRP to_TO enter_VB the_DT ?_. APP_NNP ._.

325_CD river_NN ,_, until_IN he_PRP is_VBZ assured_VBN that_IN their_PRP$ condition_NN is_VBZ satisfactory_JJ ._.
He_PRP will_MD deliver_VB ,_, free_JJ of_IN charge_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT captain_NN or_CC master_NN ,_, a_DT sanitary_JJ passport_NN ,_, bill-of-health_NN or_CC certificate_NN ,_, the_DT production_NN of_IN which_WDT will_MD be_VB demanded_VBN at_IN the_DT subsequent_JJ stations_NNS ._.
There_EX will_MD be_VB a_DT daily_JJ inspection_NN ._.
The_DT detention_NN at_IN Sulina_NNP of_IN healthy_JJ ships_NNS will_MD not_RB exceed_VB six_CD days_NNS ._.
Contaminated_VBN clothes_NNS will_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN on_IN arrival_NN ._.
Drinking-water_NN of_IN good_JJ quality_NN will_MD be_VB substituted_VBN for_IN water_NN of_IN questionable_JJ quality_NN that_WDT may_MD be_VB on_IN board_NN ._.
The_DT bilge-water_NN will_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN ._.
The_DT measures_NNS above_IN indicated_VBN will_MD only_RB be_VB applied_VBN to_TO arrivals_NNS from_IN ports_NNS infected_VBN with_IN the_DT plague_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB understood_JJ that_IN a_DT ship_NN coming_VBG from_IN a_DT healthy_JJ port_NN may_MD ,_, if_IN it_PRP does_VBZ not_RB wish_VB to_TO submit_VB to_TO the_DT restrictive_JJ measures_NNS indicated_VBN above_IN ,_, refuse_NN to_TO embark_VB travellers_NNS from_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ._.
The_DT rules_NNS for_IN suspected_VBN and_CC infected_VBN ships_NNS will_MD be_VB the_DT same_JJ as_IN at_IN other_JJ European_JJ ports_NNS ._.
CHAPTER_NN III_NNP ._.
Instructions_NNS regarding_VBG the_DT method_NN of_IN disinfection_NN ._.
1_CD ._.
Personal_JJ effects_NNS ,_, rags_NNS ,_, infected_VBN bandages_NNS ,_, papers_NNS ,_, and_CC other_JJ articles_NNS without_IN value_NN should_MD be_VB destroyed_VBN by_IN fire_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
Under-clothing_NN ,_, bedding_NN ,_, wearing_VBG apparel_NN ,_, mattresses_NNS ,_, carpets_NNS ,_, etc._NN ,_, which_WDT are_VBP contaminated_VBN or_CC suspected_VBN should_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN in_IN stoves_NNS at_IN normal_JJ pressure_NN ,_, or_CC at_IN a_DT pressure_NN of_IN from_IN one-and-a-half_JJ to_TO two_CD degrees_NNS ,_, with_IN or_CC without_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN steam_NN ._.
Before_IN a_DT stove_NN is_VBZ passed_VBN as_IN efficient_NN for_IN the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN disinfec-_JJ tion_NN ,_, it_PRP should_MD be_VB subjected_VBN to_TO a_DT test_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT aid_NN of_IN a_DT signal_JJ ther-_JJ mometer_NN ,_, showing_VBG the_DT moment_NN when_WRB the_DT temperature_NN in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN a_DT mattress_NN rises_VBZ to_TO at_IN least_JJS 100_CD (_( Centigrade_NNP )_) ._.
To_TO ensure_VB that_IN the_DT disinfection_NN is_VBZ effective_JJ ,_, this_DT temperature_NN must_MD be_VB maintained_VBN for_IN from_IN 10_CD to_TO 15_CD minutes_NNS ._.
3_CD ._.
Disinfecting_VBG solutions-_NN (_( a_DT )_) Solution_NN of_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN ,_, of_IN 1_CD part_NN in_IN 1,000_CD ,_, with_IN the_DT addition_NN of_IN 10_CD parts_NNS of_IN chloride_NN of_IN soda_NN ._.
The_DT solution_NN should_MD be_VB coloured_VBN with_IN aniline_JJ dye_NN or_CC indigo_NN ._.
It_PRP should_MD not_RB be_VB placed_VBN in_IN metal_NN vessels_NNS ._.
(_( b_NN )_) A_DT 5_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
solution_NN of_IN pure_NN crystallized_VBN carbolic_JJ acid_NN ,_, or_CC 5_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN crude_JJ commercial_JJ carbolic_NN acid_NN ,_, in_IN a_DT warm_JJ solution_NN of_IN soft_JJ soap_NN ._.
?_. 326_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
(_( c_NN )_) Fresh_NNP slaked_VBD lime_NN ._.
*_RB 4_CD ._.
Special_JJ instructions_NNS to_TO be_VB observed_VBN in_IN the_DT employment_NN of_IN dis-_JJ infecting_JJ solutions_NNS ._.
The_DT linen_NN ,_, clothing_NN and_CC articles_NNS soiled_VBN by_IN the_DT excreta_NN of_IN patients_NNS should_MD be_VB soaked_VBN in_IN the_DT solution_NN of_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN ._.
The_DT solution_NN of_IN pure_JJ carbolic_JJ acid_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT solution_NN of_IN soap_NN and_CC carbolic_JJ acid_NN are_VBP equally_RB suited_VBN to_TO the_DT purpose_NN ._.
The_DT articles_NNS should_MD remain_VB in_IN the_DT solu-_JJ tion_NN for_IN at_IN least_JJS six_CD hours_NNS ._.
Articles_NNS which_WDT can_MD not_RB be_VB subjected_VBN to_TO the_DT temperature_NN of_IN the_DT stove_NN (_( 100_CD Centigrade_NNP )_) without_IN injury_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN leather_JJR goods_NNS ,_, wooden_JJ articles_NNS stuck_VBN together_RB with_IN glue_NN ,_, felt_VBD ,_, velvet_NN ,_, silk_NN ,_, etc._FW ,_, should_MD be_VB washed_VBN with_IN the_DT solution_NN of_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN ;_: coins_NNS can_MD be_VB dis-_JJ infected_VBN with_IN the_DT solution_NN of_IN soap_NN and_CC carbolic_JJ acid_NN ._.
Persons_NNS engaged_VBN in_IN nursing_VBG the_DT sick_NN should_MD wash_VB their_PRP$ hands_NNS and_CC faces_VBZ with_IN the_DT solution_NN of_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN ,_, or_CC with_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT carbolic_JJ solutions_NNS ._.
The_DT carbolic_JJ solutions_NNS will_MD be_VB useful_JJ more_JJR particularly_RB for_IN dis-_JJ infecting_NN articles_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN metals_NNS ,_, instruments_NNS ,_, etc._NN ,_, which_WDT can_MD neither_RB be_VB subjected_VBN to_TO a_DT temperature_NN of_IN 100_CD Centigrade_NNP ,_, nor_CC placed_VBD in_IN con-_JJ tact_NN with_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN ._.
Slaked_JJ lime_NN is_VBZ particularly_RB recommended_VBN for_IN disinfecting_VBG excreta_NN ._.
Expectorated_JJ matter_NN should_MD be_VB burnt_VBN ._.
5_CD ._.
Disinfection_NN of_IN ships_NNS with_IN plague_NN patients_NNS on_IN board_NN ._.
The_DT cabin_NN or_CC cabins_NNS ,_, and_CC all_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT ship_NN occupied_VBN by_IN the_DT sick_NN or_CC suspected_VBN ,_, should_MD be_VB cleared_VBN out_RP and_CC all_DT articles_NNS in_IN them_PRP should_MD be_VB treated_VBN as_IN described_VBN above_IN ._.
The_DT partitions_NNS should_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN with_IN the_DT solution_NN of_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN with_IN an_DT addition_NN of_IN 10_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN alcohol_NN ._.
The_DT washing_NN should_MD commence_VB from_IN the_DT top_JJ ,_, horizontally_RB ,_, and_CC be_VB continued_VBN down-_JJ wards_NNS ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT whole_JJ surface_NN of_IN the_DT partition_NN becomes_VBZ covered_VBN with_IN a_DT coating_NN of_IN minute_NN drops_NNS ._.
The_DT boarding_NN should_MD be_VB washed_VBN with_IN the_DT same_JJ solution_NN ._.
Two_CD hours_NNS after_IN ,_, the_DT walls_NNS and_CC flooring_NN should_MD be_VB washed_VBN over_IN with_IN plenty_NN of_IN water_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
Disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT hold_NN of_IN an_DT infected_JJ ship_NN ._.
*_NN To_TO get_VB very_RB strong_JJ slaked_VBD lime_NN ,_, take_VBP lime_NN of_IN good_JJ quality_NN ,_, slake_VB it_PRP ,_, by_IN moisten-_JJ ing_VBG it_PRP gradually_RB ,_, with_IN half_PDT its_PRP$ weight_NN of_IN water_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT operation_NN is_VBZ completed_VBN ,_, put_VBD the_DT powder_NN in_IN a_DT carefully_RB corked_VBN receptacle_NN ,_, and_CC place_NN it_PRP in_IN a_DT dry_JJ spot_NN ._.
As_IN each_DT kilo-_JJ gramme_NN of_IN lime_JJ absorbs_JJ 500_CD grammes_NNS of_IN water_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO become_VB slack_NN ,_, it_PRP acquires_VBZ a_DT volume_NN of_IN 2_CD litres_NNS 200_CD ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ sufficient_JJ to_TO dilute_VB it_PRP with_IN double_JJ its_PRP$ volume_NN of_IN water_NN ,_, say_VBP 4_CD kilogrammes_NNS 400_CD grammes_NNS to_TO obtain_VB a_DT whitewash_NN which_WDT will_MD be_VB of_IN about_RB 20_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
strength_NN of_IN lime_NN ._.

IX_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
327_CD To_TO disinfect_VB the_DT hold_NN ,_, sulphate_NN of_IN iron_NN ,_, in_IN quantity_NN sufficient_NN to_TO neutralise_VB the_DT sulphurated_JJ hydrogen_NN ,_, should_MD first_RB be_VB thrown_VBN in_IN ,_, the_DT bilge-water_NN should_MD be_VB pumped_VBN out_RP ,_, and_CC the_DT hold_NN washed_VBD with_IN sea-_JJ water_NN ._.
Solution_NN of_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN should_MD then_RB be_VB thrown_VBN in_IN ._.
The_DT bilge-water_NN should_MD not_RB be_VB pumped_VBN out_RP while_IN the_DT ship_NN is_VBZ in_IN port_NN ._.
CHAPTER_NN IV_NNP ._.
Precautionary_JJ measures_NNS recommended_VBD for_IN ships_NNS on_IN departure_NN ,_, during_IN the_DT voyage_NN ,_, and_CC on_IN arrival_NN ._.
Note.-Plague_JJ appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB transmitted_VBN by_IN the_DT excretions_NNS of_IN the_DT sick_JJ (_( from_IN the_DT air_NN passages_NNS and_CC bowels_NNS )_) ,_, by_IN the_DT morbid_NN products_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN (_( pus_NN )_) ,_, and_CC consequently_RB by_IN means_NNS of_IN linen_NN ,_, clothing_NN ,_, and_CC soiled_VBD hands_NNS ._.
I.-Measures_NNS to_TO be_VB taken_VBN on_IN departure_NN ._.
1_CD ._.
The_DT captain_NN should_MD be_VB careful_JJ not_RB to_TO embark_VB persons_NNS suspected_VBN to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ._.
He_PRP should_MD refuse_VB to_TO receive_VB on_IN board_NN dirty_NN or_CC suspicious_JJ linen_NN ,_, personal_JJ effects_NNS ,_, and_CC bedding_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, generally_RB ,_, all_DT dirty_NN or_CC suspicious_JJ articles_NNS ._.
Bedding_NNP ,_, wearing_VBG apparel_NN ,_, personal_JJ effects_NNS ,_, etc._FW ,_, belonging_VBG to_TO persons_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN should_MD not_RB be_VB taken_VBN on_IN board_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
Before_IN embarkation_NN the_DT ship_NN should_MD be_VB put_VBN in_IN a_DT state_NN of_IN perfect_JJ cleanliness_NN and_CC she_PRP should_MD ,_, if_IN necessary_JJ ,_, be_VB disinfected_VBN ._.
3_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ essential_JJ that_IN the_DT drinking-water_NN taken_VBN on_IN board_NN should_MD be_VB obtained_VBN from_IN a_DT source_NN free_JJ from_IN all_DT possible_JJ contamination_NN ._.
Water_NNP is_VBZ not_RB dangerous_JJ if_IN it_PRP is_VBZ distilled_VBN or_CC boiled_VBN ._.
II.-Measures_NNS to_TO be_VB taken_VBN during_IN the_DT voyage_NN ._.
1_CD ._.
Every_DT ship_NN should_MD have_VB a_DT special_JJ place_NN reserved_VBD for_IN the_DT segre-_JJ gation_NN of_IN persons_NNS attacked_VBN by_IN contagious_JJ disease_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
If_IN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT such_JJ place_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, the_DT cabin_NN or_CC other_JJ place_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT a_DT person_NN is_VBZ attacked_VBN with_IN plague_NN ,_, should_MD be_VB isolated_VBN ._.
Only_RB those_DT attending_VBG the_DT patients_NNS should_MD be_VB admitted_VBN ._.
Such_JJ attendants_NNS should_MD be_VB cut_VBN off_RP from_IN all_DT contact_NN with_IN the_DT other_JJ persons_NNS on_IN board_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT bedding_NN ,_, linen_NN ,_, and_CC clothing_NN which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN in_IN contact_NN with_IN the_DT patient_NN should_MD immediately_RB ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT patients_NNS '_POS room_NN ,_, be_VB soaked_VBN in_IN a_DT disinfecting_JJ solution_NN ._.
The_DT same_JJ measure_NN should_MD be_VB taken_VBN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT clothing_NN of_IN the_DT persons_NNS who_WP have_VBP access_NN to_TO the_DT patient_NN which_WDT may_MD have_VB become_VBN polluted_JJ ._.
?_. 328_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
Articles_NNS which_WDT are_VBP of_IN no_DT value_NN should_MD be_VB burnt_JJ ,_, or_CC thrown_VBN over-_JJ board_NN ,_, if_IN the_DT ship_NN is_VBZ not_RB in_IN port_NN or_CC in_IN a_DT canal_NN ._.
Other_JJ articles_NNS should_MD be_VB carried_VBN to_TO the_DT stove_NN ,_, in_IN impermeable_JJ bags_NNS ,_, sprinkled_VBN with_IN a_DT solution_NN of_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN ,_, so_RB as_IN to_TO avoid_VB all_DT contact_NN with_IN surrounding_VBG objects_NNS ._.
If_IN there_EX is_VBZ not_RB a_DT stove_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, the_DT articles_NNS should_MD be_VB soaked_VBN in_IN the_DT disinfecting_NN solution_NN for_IN six_CD hours_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT excreta_NN of_IN the_DT sick_NN should_MD be_VB collected_VBN in_IN vessels_NNS ,_, into_IN which_WDT a_DT glass_NN of_IN the_DT disinfecting_VBG solution_NN above_IN described_NN has_VBZ been_VBN previously_RB poured_VBN ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT vessels_NNS should_MD be_VB at_IN once_RB emptied_VBN into_IN the_DT latrines_NNS which_WDT should_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN each_DT time_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT places_NNS occupied_VBN by_IN the_DT sick_NN should_MD be_VB carefully_RB disinfected_VBN according_VBG to_TO the_DT rules_NNS previously_RB laid_VBD down_RB ._.
5_CD ._.
Corpses_NNS should_MD be_VB wrapped_VBN in_IN a_DT shroud_NN impregnated_VBN with_IN cor-_JJ rosive_JJ sublimate_NN and_CC thrown_VBN into_IN the_DT sea_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
All_PDT the_DT preventive_JJ measures_NNS taken_VBN during_IN the_DT voyage_NN should_MD be_VB stated_VBN in_IN the_DT log_NN ,_, which_WDT should_MD be_VB submitted_VBN to_TO the_DT sanitary_JJ authority_NN immediately_RB on_IN arrival_NN in_IN port_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
The_DT measures_NNS should_MD be_VB applied_VBN to_TO everything_NN that_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN in_IN contact_NN with_IN the_DT sick_NN ,_, irrespective_NN of_IN the_DT gravity_NN and_CC result_NN of_IN the_DT illness_NN ._.
III.-Measures_NNS to_TO be_VB taken_VBN on_IN arrival_NN ._.
1_CD ._.
If_IN the_DT ship_NN is_VBZ infected_VBN ,_, the_DT persons_NNS attacked_VBD should_MD be_VB disem-_JJ barked_VBN and_CC segregated_VBN in_IN a_DT place_NN set_VBN apart_RB for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._.
Those_DT who_WP have_VBP had_VBD access_NN to_TO the_DT sick_NN should_MD be_VB considered_VBN as_IN suspected_VBN ._.
2_CD ._.
All_DT contaminated_VBN objects_NNS and_CC articles_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN clothes_NNS ,_, bedding_NN ,_, mattresses_NNS ,_, carpets_NNS ,_, and_CC other_JJ articles_NNS which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN in_IN contact_NN with_IN the_DT sick_NN ,_, the_DT clothes_NNS of_IN those_DT who_WP have_VBP been_VBN in_IN attendance_NN on_IN them_PRP ,_, the_DT articles_NNS in_IN the_DT patients_NNS '_POS cabin_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN any_DT cabin_NN and_CC on_IN the_DT deck_NN ,_, or_CC parts_NNS of_IN the_DT deck_NN where_WRB the_DT sick_NN have_VBP been_VBN placed_VBN ,_, should_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN ._.
CHAPTER_NN V._NNP Administration_NNP and_CC Control_NNP ._.
Powers_NNS of_IN the_DT Constantinople_NNP Board_NNP of_IN Health_NNP (_( Red_NNP Sea-Persian_JJ Gulf-Perso-Turkish_NNP ,_, and_CC Russo-Turkish_JJ frontiers_NNS )_) ._.
I_PRP ._.
The_DT execution_NN and_CC control_NN of_IN measures_NNS against_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, prescribed_VBN by_IN this_DT Convention_NNP ,_, are_VBP entrusted_VBN ,_, in_IN exercise_NN of_IN the_DT powers_NNS of_IN the_DT Constantinople_NNP Board_NNP of_IN Health_NNP ,_, to_TO the_DT Committee_NNP ?_. APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._. ]_NN

329_CD established_VBN by_IN Article_NNP 1_CD of_IN Annexure_NNP IV_NNP of_IN the_DT Paris_NNP Convention_NNP of_IN the_DT 3rd_CD April_NNP 1894_CD ._.

5_CD ._.
This_DT Government_NNP therefore_NN are_VBP compelled_VBN to_TO ask_VB that_IN the_DT Con-_NNP vention_NN should_MD be_VB so_RB modified_JJ as_IN to_TO allow_VB of_IN inspection_NN on_IN shore_NN or_CC on_IN board_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT circumstances_NNS of_IN any_DT particular_JJ port_NN may_MD render_VB necessary_JJ ._.

3_CD ._.
The_DT details_NNS of_IN rules_NNS B_NNP inwards_NNS are_VBP taken_VBN from_IN the_DT regulations_NNS enforced_VBN by_IN Government_NNP at_IN Aden_NNP and_CC Karachi_NNP against_IN arrivals_NNS from_IN plague-infected_JJ ports_NNS ._.

In_IN drawing_VBG up_RP these_DT rules_NNS we_PRP have_VBP felt_VBN uncertain_JJ how_WRB far_RB it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT intention_NN of_IN Government_NNP to_TO order_NN the_DT inspection_NN of_IN every_DT vessel_NN which_WDT leaves_VBZ Bombay_NNP for_IN any_DT port_NN ._.
It_PRP seems_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO leave_VB it_PRP open_JJ to_TO Government_NNP to_TO decide_VB that_IN when_WRB plague_NN cases_NNS in_IN Bombay_NNP have_VBP become_VBN very_RB few_JJ these_DT rules_NNS should_MD apply_VB to_TO certain_JJ classes_NNS of_IN vessels_NNS only_RB ,_, say_VBP those_DT bound_NN for_IN Europe_NNP ._.
5_CD ._.
The_DT only_JJ important_JJ exception_NN to_TO the_DT general_JJ conformity_NN is_VBZ that_IN while_IN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN the_DT practice_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP to_TO inspect_VB the_DT passengers_NNS and_CC crew_NN of_IN outgoing_VBG vessels_NNS either_CC on_IN shore_NN or_CC on_IN board_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT other_JJ necessary_JJ arrangements_NNS regarding_VBG the_DT departure_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN made_VBD possible_JJ ,_, the_DT Convention_NNP Rules_NNP as_IN noted_VBN in_IN Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP No_NNP ._.

6_CD ._.
An_DT examination_NN of_IN the_DT conditions_NNS under_IN which_WDT vessels_NNS leave_VBP Bombay_NNP shows_VBZ that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB advisable_JJ ,_, that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB even_RB possible_JJ ,_, to_TO enforce_VB a_DT rule_NN which_WDT makes_VBZ all_DT outgoing_JJ medical_JJ inspection_NN an_DT inspec-_JJ tion_NN on_IN shore_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
In_IN Bombay_NNP vessels_NNS start_VBP from_IN one_CD of_IN three_CD places-_NN (_( 1_CD )_) The_DT outer_NN wall_NN of_IN the_DT dock_NN ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) The_DT docks_NNS ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) The_DT stream_NN ._.

IX_NNP ._.
arranged_VBN on_IN the_DT dock_NN wall_NN ._.
The_DT crews_NN of_IN those_DT vessels_NNS ,_, that_DT is_VBZ of_IN vessels_NNS that_WDT start_VBP from_IN outer_JJR wall_NN of_IN the_DT dock_NN ,_, are_VBP mustered_VBN and_CC exa-_JJ mined_VBN on_IN board_NN before_IN the_DT passengers_NNS are_VBP allowed_VBN to_TO enter_VB the_DT ship_NN ._.

8_CD ._.

The_DT state_NN of_IN the_DT lading_NN or_CC of_IN the_DT tide_NN not_RB unfrequently_RB compels_VBZ a_DT vessel_NN to_TO leave_VB the_DT dock_NN at_IN night_NN ._.

If_IN the_DT passengers_NNS and_CC crew_NNS have_VBP to_TO be_VB inspected_VBN on_IN shore_NN a_DT building_NN must_MD be_VB secured_VBN in_IN some_DT central_JJ position_NN in_IN the_DT docks_NNS with_IN separate_JJ rooms_NNS and_CC retiring_VBG rooms_NNS for_IN men_NNS and_CC for_IN women_NNS ._.

A.-OUTWARD_NNP ._.
Rule_JJ I.-No_NNP vessel_NN shall_MD leave_VB the_DT port_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP for_IN any_DT of_IN the_DT following_JJ ports_NNS ._.
Until_IN she_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT port_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT master_NN or_CC person_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN such_JJ vessel_NN has_VBZ obtained_VBN a_DT bill-of-health_NN or_CC certificate_NN from_IN such_JJ officer_NN that_IN the_DT master_NN or_CC person_NN in_IN charge_NN ,_, officer_NN and_CC passenger_NN (_( if_IN any_DT )_) of_IN such_JJ vessel_NNS are_VBP free_JJ from_IN plague_NN :_: provided_VBN that_IN ,_, in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN a_DT vessel_NN that_WDT has_VBZ called_VBN at_IN Bombay_NNP from_IN a_DT port_NN outside_IN the_DT continent_NN of_IN India_NNP en_FW route_NN for_IN some_DT other_JJ port_NN ,_, and_CC which_WDT has_VBZ on_IN arrival_NN a_DT clean_JJ bill-of-health_NN and_CC has_VBZ had_VBN no_DT communication_NN with_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, except_IN through_IN any_DT person_NN or_CC persons_NNS who_WP shall_MD have_VB embarked_VBN there_RB ,_, the_DT inspection_NN of_IN such_JJ vessel_NN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT port_NN may_MD be_VB limited_VBN to_TO the_DT medical_JJ examination_NN of_IN such_JJ person_NN or_CC persons_NNS so_RB embarked_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT bill-of-health_NN or_CC certificate_NN required_VBN by_IN this_DT rule_NN shall_MD only_RB certify_VB that_IN such_JJ person_NN or_CC persons_NNS is_VBZ or_CC are_VBP free_JJ from_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC such_JJ certificate_NN may_MD be_VB in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN an_DT endorsement_NN on_IN the_DT bill-of-health_NN furnished_VBD to_TO the_DT vessel_NN at_IN the_DT last_JJ port_NN of_IN call_NN prior_RB to_TO arrival_NN at_IN ._.
Bombay_NNP ._.
For_IN the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN this_DT proviso_VBZ the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN Customs_NNP and_CC the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP are_VBP empowered_VBN to_TO decide_VB what_WP shall_MD constitute_VB communication_NN with_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
Rule_NNP II.-Should_NNP the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT port_NN be_VB of_IN opinion_NN that_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN of_IN ,_, or_CC about_IN to_TO sail_VB on_IN ,_, any_DT vessel_NNS so_RB in-_JJ spected_VBN is_VBZ suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN he_PRP shall_MD refuse_VB to_TO give_VB a_DT bill-of-health_NN or_CC certificate_NN as_IN aforesaid_NN unless_IN and_CC until_IN such_JJ person_NN together_RB with_IN his_PRP$ or_CC her_PRP$ attendants_NNS and_CC relatives_NNS ,_, and_CC their_PRP$ baggage_NN and_CC personal_JJ effects_NNS have_VBP been_VBN removed_VBN from_IN the_DT vessel_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ been_VBN disinfected_VBN in_IN such_JJ manner_NN as_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT port_NN directs_VBZ ;_: and_CC such_JJ removal_NN and_CC disinfection_NN shall_MD be_VB noted_VBN on_IN the_DT bill-of-health_NN ._.

Rule_NNP III.-After_NNP the_DT master_NN or_CC person_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ obtained_VBN a_DT bill-of-health_NN or_CC certificate_NN under_IN the_DT provisions_NNS of_IN these_DT rules_NNS ,_, no_DT person_NN or_CC cargo_NN or_CC goods_NNS of_IN any_DT kind_NN shall_MD be_VB embark-_JJ ed_NN or_CC disembarked_VBN before_IN the_DT vessel_NN leaves_VBZ the_DT port_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, unless_IN such_JJ vessel_NN is_VBZ again_RB inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP and_CC another_DT bill-of-health_NN or_CC certificate_NN obtained_VBN from_IN such_JJ officer_NN by_IN the_DT master_NN or_CC person_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN ._.
Rule_NNP IV.-No_NNP port_NN clearance_NN shall_MD be_VB delivered_VBN to_TO any_DT vessel_NN unless_IN and_CC until_IN the_DT master_NN or_CC person_NN in_IN charge_NN thereof_VBP shall_MD produce_VB the_DT bill-of-health_NN or_CC certificate_NN to_TO be_VB obtained_VBN as_IN aforesaid_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP shall_MD be_VB the_DT duty_NN of_IN customs_NNS officers_NNS to_TO refuse_VB delivery_NN of_IN the_DT port_JJ clearance_NN until_IN such_JJ master_NN or_CC person_NN in_IN charge_NN shall_MD produce_VB such_JJ bill-of-health_NN or_CC certificate_NN and_CC such_JJ bill-of-health_NN or_CC certificate_NN comes_VBZ within_IN the_DT provisions_NNS of_IN rule_NN V._NNP Rule_NNP V.-Vessels_NNP not_RB leaving_VBG port_NN before_IN 6_CD A.M._NNP of_IN the_DT day_NN follow-_JJ ing_VBG the_DT medical_JJ inspection_NN may_MD not_RB leave_VB without_IN re-inspection_NN ._.
Rule_NNP VI.-The_NNP medical_JJ inspection_NN of_IN vessels_NNS and_CC passengers_NNS shall_MD be_VB carried_VBN out_RP between_IN sunrise_NN and_CC sunset_NN ._.
