IX_NNP ._.
from_IN in_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP as_IN a_DT temporary_JJ measure-_JJ I.-The_NNP commander_NN of_IN every_DT vessel_NN ,_, including_VBG buggalows_NNS or_CC other_JJ native_JJ craft_NN arriving_VBG at_IN Bombay_NNP from_IN shall_MD ,_, before_IN entering_VBG harbour_NN ,_, hoist_VB a_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN ;_: or_CC shall_MD ,_, if_IN entering_VBG port_NN at_IN night_NN time_NN ,_, show_VBP the_DT quarantine_JJ light_JJ sig-_JJ nals_NNS ,_, viz._NN ,_, 3_CD lights_NNS ,_, red_JJ ,_, white_JJ and_CC red_JJ at_IN the_DT main_JJ ._.
He_PRP shall_MD indicate_VB by_IN signal_JJ the_DT port_NN from_IN which_WDT the_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ come_VBN ,_, and_CC shall_MD keep_VB such_JJ flag_NN and_CC signals_NNS hoisted_VBN until_IN permitted_VBN to_TO take_VB them_PRP down_RP as_RB hereinafter_NN provided_VBD ._.
The_DT pilot_NN on_IN going_VBG alongside_IN a_DT vessel_NN from_IN shall_MD direct_VB the_DT flag_NN or_CC lights_NNS prescribed_VBN above_IN to_TO be_VB hoisted_VBN ,_, if_IN this_DT has_VBZ not_RB already_RB been_VBN done_VBN ._.
II.-Such_JJ commander_NN shall_MD not_RB without_IN first_JJ having_VBG obtained_VBN permission_NN ,_, as_IN hereinafter_NN provided_VBD allow_JJ any_DT communi-_JJ cation_NN except_IN orally_RB ,_, with_IN the_DT shore_NN or_CC with_IN any_DT vessel_NN or_CC board_NN excepting_VBG with_IN the_DT boat_NN supplying_VBG pilots_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN that_DT case_NN communication_NN shall_MD be_VB limited_VBN to_TO receiving_VBG on_IN board_NN the_DT pilot_NN ,_, his_PRP$ servant_NN and_CC baggage_NN ._.
III.-On_NNP such_JJ arrival_NN being_VBG signalled_VBD the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT port_NN shall_MD as_RB soon_RB as_IN possible_JJ go_VB alongside_IN the_DT vessel_NN and_CC ascertain_NN by_IN enquiry_NN from_IN the_DT commander_NN ,_, and_CC by_IN careful_JJ individual_JJ medical_JJ examination_NN of_IN the_DT passengers_NNS and_CC crew_NN ,_, whether_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG or_CC has_VBZ during_IN the_DT voyage_NN suffered_VBD from_IN plague_NN ,_, or_CC whether_IN any_DT death_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN during_IN the_DT voyage_NN from_IN unknown_JJ or_CC suspicious_JJ causes_NNS ._.
If_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT port_NN is_VBZ satisfied_VBN by_IN such_JJ enquiry_NN and_CC examination_NN that_IN no_DT per-_JJ son_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG ,_, or_CC during_IN the_DT voyage_NN has_VBZ suffer-_JJ ed_NNS ,_, from_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN no_DT death_NN from_IN unknown_JJ or_CC sus-_JJ picious_JJ causes_NNS has_VBZ occurred_VBN during_IN the_DT voyage_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ been_VBN ten_VBN clear_JJ days_NNS out_RP from_IN pratique_NN shall_MD be_VB given_VBN at_IN once_RB ,_, subject_JJ to_TO the_DT directions_NNS of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT port_NN as_IN to_TO what_WP ,_, if_IN any_DT ,_, proce-_JJ dure_NN of_IN disinfection_NN shall_MD be_VB carried_VBN out_RP ._.

339_CD clear_JJ days_NNS have_VBP elapsed_VBN since_IN the_DT vessel_NN 's_POS departure_NN from_IN or_CC until_IN all_DT persons_NNS on_IN board_NN have_VBP been_VBN subjected_VBN to_TO me-_JJ dical_JJ supervision_NN at_IN an_DT appointed_JJ place_NN during_IN such_JJ period_NN as_IN will_MD complete_VB ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN 's_POS departure_NN from_IN For_IN the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN this_DT rule_NN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT port_NN may_MD domand_VB a_DT declaration_NN on_IN oath_NN from_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN or_CC in_IN his_PRP$ absence_NN from_IN the_DT commander_NN that_IN there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN no_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN on_IN the_DT ship_NN since_IN her_PRP$ departure_NN from_IN IV.-If_NNP ,_, as_IN the_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT enquiry_NN and_CC examination_NN made_VBN under_IN rule_NN III_NNP ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT port_NN shall_MD have_VB reason_NN to_TO believe_VB or_CC suspect_VB that_DT at_IN the_DT time_NN the_DT vessel_NN arrives_VBZ in_IN the_DT harbour_NN any_DT person_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG ,_, or_CC during_IN the_DT voyage_NN has_VBZ suffered_VBN ,_, from_IN plague_NN ,_, or_CC that_IN any_DT suspici-_JJ ous_JJ death_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD direct_VB that_IN such_JJ person_NN ,_, together_RB with_IN all_PDT his_PRP$ or_CC her_PRP$ baggage_NN and_CC personal_JJ effects_NNS other_JJ than_IN such_JJ contaminated_VBN or_CC infected_VBN articles_NNS as_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT port_NN directs_VBZ to_TO be_VB destroyed_VBN ,_, be_VB removed_VBN to_TO such_JJ place_NN as_IN is_VBZ appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, there_EX to_TO remain_VB until_IN permitted_VBN to_TO leave_VB by_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN such_JJ place_NN ._.

Under_IN this_DT rule_NN the_DT period_NN of_IN quarantine_NN for_IN vessels_NNS which_WDT on_IN arrival_NN are_VBP found_VBN free_JJ from_IN cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN ,_, but_CC on_IN which_WDT a_DT suspicious_JJ death_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN during_IN the_DT voyage_NN should_MD be_VB limited_VBN to_TO ten_VB days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN such_JJ suspicious_JJ death_NN ._.
V.-If_NNP ,_, during_IN the_DT period_NN ,_, a_DT vessel_NN is_VBZ at_IN the_DT quarantine_JJ anchorage_NN aforesaid_VBD any_DT case_NN or_CC cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN should_MD occur_VB on_IN board_NN ,_, the_DT said_VBD vessel_JJ shall_MD remain_VB in_IN quarantine_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT termination_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN either_RB by_IN death_NN ,_, recovery_NN ,_, or_CC removal_NN from_IN the_DT vessel_NN ,_, and_CC be_VB subject_JJ to_TO all_PDT the_DT prohibitions_NNS provided_VBN in_IN rules_NNS III_NNP and_CC IV_NNP ._.

VII.-Any_NNP mails_NNS ,_, baggage_NN or_CC cargo_NN which_WDT may_MD be_VB brought_VBN by_IN any_DT vessel_NNS so_IN arriving_VBG shall_MD be_VB landed_VBN under_IN such_JJ pre-_JJ cautions_NNS as_IN to_TO the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD seem_VB necessary_JJ to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.

591_CD of_IN 1897_CD Note_NN by_IN Surgeon-Major_NNP MacCartie_NNP on_IN Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP letter_NN No_NNP ._.
1623_CD ,_, Home_NNP Department_NNP ,_, dated_VBD 1st_CD June_NNP 1897_CD (_( Sanitary_NNP )_) ._.

I.-Departures_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.

spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
341_CD the_DT Bombay_NNP rules_NNS permit_NN of_IN inspection_NN on_IN shore_NN or_CC on_IN boardship_NN as_IN the_DT case_NN may_MD be_VB ._.
(_( b_NN )_) Inspection_NN on_IN shore_NN of_IN contaminated_VBN or_CC suspected_VBN articles_NNS is_VBZ compulsory_JJ under_IN the_DT Venice_NNP rules_NNS and_CC is_VBZ not_RB mentioned_VBN in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP rules_NNS ._.
A_DT third_JJ point_NN of_IN difference_NN is_VBZ the_DT wish_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP expressed_VBD in_IN paragraph_NN 5_CD of_IN their_PRP$ letter_NN No_DT ._.

3_CD ._.
The_DT order_NN to_TO inspect_VB on_IN shore_NN each_DT person_NN sailing_VBG on_IN the_DT ship_NN would_MD seem_VB to_TO include_VB crews_NNS as_RB well_RB as_IN passengers_NNS ,_, and_CC if_IN that_DT is_VBZ the_DT intention_NN ,_, its_PRP$ inclusion_NN in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP rules_NNS will_MD be_VB difficult_JJ ,_, if_IN not_RB impossible_JJ ,_, for_IN the_DT following_JJ reasons_NNS :_: -_: A_DT very_RB large_JJ number_NN of_IN vessels_NNS do_VBP not_RB enter_VB the_DT docks_NNS ._.
They_PRP load_VBP and_CC unload_VBP in_IN the_DT stream_NN and_CC their_PRP$ crews_NNS therefore_RB live_VBP on_IN board_NN ,_, but_CC communicate_VBP freely_RB with_IN the_DT shore_NN either_CC by_IN visits_NNS to_TO the_DT town_NN or_CC by_IN contact_NN with_IN shore_JJ people_NNS who_WP load_VBP or_CC unload_VBP the_DT vessels_NNS ._.
If_IN these_DT crews_NNS have_VBP to_TO be_VB brought_VBN on_IN shore_NN for_IN inspection_NN ,_, great_JJ expense_NN ,_, trouble_NN ,_, and_CC delay_NN will_MD be_VB thrown_VBN on_IN shipowners_NNS with_IN no_DT compensating_VBG advantage_NN ,_, for_IN ,_, if_IN any_DT member_NN of_IN them_PRP is_VBZ found_VBN at_IN the_DT inspection_NN of_IN shore_NN to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ,_, he_PRP must_MD be_VB considered_VBN to_TO have_VB already_RB infected_VBN the_DT ship_NN he_PRP has_VBZ come_VBN from_IN ._.
The_DT largest_JJS P._NN and_CC O._NNP vessels_NNS always_RB sail_VBP from_IN the_DT stream_NN and_CC have_VBP crews_NNS numbering_VBG from_IN 300_CD to_TO 340_CD men_NNS ._.
All_PDT these_DT have_VBP free_JJ communication_NN with_IN the_DT city_NN for_IN many_JJ days_NNS before_IN departure_NN from_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
Are_VBP they_PRP to_TO be_VB brought_VBN on_IN shore_NN for_IN examination_NN on_IN the_DT day_NN of_IN sailing_NN ,_, as_IN would_MD seem_VB to_TO be_VB intended_VBN by_IN the_DT rules_NNS of_IN the_DT Venice_NNP Conference_NNP ,_, and_CC if_IN so_RB ,_, what_WP sanitary_JJ object_NN has_VBZ been_VBN attained_VBN by_IN a_DT transfer_NN from_IN ship_NN to_TO shore_VB at_IN great_JJ expense_NN ,_, inconvenience_NN and_CC delay_NN to_TO the_DT owners_NNS ,_, and_CC at_IN considerable_JJ risk_NN to_TO the_DT ships_NNS thus_RB deprived_VBN of_IN their_PRP$ crews_NNS ?_.
The_DT same_JJ objections_NNS apply_VBP though_IN in_IN a_DT lesser_JJR degree_NN to_TO such_JJ vessels_NNS as_IN sail_NN direct_NN from_IN the_DT wet_NN docks_NNS ._.

5_CD ._.
How_WRB important_JJ is_VBZ this_DT crew_JJ question_NN will_MD be_VB seen_VBN from_IN the_DT return_NN of_IN persons_NNS inspected_VBN prior_RB to_TO their_PRP$ departure_NN from_IN Bombay_NNP by_IN sea_NN during_IN the_DT months_NNS of_IN April_NNP and_CC May_NNP last_JJ ,_, the_DT only_JJ two_CD months_NNS for_IN which_WDT the_DT returns_NNS have_VBP as_IN yet_RB been_VBN made_VBN out_RP ._.
In_IN April_NNP 80,008_CD persons_NNS were_VBD inspected_VBN ,_, of_IN whom_WP 42,141_CD were_VBD crews_NNS ._.
In_IN May_NNP 81,398_CD ,_, of_IN whom_WP 44,797_CD were_VBD crews_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ thus_RB evident_JJ that_IN the_DT crews_NNS of_IN vessels_NNS have_VBP been_VBN even_RB more_RBR numerous_JJ than_IN the_DT passengers_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT transfer_NN of_IN an_DT average_NN of_IN ?_. 342_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
over_IN forty-three_JJ thousand_CD a_DT month_NN to_TO shore_VB for_IN inspection_NN would_MD have_VB been_VBN impracticable_JJ ,_, and_CC as_IN regards_NNS any_DT sanitary_JJ object_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT prevention_NN of_IN infection_NN on_IN a_DT departing_VBG vessel_NN ,_, useless_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB hoped_VBN then_RB that_IN the_DT expression_NN ``_`` every_DT person_NN sailing_VBG in_IN the_DT vessel_NN must_MD be_VB examined_VBN on_IN shore_NN ''_'' which_WDT occurs_VBZ in_IN paragraph_NN 5_CD of_IN Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP letter_NN No_NNP ._.

7_CD ._.
On_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, the_DT inspection_NN of_IN all_DT passengers_NNS on_IN shore_NN will_MD be_VB possible_JJ ,_, although_IN extremely_RB difficult_JJ and_CC very_RB expensive_JJ as_IN will_MD be_VB seen_VBN from_IN the_DT following_VBG remarks_NNS ._.
In_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT Venice_NNP Regulations_NNPS ,_, Bombay_NNP ,_, as_RB long_RB as_IN indigenous_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN occur_NN there_RB ,_, will_MD be_VB bound_VBN to_TO inspect_VB all_DT outgoing_JJ persons_NNS ;_: but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT opinion_NN of_IN many_JJ medical_JJ men_NNS of_IN standing_VBG that_DT plague_NN will_MD ,_, as_IN cholera_NN had_VBD done_VBN ,_, become_VB endemic_JJ in_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
There_EX is_VBZ therefore_RB a_DT possibility_NN if_IN not_RB a_DT probability_NN of_IN the_DT Local_JJ Government_NNP having_VBG to_TO provide_VB an_DT inspecting_JJ staff_NN to_TO prevent_VB the_DT export_NN of_IN plague_NN cases_NNS ,_, commensurate_NN with_IN the_DT enormous_JJ human_NN traffic_NN between_IN Bombay_NNP and_CC other_JJ ports_NNS ._.
To_TO estimate_VB what_WP staff_NN is_VBZ necessary_JJ for_IN this_DT purpose_NN is_VBZ of_IN course_NN impossible_JJ until_IN it_PRP is_VBZ known_VBN whether_IN the_DT regulations_NNS as_IN to_TO inspection_VB refer_NN only_RB to_TO vessels_NNS bound_IN for_IN Europe_NNP ,_, or_CC are_VBP to_TO apply_VB as_IN at_IN present_NN ,_, to_TO all_DT persons_NNS leaving_VBG Bombay_NNP by_IN sea_NN for_IN anywhere_RB ._.
If_IN the_DT latter_NN ,_, then_RB a_DT staff_NN sufficient_NN to_TO inspect_VB some_DT 80,000_CD people_NNS a_DT month_NN will_MD be_VB necessary_JJ ._.
Such_JJ a_DT staff_NN has_VBZ been_VBN in_IN existence_NN since_IN the_DT 6th_CD Feb-_JJ ruary_NN ,_, and_CC consists_VBZ of-_JJ 1_CD Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, 1_CD Additional_NNP Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, 3_CD Commissioned_NNP Medical_NNP Officers_NNP ,_, 3_CD Assistant_NNP Surgeons_NNP ,_, 1_CD Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP ,_, 2_CD Lady_NN Doctors_NNS ,_, and_CC services_NNS of_IN one_CD other_JJ Lady_NNP Doctor_NNP on_IN at_IN least_JJS two_CD days_NNS of_IN each_DT week_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN addition_NN to_TO the_DT above_NN ,_, three_CD qualified_VBD medical_JJ officers_NNS who_WP worked_VBD under_IN the_DT supervision_NN of_IN the_DT Customs_NNP Department_NNP ,_, chiefly_NN in_IN connection_NN with_IN the_DT inspection_NN of_IN small_JJ native_JJ sailing_NN craft_NN ._.
The_DT above_JJ staff_NN was_VBD really_RB too_RB small_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT work_NN was_VBD only_RB satisfactorily_RB done_VBN by_IN working_VBG at_IN a_DT pressure_NN which_WDT is_VBZ only_RB possible_JJ for_IN a_DT limited_JJ time_NN ,_, which_WDT left_VBD absolutely_RB no_DT margin_NN for_IN sickness_NN or_CC accident_NN ,_, and_CC necessitated_JJ hours_NNS of_IN duty_NN lasting_NN on_IN too_RB many_JJ occasions_NNS from_IN 5-30_JJ A.M._NNP to_TO 7_CD and_CC at_IN times_NNS 8_CD P.M._NNP with_IN a_DT very_RB brief_JJ interval_NN for_IN breakfast_NN ,_, whilst_VBD it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN necessary_JJ on_IN English_JJ mail_NN days_NNS to_TO supplement_VB that_IN staff_NN by_IN enlisting_VBG the_DT services_NNS of_IN at_IN least_JJS two_CD and_CC sometimes_RB four_CD of_IN the_DT Professors_NNS of_IN the_DT Grant_NNP Medical_NNP College_NNP ._.

IX_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
343_CD The_DT necessity_NN for_IN a_DT large_JJ staff_NN is_VBZ not_RB merely_RB because_IN so_RB large_JJ a_DT number_NN of_IN persons_NNS have_VBP to_TO be_VB inspected_VBN ,_, or_CC because_IN vessels_NNS sail_VBP at_IN all_DT hours_NNS and_CC from_IN different_JJ anchorages_NNS or_CC berths_NNS in_IN a_DT large_JJ harbour_NN ,_, but_CC also_RB because_IN plague_NN is_VBZ a_DT disease_NN which_WDT compels_VBZ a_DT most_RBS rigid_JJ inspection_NN of_IN all_DT persons_NNS who_WP present_VBP themselves_PRP for_IN examination_NN ._.
Its_PRP$ main_JJ and_CC chiefest_JJS signs_NNS are_VBP fever_RB and_CC bubos_VB ,_, and_CC accordingly_RB any_DT man_NN with_IN fever_NN or_CC with_IN bubos_JJ becomes_NNS an_DT object_NN of_IN suspicion_NN ,_, has_VBZ to_TO have_VB his_PRP$ temperature_NN taken_VBN and_CC be_VB examined_VBN practically_RB naked_JJ ._.
During_IN the_DT inspection_NN of_IN departing_VBG passengers_NNS by_IN sea_NN in_IN February_NNP ,_, March_NNP ,_, April_NNP and_CC May_NNP ,_, the_DT numbers_NNS placed_VBN on_IN one_CD side_NN for_IN temper-_JJ ature_NN observation_NN ranged_VBD from_IN 20_CD to_TO 25_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, and_CC as_RB many_JJ as_IN a_DT dozen_NN thermometers_NNS were_VBD in_IN use_NN at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN ._.
8_CD ._.
Therefore_RB as_RB long_RB as_IN plague_NN exists_NNS ,_, the_DT Local_JJ Government_NNP will_MD require_VB a_DT very_RB large_JJ staff_NN to_TO examine_VB outgoing_VBG vessels_NNS ,_, for_IN ,_, even_RB if_IN there_EX are_VBP but_CC few_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN in_IN the_DT city_NN ,_, every_DT one_CD departing_NN from_IN Bombay_NNP must_MD be_VB looked_VBN upon_IN as_IN a_DT possible_JJ plague_NN case_NN ,_, and_CC will_MD have_VB to_TO be_VB most_JJS rigidly_RB examined_VBD ;_: for_IN no_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP can_MD be_VB expected_VBN to_TO sign_VB a_DT bill-of-health_NN which_WDT certifies_VBZ to_TO the_DT absence_NN of_IN plague_NN from_IN amongst_NN crew_NN and_CC passengers_NNS ,_, unless_IN he_PRP is_VBZ satisfied_JJ that_IN all_DT that_DT is_VBZ humanly_RB possible_JJ has_VBZ been_VBN done_VBN to_TO ensure_VB that_IN the_DT bill-of-health_NN is_VBZ an_DT honest_JJ one_CD ._.
9_CD ._.
It_PRP becomes_VBZ ,_, then_RB ,_, important_JJ to_TO consider_VB how_WRB the_DT inspection_NN of_IN outgoing_VBG persons_NNS from_IN Bombay_NNP can_MD be_VB managed_VBN without_IN the_DT Local_JJ Government_NNP having_VBG to_TO undergo_VB a_DT very_RB heavy_JJ expenditure_NN ;_: and_CC ,_, as_IN I_PRP submit_VBP ,_, the_DT expense_NN of_IN an_DT inspecting_JJ staff_NN will_MD ,_, if_IN all_DT persons_NNS are_VBP to_TO be_VB examined_VBN on_IN shore_NN ,_, as_IN directed_VBN in_IN paragraph_JJ 5_CD of_IN Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP letter_NN No_NNP ._.
1623_CD of_IN 1st_CD June_NNP ,_, be_VB so_RB great_JJ as_IN to_TO practically_RB be_VB prohibi-_JJ tive_NN ._.
10_CD ._.

I_PRP would_MD point_VB out_RP that_IN such_JJ regulations_NNS would_MD not_RB only_RB comply_VB with_IN the_DT Venice_NNP Convention_NNP rules_NNS ,_, but_CC would_MD also_RB further_RB order_NN on_IN the_DT P._NNP and_CC O_NNP ._.

14_CD ._.
Similar_JJ rules_NNS could_MD be_VB adopted_VBN for_IN other_JJ passenger_NN steamers_NNS for_IN Europe_NNP ,_, China_NNP ,_, and_CC Japan_NNP ._.
15_CD ._.
I_PRP believe_VBP there_EX is_VBZ already_RB efficient_JJ examination_NN on_IN shore_NN of_IN coasting_VBG steamers_NNS ._.
But_CC I_PRP do_VBP not_RB understand_VB that_IN the_DT Venice_NNP Conven-_NNP tion_NN rules_NNS are_VBP intended_VBN to_TO apply_VB to_TO vessels_NNS between_IN British_JJ ports_NNS only_RB ,_, either_RB in_IN India_NNP ,_, or_CC between_IN India_NNP and_CC any_DT other_JJ British_JJ port_NN outside_IN India_NNP ._.

17_CD ._.
As_IN I_PRP have_VBP already_RB stated_VBN ,_, I_PRP do_VBP not_RB understand_VB that_IN the_DT Venice_NNP Convention_NNP rules_NNS are_VBP intended_VBN to_TO apply_VB to_TO the_DT crews_NNS of_IN vessels_NNS as_IN (_( a_DT )_) their_PRP$ examination_NN on_IN shore_NN is_VBZ impossible_JJ and_CC (_( b_NN )_) useless_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP could_MD not_RB prevent_VB a_DT vessel_NN being_VBG an_DT infected_VBN vessel_NN by_IN the_DT discovery_NN of_IN any_DT member_NN of_IN the_DT crew_NN being_VBG infected_VBN ,_, as_IN he_PRP would_MD have_VB come_VBN from_IN the_DT ship_NN ,_, and_CC would_MD therefore_RB have_VB made_VBN the_DT ship_NN infected_VBD before_IN he_PRP came_VBD on_IN shore_NN for_IN examination_NN ._.
Moreover_RB ,_, I_PRP do_VBP not_RB think_VB there_EX is_VBZ much_RB danger_JJR to_TO be_VB apprehended_VBN from_IN the_DT crews_NNS ,_, and_CC it_PRP would_MD be_VB interesting_VBG to_TO know_VB if_IN ,_, during_IN the_DT recent_JJ plague_NN epidemic_JJ ,_, Surgeon-_JJ Major_NNP MacCartie_NNP has_VBZ found_VBN any_DT case_NN in_IN which_WDT a_DT ship_NN has_VBZ become_VBN infected_VBN from_IN illness_NN among_IN the_DT crew_NN ._.

Section_NNP II_NNP of_IN Chapter_NNP I_PRP of_IN the_DT Venice_NNP Con-_NNP vention_NN ,_, relating_VBG to_TO sanitary_JJ measures_NNS for_IN ships_NNS sailing_VBG from_IN infected_VBN ports_NNS ,_, is_VBZ divided_VBN into_IN two_CD portions_NNS -_: the_DT first_JJ relating_NN to_TO ordinary_JJ vessels_NNS and_CC the_DT second_JJ relating_NN to_TO pilgrim_VB ships_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT latter_JJ the_DT direction_NN to_TO examine_VB on_IN shore_NN is_VBZ followed_VBN by_IN a_DT remark_NN that_IN in_IN carrying_VBG out_RP this_DT measure_NN each_DT Government_NN may_MD take_VB local_JJ con-_JJ siderations_NNS and_CC conditions_NNS into_IN account_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT footnote_NN explains_VBZ that_IN the_DT Conference_NNP decided_VBD that_IN in_IN the_DT Dutch_JJ Indies_NNPS the_DT inspection_NN may_MD be_VB carried_VBN out_RP on_IN board_NN ship_NN ._.
The_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP agree_VBP with_IN Sir_NNP James_NNP Campbell_NNP that_IN ,_, if_IN the_DT concession_NN of_IN examination_NN on_IN board_NN can_MD be_VB made_VBN in_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT most_RBS dangerous_JJ class_NN of_IN passengers_NNS ,_, namely_RB ,_, pilgrims_NNS ,_, it_PRP ought_MD also_RB to_TO be_VB made_VBN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN other_JJ persons_NNS should_MD circumstances_NNS render_VB this_DT desirable_JJ ._.
And_CC it_PRP is_VBZ shown_VBN that_IN the_DT circumstances_NNS of_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP render_VBP the_DT concession_NN impera-_JJ tive_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ pointed_VBN out_RP that_IN the_DT most_RBS important_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT examina-_JJ tion_NN is_VBZ the_DT examination_NN of_IN the_DT crew_NN ,_, firstly_RB because_IN of_IN the_DT persons_NNS examined_VBD the_DT greater_JJR number_NN belong_NN to_TO crews_NNS of_IN vessels_NNS ,_, and_CC secondly_RB because_IN experience_NN has_VBZ shown_VBN that_IN the_DT crews_NNS are_VBP much_RB more_RBR likely_JJ to_TO be_VB infected_VBN than_IN the_DT passengers_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ further_JJ shown_VBN that_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN the_DT crews_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ practically_RB impossible_JJ to_TO examine_VB them_PRP all_DT on_IN shore_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN in_IN the_DT less_RBR important_JJ case_NN of_IN the_DT passengers_NNS ,_, though_IN it_PRP is_VBZ possible_JJ ,_, it_PRP would_MD give_VB rise_NN to_TO very_RB serious_JJ inconvenience_NN both_DT to_TO the_DT passengers_NNS and_CC to_TO the_DT regular_JJ working_NN of_IN the_DT port_NN arrange-_JJ ments_NNS ._.

I_PRP am_VBP to_TO take_VB this_DT opportunity_NN to_TO state_NN that_IN the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP fully_RB shares_NNS in_IN the_DT appreciation_NN of_IN the_DT admirable_JJ work_NN done_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP MacCartie_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ staff_NN during_IN the_DT past_JJ six_CD months_NNS ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ expressed_VBN by_IN the_DT Govern-_NNP ment_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
4_CD ._.

As_IN Rule_NNP II_NNP stands_VBZ at_IN present_JJ it_PRP permits_VBZ the_DT grant_NN of_IN a_DT clean_JJ bill-of-health_NN ,_, even_RB though_IN a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN is_VBZ discovered_VBN on_IN board_NN ,_, provided_VBD that_IN the_DT patient_NN is_VBZ removed_VBN and_CC that_IN the_DT other_JJ pre-_JJ scribed_JJ precautions_NNS are_VBP duly_RB carried_VBN out_RP ._.

656_CD 165/P._CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 6th_CD February_NNP ,_, prohibits_VBZ the_DT departure_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN until_IN she_PRP has_VBZ obtained_VBN a_DT clean_JJ bill-of-health_NN ,_, and_CC permits_VBZ the_DT grant_NN of_IN a_DT clean_JJ bill-of-health_NN if_IN the_DT persons_NNS left_VBD on_IN board_NN are_VBP free_JJ from_IN plague_NN ._.
Neither_DT draft_NN Rule_NNP II_NNP nor_CC existing_VBG Rule_NNP I_PRP conforms_VBP to_TO the_DT requirements_NNS of_IN the_DT Venice_NNP Convention_NNP ._.
On_IN the_DT one_CD hand_NN ,_, if_IN the_DT measures_NNS prescribed_VBN by_IN the_DT Convention_NNP are_VBP duly_RB carried_VBN out_RP ,_, the_DT vessel_NN may_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO depart_VB ,_, even_RB though_IN she_PRP can_MD not_RB be_VB certified_VBN to_TO be_VB healthy_JJ ;_: on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, if_IN a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN is_VBZ discovered_VBN on_IN board_NN ,_, the_DT fact_NN must_MD be_VB stated_VBN in_IN the_DT bill-of-health_NN ._.
Chapter_NN II_NNP ,_, Section_NNP VIII_NNP of_IN the_DT Conven-_NNP tion_NN lays_VBZ down_RP the_DT rule_NN that_IN a_DT ship_NN sailing_VBG from_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN may_MD only_RB be_VB considered_VBN as_IN healthy_JJ if_IN no_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN on_IN board_NN either_CC before_IN departure_NN ,_, during_IN the_DT voyage_NN ,_, or_CC on_IN arrival_NN ._.
The_DT adoption_NN of_IN the_DT prescribed_JJ precautions_NNS on_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN a_DT case_NN before_IN departure_NN can_MD not_RB alter_VB the_DT fact_NN that_IN the_DT vessel_NN is_VBZ infected_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ stated_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP MacCartie_NNP that_IN during_IN the_DT height_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_JJ it_PRP was_VBD generally_RB found_VBN necessary_JJ to_TO remove_VB some_DT of_IN the_DT crew_NN on_IN suspicion_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN in_IN some_DT instances_NNS the_DT suspected_JJ cases_NNS turned_VBD out_RP to_TO be_VB true_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN ._.
It_PRP does_VBZ not_RB appear_VB necessary_JJ to_TO mention_VB in_IN the_DT bill-of-health_NN the_DT removal_NN of_IN a_DT case_NN on_IN mere_JJ suspicion_NN ,_, for_IN instance_NN ,_, the_DT removal_NN of_IN a_DT person_NN suffering_VBG from_IN fever_NN without_IN any_DT other_JJ sign_NN of_IN plague_NN ._.
But_CC if_IN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN inspection_NN on_IN board_NN a_DT case_NN is_VBZ disco-_JJ vered_NNS ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ ascertained_VBN or_CC believed_VBN to_TO be_VB plague_NN ,_, then_RB it_PRP is_VBZ clearly_RB necessary_JJ to_TO mention_VB the_DT fact_NN in_IN the_DT bill-of-health_NN ._.
In_IN such_JJ cases_NNS the_DT precautions_NNS adopted_VBD should_MD also_RB be_VB stated_VBN ,_, including_VBG ,_, if_IN the_DT patient_NN has_VBZ been_VBN living_VBG on_IN board_NN ,_, the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT infected_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
Apart_RB from_IN the_DT matter_NN discussed_VBN in_IN the_DT preceding_NN paragraph_NN ,_, the_DT draft_NN rules_NNS for_IN the_DT inspection_NN of_IN outward_NN bound_NN vessels_NNS appear_VBP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP to_TO be_VB generally_RB suitable_JJ and_CC in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT Venice_NNP Convention_NNP ,_, and_CC they_PRP consider_VBP that_IN the_DT rules_NNS may_MD be_VB sanctioned_VBN subject_JJ to_TO the_DT following_JJ remarks_NNS ._.
It_PRP should_MD be_VB stated_VBN in_IN Rule_NNP I_PRP ,_, in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT terms_NNS of_IN the_DT Convention_NNP ,_, that_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP must_MD examine_VB each_DT person_NN sailing_VBG on_IN the_DT ship_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT Consular_NNP Authority_NNP interested_JJ in_IN the_DT ship_NN may_MD be_VB present_JJ at_IN the_DT examination_NN ._.

357_CD India_NNP ,_, be_VB made_VBN on_IN shore_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP consider_VBP that_IN this_DT should_MD be_VB stated_VBN in_IN the_DT rule_NN ._.
It_PRP also_RB appears_VBZ from_IN Sir_NNP James_NNP Campbell_NNP 's_POS letter_NN of_IN the_DT 24th_CD June_NNP that_WDT under_IN present_JJ arrangements_NNS passengers_NNS are_VBP sometimes_RB examined_VBN on_IN shore_NN ._.

6_CD ._.
Rule_NN I_PRP commences_VBP with_IN the_DT words_NNS ``_`` no_DT vessel_NN shall_MD leave_VB the_DT port_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP for_IN any_DT of_IN the_DT following_JJ ports_NNS ._. ''_''

In_IN paragraph_JJ 7_CD of_IN your_PRP$ letter_NN under_IN reply_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ stated_VBN that_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP agree_VBP with_IN Sir_NNP James_NNP Campbell_NNP that_IN ,_, when_WRB plague_NN cases_NNS have_VBP become_VBN very_RB few_JJ in_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, the_DT inspection_NN rules_NNS should_MD be_VB applied_VBN to_TO certain_JJ classes_NNS of_IN vessels_NNS only_RB ._.
They_PRP consider_VBP that_DT so_RB long_RB as_IN Bombay_NNP remains_VBZ an_DT infected_JJ port_NN within_IN the_DT meaning_NN of_IN that_DT expression_NN as_IN used_VBN in_IN the_DT Convention_NNP ,_, individual_JJ medical_JJ inspection_NN must_MD be_VB made_VBN of_IN every_DT person_NN sailing_VBG in_IN each_DT vessel_NN proceeding_VBG to_TO any_DT part_NN of_IN a_DT country_NN which_WDT is_VBZ a_DT party_NN to_TO the_DT Convention_NNP ;_: but_CC that_DT ,_, as_IN regards_NNS vessels_NNS proceeding_VBG to_TO other_JJ ports_NNS ,_, whether_IN within_IN or_CC outside_IN India_NNP ,_, the_DT inspection_NN can_MD be_VB altered_VBN or_CC discontinued_VBN at_IN will_MD ._.
The_DT Governor_NNP in_IN Council_NNP hopes_VBZ that_IN the_DT time_NN is_VBZ near_IN when_WRB the_DT inspection_NN of_IN vessels_NNS proceeding_VBG from_IN Bombay_NNP may_MD in_IN some_DT cases_NNS be_VB relaxed_VBN or_CC discontinued_VBN ,_, and_CC enquiry_NN is_VBZ made_VBN in_IN your_PRP$ letter_NN whether_IN such_JJ alterations_NNS or_CC discontinuance_NN should_MD be_VB made_VBN without_IN previous_JJ reference_NN to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ._.
I_PRP am_VBP to_TO say_VB that_IN the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP considers_NNS that_WDT for_IN the_DT present_JJ the_DT rules_NNS must_MD be_VB maintained_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ entirety_NN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN vessels_NNS sailing_VBG to_TO all_DT ports_NNS whether_IN in_IN or_CC out_IN of_IN India_NNP ._.
In_IN view_NN of_IN the_DT great_JJ increase_NN in_IN the_DT mortality_NN in_IN Bombay_NNP and_CC of_IN the_DT recrudescence_NN of_IN plague_NN in_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT surrounding_VBG districts_NNS ,_, His_PRP$ Excellency_NN in_IN Council_NNP is_VBZ of_IN opinion_NN that_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB unwise_JJ to_TO relax_VB any_DT of_IN the_DT precautions_NNS at_IN the_DT present_JJ time_NN ._.
His_PRP$ Excellency_NN in_IN Council_NNP is_VBZ also_RB not_RB at_IN present_JJ convinced_VBD that_IN the_DT rules_NNS for_IN vessels_NNS bound_VBN for_IN Indian_JJ ports_NNS may_MD be_VB ultimately_RB discontinued_VBN or_CC relaxed_VBN before_IN those_DT for_IN vessels_NNS sailing_VBG for_IN ports_NNS out_IN of_IN India_NNP ._.
The_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP would_MD therefore_VB prefer_NN that_IN a_DT reference_NN should_MD be_VB made_VBN to_TO them_PRP before_IN the_DT rules_NNS are_VBP discontinued_VBN or_CC relaxed_VBN with_IN reference_NN to_TO vessels_NNS sailing_VBG to_TO any_DT particular_JJ class_NN of_IN ports_NNS ._.
7_CD ._.
I_PRP am_VBP to_TO observe_VB that_IN the_DT inspection_NN rules_NNS for_IN outward_NN bound_NN vessels_NNS forwarded_VBN with_IN your_PRP$ letter_NN are_VBP framed_VBN only_RB for_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN no_DT mention_NN is_VBZ made_VBN in_IN your_PRP$ letter_NN or_CC its_PRP$ enclosures_NNS of_IN any_DT other_JJ port_NN in_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Presidency_NNP ._.

8_CD ._.

10_CD ._.

IX_NNP ._.
The_DT rules_NNS at_IN present_NN in_IN force_NN at_IN Aden_NNP are_VBP in_IN several_JJ respects_NNS opposed_VBN to_TO the_DT Venice_NNP Convention_NNP and_CC the_DT instructions_NNS contained_VBN in_IN my_PRP$ letter_NN of_IN the_DT 1st_CD June_NNP ._.
Rule_NNP IV_NNP prescribes_VBZ fifteen_JJ days_NNS '_POS quarantine_NN for_IN infected_JJ vessels_NNS ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT provision_NN in_IN the_DT rules_NNS for_IN landing_VBG the_DT sick_JJ and_CC keeping_VBG them_PRP in_IN an_DT isolation_NN hospital_NN ._.
The_DT healthy_JJ are_VBP only_RB landed_JJ and_CC kept_VBD in_IN segregation_NN at_IN the_DT discretion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
The_DT rules_NNS thus_RB permit_VBP the_DT detention_NN of_IN the_DT sick_JJ and_CC healthy_JJ together_RB on_IN board_NN ship_NN ,_, a_DT procedure_NN which_WDT ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, is_VBZ open_JJ to_TO grave_VB objection_NN ._.

With_IN reference_NN to_TO the_DT remark_NN of_IN the_DT Resident_NNP that_IN the_DT Port_NNP Sur-_NNP geon_NN can_MD not_RB proceed_VB on_IN board_NN a_DT vessel_NN in_IN quarantine_NN ``_`` without_IN compromising_VBG himself_PRP ,_, ''_'' I_PRP am_VBP to_TO observe_VB that_DT though_IN this_DT consideration_NN was_VBD of_IN some_DT importance_NN so_RB long_RB as_IN Egypt_NNP or_CC European_JJ nations_NNS were_VBD at_IN liberty_NN to_TO impose_VB quarantine_NN against_IN Aden_NNP without_IN assigning_VBG definite_JJ reasons_NNS for_IN their_PRP$ action_NN ,_, yet_RB now_RB it_PRP ceases_VBZ to_TO have_VB any_DT weight_NN ,_, as_IN ,_, in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT principles_NNS of_IN the_DT Venice_NNP Conven-_NNP tion_NN ,_, Aden_NNP can_MD only_RB be_VB treated_VBN as_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN if_IN plague_JJ actually_RB exists_VBZ there_RB ._.

5380_CD ,_, DATED_NNP 4TH_CD OCTOBER_NNP 1897_CD ._.
Rules_NNS applicable_JJ to_TO vessels_VB arriving_VBG at_IN Aden_NNP from_IN Ports_NNP infected_VBD with_IN Plague_NNP ._.
Rule_NNP I.-The_NNP commander_NN of_IN every_DT vessel_NN ,_, including_VBG buggalows_NNS or_CC other_JJ native_JJ craft_NN ,_, arriving_VBG at_IN Aden_NNP from_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN shall_MD ,_, be-_JJ fore_NN entering_VBG the_DT harbour_NN ,_, hoist_VB a_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN (_( or_CC ,_, if_IN entering_VBG the_DT port_NN at_IN night-time_JJ ,_, exhibit_NN two_CD red_JJ lights_NNS one_CD above_IN the_DT other_JJ at_IN the_DT main_JJ )_) and_CC indicate_JJ by_IN signal_VBG the_DT port_NN from_IN which_WDT such_JJ vessel_NN has_VBZ come_VBN ,_, and_CC shall_MD keep_VB such_JJ flag_NN and_CC signals_NNS flying_VBG until_IN permitted_VBN to_TO take_VB them_PRP down_RP ._.
The_DT pilot_NN on_IN going_VBG alongside_IN a_DT vessel_NN from_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN shall_MD direct_VB the_DT flag_NN prescribed_VBN above_IN to_TO be_VB hoisted_VBN if_IN it_PRP has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN already_RB done_VBN ._.
Rule_NNP II.-Such_JJ commander_NN shall_MD not_RB ,_, except_IN as_IN hereinafter_NN provid-_NN ed_NN ,_, allow_VB any_DT communication_NN ,_, except_IN orally_RB ,_, with_IN the_DT shore_NN or_CC with_IN c_JJ 46_CD ?_. 362_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
any_DT other_JJ vessel_NN or_CC boat_NN ,_, except_IN the_DT pilot_NN boat_NN ,_, with_IN which_WDT communica-_JJ tion_NN shall_MD be_VB limited_VBN to_TO receiving_VBG the_DT pilot_NN who_WP shall_MD proceed_VB straight_RB to_TO the_DT bridge_NN ._.
Rule_JJ III.-No_NNP vessel_NN shall_MD be_VB given_VBN pratique_JJ until_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN its_PRP$ departure_NN from_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ._.
A_DT vessel_NN which_WDT carries_VBZ no_DT qualified_JJ medical_JJ officer_NN shall_MD not_RB be_VB given_VBN pratique_JJ until_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN its_PRP$ arrival_JJ in-_JJ Aden_NNP ._.
Until_IN the_DT ten_JJ days_NNS '_POS period_NN has_VBZ expired_VBN ,_, a_DT vessel_NN shall_MD ,_, during_IN its_PRP$ stay_NN at_IN Aden_NNP ,_, remain_VBP at_IN the_DT quarantine_JJ anchorage_NN appointed_VBN from_IN time_NN to_TO time_NN by_IN the_DT Resident_NNP by_IN general_JJ or_CC special_JJ order_NN in_IN this_DT behalf_NN ._.
Until_IN a_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ been_VBN given_VBN pratique_NN ,_, it_PRP shall_MD have_VB no_DT communication_NN with_IN the_DT shore_NN ._.
Rule_NNP IV.-On_NNP the_DT arrival_NN of_IN a_DT vessel_NN ,_, whose_WP$ destination_NN is_VBZ Aden_NNP ,_, an_DT officer_NN appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN by_IN the_DT Resident_NNP shall_MD go_VB alongside_RB and_CC ascertain_VB whether_IN ten_JJ days_NNS have_VBP or_CC have_VBP not_RB expired_VBN since_IN its_PRP$ departure_NN from_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ._.
(_( a_DT )_) If_IN ten_VBN days_NNS have_VBP expired_VBN since_IN its_PRP$ departure_NN from_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN it_PRP carries_VBZ a_DT qualified_JJ medical_JJ officer_NN ,_, the_DT officer_NN appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN shall_MD board_NN the_DT vessel_NN and_CC make_VB such_JJ inquiries_NNS and_CC inspection_NN as_IN he_PRP thinks_VBZ necessary_JJ ,_, and_CC may_MD require_VB a_DT declaration_NN on_IN oath_NN from_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN or_CC the_DT captain_NN ,_, or_CC both_DT ,_, as_IN to_TO the_DT existence_NN of_IN plague_NN or_CC suspected_VBN plague_NN on_IN board_NN the_DT vessel_NN either_CC during_IN the_DT voyage_NN or_CC before_IN its_PRP$ departure_NN ._.
He_PRP shall_MD then_RB declare_VB whether_IN the_DT vessel_NN is_VBZ ``_`` healthy_JJ ,_, ''_'' ``_`` suspected_VBN ''_'' or_CC ``_`` infected_VBN ,_, ''_'' as_IN defined_VBN in_IN Rule_NNP VII_NNP ._.
If_IN he_PRP is_VBZ satisfied_JJ that_IN the_DT vessel_NN is_VBZ ``_`` healthy_JJ ''_'' it_PRP shall_MD be_VB given_VBN pratique_JJ forthwith_NN ._.
If_IN he_PRP declares_VBZ it_PRP to_TO be_VB ``_`` suspect-_JJ ed_NN ''_'' or_CC ``_`` infected_VBN ,_, ''_'' it_PRP shall_MD be_VB dealt_VBN with_IN in_IN the_DT manner_NN prescribed_VBN in_IN Rule_NNP VII_NNP ._.
(_( b_NN )_) If_IN on_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN a_DT vessel_NN it_PRP is_VBZ ascertained_VBN that_IN ten_JJ days_NNS have_VBP not_RB expired_VBN since_IN its_PRP$ departure_NN from_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ,_, or_CC if_IN it_PRP carries_VBZ no_DT qualified_JJ medical_JJ officer_NN ,_, it_PRP shall_MD be_VB detained_VBN at_IN the_DT quaran-_JJ tine_NN anchorage_NN until_IN ,_, in_IN the_DT former_JJ case_NN ,_, ten_VBP days_NNS have_VBP expired_VBN since_IN its_PRP$ departure_NN from_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ,_, or_CC ,_, in_IN the_DT latter_JJ case_NN ,_, ten_VBP days_NNS have_VBP expired_VBN since_IN its_PRP$ arrival_NN at_IN Aden_NNP ,_, after_IN which_WDT the_DT officer_NN appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_JJ shall_MD take_VB the_DT measures_NNS specified_VBN in_IN clause_NN (_( a_DT )_) of_IN this_DT rule_NN ,_, and_CC classify_VB the_DT vessel_NN :_: Provided_VBN ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT officer_NN appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN may_MD ,_, at_IN any_DT time_NN before_IN the_DT expiration_NN of_IN the_DT aforesaid_JJ period_NN of_IN ten_JJ days_NNS make_VBP such_JJ inquiries_NNS and_CC inspections_NNS as_IN he_PRP thinks_VBZ necessary_JJ ;_: and_CC if_IN ,_, as_IN the_DT result_NN thereof_NN ,_, he_PRP comes_VBZ to_TO the_DT conclusion_NN that_IN the_DT vessel_NN is_VBZ ``_`` infected_JJ ,_, ''_'' he_PRP shall_MD forthwith_VB ,_, and_CC without_IN waiting_VBG for_IN the_DT expiration_NN of_IN the_DT ten_JJ days_NNS '_POS period_NN ,_, order_NN it_PRP to_TO be_VB treated_VBN as_IN infected_JJ ._.

IX_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
363_CD Rule_NNP V.-On_NNP the_DT arrival_NN of_IN a_DT vessel_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ onward_RB bound_NN ,_, and_CC which_WDT uses_VBZ Aden_NNP as_RB merely_RB a_DT port_NN of_IN call_NN ,_, the_DT officer_NN appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN by_IN the_DT Resident_NNP shall_MD go_VB alongside_RB and_CC ascertain_VB whether_IN ten_JJ days_NNS have_VBP or_CC have_VBP not_RB expired_VBN since_IN its_PRP$ departure_NN from_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ._.
(_( a_DT )_) If_IN ten_VBN days_NNS have_VBP expired_VBN since_IN its_PRP$ departure_NN from_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN it_PRP carries_VBZ a_DT qualified_JJ medical_JJ officer_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN the_DT officer_NN appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN is_VBZ permitted_VBN to_TO make_VB such_JJ inspection_NN as_IN he_PRP thinks_VBZ necessary_JJ ,_, and_CC ,_, as_IN the_DT result_NN thereof_NN and_CC as_IN the_DT result_NN of_IN any_DT inquiries_NNS he_PRP may_MD make_VB ,_, is_VBZ satisfied_JJ that_IN the_DT vessel_NN is_VBZ ``_`` healthy_JJ ,_, ``_`` the_DT vessel_NN shall_MD be_VB given_VBN pratique_NN ._.
Otherwise_VB it_PRP shall_MD remain_VB in_IN quarantine_NN at_IN the_DT anchorage_NN appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN by_IN the_DT Resident_NNP during_IN its_PRP$ stay_NN in_IN port_NN :_: no_DT persons_NNS shall_MD be_VB landed_VBN therefrom_NN ,_, except_IN at_IN the_DT quarantine_NN camps_NNS appointed_VBN by_IN the_DT Resident_NNP ,_, and_CC no_DT communication_NN with_IN the_DT shore_NN or_CC with_IN other_JJ vessels_NNS shall_MD be_VB allowed_VBN ,_, except_IN the_DT landing_NN of_IN mails_NNS in_IN quarantine_NN and_CC the_DT embarkation_NN and_CC disembarkation_NN of_IN passengers_NNS in_IN quarantine_NN ._.
(_( b_NN )_) If_IN ten_VBN days_NNS have_VBP not_RB expired_VBN since_IN its_PRP$ departure_NN from_IN an_DT in-_JJ fected_JJ port_NN ,_, or_CC if_IN it_PRP carries_VBZ no_DT qualified_JJ medical_JJ officer_NN ,_, it_PRP shall_MD remain_VB in_IN quarantine_NN at_IN the_DT quarantine_JJ anchorage_NN appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN during_IN its_PRP$ stay_NN in_IN port_NN ,_, N.B.-No_NNP inspection_NN of_IN a_DT vessel_NN under_IN Rules_NNP IV_NNP and_CC V_NNP shall_MD ordinarily_RB be_VB made_VBN ,_, except_IN by_IN day-light_NN ._.
Rule_JJ VI.-These_JJ rules_NNS shall_MD not_RB prevent_VB the_DT transhipment_NN ,_, in_IN quarantine_NN ,_, of_IN passengers_NNS or_CC other_JJ persons_NNS or_CC mails_NNS or_CC cargo_NN from_IN a_DT vessel_NN in_IN quarantine_NN to_TO another_DT ;_: provided_VBN that_IN thereafter_RB the_DT latter_JJ vessel_NN shall_MD be_VB in_IN quarantine_NN ._.
Rule_NNP VII.-For_NNP the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN these_DT rules_NNS a_DT ``_`` healthy_JJ ''_'' vessel_JJ means-_JJ ``_`` A_NNP vessel_NN which_WDT has_VBZ had_VBN no_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN and_CC which_WDT has_VBZ left_VBN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ten_NN days_NNS or_CC more_JJR previously_RB ._. ''_''
A_DT ``_`` suspected_JJ ``_`` vessel_JJ means-_JJ ``_`` Any_NNP vessel_NN ,_, on_IN board_NN which_WDT there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN departure_NN or_CC during_IN the_DT voyage_NN ,_, but_CC on_IN which_WDT no_DT fresh_JJ case_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN for_IN twelve_NN days_NNS ._. ''_''
An_DT ``_`` infected_JJ ``_`` vessel_JJ means-_JJ ``_`` Any_NNP vessel_NN with_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, or_CC on_IN board_NN which_WDT one_CD or_CC more_JJR cases_NNS have_VBP taken_VBN place_NN within_IN twelve_JJ days_NNS ._. ''_''
The_DT only_JJ measures_NNS which_WDT the_DT authorities_NNS of_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN arrival_NN may_MD enforce_VB with_IN regard_NN to_TO ``_`` healthy_JJ ``_`` vessels_NNS are_VBP those_DT which_WDT are_VBP pre-_JJ scribed_NN for_IN ``_`` suspected_JJ ``_`` vessels_NNS (_( medical_JJ inspection_NN ,_, disinfection_NN ,_, pumping_VBG out_RP the_DT bilge-water_NN and_CC the_DT substitution_NN of_IN good_JJ drinking_NN water_NN for_IN the_DT water_NN on_IN board_NN )_) ,_, except_IN that_IN the_DT measures_NNS prescribed_VBN ?_. 364_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
for_IN the_DT disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN itself_PRP may_MD not_RB be_VB enforced_VBN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN healthy_JJ vessels_NNS ._.
The_DT following_JJ treatment_NN is_VBZ prescribed_VBN for_IN ``_`` suspected_VBN ``_`` and_CC ``_`` infected_VBN ''_'' vessels_NNS ,_, respectively_RB :_: -_: Suspected_VBN vessels_NNS are_VBP subject_JJ to_TO the_DT following_JJ measures_NNS which_WDT will_MD be_VB carried_VBN out_RP under_IN the_DT orders_NNS and_CC supervision_NN of_IN the_DT officer_NN appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN :_: -_: 1_CD ._.
Medical_JJ inspection_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
Disinfection_NN ;_: the_DT soiled_JJ linen_NN and_CC personal_JJ effects_NNS of_IN the_DT crew_NN and_CC pas-_JJ sengers_NNS ,_, which_WDT in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT officer_NN appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN may_MD be_VB regarded_VBN as_IN contaminated_VBN ,_, should_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN ._.
3_CD ._.
Pumping_VBG cut_VBD the_DT bilge-water_NN after_IN disinfection_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT substitution_NN of_IN good_JJ drinking_NN water_NN for_IN the_DT water_NN stored_VBD on_IN board_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
Disinfection_NN of_IN all_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT vessel_NN which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN inhabited_VBN by_IN plague_NN patients_NNS ,_, and_CC any_DT other_JJ measures_NNS of_IN disinfection_NN that_WDT may_MD be_VB ordered_VBN by_IN the_DT officer_NN appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._.
A_DT watch_NN should_MD be_VB kept_VBN over_IN the_DT health_NN of_IN the_DT crew_NN and_CC passengers_NNS for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN arrival_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN ;_: and_CC the_DT crew_NN should_MD not_RB without_IN the_DT special_JJ permission_NN of_IN the_DT officer_NN appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO land_VB ,_, except_IN on_IN duty_NN ._.
Infected_VBN vessels_NNS are_VBP subject_JJ to_TO the_DT following_JJ rules_NNS :_: -_: 1_CD ._.
The_DT sick_NN will_MD be_VB immediately_RB disembarked_VBN and_CC isolated_VBN ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT other_JJ persons_NNS on_IN board_NN should_MD also_RB ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, be_VB disembarked_VBN and_CC kept_VBN under_IN observation_NN or_CC surveillance*_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN varying_VBG according_VBG to_TO the_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN and_CC the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN ,_, but_CC which_WDT must_MD not_RB exceed_VB ten_JJ days_NNS ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT soiled_JJ linen_NN and_CC personal_JJ effects_NNS of_IN the_DT crew_NN and_CC passengers_NNS ,_, which_WDT in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ authority_NN of_IN the_DT port_NN may_MD be_VB considered_VBN as_IN infected_VBN will_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT bilge-water_NN will_MD be_VB pumped_VBN out_RP after_IN disinfection_NN ,_, and_CC good_JJ drinking_NN water_NN will_MD be_VB substituted_VBN for_IN the_DT water_NN stored_VBD on_IN board_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
All_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT vessel_NN which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN inhabited_VBN by_IN plague_NN patients_NNS should_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN ,_, and_CC such_JJ other_JJ measures_NNS of_IN disinfection_NN shall_MD be_VB taken_VBN as_IN may_MD be_VB ordered_VBN by_IN the_DT officer_NN appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._.
Rule_NNP VIII.-The_NNP Resident_NNP shall_MD have_VB full_JJ power_NN ,_, subject_JJ to_TO any_DT orders_NNS that_WDT may_MD be_VB issued_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, to_TO make_VB re-_JJ gulations_NNS or_CC pass_NN orders_NNS regarding_VBG the_DT administration_NN of_IN quarantine_JJ camps_NNS and_CC hospitals_NNS ,_, whether_IN ashore_NN or_CC afloat_NN ,_, and_CC regarding_VBG quarantine_NN anchorages_NNS ,_, and_CC all_DT persons_NNS concerned_VBN shall_MD be_VB bound_VBN to_TO obey_VB such_JJ regulations_NNS and_CC orders_NNS ._.
Any_DT vessel_NN objecting_VBG to_TO submit_VB thereto_NN ,_, or_CC to_TO any_DT of_IN the_DT measures_NNS indicated_VBN in_IN these_DT rules_NNS ,_, shall_MD ,_, how-_JJ ever_RB ,_, be_VB free_JJ to_TO put_VB back_RB to_TO sea_NN ._.
Rule_NNP IX.-Any_NNP mails_NNS or_CC cargo_NN which_WDT may_MD be_VB brought_VBN by_IN any_DT vessel_JJ arriving_NN from_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN shall_MD be_VB landed_VBN under_IN such_JJ *_IN The_DT expression_NN 'observation_NN '_POS means_NNS segregation_NN of_IN the_DT passengers_NNS ,_, either_DT on_IN board_NN a_DT vessel_NN or_CC in_IN a_DT lazaretto_NN ,_, till_NN they_PRP have_VBP obtained_VBN free_JJ pratique_NN ._.
The_DT expression_NN 'sur-_JJ veillance_NN '_POS means_NNS that_IN the_DT passengers_NNS will_MD not_RB be_VB isolated_VBN ;_: they_PRP will_MD at_IN once_RB obtain_VB free_JJ pratique_NN ,_, but_CC on_IN arriving_VBG at_IN their_PRP$ destination_NN they_PRP will_MD be_VB kept_VBN under_IN medical_JJ surveillance_NN ._.

spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.

Rule_NNP X.-It_NNP will_MD be_VB the_DT duty_NN of_IN the_DT port_JJ officer_NN to_TO facilitate_VB the_DT conveyance_NN to_TO all_DT vessels_NNS in_IN quarantine_NN of_IN such_JJ supplies_NNS of_IN provisions_NNS ,_, stores_NNS and_CC other_JJ articles_NNS as_IN may_MD be_VB required_VBN by_IN those_DT on_IN board_NN ._.
Such_JJ supplies_NNS will_MD be_VB placed_VBN on_IN the_DT boats_NNS of_IN the_DT vessels_NNS in_IN quarantine_NN to_TO be_VB subsequently_RB removed_VBN by_IN members_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ crews_NNS ._.
Rule_NNP XI.-All_JJ vessels_NNS arriving_VBG at_IN Aden_NNP ,_, which_WDT may_MD have_VB commu-_NNS nicated_VBN with_IN vessels_NNS coming_VBG from_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ,_, shall_MD be_VB subjected_VBN to_TO the_DT same_JJ rules_NNS as_IN vessels_NNS arriving_VBG at_IN Aden_NNP from_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ._.
Rule_NNP XII.-All_NNP vessels_NNS which_WDT have_VBP undergone_JJ medical_JJ inspection_NN and_CC quarantine_NN in_IN the_DT manner_NN above_IN prescribed_NN should_MD have_VB the_DT fact_NN clearly_RB stated_VBN on_IN their_PRP$ bills_NNS of_IN health_NN ._.
Extracts_NNS from_IN the_DT letter_NN from_IN the_DT Political_NNP Resident_NNP ,_, Aden_NNP ,_, referred_VBD to_TO in_IN paragraph_JJ 1_CD of_IN the_DT letter_NN to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ._.
Rule_NNP IV_NNP ,_, paragraph_NN 2_CD ._.
The_DT view_NN hitherto_VBD held_VBN at_IN Aden_NNP is_VBZ that_IN the_DT Port_NNP Surgeon_NNP can_MD not_RB proceed_VB on_IN board_NN a_DT ship_NN in_IN quarantine_NN without_IN compromising_VBG himself_PRP ._.
If_IN this_DT view_NN is_VBZ correct-and_NN by_IN ``_`` inspection_NN ``_`` in_IN this_DT paragraph_NN personal_JJ inspection_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ meant-it_JJ would_MD follow_VB that_IN the_DT Port_NNP Surgeon_NNP would_MD himself_PRP be_VB in_IN quarantine_NN if_IN he_PRP inspected_VBD a_DT vessel_NN before_IN the_DT completion_NN of_IN the_DT ten_JJ days_NNS therein_RB referred_VBD to_TO ._.
Were_RB there_EX to_TO be_VB in_IN Aden_NNP a_DT floating_JJ hospital_NN ,_, with_IN a_DT medical_JJ officer_NN or_CC officers_NNS practically_RB in_IN perpetual_JJ quarantine_NN ,_, this_DT would_MD not_RB matter_VB ;_: but_CC so_RB long_RB as_IN the_DT Port_NNP Surgeon_NNP is_VBZ the_DT ``_`` officer_NN appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, ''_'' and_CC assuming_VBG that_IN the_DT fact_NN of_IN his_PRP$ boarding_VBG a_DT vessel_NN in_IN quarantine_NN would_MD compromise_VB him_PRP ,_, I_PRP would_MD suggest_VB the_DT omission_NN of_IN the_DT words_NNS ``_`` and_CC inspection_NN ``_`` in_IN the_DT second_JJ line_NN of_IN this_DT paragraph_NN ._.
If_IN it_PRP is_VBZ held_VBN that_IN a_DT medical_JJ officer_NN can_MD proceed_VB on_IN board_NN a_DT vessel_NN in_IN quarantine_NN without_IN compromising_VBG himself_PRP ,_, then_RB the_DT words_NNS above_IN noted_VBD may_MD stand_VB ._.
Rules_NNS IV_NNP and_CC V._NNP In_IN both_CC these_DT rules_NNS it_PRP should_MD be_VB made_VBN clear_JJ that_IN the_DT ``_`` inspection_NN ``_`` therein_RB referred_VBN to_TO can_MD only_RB be_VB made_VBN by_IN day-light_JJ ._.
Any_DT inspection_NN by_IN night_NN must_MD necessarily_RB be_VB incomplete_JJ and_CC un-_JJ satisfactory_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN no_DT one_NN to_TO assist_VB him_PRP ,_, the_DT Port_NNP Surgeon_NNP could_MD not_RB be_VB expected_VBN to_TO do_VB this_DT duty_NN by_IN night_NN ._.
I_PRP would_MD suggest_VB the_DT addition_NN of_IN the_DT words_NNS ``_`` by_IN day-light_JJ ``_`` after_IN the_DT word_NN ``_`` inspection_NN ``_`` wherever_IN it_PRP occurs_VBZ in_IN these_DT two_CD rules_NNS ._.
In_IN regard_NN to_TO giving_VBG effect_NN to_TO the_DT rules_NNS the_DT Port_NNP Surgeon_NNP has_VBZ drawn_VBN attention_NN to_TO the_DT following_JJ facts_NNS :_: -_: (_( a_DT )_) That_WDT while_IN disinfection_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB mainly_RB relied_VBN on_IN in_IN future_NN for_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN infected_JJ ships_NNS ,_, there_EX is_VBZ no_DT disinfecting_VBG stove_VB ?_. 366_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
or_CC other_JJ appliance_NN in_IN Aden_NNP ,_, nor_CC has_VBZ the_DT Port_NNP Surgeon_NNP any_DT staff_NN or_CC means_VBZ at_IN his_PRP$ disposal_NN for_IN carrying_VBG out_RP the_DT disinfection_NN provided_VBD in_IN Rule_NNP VII_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN this_DT work_NN if_IN left_VBN to_TO the_DT vessels_NNS themselves_PRP ,_, especially_RB when_WRB there_EX is_VBZ no_DT medical_JJ officer_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, will_MD be_VB certain_JJ to_TO be_VB imperfectly_RB done_VBN ._.
(_( b_NN )_) That_IN as_RB medical_JJ inspection_NN can_MD not_RB ,_, under_IN present_JJ condi-_JJ tions_NNS ,_, be_VB held_VBN at_IN night_NN ,_, vessels_NNS arriving_VBG from_IN infected_JJ ports_NNS during_IN the_DT night-time_JJ and_CC departing_VBG before_IN day-break_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB ad-_JJ mitted_VBN to_TO free_JJ pratique_NN ._.
(_( c_NN )_) That_IN if_IN all_DT onward_VBP bound_NN vessels_NNS (_( such_JJ as_IN are_VBP referred_VBN to_TO in_IN Rule_NNP V_NNP )_) arriving_VBG at_IN night-time_JJ are_VBP to_TO be_VB visited_VBN on_IN arrival_NN ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB necessary_JJ to_TO appoint_VB a_DT special_JJ officer_NN for_IN that_DT purpose_NN ,_, as_IN one_CD officer_NN can_MD not_RB carry_VB on_IN such_JJ duties_NNS by_IN night_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN by_IN day_NN ._.
The_DT Port_NNP Surgeon_NNP suggests_VBZ that_IN in_IN such_JJ cases_NNS ,_, as_IN the_DT vessel_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB admitted_VBN to_TO pratique_VB during_IN the_DT night-time_JJ ,_, it_PRP would_MD be_VB sufficient_JJ to_TO send_VB the_DT usual_JJ form_NN of_IN report_NN on_IN board_NN to_TO be_VB filled_VBN in_IN by_IN the_DT com-_JJ mander_NN or_CC medical_JJ officer_NN ,_, instead_RB of_IN taking_VBG the_DT report_NN orally_RB from_IN him_PRP alongside_RB ._.
In_IN this_DT case_NN the_DT appointment_NN of_IN a_DT special_JJ officer_NN would_MD not_RB be_VB neces-_JJ sary_JJ ._.
In_IN this_DT proposal_NN I_PRP am_VBP prepared_JJ to_TO concur_VB so_RB long_RB as_IN the_DT work_NN is_VBZ carried_VBN on_IN unaided_VBN by_IN the_DT Port_NNP Surgeon_NNP ._.

367_CD If_IN plague_NN broke_VBD out_RP anywhere_RB ,_, information_NN of_IN the_DT occurrence_NN would_MD be_VB communicated_VBN to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, by_IN whom_WP the_DT necessary_JJ notification_NN would_MD be_VB issued_VBN ._.

7_CD of_IN this_DT Government_NNP ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 12th_CD March_NNP 1897_CD ,_, under_IN which_WDT every_DT medical_JJ practitioner_NN ,_, police_JJ officer_NN or_CC municipal_JJ servant_NN is_VBZ bound_VBN to_TO report_VB cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN to_TO the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, who_WP in_IN his_PRP$ turn_NN would_MD report_VB the_DT same_JJ to_TO Government_NNP through_IN the_DT Chairman_NNP of_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP ._.

4_CD ._.
As_IN regards_NNS the_DT measures_NNS to_TO be_VB taken_VBN on_IN the_DT departure_NN of_IN vessels_NNS from_IN infected_JJ ports_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ laid_VBN down_RB in_IN the_DT Convention_NN that_WDT every_DT person_NN sailing_VBG on_IN the_DT vessel_NN must_MD be_VB examined_VBN on_IN shore_NN and_CC by_IN day_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN embarkation_NN by_IN a_DT medical_JJ officer_NN appointed_VBN by_IN Govern-_NNP ment_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT Consular_NNP Authority_NNP interested_JJ in_IN the_DT ship_NN may_MD be_VB present_JJ at_IN the_DT inspection_NN ._.

3_CD of_IN the_DT 25th_CD May_NNP ._.

In_IN this_DT connection_NN ,_, I_PRP am_VBP to_TO observe_VB that_DT strong_JJ feeling_NN was_VBD evoked_VBN in_IN Calcutta_NNP some_DT months_NNS ago_IN by_IN the_DT proposal_NN to_TO embark_VB at_IN Diamond_NNP Harbour_NNP pilgrims_VBZ proceeding_VBG to_TO the_DT Hedjaz_NNP ._.

It_PRP was_VBD argued_VBN ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN in_IN the_DT view_NN of_IN foreign_JJ nations_NNS Diamond_NNP Harbour_NNP was_VBD the_DT same_JJ as_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT formation_NN of_IN a_DT plague_NN camp_NN there_RB would_MD lead_VB to_TO Calcutta_NNP being_VBG quarantined_VBN ._.

1625_CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT ist_NN June_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN paragraph_NN 3_CD (_( ii_NN )_) of_IN my_PRP$ letter_NN No_NNP ._.
1674_CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 9th_CD June_NNP ,_, it_PRP was_VBD desired_VBN that_IN in_IN conformity_NN with_IN the_DT Convention_NNP all_DT persons_NNS sailing_VBG on_IN the_DT vessel_NN should_MD be_VB examined_VBN on_IN shore_NN prior_RB to_TO the_DT departure_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN ._.
In_IN paragraph_JJ 4_CD of_IN your_PRP$ letter_NN under_IN reply_NN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bengal_NNP represents_VBZ that_IN ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT peculiar_JJ conditions_NNS of_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO comply_VB with_IN this_DT requirement_NN of_IN the_DT Convention_NNP without_IN interfering_VBG with_IN the_DT convenience_NN of_IN passengers_NNS ,_, and_CC possibly_RB causing_VBG steamers_NNS to_TO miss_VB a_DT tide_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT succeeding_VBG four_CD paragraphs_NN an_DT account_NN is_VBZ given_VBN of_IN the_DT measures_NNS proposed_VBN with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO minimize_VB this_DT inconvenience_NN and_CC the_DT possibility_NN of_IN delay_NN ._.
It_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN from_IN the_DT correspon-_JJ dence_NN with_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP forwarded_VBD with_IN this_DT letter_NN that_IN it_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN found_VBN impossible_JJ to_TO insist_VB on_IN the_DT examination_NN of_IN all_DT persons_NNS on_IN shore_NN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN vessels_NNS sailing_VBG from_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP have_VBP been_VBN authorized_VBN to_TO retain_VB the_DT existing_VBG procedure_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN worked_VBN with_IN marked_JJ success_NN ,_, and_CC under_IN which_WDT the_DT examination_NN is_VBZ made_VBN on_IN board_NN or_CC on_IN shore_NN as_IN may_MD be_VB the_DT more_RBR convenient_NN ._.

3_CD ._.

RULES_NNP ._.
1_CD ._.
Medical_JJ inspection_NN and_CC bill_NN of_IN health.-No_JJ vessel_NN shall_MD leave_VB any_DT such_JJ port_NN for_IN any_DT port_NN out_IN of_IN India_NNP until_IN she_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Port_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT master_NN or_CC person_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN such_JJ vessel_NN has_VBZ obtained_VBN from_IN such_JJ officer_NN a_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN in_IN the_DT form_NN given_VBN below_IN ,_, stating_VBG that_IN the_DT master_NN or_CC person_NN in_IN charge_NN ,_, officers_NNS ,_, crew_NN and_CC passengers_NNS (_( if_IN any_DT )_) of_IN such_JJ vessel_NNS have_VBP been_VBN inspected_VBN by_IN him_PRP by_IN day_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN embarkation_NN ,_, and_CC are_VBP free_JJ from_IN infectious_JJ disease_NN dangerous_JJ to_TO life_NN and_CC from_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN :_: Provided_VBD that_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN passengers_NNS a_DT certificate_NN in_IN the_DT form_NN annexed_VBD as_IN Appendix_NNP I_PRP ,_, by_IN a_DT commissioned_JJ medical_JJ officer_NN appointed_VBN for_IN this_DT purpose_NN ,_, and_CC dated_VBD not_RB more_RBR than_IN twelve_CD hours_NNS before_IN the_DT departure_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN ,_, shall_MD be_VB accepted_VBN in_IN lieu_NN of_IN examination_NN by_IN the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
Such_JJ certificates_NNS shall_MD be_VB annexed_VBN to_TO ,_, and_CC form_VB part_NN of_IN ,_, the_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
Removal_NN of_IN infected_JJ persons.-Should_JJ the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Port_NNP be_VB of_IN opinion_NN that_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN of_IN any_DT vessel_NN so_RB inspected_JJ is_VBZ suffering_VBG from_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN or_CC is_VBZ not_RB free_JJ from_IN the_DT infection_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, such_JJ person_NN and_CC all_PDT his_PRP$ relations_NNS and_CC non-medical_JJ attendants_NNS shall_MD be_VB removed_VBN from_IN the_DT vessel_NN to_TO a_DT plague_JJ hospital_NN or_CC place_NN of_IN obser-_JJ vation_NN appointed_VBN by_IN Government_NNP ,_, and_CC such_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT vessel_NN as_IN have_VBP been_VBN frequented_VBN by_IN such_JJ person_NN or_CC his_PRP$ relations_NNS and_CC attendants_NNS shall_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN to_TO the_DT satisfaction_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.

3_CD ._.

4_CD ._.
Fresh_JJ bill_NN of_IN health_NN when_WRB necessary.-After_NN the_DT master_NN or_CC person_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ obtained_VBN a_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN under_IN the_DT provisions_NNS of_IN these_DT rules_NNS ,_, no_DT person_NN shall_MD be_VB admitted_VBN on_IN board_NN such_JJ vessel_NN before_IN she_PRP leaves_VBZ the_DT port_NN ,_, unless_IN such_JJ vessel_NN is_VBZ again_RB inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Port_NNP ,_, and_CC another_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN obtained_VBN from_IN such_JJ officer_NN by_IN the_DT master_NN or_CC person_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN such_JJ vessel_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
Port_NNP clearance.-_NN (_( a_DT )_) Except_IN as_RB provided_VBN for_IN in_IN clause_NN (_( b_NN )_) of_IN this_DT rule_NN ,_, no_DT port_NN clearance_NN shall_MD be_VB delivered_VBN to_TO any_DT vessel_NN bound_NN from_IN any_DT such_JJ port_NN to_TO any_DT port_NN out_IN of_IN India_NNP ,_, unless_IN and_CC until_IN the_DT master_NN or_CC person_NN in_IN charge_NN thereof_VBP shall_MD produce_VB the_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN so_IN to_TO be_VB obtained_VBN as_IN aforesaid_NN ;_: and_CC it_PRP shall_MD be_VB the_DT duty_NN of_IN Customs_NNP Officers_NNP to_TO refuse_VB delivery_NN of_IN the_DT port_NN clearance_NN ,_, without_IN the_DT production_NN of_IN such_JJ bill_NN of_IN health_NN :_: (_( b_NN )_) Provided_VBD that_IN the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN Customs_NNP may_MD grant_VB port_VB clear-_JJ ance_NN under_IN section_NN 66_CD of_IN the_DT Sea_NNP Customs_NNP Act_NNP on_IN a_DT guarantee_NN being_VBG given_VBN by_IN the_DT agents_NNS of_IN a_DT vessel_NN ,_, that_IN within_IN 48_CD hours_NNS of_IN departure_NN they_PRP will_MD produce_VB a_DT duplicate_JJ copy_NN of_IN the_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN as_IN finally_RB granted_VBN ,_, signed_VBN by_IN the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP or_CC an_DT additional_JJ Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, and_CC that_IN if_IN for_IN any_DT reason_NN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP should_MD refuse_VB to_TO grant_VB the_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN ,_, they_PRP will_MD bring_VB the_DT vessel_NN back_RB to_TO her_PRP$ moorings_NNS ._.

This_DT is_VBZ to_TO certify_VB that_IN the_DT ship_NN (_( or_CC steamer_NN )_) sailing_VBG under_IN the_DT flag_NN and_CC under_IN the_DT command_NN of_IN as_IN master_NN ,_, of_IN tons_NNS ,_, bound_NN for_IN with_IN a_DT crew_NN of_IN persons*_NN and_CC passengers_NNS ,_, is_VBZ at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN leaving_VBG this_DT port_NN in_IN a_DT satis-_JJ factory_NN sanitary_JJ condition_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN no_DT case_NN of_IN infectious_JJ disease_NN ?_. 376_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
dangerous_JJ to_TO life_NN ,_, or_CC of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ,_, exists_VBZ among_IN her_PRP$ officers_NNS ,_, passengers_NNS or_CC crew_NN ,_, all_DT of_IN whom_WP have_VBP been_VBN inspected_VBN by_IN me_PRP ,_, with_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN the_DT persons_NNS named_VBN below_IN ,_, by_IN day_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN embar-_JJ kation_NN ._.
*_NN Or_CC as_IN the_DT case_NN may_MD be_VB ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ further_JJ certified_VBD that_IN the_DT town_NN and_CC port_NN of_IN are_VBP at_IN present*_JJ free_JJ from_IN plague_NN ,_, epidemic_JJ cholera_NN ,_, yellow_JJ fever_NN and_CC all_DT other_JJ dangerous_JJ epidemic_JJ diseases_NNS ._.
The_DT persons_NNS named_VBN below_IN ,_, who_WP are_VBP personally_RB known_VBN to_TO me_PRP ,_, or_CC whose_WP$ identity_NN has_VBZ been_VBN proved_VBN to_TO my_PRP$ satisfaction_NN ,_, have_VBP produced_VBN the_DT annexed_JJ certificates_NNS from_IN medical_JJ officers_NNS duly_RB appointed_VBN in_IN this_DT behalf_NN ._.
APPENDIX_NNP I_PRP ._.
CERTIFICATE_NN ._.
I_PRP do_VBP hereby_RB certify_VB that_IN I_PRP have_VBP examined_VBN a_DT passenger_NN on_IN the_DT ship_NN ,_, not_RB more_RBR than_IN twelve_CD hours_NNS before_IN the_DT departure_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN from_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN ,_, and_CC find_VB him_PRP in_IN good_JJ health_NN ,_, except_IN as_RB noted_VBN in_IN the_DT margin_NN ,_, and_CC free_JJ from_IN any_DT symptoms_NNS of_IN bubonic_JJ plague_NN ._.

APPENDIX_NNP II_NNP ._.
Under-clothing_NN ,_, bedding_NN ,_, wearing_VBG apparel_NN ,_, mattresses_NNS ,_, carpets_NNS ,_, etc._NN ,_, which_WDT are_VBP contaminated_VBN or_CC suspected_VBN ,_, should_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN in_IN stoves_NNS at_IN normal_JJ presssure_NN ,_, or_CC at_IN a_DT pressure_NN of_IN from_IN one-and-a-half_JJ to_TO two_CD degrees_NNS ,_, with_IN or_CC without_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN steam_NN ._.
Before_IN a_DT stove_NN is_VBZ passed_VBN as_IN efficient_NN for_IN the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN disinfec-_JJ tion_NN ,_, it_PRP should_MD be_VB subjected_VBN to_TO a_DT test_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT aid_NN of_IN a_DT signal_JJ thermo-_JJ meter_NN ,_, showing_VBG the_DT moment_NN when_WRB the_DT temperature_NN in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN a_DT mattress_NN rises_VBZ to_TO at_IN least_JJS 100_CD (_( centigrade_NN )_) ._.
To_TO ensure_VB that_IN the_DT disinfection_NN is_VBZ effective_JJ ,_, this_DT temperature_NN must_MD be_VB maintained_VBN for_IN from_IN 10_CD to_TO 15_CD minutes_NNS ._.
Disinfecting_VBG solutions-_NN (_( a_DT )_) Solution_NN of_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN ,_, of_IN 1_CD part_NN in_IN 1,000_CD ,_, with_IN the_DT addition_NN of_IN 10_CD parts_NNS of_IN chloride_NN of_IN soda_NN ._.
The_DT solution_NN should_MD be_VB coloured_VBN with_IN aniline_JJ dye_NN or_CC indigo_NN ._.
It_PRP should_MD not_RB be_VB placed_VBN in_IN metal_NN vessels_NNS ._.

of_IN crude_JJ commercial_JJ carbolic_NN acid_NN ,_, in_IN a_DT warm_JJ solution_NN of_IN soft_JJ soap_NN ._.
The_DT carbolic_JJ solutions_NNS will_MD be_VB useful_JJ ,_, more_RBR particularly_RB for_IN disinfect-_JJ ing_NN articles_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN metals_NNS ,_, instruments_NNS ,_, etc._NN ,_, which_WDT can_MD neither_RB be_VB subjected_VBN to_TO a_DT temperature_NN of_IN 100_CD centigrade_NN ,_, nor_CC placed_VBD in_IN contact_NN with_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN ._.

Notification_NN No_DT ._.
160-Marine_JJ ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 24th_CD August_NNP 1897_CD ._.
In_IN exercise_NN of_IN the_DT power_NN conferred_VBN by_IN section_NN 2_CD of_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ,_, III_NNP of_IN 1897_CD ,_, and_CC by_IN the_DT Notification_NNP of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP in_IN the_DT Home_NNP Department_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
302_CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 4th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ,_, the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP of_IN Bengal_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN pleased_VBN to_TO prescribe_VB ,_, as_IN a_DT temporary_JJ measure_NN ,_, the_DT following_JJ rules_NNS for_IN quarantine_NN against_IN plague_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN the_DT medical_JJ inspection_NN ,_, isolation_NN ,_, observation_NN and_CC surveillance_NN of_IN persons_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN ,_, or_CC suspected_VBN of_IN being_VBG infected_VBN with_IN ,_, plague_NN ._.
These_DT rules_NNS shall_MD take_VB effect_NN from_IN the_DT 26th_CD August_NNP 1897_CD in_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, and_CC shall_MD supersede_VB all_DT previous_JJ rules_NNS ._.
I._JJ Definitions-_NNP (_( 1_CD )_) Health_NNP Officer.-In_NNP these_DT rules_NNS ``_`` Health_NNP Officer_NNP ''_'' means_VBZ the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Port_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, and_CC includes_VBZ an_DT Assistant_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP and_CC any_DT person_NN appointed_VBN by_IN name_NN ,_, in_IN virtue_NN of_IN his_PRP$ office_NN ,_, to_TO perform_VB the_DT duties_NNS of_IN an_DT Assistant_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
c_VB 48_CD ?_. 378_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) Infected_VBD ship.-Any_JJ ship_NN with_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, or_CC on_IN board_NN which_WDT one_CD or_CC more_JJR cases_NNS have_VBP taken_VBN place_NN within_IN twelve_JJ days_NNS before_IN her_PRP$ arrrival_NN ,_, will_MD be_VB considered_VBN infected_JJ ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) Suspected_VBD ship.-Any_JJ ship_NN ,_, on_IN board_NN which_WDT there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN departure_NN ,_, or_CC during_IN the_DT voyage_NN ,_, but_CC on_IN which_WDT no_DT fresh_JJ case_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN for_IN twelve_NN days_NNS before_IN her_PRP$ arrival_NN ,_, will_MD be_VB considered_VBN suspected_JJ ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) Healthy_NNP ship.-Any_JJ ship_NN ,_, even_RB though_IN coming_VBG from_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ had_VBN no_DT death_NN or_CC case_NN of_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, either_CC before_IN departure_NN ,_, during_IN the_DT voyage_NN or_CC on_IN arrival_NN ,_, will_MD be_VB considered_VBN healthy_JJ ._.
(_( 5_CD )_) Observation.-The_JJ term_NN ``_`` observation_NN ''_'' means_VBZ that_IN the_DT persons_NNS subjected_VBN to_TO it_PRP will_MD be_VB segregated_VBN in_IN a_DT lazaretto_NN or_CC isolation_NN camp_NN ,_, till_NN they_PRP have_VBP obtained_VBN free_JJ pratique_NN ._.
(_( 6_CD )_) Surveillance.-The_JJ term_NN ``_`` surveillance_NN ''_'' means_VBZ that_IN the_DT persons_NNS subjected_VBN to_TO it_PRP will_MD not_RB be_VB isolated_VBN ;_: they_PRP will_MD at_IN once_RB obtain_VB free_JJ pratique_NN ,_, but_CC ,_, on_IN arriving_VBG at_IN their_PRP$ des-_JJ tination_NN ,_, they_PRP will_MD be_VB kept_VBN under_IN medical_JJ supervision_NN ._.
II_NNP ._.
Hoisting_VBG of_IN yellow_JJ flag.-The_JJ commander_NN of_IN every_DT vessel_NN ,_, including_VBG buggalows_NNS or_CC other_JJ native_JJ craft_NN ,_, (_( a_DT )_) arriving_VBG from_IN an_DT infect-_JJ ed_NN port_NN ,_, or_CC (_( b_NN )_) having_VBG plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, or_CC (_( c_NNS )_) on_IN board_NN of_IN which_WDT one_CD or_CC more_JJR cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN have_VBP taken_VBN place_NN within_IN twelve_JJ days_NNS of_IN her_PRP$ arrival_NN ,_, shall_MD ,_, on_IN arrival_NN at_IN the_DT Sandheads_NNP ,_, hoist_VBP a_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN ,_, and_CC indicate_NN by_IN signal_JJ the_DT port_NN from_IN which_WDT she_PRP has_VBZ come_VBN ,_, and_CC shall_MD keep_VB such_JJ flag_NN and_CC signal_JJ flying_VBG until_IN permitted_VBN in_IN writing_NN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO haul_VB it_PRP down_RP ._.
The_DT pilot_NN ,_, on_IN going_VBG alongside_IN such_JJ vessel_NN ,_, shall_MD direct_VB the_DT flag_NN prescribed_VBN above_IN to_TO be_VB hoisted_VBN ,_, if_IN that_DT has_VBZ not_RB already_RB been_VBN done_VBN ._.
*_JJ N.B.-Pilotage_NN is_VBZ compulsory_JJ for_IN all_DT vessels_NNS over_IN 100_CD tons_NNS in_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN Calcutta_NNP III_NNP ._.
Prohibition_NN of_IN communication.-The_JJ commander_NN shall_MD not_RB ,_, without_IN first_JJ having_VBG obtained_VBN permission_NN as_IN hereinafter_NN provided_VBN ,_, allow_VB any_DT communication_NN ,_, except_IN orally_RB ,_, with_IN the_DT shore_NN or_CC any_DT other_JJ vessel_NN or_CC boat_NN ,_, excepting_VBG only_RB with_IN the_DT boat_NN supply-_JJ ing_VBG the_DT pilots*_NN from_IN the_DT Pilot_NNP Brig_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN that_DT case_NN communication_NN shall_MD be_VB limited_VBN to_TO receiving_VBG on_IN board_NN the_DT pilot_NN ,_, his_PRP$ Leadsman_NNP ,_, servant_NN and_CC baggage_NN ._.
IV_NNP ._.
Stoppage_NN at_IN Diamond_NNP Harbour.-If_NNP there_EX is_VBZ any_DT case_NN of_IN sick-_JJ ness_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT pilot_NN has_VBZ reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ plague_JJ ,_, he_PRP shall_MD telegraph_VB to_TO the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP from_IN Saugor_NNP ,_, and_CC not_RB proceed_VB be-_JJ yond_NN Diamond_NNP Harbour_NNP without_IN the_DT permission_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
V._NNP Stoppage_NNP at_IN Mateabrooj.-If_NNP the_DT pilot_NN has_VBZ no_DT reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN there_EX is_VBZ any_DT one_CD suffering_NN from_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD bring_VB the_DT vessel_NN up_IN the_DT river_NN to_TO Mateabrooj_NNP ,_, and_CC shall_MD anchor_VB it_PRP there_EX till_VBZ the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP has_VBZ visited_VBN it_PRP ._.

spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
379_CD VI_NNP ._.
Inspection_NN by_IN Health_NNP Officer.-The_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, as_RB soon_RB as_IN he_PRP has_VBZ received_VBN information_NN of_IN the_DT stoppage_NN of_IN tne_JJ vessel_NN at_IN Diamond_NNP Harbour_NNP ,_, or_CC of_IN its_PRP$ arrival_NN at_IN Mateabrooj_NNP ,_, shall_MD visit_VB it_PRP and_CC ascertain_VB by_IN en-_JJ quiry_NN from_IN the_DT commander_NN or_CC of_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, or_CC from_IN other_JJ sources_NNS of_IN information_NN ,_, whether_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG or_CC has_VBZ suffered_VBN from_IN plague_NN ._.
For_IN this_DT purpose_NN ,_, he_PRP may_MD demand_VB a_DT declaration_NN ,_, on_IN oath_NN ,_, from_IN the_DT doctor_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN ,_, or_CC ,_, failing_VBG him_PRP ,_, from_IN the_DT captain_NN ,_, that_IN there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN no_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN on_IN the_DT ship_NN since_IN her_PRP$ departure_NN ._.
VII_NNP ._.
Rules_NNS relating_VBG to_TO infected_VBN ships-_NN (_( 1_CD )_) If_IN an_DT infected_JJ ship_NN has_VBZ ,_, under_IN Rule_NNP IV_NNP ,_, been_VBN stopped_VBN at_IN Diamond_NNP Harbour_NNP ,_, she_PRP will_MD await_VB the_DT orders_NNS of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP there_RB ._.
If_IN ,_, under_IN Rule_NNP V_NNP ,_, she_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN brought_VBN up_RP to_TO Mateabrooj_NNP ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP will_MD direct_VB the_DT command-_JJ er_NN to_TO take_VB her_PRP to_TO the_DT sanitary_JJ station_NN at_IN Diamond_NNP Harbour_NNP or_CC elsewhere_RB as_IN may_MD be_VB appointed_VBN by_IN Government_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO await_VB orders_NNS there_RB ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) On_IN arrival_NN at_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ station_NN ,_, the_DT sick_NN will_MD be_VB immediate-_JJ ly_NN disembarked_VBD and_CC isolated_VBD under_IN the_DT order_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) The_DT other_JJ persons_NNS on_IN board_NN shall_MD also_RB be_VB disembarked_VBN and_CC ,_, when_WRB necessary_JJ ,_, kept_VBD under_IN observation_NN at_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ station_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN varying_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT discretion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN and_CC the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN ._.
Such_JJ period_NN must_MD not_RB exceed_VB ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN ,_, whe-_JJ ther_NN that_WDT occurred_VBD on_IN boardship_NN or_CC during_IN the_DT period_NN of_IN observation_NN on_IN shore_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ also_RB in_IN the_DT discretion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO allow_VB such_JJ persons_NNS to_TO proceed_VB to_TO their_PRP$ destination_NN on_IN their_PRP$ giving_VBG a_DT written_VBN undertaking_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT form_NN annexed_VBD as_IN Appendix_NNP I_PRP ,_, to_TO submit_VB themselves_PRP to_TO surveillance_VB by_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN (_( if_IN any_DT )_) appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, at_IN their_PRP$ destination_NN ,_, for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN ._.
The_DT under-_JJ taking_VBG shall_MD be_VB executed_VBN in_IN duplicate_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD copy_NN shall_MD be_VB sent_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN concerned_VBN ._.
No_DT one_CD arriving_VBG on_IN the_DT vessel_NN shall_MD be_VB left_VBN on_IN board_NN ,_, except_IN those_DT persons_NNS whose_WP$ presence_NN is_VBZ necessary_JJ for_IN the_DT care_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) The_DT soiled_JJ linen_NN and_CC personal_JJ effects_NNS of_IN the_DT crew_NN and_CC passen-_JJ gers_NNS ,_, which_WDT ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, may_MD be_VB considered_VBN as_IN infected_JJ ,_, shall_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT rules_NNS contained_VBN in_IN Appendix_NNP II_NNP ._.

IX_NNP ._.
(_( 5_CD )_) The_DT bilge-water_NN will_MD be_VB pumped_VBN out_RP after_IN disinfection_NN ,_, and_CC good_JJ drinking-water_NN will_MD be_VB substituted_VBN for_IN the_DT water_NN stored_VBD on_IN board_NN ._.
(_( 6_CD )_) All_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT ship_NN ,_, which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN inhabited_VBN by_IN plague-_JJ patients_NNS ,_, will_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN ;_: and_CC the_DT other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT ship_NN may_MD also_RB be_VB disinfected_VBN at_IN the_DT discretion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
(_( 7_CD )_) When_WRB these_DT rules_NNS have_VBP been_VBN fully_RB complied_VBN with_IN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD ,_, by_IN an_DT order_NN in_IN writing_VBG under_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB delivered_VBN to_TO the_DT commander_NN ,_, permit_VBP the_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN to_TO be_VB hauled_VBN down_RP ._.
VIII_NNP ._.
Rules_NNS relating_VBG to_TO suspected_VBN ships-_NN (_( 1_CD )_) If_IN a_DT suspected_JJ ship_NN has_VBZ ,_, under_IN Rule_NNP IV_NNP ,_, been_VBN stopped_VBN at_IN Diamond_NNP Harbour_NNP ,_, she_PRP will_MD await_VB the_DT orders_NNS of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Office_NNP there_RB ._.
If_IN ,_, under_IN Rule_NNP V_NNP ,_, she_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN brought_VBN up_RP to_TO Mateabrooj_NNP ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP will_MD go_VB on_IN board_NN of_IN her_PRP$ there_EX ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) The_DT passengers_NNS and_CC crew_NN will_MD be_VB medically_RB inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) The_DT soiled_JJ linen_NN and_CC personal_JJ effects_NNS of_IN the_DT passengers_NNS and_CC crew_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, may_MD be_VB considered_VBN as_IN infected_VBN ,_, will_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT rules_NNS contained_VBN in_IN Appendix_NNP II_NNP ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) The_DT bilge-water_NN will_MD be_VB pumped_VBN out_RP after_IN disinfection_NN ,_, and_CC good_JJ drinking-water_NN will_MD be_VB substituted_VBN for_IN the_DT water_NN stored_VBD on_IN board_NN ._.
(_( 5_CD )_) All_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT ship_NN ,_, which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN inhabited_VBN by_IN plague-_JJ patients_NNS ,_, will_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN ;_: and_CC the_DT other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT ship_NN may_MD also_RB be_VB disinfected_VBN at_IN the_DT discretion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
(_( 6_CD )_) Passengers_NNS who_WP are_VBP suspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO be_VB infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN may_MD be_VB detained_VBN under_IN observation_NN in_IN an_DT isolation_NN hospital_NN appointed_VBD for_IN the_DT purpose_NN for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN arrival_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN ,_, or_CC ,_, if_IN plague_JJ occurs_NN among_IN them_PRP while_IN under_IN observation_NN ,_, from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN ._.
(_( 7_CD )_) The_DT crew_NN will_MD not_RB be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO land_VB ,_, except_IN on_IN duty_NN ,_, for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN ._.
(_( 8_CD )_) Passengers_NNS who_WP are_VBP passed_VBN on_IN medical_JJ inspection_NN as_IN healthy_JJ will_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO proceed_VB to_TO their_PRP$ destination_NN on_IN their_PRP$ giving_VBG a_DT written_VBN undertaking_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT form_NN annexed_NN ,_, to_TO submit_VB themselves_PRP to_TO surveillance_VB by_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN ?_.
