IX_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
381_CD (_( if_IN any_DT )_) appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, at_IN their_PRP$ destination_NN ,_, for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN ._.
The_DT undertaking_NN shall_MD be_VB executed_VBN in_IN dupli-_JJ cate_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD copy_NN shall_MD be_VB sent_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN concerned_VBN ._.
(_( 9_CD )_) When_WRB these_DT rules_NNS have_VBP been_VBN fully_RB complied_VBN with_IN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD ,_, by_IN an_DT order_NN in_IN writing_VBG under_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB delivered_VBN to_TO the_DT commander_NN ,_, permit_VBP the_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN to_TO be_VB hauled_VBN down_RP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
Rules_NNS relating_VBG to_TO healthy_JJ ships-_NN (_( 1_CD )_) A_DT healthy_JJ ship_NN shall_MD be_VB given_VBN free_JJ pratique_NN at_IN once_RB ,_, what-_JJ ever_RB may_MD be_VB the_DT nature_NN of_IN her_PRP$ bill_NN of_IN health_NN ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) Such_PDT a_DT ship_NN may_MD ,_, at_IN the_DT discretion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, be_VB subjected_VBN to_TO the_DT measures_NNS prescribed_VBN in_IN Rules_NNP VIII_NNP (_( 2_CD )_) ,_, VIII_NNP (_( 3_CD )_) and_CC VIII_NNP (_( 4_CD )_) ,_, but_CC the_DT ship_NN itself_PRP may_MD not_RB be_VB disinfected_VBN as_IN in_IN Rule_NNP VIII_NNP (_( 5_CD )_) ,_, except_IN with_IN the_DT consent_NN of_IN the_DT commander_NN or_CC agent_NN ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) Passengers_NNPS who_WP ,_, on_IN medical_JJ inspection_NN ,_, are_VBP suspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO be_VB infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN may_MD be_VB de-_JJ tained_VBN under_IN observation_NN in_IN an_DT isolation_NN hospital_NN appointed_VBD for_IN the_DT purpose_NN for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT ship_NN left_VBD an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ,_, or_CC ,_, if_IN plague_JJ occurs_NN among_IN them_PRP while_IN under_IN observation_NN ,_, from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) The_DT crew_NN will_MD not_RB be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO land_VB ,_, except_IN on_IN duty_NN ,_, ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT ship_NN left_VBD an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ._.
(_( 5_CD )_) The_DT crew_NN and_CC passengers_NNS may_MD ,_, at_IN the_DT discretion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, be_VB subjected_VBN to_TO surveillance_VB in_IN the_DT manner_NN described_VBD in_IN Rule_NNP VIII_NNP (_( 8_CD )_) for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT ship_NN left_VBD an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ._.
(_( 6_CD )_) When_WRB these_DT rules_NNS have_VBP been_VBN fully_RB complied_VBN with_IN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD ,_, by_IN an_DT order_NN in_IN writing_VBG under_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB delivered_VBN to_TO the_DT commander_NN ,_, permit_VBP the_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN to_TO be_VB hauled_VBN down_RP ._.
(_( 7_CD )_) None_NN of_IN the_DT above_JJ measures_NNS will_MD be_VB considered_VBN necessary_JJ when_WRB the_DT ship_NN has_VBZ been_VBN given_VBN free_JJ pratique_NN at_IN Colombo_NNP or_CC other_JJ intermediate_JJ port_NN ._.
X_NN ._.

Rules_NNS relating_VBG to_TO crowded_VBN and_CC insanitary_JJ ships.-Crowded_JJ ships_NNS ,_, ships_NNS carrying_VBG emigrants_NNS or_CC return_NN pilgrims_NNS and_CC ships_NNS which_WDT appear_VBP to_TO be_VB in_IN an_DT insanitary_JJ state_NN may_MD ,_, at_IN the_DT discretion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, be_VB treated_VBN as_IN suspected_JJ ships_NNS under_IN head_NN VIII_NNP ._.
XII_NN ._.
Right_NNP of_IN ship_NN to_TO put_VB back_RB to_TO sea.-Any_JJ ships_NNS objecting_VBG to_TO submit_VB to_TO the_DT obligations_NNS imposed_VBN by_IN these_DT rules_NNS will_MD be_VB free_JJ to_TO put_VB back_RB to_TO sea_NN ._.
Such_JJ objection_NN must_MD be_VB notified_VBN on_IN or_CC before_IN arriving_VBG at_IN Diamond_NNP Harbour_NNP ._.
XIII_NN ._.

-If_JJ ships_NNS claiming_VBG the_DT right_NN to_TO put_VB back_RB to_TO sea_NN desire_NN to_TO disembark_VB passengers_NNS or_CC land_NN goods_NNS ,_, they_PRP must_MD submit_VB to_TO the_DT rules_NNS relating_VBG to_TO suspected_VBN ships_NNS ._.
XIV_NN ._.

APPENDIX_NNP II_NNP ._.
Instructions_NNS for_IN disinfection_NN ._.
1_CD ._.
Personal_JJ effects_NNS ,_, rags_NNS ,_, infected_VBN bandages_NNS ,_, papers_NNS and_CC other_JJ articles_NNS ,_, without_IN value_NN ,_, should_MD be_VB destroyed_VBN by_IN fire_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
Under-clothing_NN ,_, bedding_NN ,_, wearing_VBG apparel_NN ,_, mattresses_NNS ,_, carpets_NNS ,_, etc._NN ,_, which_WDT are_VBP contaminated_VBN or_CC suspected_VBN ,_, should_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN in_IN stoves_NNS at_IN normal_JJ pressure_NN ,_, or_CC at_IN a_DT pressure_NN of_IN from_IN one-and-a-half_JJ to_TO two_CD degrees_NNS ,_, with_IN or_CC without_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN steam_NN ._.
Before_IN a_DT stove_NN is_VBZ passed_VBN as_IN efficient_NN for_IN the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN disinfec-_JJ tion_NN ,_, it_PRP should_MD be_VB subjected_VBN to_TO a_DT test_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT aid_NN of_IN a_DT signal_JJ ther-_JJ mometer_NN ,_, showing_VBG the_DT moment_NN when_WRB the_DT temperature_NN in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN a_DT mattress_NN rises_VBZ to_TO ,_, at_IN least_JJS ,_, 100_CD (_( centigrade_NN )_) ._.

IX_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
383_CD To_TO ensure_VB that_IN the_DT disinfection_NN is_VBZ effective_JJ ,_, this_DT temperature_NN must_MD be_VB maintained_VBN for_IN from_IN ten_NN to_TO fifteen_VB minutes_NNS ._.
3_CD ._.
Disinfecting_VBG solutions-_NN (_( a_DT )_) Solution_NN of_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN ,_, of_IN 1_CD part_NN in_IN 1,000_CD ,_, with_IN the_DT addition_NN of_IN 10_CD parts_NNS of_IN chloride_NN of_IN soda_NN ._.
The_DT solution_NN should_MD be_VB coloured_VBN with_IN aniline_JJ dye_NN or_CC indigo_NN ._.
It_PRP should_MD not_RB be_VB placed_VBN in_IN metal_NN vessels_NNS ._.
(_( b_NN )_) A_DT 5_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
solution_NN of_IN pure_NN crystallized_VBN carbolic_JJ acid_NN ,_, or_CC 5_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN crude_JJ commercial_JJ carbolic_NN acid_NN ,_, in_IN a_DT warm_JJ soft_JJ soap_NN ._.
(_( c_NN )_) Fresh_NNP slaked-lime_NN ._.
*_RB 4_CD ._.
Special_JJ instructions_NNS to_TO be_VB observed_VBN in_IN the_DT employment_NN of_IN disin-_JJ fecting_JJ solutions_NNS ._.
The_DT linen_NN ,_, clothing_NN and_CC articles_NNS ,_, soiled_VBN by_IN the_DT excreta_NN of_IN patients_NNS ,_, should_MD be_VB soaked_VBN in_IN the_DT solution_NN of_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN ._.
The_DT solution_NN of_IN pure_JJ carbolic_JJ acid_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT solution_NN of_IN soap_NN and_CC carbolic_JJ acid_NN ,_, are_VBP equally_RB suited_VBN to_TO the_DT purpose_NN ._.
The_DT articles_NNS should_MD remain_VB in_IN the_DT solution_NN for_IN at_IN least_JJS six_CD hours_NNS ._.
Articles_NNS which_WDT can_MD not_RB be_VB subjected_VBN to_TO the_DT temperature_NN of_IN the_DT stove_NN (_( 100_CD centigrade_NN )_) without_IN injury_NN ,_, such_JJ as_IN leather_JJR goods_NNS ,_, wooden_JJ arti-_JJ cles_NNS stuck_VBN together_RB with_IN glue_NN ,_, felt_VBD ,_, velvet_NN ,_, silk_NN ,_, etc._FW ,_, should_MD be_VB washed_VBN with_IN the_DT solution_NN of_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN ;_: coins_NNS can_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN with_IN the_DT solution_NN of_IN soap_NN and_CC carbolic_JJ acid_NN ._.
Persons_NNS engaged_VBN in_IN nursing_VBG the_DT sick_NN should_MD wash_VB their_PRP$ hands_NNS and_CC faces_VBZ with_IN the_DT solution_NN of_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN ,_, or_CC with_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT car-_JJ bolic_JJ solutions_NNS ._.
The_DT carbolic_JJ solutions_NNS will_MD be_VB useful_JJ ,_, more_RBR particularly_RB for_IN disin-_JJ fecting_NN articles_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN metals_NNS ,_, instruments_NNS ,_, etc._NN ,_, which_WDT can_MD neither_RB be_VB subjected_VBN to_TO a_DT temperature_NN of_IN 100_CD centigrade_NN ,_, nor_CC placed_VBD in_IN contact_NN with_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN ._.
Slaked-lime_JJ is_VBZ particularly_RB recommended_VBN for_IN disinfecting_VBG excreta_NN ._.
Expectorated_JJ matter_NN should_MD be_VB burnt_VBN ._.
5_CD ._.
Disinfection_NN of_IN ships_NNS with_IN plague-patients_NNS on_IN board_NN ._.
The_DT cabin_NN or_CC cabins_NNS ,_, and_CC all_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT ship_NN occupied_VBN by_IN the_DT sick_NN or_CC suspected_VBN ,_, should_MD be_VB cleared_VBN out_RP ,_, and_CC all_DT articles_NNS in_IN them_PRP should_MD be_VB treated_VBN as_IN described_VBN above_IN ._.
*_NN To_TO get_VB very_RB strong_JJ slaked-lime_NN ,_, take_VBP lime_NN of_IN good_JJ quality_NN ,_, slake_VB it_PRP ,_, by_IN moisten-_JJ ing_VBG it_PRP gradually_RB with_IN half_PDT its_PRP$ weight_NN of_IN water_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT operation_NN is_VBZ completed_VBN ,_, put_VBD the_DT powder_NN in_IN a_DT carefully-corked_JJ receptacle_NN ,_, and_CC place_NN it_PRP in_IN a_DT dry_JJ spot_NN ._.
As_IN each_DT kilogram-_CD me_PRP of_IN lime_NN absorbs_NNS 500_CD grammes_NNS of_IN water_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO become_VB slack_NN ,_, it_PRP acquires_VBZ a_DT volume_NN of_IN 2_CD litres_NNS 200_CD ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ sufficient_JJ to_TO dilute_VB it_PRP with_IN double_JJ its_PRP$ volume_NN of_IN water_NN ,_, say_VBP 4_CD kilogrammes_NNS 400_CD grammes_NNS ,_, to_TO obtain_VB a_DT white-wash_NN ,_, which_WDT will_MD be_VB of_IN about_RB 20_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
strength_NN of_IN lime_NN ._.

IX_NNP ._.
The_DT partitions_NNS should_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN with_IN the_DT solution_NN of_IN corrosive_JJ sublimate_NN ,_, with_IN an_DT addition_NN of_IN 10_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN alcohol_NN ._.
The_DT wash-_JJ ing_NN should_MD commence_VB from_IN the_DT top_JJ ,_, horizontally_RB ,_, and_CC be_VB continued_VBN downwards_NNS ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT whole_JJ surface_NN of_IN the_DT partition_NN becomes_VBZ covered_VBN ,_, with_IN a_DT coating_NN of_IN minute_NN drops_NNS ._.

6_CD ._.
Disinfection_NN of_IN the_DT hold_NN of_IN an_DT infected_JJ ship_NN ._.
To_TO disinfect_VB the_DT hold_NN ,_, sulphate_NN of_IN iron_NN ,_, in_IN quantity_NN sufficient_NN to_TO neutralize_VB the_DT sulphurated_JJ hydrogen_NN ,_, should_MD first_RB be_VB thrown_VBN in_IN ,_, the_DT bilge-water_NN should_MD be_VB pumped_VBN out_RP ,_, and_CC the_DT hold_NN washed_VBD with_IN sea-_JJ water_NN ._.

The_DT bilge-water_NN should_MD not_RB be_VB pumped_VBN out_RP while_IN the_DT ship_NN is_VBZ in_IN port_NN ._.

IX_NNP ._.
ascertain_NN that_IN none_NN of_IN them_PRP are_VBP suffering_VBG from_IN or_CC infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ._.
The_DT ports_NNS of_IN the_DT Madras_NNP Presidency_NNP not_RB being_VBG infected_VBN the_DT matter_NN is_VBZ of_IN less_JJR importance_NN in_IN that_DT Presidency_NNP ._.

3_CD ._.

This_DT is_VBZ to_TO certify_VB that_IN the_DT ship_NN (_( or_CC steamer_NN )_) sailing_VBG under_IN the_DT flag_NN and_CC under_IN the_DT command_NN of_IN as_IN master_NN of_IN tons_NNS bound_IN for_IN with_IN a_DT crew_NN of_IN persons*_NN and_CC *_JJ Including_NNP officers_NNS and_CC able-bodied_JJ passengers_NNS and_CC laden_JJ with_IN a_DT cargo_NN seamen_NN ._.

(_( i_NN )_) a_DT vessel_NN which_WDT has_VBZ obtained_VBN a_DT clean_JJ bill_NN of_IN health_NN at_IN any_DT port_NN of_IN the_DT Madras_NNP Presidency_NNP shall_MD not_RB be_VB liable_JJ to_TO further_JJ inspection_NN during_IN the_DT same_JJ voyage_NN if_IN there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN no_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN meanwhile_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ not_RB subsequently_RB touched_VBN at_IN any_DT port_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN declared_VBN infected_JJ ,_, or_CC taken_VBN up_RP passengers_NNS at_IN other_JJ than_IN inspection_NN ports_NNS ;_: and_CC (_( ii_NN )_) all_DT vessels_NNS belonging_VBG to_TO the_DT Ceylon_NNP Government_NNP which_WDT may_MD leave_VB ports_NNS in_IN the_DT Madras_NNP Presidency_NNP with_IN emigrants_NNS for_IN Ceylon_NNP shall_MD be_VB exempted_VBN from_IN medical_JJ inspection_NN ._.

6_CD ._.
Should_MD the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT port_NN be_VB of_IN opinion_NN that_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN of_IN any_DT vessel_NN so_RB inspected_JJ is_VBZ suffering_VBG from_IN the_DT bubonic_JJ plague_NN or_CC from_IN any_DT illness_NN which_WDT he_PRP suspects_VBZ may_MD prove_VB to_TO be_VB plague_NN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD refuse_VB to_TO give_VB a_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN as_IN aforesaid_NN unless_IN and_CC until_IN such_JJ person_NN ,_, together_RB with_IN his_PRP$ or_CC her_PRP$ attendants_NNS and_CC relatives_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ baggage_NN and_CC personal_JJ effects_NNS ,_, have_VBP been_VBN removed_VBN from_IN the_DT vessel_NN and_CC such_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT vessel_NN as_IN have_VBP been_VBN frequented_VBN by_IN such_JJ persons_NNS shall_MD have_VB been_VBN disinfected_VBN to_TO the_DT satisfaction_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
Such_JJ removal_NN and_CC disinfection_NN shall_MD be_VB noted_VBN on_IN the_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN ._.
The_DT baggage_NN and_CC effects_NNS of_IN such_JJ persons_NNS as_IN are_VBP removed_VBN from_IN or_CC prevented_VBN from_IN sailing_VBG in_IN any_DT vessel_NN under_IN this_DT rule_NN shall_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN on_IN shore_NN in_IN such_JJ manner_NN as_IN the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP directs_VBZ before_IN such_JJ baggage_NN and_CC personal_JJ effects_NNS are_VBP permitted_VBN on_IN board_NN any_DT vessel_NN ._.
7_CD ._.
All_DT persons_NNS so_RB removed_VBD shall_MD be_VB detained_VBN in_IN a_DT plague_JJ hospital_NN or_CC place_NN of_IN observation_NN appointed_VBN by_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP authority_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT case_NN may_MD be_VB ;_: and_CC shall_MD not_RB leave_VB such_JJ hospital_NN or_CC place_NN until_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP present_NN at_IN the_DT spot_NN shall_MD have_VB certified_VBN that_IN they_PRP are_VBP free_JJ from_IN the_DT infection_NN of_IN the_DT plague_NN ._.
*_JJ Note.-Mail_NNP bags_NNS are_VBP included_VBN in_IN ``_`` cargo_NN ''_'' under_IN this_DT Regulation_NNP ._.
8_CD ._.
After_IN the_DT master_NN or_CC person_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ obtained_VBN a_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN under_IN the_DT provisions_NNS of_IN these_DT regulations_NNS ,_, no_DT person_NN or_CC cargo*_NN or_CC goods_NNS of_IN any_DT kind_NN shall_MD be_VB embarked_VBN or_CC disembarked_VBN before_IN the_DT vessel_NN leaves_VBZ the_DT port_NN unless_IN such_JJ vessel_NN is_VBZ again_RB inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP and_CC another_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN obtained_VBN from_IN such_JJ officer_NN by_IN the_DT master_NN or_CC person_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN such_JJ vessel_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT necessity_NN of_IN a_DT fresh_JJ inspection_NN by_IN the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP under_IN this_DT regulation_NN arises_VBZ from_IN any_DT default_NN or_CC act_NN of_IN the_DT master_NN or_CC agents_NNS of_IN the_DT vessel_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT the_DT Port_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD be_VB the_DT sole_JJ judge_NN ,_, such_JJ fresh_JJ inspection_NN shall_MD not_RB take_VB place_NN until_IN after_IN the_DT payment_NN to_TO the_DT Port_NNP Officer_NNP by_IN the_DT master_NN or_CC agents_NNS of_IN such_JJ vessel_NN of_IN such_JJ fee_NN for_IN such_JJ inspection_NN ,_, not_RB being_VBG less_JJR than_IN five_CD nor_CC more_JJR than_IN fifty_JJ rupees_NNS ,_, as_IN the_DT Port_NNP Officer_NNP in_IN his_PRP$ sole_JJ discretion_NN may_MD order_NN ._.
9_CD ._.
No_DT port_NN clearance_NN shall_MD be_VB delivered_VBN to_TO any_DT vessel_NN bound_NN from_IN any_DT such_JJ port_NN to_TO any_DT port_NN out_IN of_IN India_NNP unless_IN and_CC until_IN the_DT master_NN or_CC person_NN in_IN charge_NN thereof_VBP shall_MD produce_VB a_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN obtained_VBN as_IN aforesaid_NN ;_: and_CC it_PRP shall_MD be_VB the_DT duty_NN of_IN the_DT Customs_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO refuse_VB delivery_NN of_IN the_DT port_NN clearance_NN without_IN the_DT production_NN of_IN such_JJ bill_NN of_IN health_NN ._.

10_CD ._.

P._NNP HEWETT_NNP ,_, Esq._NNP ,_, C.I.E._NNP ,_, Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, Home_NNP Department_NNP ,_, To-The_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Madras_NNP ,_, Marine_NNP Department_NNP ._.

791-Marine_JJ ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 11th_CD instant_NN ,_, forwarding_VBG a_DT copy_NN of_IN the_DT revised_VBN rules_NNS issued_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Madras_NNP on_IN the_DT same_JJ date_NN for_IN the_DT inspection_NN of_IN outward-bound_JJ vessels_NNS ._.

I_PRP am_VBP to_TO make_VB the_DT following_JJ remarks_NNS on_IN certain_JJ points_NNS connected_VBN with_IN them_PRP ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT first_JJ of_IN the_DT regulations_NNS directs_VBZ that_IN no_DT person_NN shall_MD be_VB per-_JJ mitted_VBN to_TO embark_VB on_IN board_NN a_DT vessel_NN bound_NN direct_NN for_IN any_DT port_NN out_IN of_IN India_NNP who_WP has_VBZ ,_, within_IN the_DT preceding_VBG ten_JJ days_NNS ,_, resided_VBN in_IN a_DT part_NN of_IN India_NNP believed_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Port_NNP to_TO be_VB infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN ._.
This_DT regulation_NN reproduces_VBZ in_IN a_DT slightly_RB modified_VBN form_NN the_DT first_JJ of_IN the_DT rules_NNS for_IN vessels_NNS sailing_VBG from_IN Tuticorin_NNP to_TO Ceylon_NNP ,_, pub-_NN lished_VBN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Madras_NNP on_IN the_DT 22nd_CD of_IN February_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT first_JJ of_IN the_DT rules_NNS for_IN vessels_NNS sailing_VBG from_IN the_DT Port_NNP of_IN Madras_NNP for_IN ports_NNS out_IN of_IN India_NNP published_VBN on_IN the_DT 23rd_CD of_IN the_DT same_JJ month_NN ._.
At_IN that_DT time_NN the_DT Venice_NNP Convention_NNP had_VBD not_RB yet_RB been_VBN framed_VBN ;_: now_RB that_IN the_DT Conven-_NNP tion_NN has_VBZ been_VBN commonly_RB accepted_VBN and_CC enforced_VBN the_DT retention_NN of_IN the_DT rule_NN appears_VBZ to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP to_TO be_VB unnecessary_JJ ._.
It_PRP goes_VBZ beyond_IN the_DT requirements_NNS of_IN the_DT Convention_NNP ,_, and_CC ,_, in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, it_PRP also_RB goes_VBZ beyond_IN the_DT necessities_NNS of_IN the_DT general_JJ case_NN ._.
The_DT case_NN of_IN Ceylon_NNP is_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP recognize_NN ,_, somewhat_RB apart_RB from_IN that_DT of_IN other_JJ countries_NNS outside_IN of_IN India_NNP ,_, owing_VBG to_TO its_PRP$ close_JJ proximity_NN to_TO the_DT Indian_JJ mainland_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Madras_NNP consider_VBP that_IN the_DT withdrawal_NN of_IN the_DT rule_NN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN vessels_NNS bound_VBN for_IN Ceylon_NNP will_MD be_VB likely_RB to_TO cause_VB vessels_NNS for_IN Madras_NNP ports_NNS to_TO be_VB put_VBN in_IN quarantine_NN at_IN Colombo_NNP ,_, then_RB the_DT Govern-_NNP ment_NN of_IN India_NNP will_MD have_VB no_DT objection_NN to_TO its_PRP$ retention_NN in_IN this_DT special_JJ case_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
Rules_NNS 6_CD and_CC 7_CD describe_NN correctly_RB the_DT action_NN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN on_IN the_DT discovery_NN of_IN a_DT declared_JJ or_CC suspected_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN the_DT vessel_NN before_IN her_PRP$ departure_NN ,_, but_CC no_DT provision_NN is_VBZ made_VBN in_IN the_DT regulations_NNS for_IN ?_. APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
393_CD the_DT action_NN to_TO be_VB taken_VBN should_MD a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN be_VB discovered_VBN among_IN the_DT persons_NNS examined_VBD on_IN shore_RB previous_JJ to_TO their_PRP$ embarkation_NN ._.
It_PRP appears_VBZ to_TO the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP necessary_JJ that_IN a_DT rule_NN should_MD be_VB inserted_VBN prescribing_VBG that_IN in_IN this_DT event_NN the_DT sick_JJ person_NN and_CC his_PRP$ non-professional_JJ attendants_NNS should_MD be_VB prevented_VBN from_IN embarking_VBG and_CC segregated_VBN on_IN shore_NN that_IN the_DT baggage_NN of_IN these_DT persons_NNS should_MD not_RB be_VB embarked_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN articles_NNS likely_RB to_TO be_VB contaminated_VBN should_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN on_IN shore_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
In_IN a_DT marginal_JJ note_NN to_TO proviso_VB (_( i_NN )_) of_IN rule_NN 3_CD it_PRP is_VBZ stated_VBN that_IN no_DT vessel_NN ,_, even_RB if_IN she_PRP has_VBZ started_VBN from_IN a_DT port_NN in_IN the_DT Madras_NNP Presidency_NNP ,_, may_MD sail_VB from_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN Madras_NNP to_TO Burma_VB without_IN medical_JJ inspec-_JJ tion_NN as_IN prescribed_VBN in_IN the_DT regulations_NNS under_IN reference_NN ._.

The_DT point_NN is_VBZ not_RB one_CD of_IN great_JJ importance_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT rules_NNS should_MD in_IN all_DT respects_NNS be_VB accu-_JJ rate_NN in_IN form_NN as_RB well_RB as_IN in_IN substance_NN ,_, as_IN they_PRP will_MD remain_VB the_DT model_NN for_IN future_JJ rules_NNS in_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN their_PRP$ being_VBG required_VBN ._.

167_CD ,_, dated_VBD 11th_CD September_NNP 1897_CD ,_, published_VBN in_IN the_DT Fort_NNP St._NNP George_NNP Gazette_NNP of_IN 14th_CD September_NNP 1897_CD ,_, Part_NNP I_PRP ,_, page_NN 1167_CD ,_, I_PRP beg_VBP to_TO bring_VB to_TO notice_VB that_IN in_IN the_DT bill_NN of_IN health_NN form_NN therein_NN given_VBN ,_, there_EX is_VBZ nothing_NN that_IN provides-_NN for_IN the_DT inspection_NN of_IN persons_NNS not_RB on_IN the_DT ship_NN 's_POS articles_NNS ,_, and_CC who_WP are_VBP not_RB passengers_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT private_JJ servants_NNS of_IN officers_NNS and_CC engineers_NNS ._.

Definition_NN ,_, I_PRP ._.
In_IN these_DT regulations-_JJ (_( 1_CD )_) ``_`` Vessel_NNP ''_'' includes_VBZ anything_NN made_VBN for_IN the_DT conveyance_NN by_IN water_NN of_IN human_JJ beings_NNS or_CC of_IN property_NN ._.

spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
395_CD (_( 2_CD )_) ``_`` Port_NNP Officer_NNP ''_'' includes_VBZ any_DT person_NN acting_VBG under_IN the_DT author-_JJ ity_NN of_IN Government_NNP in_IN charge_NN of_IN port_NN discipline_NN ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) ``_`` Master_NNP ''_'' when_WRB used_VBN in_IN relation_NN to_TO any_DT vessel_NN means_VBZ any_DT person_NN (_( except_IN a_DT pilot_NN or_CC harbour_PRP$ master_NN )_) having_VBG for_IN the_DT time_NN being_VBG the_DT charge_NN or_CC control_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) ``_`` Sanitary_JJ authority_NN ''_'' means_VBZ the_DT Collector_NNP of_IN the_DT District_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Municipal_NNP Council_NNP or_CC Local_NNP Board_NNP ,_, the_DT area_NN under_IN whose_WP$ jurisdiction_NN includes_VBZ or_CC abuts_NNS on_IN any_DT part_NN of_IN a_DT customs_NNS port_NN ._.
Where_WRB a_DT customs_NNS port_NN is_VBZ included_VBN within_IN or_CC abuts_NNS on_IN the_DT jurisdiction_NN of_IN more_JJR than_IN one_CD of_IN the_DT authorities_NNS above_IN mentioned_VBN ,_, the_DT Governor_NNP in_IN Council_NNP shall_MD appoint_VB which_WDT of_IN them_PRP shall_MD be_VB the_DT sanitary_JJ authority_NN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN these_DT regulations_NNS ,_, or_CC he_PRP may_MD distribute_VB among_IN them_PRP ,_, in_IN such_JJ manner_NN as_IN he_PRP may_MD deem_VB fit_NN ,_, the_DT duties_NNS imposed_VBN by_IN these_DT regulations_NNS ._.
The_DT jurisdiction_NN of_IN every_DT sanitary_JJ authority_NN shall_MD ,_, for_IN the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN these_DT regulations_NNS ,_, extend_VBP to_TO seaward_VB for_IN a_DT distance_NN of_IN three_CD miles_NNS beyond_IN low_JJ water_NN mark_NN on_IN all_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT coast_NN line_NN bounding_VBG the_DT area_NN ordinarily_RB under_IN its_PRP$ jurisdiction_NN ._.
(_( 5_CD )_) ``_`` Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ''_'' includes_VBZ any_DT duly_RB qualified_JJ medical_JJ practitioner_NN appointed_VBN by_IN a_DT sanitary_JJ authority_NN or_CC by_IN the_DT Local_JJ Government_NNP to_TO act_VB in_IN the_DT execution_NN of_IN these_DT regu-_JJ lations_NNS ._.
(_( 6_CD )_) ``_`` Observation_NNP ''_'' means_VBZ segregation_NN either_DT on_IN board_NN a_DT vessel_NN ,_, or_CC in_IN an_DT isolation_NN camp_NN or_CC place_NN ._.
(_( 7_CD )_) ``_`` Surveillance_NNP ''_'' means_VBZ that_IN the_DT person_NN subjected_VBD to_TO it_PRP will_MD not_RB be_VB isolated_VBN ;_: they_PRP will_MD at_IN once_RB obtain_VB free_JJ pratique_NN ,_, but_CC will_MD be_VB kept_VBN under_IN medical_JJ supervision_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
(_( 1_CD )_) ``_`` Infected_VBN ''_'' used_VBN with_IN reference_NN to_TO a_DT vessel_NN denotes_VBZ any_DT vessel_NN with_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, or_CC on_IN board_NN which_WDT one_CD or_CC more_JJR cases_NNS have_VBP taken_VBN place_NN within_IN twelve_JJ days_NNS ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) ``_`` Suspected_VBN ''_'' used_VBN with_IN reference_NN to_TO a_DT vessel_NN denotes_VBZ any_DT vessel_NN on_IN board_NN which_WDT there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN departure_NN ,_, or_CC during_IN the_DT voyage_NN ,_, but_CC on_IN which_WDT no_DT fresh_JJ case_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN for_IN twelve_NN days_NNS ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) ``_`` Healthy_NNP ''_'' used_VBN with_IN reference_NN to_TO a_DT vessel_NN denotes_VBZ any_DT vessel_NN which_WDT has_VBZ come_VBN from_IN ,_, or_CC which_WDT during_IN the_DT voyage_NN has_VBZ touched_VBN at_IN ,_, an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ,_, but_CC which_WDT has_VBZ had_VBN no_DT death_NN ,_, or_CC case_NN of_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, either_CC before_IN departure_NN ,_, during_IN the_DT voyage_NN or_CC on_IN arrival_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT master_NN of_IN every_DT ``_`` infected_JJ ,_, ''_'' ``_`` suspected_VBN ''_'' or_CC ``_`` healthy_JJ ''_'' vessel_NN shall_MD ,_, when_WRB within_IN three_CD miles_NNS of_IN the_DT coast_NN of_IN any_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT ?_. 396_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
Madras_NNP Presidency_NNP ,_, cause_NN to_TO be_VB hoisted_VBN at_IN the_DT foremast_JJ head_NN the_DT Commercial_NNP Code_NNP flag_NN Q_NNP being_VBG a_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN ,_, and_CC shall_MD keep_VB the_DT same_JJ displayed_NN during_IN the_DT whole_JJ time_NN between_IN sunrise_NN and_CC sunset_NN ._.
If_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN such_JJ vessel_NN be_VB at_IN the_DT time_NN suffering_NN or_CC suspected_VBN to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN the_DT plague_NN ,_, the_DT master_NN shall_MD also_RB hoist_VB the_DT Commercial_NNP Code_NNP flag_NN R_NNP below_IN the_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN Q_NNP ._.
Any_DT such_JJ vessel_NN arriving_VBG at_IN a_DT port_NN after_IN dark_JJ shall_MD hoist_VB on_IN coming_VBG to_TO an_DT anchor_NN one_CD white_JJ light_NN at_IN the_DT foremast_JJ head_NN and_CC one_CD red_JJ light_NN at_IN the_DT mainmast_NN head_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT master_NN of_IN any_DT such_JJ vessel_NNS shall_MD before_IN arriving_VBG at_IN an_DT anchorage_NN pump_NN out_IN the_DT bilge-water_NN ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, after_IN disinfection_NN ,_, and_CC pass_NN fresh_JJ sea_NN water_NN over_IN the_DT parts_NNS that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN in_IN contract_NN with_IN the_DT bilge-water_NN ._.
The_DT bilge-water_JJ shall_MD not_RB be_VB discharged_VBN within_IN port_NN limits_NNS ._.
5_CD ._.
The_DT Port_NNP Officer_NNP on_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN any_DT vessel_NN displaying_VBG the_DT flag_NN or_CC flags_NNS or_CC light_NN or_CC lights_NNS aforesaid_VBN ,_, or_CC if_IN he_PRP ascertains_VBZ from_IN the_DT master_NN of_IN such_JJ vessel_NN ,_, or_CC otherwise_RB has_VBZ reason_NN to_TO believe_VB ,_, that_IN the_DT vessel_NN is_VBZ infected_VBN ,_, suspected_VBD or_CC healthy_JJ from_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ,_, shall_MD detain_VB such_JJ vessel_NN ,_, and_CC order_NN the_DT master_NN forthwith_NN to_TO moor_VB or_CC anchor_VB the_DT same_JJ in_IN such_JJ place_NN as_IN may_MD be_VB fixed_VBN by_IN him_PRP ;_: and_CC the_DT master_NN shall_MD moor_VB or_CC anchor_VB accordingly_RB :_: Provided_VBD that_IN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN any_DT ship_NN which_WDT has_VBZ not_RB communicated_VBN with_IN the_DT shore_NN ,_, the_DT master_NN if_IN he_PRP objects_VBZ to_TO submit_VB to_TO the_DT obligations_NNS imposed_VBN by_IN these_DT regulations_NNS shall_MD be_VB free_JJ to_TO put_VB back_RB to_TO sea_NN ._.
In_IN such_JJ case_NN the_DT Port_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD send_VB immediate_JJ information_NN to_TO the_DT sanitary_JJ authorities_NNS of_IN the_DT port_NN in_IN India_NNP ,_, Burma_NNP or_CC Ceylon_NNP to_TO which_WDT the_DT vessel_NN is_VBZ bound_VBN or_CC at_IN which_WDT she_PRP is_VBZ next_JJ about_IN to_TO call_VB ._.
6_CD ._.
While_IN a_DT vessel_NN shall_MD be_VB so_RB detained_JJ ,_, no_DT person_NN shall_MD leave_VB the_DT same_JJ ._.
7_CD ._.
The_DT Port_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT approach_NN to_TO the_DT port_NN of_IN any_DT vessel_JJ dis-_JJ playing_VBG the_DT flag_NN or_CC flags_NNS or_CC light_NN or_CC lights_NNS aforesaid_VBN ,_, or_CC on_IN his_PRP$ detaining_VBG any_DT vessel_NN as_IN aforesaid_NN ,_, shall_MD forthwith_VB give_JJ notice_NN thereof_NN and_CC of_IN the_DT cause_NN of_IN such_JJ detention_NN to_TO the_DT Sanitary_NNP authority_NN of_IN the_DT port_NN ,_, and_CC also_RB to_TO the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
8_CD ._.

10_CD ._.

15_CD ._.

(_( 2_CD )_) If_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN any_DT such_JJ vessel_NN is_VBZ found_VBN to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ,_, or_CC from_IN any_DT illness_NN which_WDT the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP suspects_VBZ may_MD prove_VB to_TO be_VB plague_NN ,_, the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD certify_VB accord-_JJ ingly_RB ._.
Every_DT person_NN who_WP shall_MD be_VB so_RB certified_VBN by_IN him_PRP shall_MD ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, be_VB immediately_RB disembarked_VBN ,_, and_CC shall_MD be_VB detained_VBN for_IN treatment_NN in_IN a_DT suitable_JJ hospital_NN or_CC ward_NN or_CC isolation_NN camp_NN or_CC other_JJ place_NN ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) If_IN the_DT vessel_NN is_VBZ certified_VBN to_TO be_VB infected_VBN ,_, all_DT persons_NNS on_IN board_NN shall_MD be_VB kept_VBN under_IN observation_NN or_CC surveillance_NN ,_, as_IN the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD determine_VB ,_, and_CC shall_MD ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, be_VB disembarked_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) All_DT persons_NNS kept_VBD under_IN observation_NN ,_, whether_IN on_IN shore_NN or_CC on_IN board_NN the_DT vessel_NN ,_, shall_MD be_VB detained_VBN for_IN such_JJ period_NN as_IN the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD in_IN his_PRP$ absolute_JJ discretion_NN prescribe_NN with_IN regard_NN to_TO the_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN and_CC the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN which_WDT has_VBZ occurred_VBN among_IN the_DT crew_NN or_CC passengers_NNS ,_, but_CC which_WDT shall_MD not_RB exceed_VB ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN of_IN plague_NN which_WDT has_VBZ occurred_VBN on_IN board_NN ,_, or_CC which_WDT may_MD subsequently_RB occur_VB among_IN the_DT persons_NNS detained_VBN in_IN such_JJ camp_NN or_CC place_NN as_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP authority_NN shall_MD have_VB appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN their_PRP$ detention_NN or_CC on_IN board_NN the_DT vessel_NN ,_, after_IN which_WDT they_PRP shall_MD ,_, if_IN certified_VBN by_IN the_DT Chief_NNP Medi-_NNP cal_JJ Officer_NNP on_IN the_DT spot_NN to_TO be_VB free_JJ from_IN the_DT infection_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, be_VB per-_JJ mitted_VBN to_TO proceed_VB to_TO their_PRP$ destination_NN ._.

APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
399_CD from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN in_IN port_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN a_DT healthy_JJ vessel_NN for_IN the_DT period_NN necessary_JJ to_TO complete_VB a_DT term_NN of_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN 's_POS departure_NN from_IN the_DT infected_VBN port_NN last_JJ visited_VBD ._.

16_CD ._.

17_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN a_DT vessel_NN certified_VBN to_TO be_VB suspected_VBN or_CC healthy_JJ ,_, a_DT clean_JJ bill_NN of_IN health_NN shall_MD be_VB given_VBN ,_, provided_VBD the_DT requirements_NNS of_IN these_DT regulations_NNS have_VBP been_VBN complied_VBN with_IN and_CC if_IN ten_VBN days_NNS have_VBP elapsed_VBN since_IN the_DT vessel_NN 's_POS departure_NN from_IN the_DT infected_VBN port_NN last_JJ visited_VBD ._.

18_CD ._.

19_CD ._.

20_CD ._.

21_CD ._.
If_IN any_DT person_NN suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN or_CC from_IN any_DT illness_NN which_WDT the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP suspects_VBZ may_MD prove_VB to_TO be_VB plague_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB disembarked_VBN under_IN Regulation_NNP 15_CD ,_, he_PRP may_MD be_VB detained_VBN on_IN board_NN the_DT vessel_NN ,_, which_WDT shall_MD remain_VB subject_JJ ,_, for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN this_DT regulation_NN ,_, to_TO the_DT control_NN of_IN the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.

IX_NNP ._.
suffered_VBN is_VBZ ,_, or_CC proves_VBZ to_TO be_VB ,_, plague_NN ,_, the_DT vessel_NN shall_MD be_VB treated_VBN as_IN an_DT infected_JJ vessel_NN ._.
22_CD ._.
Any_DT person_NN detained_VBN under_IN observation_NN or_CC placed_VBN under_IN sur-_JJ veillance_NN who_WP is_VBZ certified_VBN by_IN the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP or_CC by_IN the_DT medi-_JJ cal_JJ officer_NN appointed_VBN under_IN Regulation_NNP 19_CD to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ,_, or_CC from_IN any_DT illness_NN which_WDT such_JJ officer_NN suspects_NNS may_MD prove_VB to_TO be_VB plague_JJ ,_, may_MD be_VB taken_VBN to_TO such_JJ hospital_NN or_CC ward_NN or_CC observation_NN camp_NN or_CC other_JJ suitable_JJ place_NN as_IN may_MD be_VB appointed_VBN for_IN that_DT purpose_NN by_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP authority_NN of_IN the_DT port_NN or_CC place_NN ,_, and_CC detained_VBD there_EX until_IN his_PRP$ recovery_NN ,_, or_CC for_IN such_JJ period_NN ,_, not_RB exceeding_VBG ten_JJ days_NNS ,_, as_IN may_MD be_VB necessary_JJ for_IN as-_JJ certaining_VBG whether_IN his_PRP$ illness_NN is_VBZ ,_, or_CC is_VBZ not_RB ,_, plague_NN ._.

23_CD ._.

24_CD ._.

25_CD ._.
The_DT master_NN shall_MD cause_VB to_TO be_VB destroyed_VBN any_DT articles_NNS on_IN board_NN his_PRP$ vessel_NN that_WDT may_MD have_VB been_VBN soiled_VBN with_IN plague_NN discharges_NNS and_CC he_PRP shall_MD also_RB cause_VB to_TO be_VB disinfected_VBN or_CC destroyed_VBN the_DT clothing_NN and_CC bedding_NN and_CC other_JJ articles_NNS of_IN personal_JJ use_NN likely_JJ to_TO retain_VB infection_NN which_WDT are_VBP on_IN board_NN his_PRP$ vessel_NN and_CC which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN used_VBN by_IN any_DT person_NN who_WP has_VBZ suffered_VBN from_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN such_JJ vessel_NN ,_, or_CC who_WP ,_, having_VBG left_VBN such_JJ vessel_NN ,_, shall_MD have_VB suffered_VBN from_IN plague_NN during_IN the_DT stay_NN of_IN such_JJ vessel_NN in_IN the_DT port_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT master_NN shall_MD have_VB neglected_VBN to_TO do_VB so_RB ,_, or_CC have_VBP done_VBN so_RB ineffectually_RB before_IN the_DT vessel_NN arrives_VBZ in_IN port_NN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD forthwith_VB ,_, upon_IN the_DT direction_NN of_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP authority_NN or_CC the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, cause_VBP the_DT same_JJ to_TO be_VB disinfected_VBN or_CC destroyed_VBN to_TO the_DT satisfaction_NN of_IN that_DT authority_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT instructions_NNS as_IN to_TO disinfection_NN contained_VBN in_IN the_DT Appendix_NNP to_TO these_DT Regulations_NNS ._.
If_IN the_DT said_VBD master_NN neglect_NN to_TO comply_VB with_IN any_DT such_JJ directions_NNS within_IN a_DT reasonable_JJ time_NN ,_, the_DT Sanitary_NNP authority_NN or_CC the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD cause_VB the_DT same_JJ to_TO be_VB carried_VBN into_IN execution_NN at_IN the_DT expense_NN of_IN the_DT said_VBD vessel_NN ._.

IX_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
401_CD 26_CD ._.

27_CD ._.

I_PRP am_VBP to_TO make_VB the_DT following_JJ observations_NNS with_IN regard_NN to_TO two_CD of_IN the_DT rules_NNS :_: -_: (_( i_NN )_) Rule_NN 15_CD (_( 3_CD )_) provides_VBZ that_IN the_DT healthy_JJ persons_NNS on_IN board_NN an_DT infected_VBN ship_NN shall_MD ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, be_VB disembarked_VBN for_IN the-_JJ purpose_NN of_IN being_VBG kept_VBN under_IN observation_NN or_CC surveillance_NN ,_, and_CC Rule_NNP 15_CD (_( 4_CD )_) describes_VBZ the_DT manner_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT observation_NN should_MD be_VB carried_VBN out_RP on_IN shore_NN or_CC on_IN board_NN the_DT vessel_NN ._.
In_IN paragraph_JJ 11_CD of_IN my_PRP$ letter_NN No_NNP ._.
1624_CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 1st_CD June_NNP ,_, stress_NN was_VBD laid_VBN on_IN the_DT importance_NN of_IN landing_VBG the_DT persons_NNS from_IN an_DT infected_JJ ship_NN instead_RB of_IN detaining_VBG them_PRP on_IN board_NN ._.
The_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP understand_VBP that_IN Rule_NNP 15_CD (_( 3_CD )_) is_VBZ intended_VBN to_TO prohibit_VB the_DT detention_NN of_IN healthy_JJ persons_NNS on_IN board_NN an_DT infected_VBN ship_NN ,_, except_IN when_WRB ,_, through_IN stress_NN of_IN weather_NN or_CC some_DT other_JJ cause_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ absolutely_RB impossible_JJ to_TO land_VB them_PRP ._.
(_( ii_NN )_) Rule_NN 15_CD (_( 5_CD )_) authorizes_VBZ the_DT Port_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO place_VB under_IN observation_NN persons_NNS from_IN a_DT healthy_JJ or_CC suspected_JJ vessel_NN for_IN a_DT term_NN not_RB exceeding_VBG ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN in_IN port_NN ._.
This_DT authorization_NN goes_VBZ beyond_IN the_DT provisions_NNS of_IN the_DT Venice_NNP Convention_NNP ,_, which_WDT limits_VBZ the_DT medical_JJ supervision_NN of_IN the_DT crew_NN and_CC passengers_NNS of_IN a_DT healthy_JJ ship_NN to_TO ten_VB days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN departure_NN from_IN the_DT infected_JJ port_NN ._.

302_CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 4th_CD Feb-_NNP ruary_JJ 1897_CD ,_, the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP of_IN Burma_NNP is_VBZ pleased_VBN to_TO prescribe_VB as_IN a_DT temporary_JJ measure_NN ,_, the_DT following_JJ rules_NNS for_IN quarantine_NN against_IN plague_NN and_CC for_IN the_DT medical_JJ inspection_NN ,_, isolation_NN ,_, observation_NN and_CC sur-_JJ veillance_NN of_IN persons_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN ,_, or_CC suspected_VBN of_IN being_VBG infected_VBN with_IN ,_, plague_NN ._.
These_DT rules_NNS shall_MD take_VB effect_NN from_IN the_DT day_NN of_IN 1897_CD in_IN the_DT Port_NNP of_IN Rangoon_NNP ._.
I._JJ Definitions-_NNP (_( 1_CD )_) Health_NNP Officer.-In_NNP these_DT rules_NNS ``_`` Health_NNP Officer_NNP ''_'' means_VBZ the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Port_NNP of_IN Rangoon_NNP ,_, and_CC includes_VBZ an_DT Assistant_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP and_CC any_DT person_NN appointed_VBN by_IN name_NN or_CC in_IN virtue_NN of_IN his_PRP$ office_NN to_TO perform_VB the_DT duties_NNS of_IN an_DT Assistant_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) Infected_VBD ship.-Any_JJ ship_NN with_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, or_CC on_IN which_WDT one_CD or_CC more_JJR cases_NNS have_VBP taken_VBN place_NN with_IN 12_CD days_NNS before_IN her_PRP$ arrival_NN ,_, will_MD be_VB considered_VBN infected_JJ ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) Suspected_VBD ship.-Any_JJ ship_NN on_IN board_NN which_WDT there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN departure_NN ,_, or_CC during_IN the_DT voy-_JJ age_NN ,_, but_CC on_IN which_WDT no_DT fresh_JJ case_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN for_IN 12_CD days_NNS before_IN her_PRP$ arrival_NN ,_, will_MD be_VB considered_VBN suspected_JJ ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) Healthy_NNP ship.-Any_JJ ship_NN ,_, even_RB though_IN coming_VBG from_IN an_DT in-_JJ fected_JJ port_NN ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ had_VBN no_DT death_NN or_CC case_NN of_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, either_CC before_IN departure_NN ,_, during_IN the_DT voyage_NN ,_, or_CC on_IN arrival_NN ,_, will_MD be_VB considered_VBN healthy_JJ ._.
(_( 5_CD )_) Observation.-The_JJ term_NN ``_`` observation_NN ''_'' means_VBZ that_IN the_DT per-_JJ sons_NNS subjected_VBN to_TO it_PRP will_MD be_VB segregated_VBN in_IN a_DT lazaretto_NN or_CC isolation_NN camp_NNS till_IN they_PRP have_VBP obtained_VBN free_JJ pratique_NN ._.
(_( 6_CD )_) Surveillance.-The_JJ term_NN ``_`` surveillance_NN ''_'' means_VBZ that_IN the_DT persons_NNS subjected_VBN to_TO it_PRP will_MD not_RB be_VB isolated_VBN :_: they_PRP will_MD at_IN ?_. APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN 405_CD once_RB obtain_VB free_JJ pratique_NN ,_, but_CC on_IN arriving_VBG at_IN their_PRP$ destina-_JJ tion_NN they_PRP will_MD be_VB kept_VBN under_IN medical_JJ supervision_NN ._.
(_( 7_CD )_) Infected_VBD port.-Means_JJ Bombay_NNP or_CC Goa_NNP ._.
II_NNP Hoisting_NNP of_IN yellow_JJ flag.-The_JJ commander_NN of_IN every_DT vessel_NN ,_, including_VBG buggalows_NNS or_CC other_JJ native_JJ craft_NN (_( a_DT )_) arriving_VBG from_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ,_, or_CC (_( b_NN )_) having_VBG plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, or_CC (_( c_NNS )_) on_IN board_NN of_IN which_WDT one_CD or_CC more_JJR cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN have_VBP occurred_VBN within_IN 12_CD days_NNS of_IN her_PRP$ arrival_NN ,_, shall_MD ,_, on_IN arrival_NN at_IN the_DT pilot_NN station_NN ,_, hoist_VB a_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN or_CC ,_, if_IN the_DT vessel_NN arrives_VBZ at_IN night_NN ,_, show_VBP three_CD lights_NNS ,_, red_JJ ,_, white_JJ and_CC red_JJ ,_, at_IN the_DT main_JJ ,_, and_CC indi-_JJ cate_NN by_IN signal_JJ the_DT port_NN from_IN which_WDT she_PRP has_VBZ come_VBN ,_, and_CC shall_MD keep_VB up_RP such_JJ flag_NN by_IN day_NN or_CC lights_NNS by_IN night_NN and_CC signal_NN until_IN permitted_VBN in_IN writ-_JJ ing_NN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO haul_VB them_PRP down_RP ._.
The_DT pilot_NN on_IN going_VBG alongside_IN such_JJ vessel_JJ shall_MD direct_VB the_DT flag_NN or_CC lights_NNS prescribed_VBN above_IN to_TO be_VB hoisted_VBN if_IN such_JJ action_NN has_VBZ not_RB already_RB been_VBN taken_VBN ._.
*_JJ N.B.-_NNP Pilotage_NNP is_VBZ compulsory_JJ for_IN all_DT vessels_NNS over_IN 100_CD tons_NNS in_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN Rangoon_NNP ._.
III_NNP ._.
Prohibition_NN of_IN communication.-The_JJ commander_NN shall_MD not_RB ,_, without_IN first_JJ having_VBG obtained_VBN permission_NN as_IN hereinafter_NN provided_VBN ,_, allow_VB any_DT but_CC oral_JJ communication_NN with_IN the_DT shore_NN or_CC with_IN anv_JJ other_JJ vessel_NN or_CC boat_NN ,_, excepting_VBG only_RB with_IN the_DT boat_NN supply-_JJ ing_VBG the_DT pilots*_NN from_IN the_DT pilot_NN brig_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN that_DT case_NN communication_NN shall_MD be_VB limit-_JJ ed_NN to_TO receiving_VBG on_IN board_NN the_DT pilot_NN ,_, his_PRP$ servant_NN and_CC baggage_NN ._.
IV_NNP ._.
Stoppage_NN at_IN Elephant_NNP Point.-If_NNP there_EX is_VBZ any_DT case_NN of_IN sickness_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT pilot_NN has_VBZ reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ plague_JJ ,_, he_PRP shall_MD telegraph_VB to_TO the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP from_IN Elephant_NNP Point_NNP and_CC not_RB proceed_VB beyond_IN Elephant_NNP Point_NNP without_IN the_DT permission_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
V._NNP Stoppage_NNP at_IN the_DT Hastings_NNP Shoal.-If_NNP the_DT pilot_NN has_VBZ no_DT reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN there_EX is_VBZ any_DT one_CD suffering_NN from_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD bring_VB the_DT vessel_NN up_IN the_DT river_NN to_TO King_NNP 's_POS Point_NNP below_IN the_DT Hastings_NNP Shoal_NNP ,_, and_CC shall_MD anchor_VB it_PRP there_EX till_VBZ the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP has_VBZ visited_VBN it_PRP ._.
VI_NNP ._.
Inspection_NN by_IN Health_NNP Officer.-The_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, as_RB soon_RB as_IN he_PRP has_VBZ received_VBN information_NN of_IN the_DT stoppage_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN at_IN Elephant_NNP Point_NNP or_CC of_IN its_PRP$ arrival_NN at_IN King_NNP 's_POS Point_NNP below_IN the_DT Hastings_NNP Shoal_NNP ,_, shall_MD visit_VB it_PRP and_CC ascertain_VB by_IN enquiry_NN from_IN the_DT commander_NN or_CC the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, or_CC other_JJ sources_NNS of_IN information_NN ,_, whether_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG or_CC has_VBZ suffered_VBN from_IN plague_NN ._.
For_IN this_DT purpose_NN he_PRP may_MD demand_VB a_DT declaration_NN ,_, on_IN oath_NN ,_, from_IN the_DT doctor_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN ,_, or_CC ,_, failing_VBG him_PRP ,_, from_IN the_DT captain_NN ,_, that_IN there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN no_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN on_IN the_DT ship_NN since_IN her_PRP$ departure_NN ._.
VII_NNP ._.
Rules_NNS relating_VBG to_TO infected_VBN ships-_NN (_( 1_CD )_) If_IN an_DT infected_JJ ship_NN has_VBZ ,_, under_IN Rule_NNP IV_NNP ,_, been_VBN stopped_VBN at_IN Ele-_NNP phant_NN Point_NNP ,_, the_DT commander_NN shall_MD await_VB the_DT orders_NNS of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP there_RB ._.

(_( 2_CD )_) On_IN arrival_NN at_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ station_NN the_DT sick_JJ shall_MD be_VB disembarked_VBN and_CC isolated_VBN under_IN the_DT order_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) The_DT other_JJ persons_NNS on_IN board_NN (_( except_IN those_DT ,_, if_IN any_DT ,_, whose_WP$ pre-_JJ sence_NN is_VBZ necessary_JJ for_IN the_DT care_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN )_) shall_MD also_RB be_VB disembarked_VBN and_CC kept_VBN under_IN observation_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN vary-_JJ ing_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT discretion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN and_CC the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN ._.

NOTIFICATION-By_NNP the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Burma_NNP ,_, General_NNP Department_NNP ._.
In_IN exercise_NN of_IN the_DT power_NN conferred_VBN by_IN section_NN 2_CD of_IN the_DT Epidemic_NNP Diseases_NNP Act_NNP ,_, 1897_CD ,_, by_IN the_DT Notification_NNP of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP in_IN the_DT Home_NNP Department_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
302_CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 4th_CD February_NNP 1897_CD ,_, the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP of_IN Burma_NNP is_VBZ pleased_VBN to_TO prescribe_VB as_IN a_DT temporary_JJ measure_NN the_DT following_NN rules_NNS for_IN quarantine_NN against_IN plague_NN and_CC for_IN the_DT Medical_NNP inspection_NN ,_, isolation_NN ,_, observation_NN ,_, and_CC surveillance_NN of_IN persons_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN ,_, or_CC suspected_VBN of_IN being_VBG infected_VBN with_IN ,_, plague_NN ._.
These_DT rules_NNS shall_MD take_VB effect_NN from_IN the_DT 18th_CD day_NN of_IN October_NNP 1897_CD in_IN the_DT Port_NNP of_IN Rangoon_NNP ._.
I._JJ Definitions-_NNP (_( 1_CD )_) Health_NNP Officer.-In_NNP these_DT rules_NNS ``_`` Health_NNP Officer_NNP ''_'' means_VBZ the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Port_NNP of_IN Rangoon_NNP ,_, and_CC includes_VBZ an_DT Assistant_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP and_CC any_DT person_NN appointed_VBN by_IN name_NN or_CC in_IN virtue_NN of_IN his_PRP$ office_NN to_TO perform_VB the_DT duties_NNS of_IN an_DT Assist-_NNP ant_JJ Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) Infected_VBD ship.-Any_JJ ship_NN with_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, or_CC on_IN which_WDT one_CD or_CC more_JJR cases_NNS have_VBP taken_VBN place_NN within_IN 12_CD days_NNS before_IN her_PRP$ arrival_NN ,_, will_MD be_VB considered_VBN infected_JJ ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) Suspected_VBD ship.-Any_JJ ship_NN on_IN board_NN which_WDT there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN a_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN departure_NN ,_, or_CC during_IN the_DT *_JJ Notifications_NNP Nos_NNP ._.
208-210_JJ contain_NN rules_NNS for_IN Moulmein_NNP ,_, Akyab_NNP ,_, and_CC Bassein_NNP simi-_JJ lar_NN to_TO the_DT rules_NNS for_IN Rangoon_NNP ._.
They_PRP are_VBP not_RB reprinted_VBN ._.
?_. APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._. ]_NN
spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
411_CD voyage_NN ,_, but_CC on_IN which_WDT no_DT fresh_JJ case_NN has_VBZ occurred_VBN for_IN 12_CD days_NNS before_IN her_PRP$ arrival_NN ,_, will_MD be_VB considered_VBN suspected_JJ ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) Healthy_NNP ship.-Any_JJ ship_NN ,_, even_RB though_IN coming_VBG from_IN an_DT infect-_JJ ed_NN port_NN ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ had_VBN no_DT death_NN or_CC case_NN of_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, either_CC before_IN departure_NN ,_, during_IN the_DT voyage_NN ,_, or_CC on_IN arrival_NN will_MD be_VB considered_VBN healthy_JJ ._.
(_( 5_CD )_) Observation.-The_JJ term_NN ``_`` observation_NN ''_'' means_VBZ that_IN the_DT persons_NNS subjected_VBN to_TO it_PRP will_MD be_VB segregated_VBN in_IN a_DT lazaretto_NN or_CC isolation_NN camp_NNS till_IN they_PRP have_VBP obtained_VBN free_JJ pratique_NN ._.
(_( 6_CD )_) Surveillance.-The_JJ term_NN ``_`` surveillance_NN ''_'' means_VBZ that_IN the_DT per-_JJ sons_NNS subjected_VBN to_TO it_PRP will_MD not_RB be_VB isolated_VBN :_: they_PRP will_MD at_IN once_RB obtain_VB free_JJ pratique_NN ,_, but_CC on_IN arriving_VBG at_IN their_PRP$ destination_NN they_PRP will_MD be_VB kept_VBN under_IN medical_JJ supervision_NN ._.
(_( 7_CD )_) Infected_VBN port_NN means_VBZ any_DT port_NN which_WDT the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Burma_NNP may_MD declare_VB to_TO be_VB infected_VBN ._.
II_NNP ._.
Hoisting_VBG of_IN yellow_JJ flag.-The_JJ Commander_NN of_IN every_DT vessel_NN ,_, including_VBG buggalows_NNS or_CC other_JJ native_JJ craft_NN ,_, (_( a_DT )_) arriving_VBG from_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ,_, or_CC (_( b_NN )_) having_VBG plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, or_CC (_( c_NNS )_) on_IN board_NN of_IN which_WDT one_CD or_CC more_JJR cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN have_VBP occurred_VBN within_IN 12_CD days_NNS of_IN her_PRP$ arrival_NN ,_, shall_MD ,_, on_IN arrival_NN at_IN the_DT pilot_NN station_NN ,_, hoist_VB a_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN ,_, or_CC ,_, if_IN the_DT vessel_NN arrives_VBZ at_IN night_NN ,_, show_VBP three_CD lights_NNS ,_, red_JJ ,_, white_JJ ,_, and_CC red_JJ ,_, at_IN the_DT main_JJ and_CC indicate_JJ by_IN signal_VBG the_DT port_NN from_IN which_WDT she_PRP has_VBZ come_VBN ,_, and_CC shall_MD keep_VB up_RP such_JJ flag_NN by_IN day_NN or_CC lights_NNS by_IN night_NN and_CC signal_NN until_IN permitted_VBN in_IN writing_NN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO haul_VB them_PRP down_RP ._.
The_DT pilot_NN on_IN going_VBG along-_JJ side_NN such_JJ vessel_JJ shall_MD direct_VB the_DT flag_NN or_CC lights_NNS prescribed_VBN above_IN to_TO be_VB hoisted_VBN if_IN such_JJ action_NN has_VBZ not_RB already_RB been_VBN taken_VBN ._.
*_JJ N.B.-Pilotage_NN is_VBZ compulsory_JJ for_IN all_DT vessels_NNS over_IN 100_CD tons_NNS in_IN the_DT port_NN of_IN Rangoon_NNP ._.
III_NNP ._.
Prohibition_NN of_IN communication.-The_JJ Commander_NNP shall_MD not_RB ,_, without_IN first_JJ having_VBG obtained_VBN permission_NN as_IN hereinafter_NN provided_VBN ,_, allow_VB any_DT but_CC oral_JJ communication_NN with_IN the_DT shore_NN or_CC with_IN any_DT other_JJ vessel_NN or_CC boat_NN ,_, excepting_VBG only_RB with_IN the_DT boat_NN supplying_VBG the_DT pilots*_NN from_IN the_DT pilot_NN brig_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN that_DT case_NN communica-_JJ tion_NN shall_MD be_VB limited_VBN to_TO receiving_VBG on_IN board_NN the_DT pilot_NN ,_, his_PRP$ servant_NN ,_, and_CC baggage_NN ._.
IV_NNP ._.
Stoppage_NN at_IN Elephant_NNP Point.-If_NNP there_EX is_VBZ any_DT case_NN of_IN sickness_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT pilot_NN has_VBZ reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ plague_JJ ,_, he_PRP shall_MD telegraph_VB to_TO the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP from_IN Elephant_NNP Point_NNP and_CC not_RB proceed_VB beyond_IN Elephant_NNP Point_NNP without_IN the_DT permission_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP V._NNP Stoppage_NNP at_IN the_DT Hastings_NNP Shoal.-If_NNP the_DT pilot_NN has_VBZ no_DT reason_NN to_TO believe_VB that_IN there_EX is_VBZ any_DT one_CD suffering_NN from_IN plague_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD bring_VB the_DT vessel_NN up_IN the_DT river_NN to_TO King_NNP 's_POS Point_NNP below_IN the_DT Hastings_NNP Shoal_NNP ,_, and_CC shall_MD anchor_VB it_PRP there_EX till_VBZ the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP has_VBZ visited_VBN it_PRP ._.

VI_NNP ._.
Inspection_NN by_IN Health_NNP Officer.-The_NNP Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, as_RB soon_RB as_IN he_PRP has_VBZ received_VBN information_NN of_IN the_DT stoppage_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN at_IN Elephant_NNP Point_NNP or_CC of_IN its_PRP$ arrival_NN at_IN King_NNP 's_POS Point_NNP below_IN the_DT Hastings_NNP Shoal_NNP ,_, shall_MD visit_VB it_PRP and_CC ascertain_VB by_IN enquiry_NN from_IN the_DT Commander_NNP or_CC the_DT Medical_JJ Officer_NNP on_IN board_NN ,_, or_CC other_JJ sources_NNS of_IN information_NN ,_, whether_IN any_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN is_VBZ suffering_VBG or_CC has_VBZ suffered_VBN from_IN plague_NN ._.
For_IN this_DT purpose_NN he_PRP may_MD demand_VB a_DT declaration_NN ,_, on_IN oath_NN ,_, from_IN the_DT Doctor_NNP of_IN the_DT ship_NN ,_, or_CC failing_VBG him_PRP ,_, from_IN the_DT Captain_NNP ,_, that_IN there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN no_DT case_NN of_IN plague_NN on_IN the_DT ship_NN since_IN her_PRP$ departure_NN ._.
VII_NNP ._.
Rules_NNS relating_VBG to_TO infected_VBN ships.-_NN (_( 1_CD )_) If_IN an_DT infected_JJ ship_NN has_VBZ ,_, under_IN Rule_NNP IV_NNP ,_, been_VBN stopped_VBN at_IN Ele-_NNP phant_NN Point_NNP ,_, the_DT Commander_NNP shall_MD await_VB the_DT orders_NNS of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP there_RB ._.
If_IN under_IN Rule_NNP V_NNP the_DT ship_NN has_VBZ been_VBN brought_VBN up_RP to_TO King_NNP 's_POS Point_NNP below_IN the_DT Hastings_NNP Shoal_NNP ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD direct_VB the_DT Commander_NNP to_TO take_VB her_PRP to_TO the_DT sanitary_JJ station_NN at_IN Elephant_NNP Point_NNP ,_, or_CC elsewhere_RB as_IN may_MD be_VB appointed_VBN by_IN Government_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO await_VB orders_NNS there_RB ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) On_IN arrival_NN at_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ station_NN the_DT sick_JJ shall_MD be_VB disembarked_VBN and_CC isolated_VBN under_IN the_DT order_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) The_DT other_JJ persons_NNS on_IN board_NN (_( except_IN those_DT ,_, if_IN any_DT ,_, whose_WP$ pre-_JJ sence_NN is_VBZ necessary_JJ for_IN the_DT care_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN )_) shall_MD also_RB be_VB disembarked_VBN and_CC kept_VBN under_IN observation_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN vary-_JJ ing_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT discretion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN and_CC the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN ._.
Such_JJ period_NN shall_MD not_RB exceed_VB ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN ,_, whether_IN that_DT occurred_VBD on_IN board_NN ship_NN or_CC during_IN the_DT period_NN of_IN observation_NN on_IN shore_NN ._.
The_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD at_IN his_PRP$ discretion_NN allow_IN such_JJ persons_NNS to_TO proceed_VB to_TO their_PRP$ destination_NN on_IN their_PRP$ giving_VBG a_DT written_VBN undertaking_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT form_NN of_IN Appendix_NNP I_PRP ,_, to_TO submit_VB themselves_PRP to_TO surveillance_VB by_IN a_DT Medical_JJ Officer_NNP appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN at_IN their_PRP$ destination_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN ._.
The_DT undertaking_NN shall_MD be_VB executed_VBN in_IN duplicate_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD copy_NN shall_MD be_VB sent_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP concerned_VBD ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) The_DT soiled_JJ linen_NN and_CC personal_JJ effects_NNS of_IN the_DT crew_NN and_CC passen-_JJ gers_NNS ,_, which_WDT in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD be_VB considered_VBN as_IN infected_JJ ,_, shall_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT rules_NNS contained_VBN in_IN Appendix_NNP II_NNP ._.
(_( 5_CD )_) The_DT bilge-water_JJ shall_MD be_VB pumped_VBN out_RP by_IN the_DT Commander_NNP after_IN disinfection_NN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP and_CC good_JJ ?_. APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._. ]_NN
Spread_NN of_IN infection_NN by_IN sea_NN ._.
413_CD drinking_NN water_NN shall_MD be_VB substituted_VBN by_IN the_DT Commander_NNP for_IN the_DT water_NN stored_VBD on_IN board_NN ._.
(_( 6_CD )_) All_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT ship_NN which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN inhabited_VBN by_IN plague-_JJ patients_NNS shall_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT ship_NN may_MD also_RB be_VB disinfected_VBN at_IN the_DT dis-_JJ cretion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
(_( 7_CD )_) When_WRB these_DT rules_NNS have_VBP been_VBN fully_RB complied_VBN with_IN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD ,_, by_IN an_DT order_NN in_IN writing_VBG under_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB delivered_VBN to_TO the_DT Commander_NNP ,_, permit_VBP the_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN to_TO be_VB hauled_VBN down_RP ._.
VIII_NNP ._.
Rules_NNS relating_VBG to_TO suspected_VBN ships.-_NN (_( 1_CD )_) If_IN a_DT suspected_JJ ship_NN has_VBZ under_IN Rule_NNP IV_NNP been_VBN stopped_VBN at_IN Ele-_NNP phant_NN Point_NN ,_, she_PRP will_MD await_VB the_DT orders_NNS of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP there_RB ._.
If_IN under_IN Rule_NNP V_NNP she_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN brought_VBN up_RP to_TO King_NNP 's_POS Point_NNP below_IN the_DT Hastings_NNP Shoal_NNP ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP will_MD go_VB on_IN board_NN of_IN her_PRP$ there_EX ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) The_DT passengers_NNS and_CC crew_VB shall_MD be_VB medically_RB inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) The_DT soiled_JJ linen_NN and_CC personal_JJ effects_NNS of_IN the_DT passengers_NNS and_CC crew_NN ,_, which_WDT in_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP may_MD be_VB considered_VBN as_IN infected_JJ ,_, shall_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT rules_NNS contained_VBN in_IN Appendix_NNP II_NNP ._.
(_( 4_CD )_) The_DT bilge-water_JJ shall_MD be_VB pumped_VBN out_RP by_IN the_DT Commander_NNP after_IN disinfection_NN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP and_CC good_JJ drinking_NN water_NN shall_MD be_VB substituted_VBN be_VB the_DT Commander_NNP for_IN the_DT water_NN stored_VBD on_IN board_NN ._.
(_( 5_CD )_) All_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT ship_NN which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN inhabited_VBN by_IN plague-_JJ patients_NNS shall_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT other_JJ parts_NNS of_IN the_DT ship_NN may_MD also_RB be_VB disinfected_VBN at_IN the_DT dis-_JJ cretion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
(_( 6_CD )_) Passengers_NNPS or_CC members_NNS of_IN the_DT crew_NN who_WP are_VBP suspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO be_VB infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN may_MD be_VB disem-_JJ barked_VBN and_CC detained_VBN under_IN observation_NN at_IN the_DT observation_NN station_NN appointed_VBN by_IN Government_NNP for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN arrival_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN ,_, or_CC ,_, if_IN plague_JJ occurs_NN among_IN them_PRP while_IN under_IN observation_NN ,_, from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN ._.
(_( 7_CD )_) The_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT crew_NN shall_MD not_RB land_VB ,_, except_IN on_IN duty_NN ,_, for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN ._.
(_( 8_CD )_) Passengers_NNS who_WP are_VBP passed_VBN on_IN medical_JJ inspection_NN as_IN healthy_JJ shall_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO proceed_VB to_TO their_PRP$ destination_NN on_IN their_PRP$ ?_. 414_CD Measures_NNPS to_TO prevent_VB the_DT [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
giving_VBG a_DT written_VBN undertaking_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT form_NN annexed_NN ,_, to_TO sub-_JJ mit_NN themselves_PRP to_TO surveillance_VB by_IN the_DT Medical_JJ Officer_NNP (_( if_IN any_DT )_) appointed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN at_IN their_PRP$ destination_NN for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN ._.

(_( 9_CD )_) When_WRB these_DT rules_NNS have_VBP been_VBN fully_RB complied_VBN with_IN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD ,_, by_IN an_DT order_NN in_IN writing_VBG under_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB delivered_VBN to_TO the_DT Commander_NNP ,_, permit_VBP the_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN to_TO be_VB hauled_VBN down_RP ._.
IX_NNP ._.
Rules_NNS relating_VBG to_TO healthy_JJ ships.-_NN (_( 1_CD )_) A_DT healthy_JJ ship_NN shall_MD be_VB given_VBN free_JJ pratique_NN at_IN once_RB ,_, what-_JJ ever_RB may_MD be_VB the_DT nature_NN of_IN her_PRP$ bill-of-health_NN ._.
(_( 2_CD )_) Such_PDT a_DT ship_NN may_MD ,_, at_IN the_DT discretion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, be_VB subjected_VBN to_TO the_DT measures_NNS prescribed_VBN in_IN Rules_NNP VIII_NNP (_( 2_CD )_) ,_, VIII_NNP (_( 3_CD )_) ,_, and_CC VIII_NNP (_( 4_CD )_) ,_, but_CC the_DT ship_NN itself_PRP may_MD not_RB be_VB disinfected_VBN as_IN in_IN Rule_NNP VIII_NNP (_( 5_CD )_) ,_, except_IN with_IN the_DT consent_NN of_IN the_DT Commander_NNP or_CC Agent_NNP ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) Passengers_NNPS or_CC members_NNS of_IN the_DT crew_NN who_WP ,_, on_IN medical_JJ inspec-_JJ tion_NN are_VBP suspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO be_VB infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN may_MD be_VB disembarked_VBN and_CC detained_VBN under_IN observation_NN at_IN the_DT observation_NN station_NN appointed_VBN by_IN Gov-_NNP ernment_NN for_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT ship_NN left_VBD an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ,_, or_CC ,_, if_IN plague_JJ occurs_NN among_IN them_PRP while_IN under_IN observation_NN ,_, from_IN the_DT date_NN of_IN the_DT last_JJ case_NN ._.

(_( 5_CD )_) The_DT crew_NN and_CC passengers_NNS may_MD ,_, at_IN the_DT discretion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, be_VB subjected_VBN to_TO surveillance_VB in_IN the_DT manner_NN described_VBD in_IN Rule_NNP VIII_NNP (_( 8_CD )_) for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN the_DT date_NN on_IN which_WDT the_DT ship_NN left_VBD an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ._.
(_( 6_CD )_) None_NN of_IN the_DT above_JJ measures_NNS shall_MD be_VB taken_VBN when_WRB the_DT ship_NN has_VBZ been_VBN given_VBN free_JJ pratique_NN at_IN Colombo_NNP or_CC other_JJ inter-_JJ mediate_NN port_NN ._.
(_( 7_CD )_) When_WRB these_DT rules_NNS have_VBP been_VBN fully_RB complied_VBN with_IN ,_, the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP shall_MD ,_, by_IN an_DT order_NN in_IN writing_VBG under_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB delivered_VBN to_TO the_DT Commander_NNP ,_, permit_VBP the_DT yellow_JJ flag_NN to_TO be_VB hauled_VBN down_RP ._.

Crowded_VBN and_CC insanitary_JJ ships.-Crowded_JJ ships_NNS ,_, ships_NNS carry-_VBP ing_VBG emigrants_NNS or_CC return_NN pilgrims_NNS ,_, and_CC ships_NNS which_WDT appear_VBP to_TO be_VB in_IN an_DT insanitary_JJ state_NN ,_, may_MD ,_, at_IN the_DT discretion_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, be_VB treat-_JJ ed_NN as_IN suspected_VBN ships_NNS under_IN Rule_NNP VIII_NNP ._.
XII_NN ._.
Right_NNP of_IN ship_NN to_TO put_VB back_RB to_TO sea.-Any_JJ ship_NN objecting_VBG to_TO submit_VB to_TO the_DT obligations_NNS imposed_VBN by_IN these_DT rules_NNS shall_MD be_VB permitted_VBN to_TO put_VB back_RB to_TO sea_NN ._.
Such_JJ objection_NN shall_MD be_VB notified_VBN on_IN or_CC before_IN arriving_VBG at_IN Elephant_NNP Point_NNP ._.
XIII_NN ._.
Rules_NNS applying_VBG to_TO ships_NNS claiming_VBG right_RB to_TO put_VB back_RB to_TO sea.-_NN Ships_NNP which_WDT claim_VBP the_DT right_NN to_TO put_VB back_RB to_TO sea_NN ,_, but_CC desire_NN to_TO disembark_VB passengers_NNS or_CC land_NN goods_NNS ,_, shall_MD submit_VB to_TO the_DT rules_NNS relating_VBG to_TO suspected_VBN ships_NNS ._.
XIV_NN ._.
Provisions_NNS and_CC stores.-It_JJ shall_MD be_VB the_DT duty_NN of_IN the_DT Port_NNP Officer_NNP to_TO facilitate_VB the_DT conveyance_NN to_TO all_DT vessels_NNS in_IN quarantine_NN of_IN such_JJ supplies_NNS of_IN provisions_NNS ,_, stores_NNS ,_, and_CC other_JJ articles_NNS as_IN may_MD be_VB required_VBN by_IN those_DT on_IN board_NN ._.
Such_JJ supplies_NNS shall_MD be_VB placed_VBN on_IN the_DT boats_NNS of_IN the_DT vessel_NN in_IN quarantine_NN ,_, to_TO be_VB subsequently_RB removed_VBN by_IN members_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ crews_NNS ._.
APPENDIX_NNP I._NN I_PRP (_( name_NN )_) of_IN (_( place_NN )_) do_VBP hereby_RB declare_VB that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ my_PRP$ intention_NN at_IN once_RB to_TO proceed_VB to_TO (_( place_NN )_) ,_, and_CC agree_VBP to_TO submit_VB myself_PRP to_TO medical_JJ supervi-_JJ sion_NN by_IN (_( name_NN or_CC office_NN of_IN Medical_NNP Officer_NNP appointed_VBD for_IN the_DT purpose_NN )_) for_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN ten_JJ days_NNS from_IN (_( date_NN from_IN which_WDT period_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB reckoned_VBN )_) ._.
Signed_VBN In_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN Health_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
APPENDIX_NNP II_NNP ._.
Instruction_NN for_IN disinfection_NN ._.
1_CD ._.
Personal_JJ effects_NNS ,_, rags_NNS ,_, infected_VBN bandages_NNS ,_, papers_NNS ,_, and_CC other_JJ articles_NNS without_IN value_NN should_MD be_VB destroyed_VBN by_IN fire_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
Under-clothing_NN ,_, bedding_NN ,_, wearing_VBG apparel_NN ,_, mattresses_NNS ,_, carpets_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, which_WDT are_VBP contaminated_VBN or_CC suspected_VBN ,_, should_MD be_VB disinfected_VBN in_IN stoves_NNS at_IN normal_JJ pressure_NN or_CC at_IN a_DT pressure_NN of_IN from_IN one_CD and-a-half_NN to_TO two_CD degrees_NNS ,_, with_IN or_CC without_IN the_DT presence_NN of_IN steam_NN ._.
Before_IN a_DT stove_NN is_VBZ passed_VBN as_IN efficient_NN for_IN the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN disinfection_NN ,_, it_PRP should_MD be_VB subjected_VBN to_TO a_DT test_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT aid_NN of_IN a_DT signal_JJ thermometer_NN ,_, -_: showing_VBG the_DT moment_NN when_WRB the_DT temperature_NN in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN a_DT mattress_NN rises_VBZ to_TO at_IN least_JJS 100_CD (_( centigrade_NN )_) ._.

Special_JJ instructions_NNS to_TO be_VB observed_VBN in_IN the_DT employment_NN of_IN dis-_JJ infecting_VBG solutions.-The_JJ linen_NN ,_, clothing_NN ,_, and_CC articles_NNS soiled_VBN by_IN the_DT excreta_NN of_IN patients_NNS should_MD be_VB soaked_VBN in_IN the_DT solution_NN of_IN corrosive_JJ subli-_JJ mate_NN ._.

of_IN alcohol_NN ._.

*_NN To_TO get_VB very_RB strong_JJ slaked_VBD lime_JJ take_NN lime_NN of_IN good_JJ quality_NN ,_, slake_VB it_PRP ,_, by_IN moistening_VBG it_PRP gradually_RB with_IN half_PDT its_PRP$ weight_NN of_IN water_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT operation_NN is_VBZ completed_VBN ,_, put_VBD the_DT powder_NN in_IN a_DT carefully-corked_JJ receptacle_NN and_CC place_NN it_PRP in_IN a_DT dry_JJ spot_NN ._.
As_IN each_DT kilogramme_NN of_IN lime_JJ absorbs_JJ 500_CD grammes_NNS of_IN water_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO become_VB slack_NN ,_, it_PRP acquires_VBZ a_DT volume_NN of_IN 2_CD litres_NNS 200_CD and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ sufficient_JJ to_TO dilate_VB it_PRP with_IN double_JJ its_PRP$ volume_NN of_IN water_NN ,_, say_VBP ,_, 4_CD kilo-_JJ grammes_NNS 400_CD grammes_NNS to_TO obtain_VB a_DT whitewash_NN which_WDT will_MD be_VB of_IN about_RB 20_CD per_IN cent_NN ,_, strength_NN of_IN lime_NN ._.

Punjab_JJ Government_NNP has_VBZ raised_VBN question_NN whether_IN import_NN of_IN grain_NN into_IN Punjab_NNP from_IN Sind_NNP or_CC Sukkur_NNP should_MD be_VB prohibited_VBN ._.

Punjab_JJ Government_NNP has_VBZ raised_VBN question_NN whether_IN import_NN of_IN grain_NN into_IN Punjab_NNP from_IN Sind_NNP or_CC Sukkur_NNP should_MD be_VB prohibited_VBN in_IN view_NN of_IN indi-_JJ genous_JJ cases_NNS having_VBG occurred_VBN at_IN Sukkur_NNP and_CC in_IN Sind_NNP ._.
Government_NN of_IN India_NNP have_VBP replied_VBN that_IN it_PRP would_MD be_VB very_RB serious_JJ matter_NN to_TO prohibit_VB import_NN and_CC that_IN the_DT trade_NN does_VBZ not_RB add_VB sufficiently_RB to_TO danger_NN of_IN spread_NN of_IN infection_NN to_TO make_VB it_PRP necessary_JJ to_TO incur_VB evils_NNS that_WDT would_MD result_VB from_IN stopping_VBG it_PRP ._.
Bombay_JJ Government_NNP have_VBP been_VBN asked_VBN to_TO take_VB all_DT possible_JJ precautions_NNS to_TO prevent_VB contaminated_JJ grain_NN being_VBG exported_VBN from_IN Sind_NNP ;_: in_IN especial_JJ to_TO adopt_VB measures_NNS to_TO obtain_VB immediate_JJ information_NN of_IN any_DT plague_NN cases_NNS in_IN or_CC near_IN grain_NN godowns_NNS and_CC to_TO prevent_VB removal_NN of_IN grain_NN open_JJ to_TO suspicion_NN of_IN contamination_NN ._.

In_IN continuation_NN of_IN my_PRP$ letter_NN No_NNP ._.
341_CD ,_, dated_VBD 11th_CD instant_NN ,_, I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honour_NN to_TO state_NN that_WDT for_IN the_DT week_NN ending_VBG 15th_CD March_NNP 1897_CD fifteen_NN fresh_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN have_VBP occurred_VBN ,_, making_VBG a_DT total_NN of_IN 29_CD from_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT outbreak_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT 22_CD have_VBP proved_VBN fatal_JJ and_CC 7_CD are_VBP under_IN treatment_NN at_IN the_DT Contagious_JJ Landhies_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.
Of_IN the_DT 15_CD fresh_JJ cases_NNS ,_, there_EX is_VBZ distinct_JJ evidence_NN that_IN 13_CD either_CC had_VBD communication_NN with_IN ,_, or_CC resided_VBN in_IN ,_, the_DT infected_JJ area_NN mentioned_VBN in_IN my_PRP$ last_JJ weekly_JJ report_NN ;_: of_IN the_DT remaining_VBG 2_CD cases_NNS ,_, no_DT reliable_JJ in-_JJ formation_NN could_MD be_VB obtained_VBN from_IN one_CD ,_, as_IN the_DT patient_NN was_VBD found_VBN migrating_VBG to_TO a_DT village_NN on_IN foot_NN ,_, and_CC ,_, when_WRB arrested_VBN by_IN the_DT police_NN ,_, was_VBD semi-delirious_JJ ,_, the_DT other_JJ case_NN showing_VBG no_DT direct_JJ signs_NNS of_IN infection_NN ,_, beyond_IN the_DT fact_NN that_IN two_CD cases_NNS had_VBD previously_RB occurred_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ neigh-_JJ bourhood_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT following_JJ few_JJ facts_NNS may_MD prove_VB interesting_VBG in_IN proving_VBG how_WRB the_DT disease_NN ,_, once_RB localised_VBN ,_, infects_VBZ the_DT neighbourhood_NN ._.
When_WRB the_DT disease_NN first_RB began_VBD to_TO establish_VB itself_PRP in_IN Sukkar_NNP ,_, it_PRP was_VBD reported_VBN by_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Inspector_NNP that_IN several_JJ dead_JJ rats_NNS were_VBD fre-_JJ quently_RB being_VBG found_VBN outside_IN a_DT Hindu_NNP temple_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO which_WDT there_EX was_VBD a_DT well_RB adjoining_NN ,_, at_IN the_DT entrance_NN of_IN Gunga_NNP Lane_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT disease_NN first_RB took_VBD root_NN ._.
I_PRP investigated_VBD the_DT place_NN several_JJ times_NNS ,_, and_CC though_IN I_PRP saw_VBD several_JJ rats_NNS in_IN the_DT act_NN of_IN drinking_NN water_NN from_IN the_DT drain_NN which_WDT communicates_VBZ with_IN this_DT sacred_VBN well_RB ,_, I_PRP never_RB witnessed_VBD any_DT of_IN them_PRP dying_VBG or_CC dead_JJ ,_, as_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Inspector_NNP assured_VBD me_PRP he_PRP had_VBD seen_VBN them_PRP come_VB out_RB and_CC drink_VB ,_, and_CC while_IN in_IN the_DT act_NN of_IN drinking_VBG get_VB con-_JJ vulsed_JJ and_CC die_NN ._.
I_PRP interviewed_VBD the_DT Head_NNP Fakir_NNP on_IN each_DT occasion_NN ,_, and_CC as_IN there_EX was_VBD a_DT godown_NN in_IN which_WDT grain_NN was_VBD stored_VBN just_RB behind_IN this_DT temple_NN ,_, I_PRP was_VBD led_VBN to_TO believe_VB that_IN the_DT rats_NNS found_VBD their_PRP$ way_NN to_TO this_DT well_NN from_IN the_DT godown_NN ._.
However_RB ,_, I_PRP reported_VBD the_DT matter_NN to_TO the_DT Collector_NNP on_IN the_DT 4th_CD instant_NN ,_, immediately_RB on_IN his_PRP$ arrival_NN in_IN Sukkur_NNP ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD arranged_VBN to_TO force_VB open_VB the_DT godown_NN that_IN evening_VBG (_( as_IN the_DT owners_NNS had_VBD deserted_VBN )_) ,_, with_IN the_DT result_NN that_WDT beyond_IN a_DT certain_JJ amount_NN of_IN ordinary_JJ accumulation_NN of_IN dust_NN ,_, the_DT godown_NN was_VBD found_VBN practically_RB clean_JJ and_CC free_JJ from_IN all_DT insanitary_JJ defects_NNS ._.
About_IN five_CD days_NNS subsequent_NN to_TO this_DT it_PRP was_VBD reported_VBN that_IN this_DT Head_NNP Fakir_NNP had_VBD deserted_VBN to_TO a_DT village_NN about_IN 10_CD miles_NNS out_IN of_IN Sukkur_NNP and_CC died_VBD suddenly_RB the_DT day_NN after_IN his_PRP$ arrival_NN there_RB ;_: this_DT naturally_RB excited_VBN suspicion_NN and_CC the_DT temple_NN was_VBD closely_RB watched_VBN ._.
On_IN the_DT morning_NN of_IN the_DT 11th_CD ,_, it_PRP was_VBD reported_VBN to_TO me_PRP ,_, sub_JJ rosa_NN ,_, that_IN a_DT man_NN was_VBD lying_VBG ill_RB in_IN this_DT very_RB temple_JJ ._.
I_PRP accordingly_RB forced_VBD my_PRP$ way_NN in_IN and_CC found_VBD such_JJ to_TO be_VB the_DT case_NN ._.
I_PRP met_VBD with_IN some_DT opposi-_JJ tion_NN ,_, but_CC was_VBD able_JJ to_TO force_VB my_PRP$ way_NN into_IN every_DT room_NN and_CC found_VBD 2_CD men_NNS ?_. APP_NNP ._.
X_NN ._. ]_VB
infection_NN by_IN merchandise_NN and_CC food-stuffs_NNS ._.
427_CD concealed_VBN in_IN different_JJ rooms_NNS ,_, one_CD plague-stricken_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT other_JJ ,_, who_WP was_VBD evidently_RB the_DT next_JJ representative_NN of_IN the_DT temple_NN ,_, concealing_VBG himself_PRP through_IN fright_NN ,_, but_CC apparently_RB in_IN good_JJ health_NN ._.
I_PRP had_VBD the_DT two_CD plague_NN cases_NNS at_IN once_RB removed_VBN to_TO the_DT Contagious_NNP Landhi_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT other_JJ man_NN to_TO the_DT Health_NNP Camp_NNP ;_: a_DT fourth_JJ man_NN had_VBD in_IN the_DT meantime_NN escaped_VBD ,_, but_CC he_PRP was_VBD found_VBN two_CD days_NNS after_IN and_CC removed_VBD in_IN a_DT critical_JJ condition_NN to_TO the_DT Contagious_NNP Landhi_NNP ._.
I_PRP then_RB drove_VBD off_RB to_TO the_DT Collector_NNP and_CC he_PRP very_RB kindly_RB returned_VBN with_IN me_PRP and_CC ,_, at_IN my_PRP$ suggestion_NN ,_, ordered_VBD the_DT whole_JJ building_NN to_TO be_VB destroyed_VBN and_CC burnt_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT well_NN to_TO be_VB closed_VBN ,_, after_IN having_VBG the_DT value_NN properly_RB assessed_VBN ._.
The_DT three_CD patients_NNS removed_VBD to_TO the_DT Contagious_NNP Landhi_NNP died_VBD as_RB well_RB as_IN the_DT headman_NN who_WP was_VBD sent_VBN to_TO the_DT Health_NNP Camp_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN demolishing_VBG the_DT building_NN ,_, no_DT fewer_JJR than_IN 35_CD dead_JJ rats_NNS were_VBD removed_VBN ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN the_DT 5_CD inmates_NNS ,_, including_VBG the_DT man_NN who_WP died_VBD in_IN the_DT village_NN outside_IN of_IN Sukkur_NNP ,_, were_VBD exterminated_VBN within_IN 10_CD days_NNS ._.
The_DT conclusion_NN one_CD is_VBZ apt_JJ to_TO draw_VB from_IN this_DT is_VBZ that_IN the_DT infection_NN prob-_NN ably_RB first_JJ began_VBD in_IN this_DT temple_NN and_CC that_IN it_PRP was_VBD a_DT perfect_JJ hotbed_NN of_IN infection_NN ,_, as_IN all_PDT the_DT Hindus_NNP from_IN Gunga_NNP Lane_NNP and_CC other_JJ lanes_NNS in_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN were_VBD in_IN the_DT habit_NN of_IN congregating_VBG and_CC worshipping_VBG in_IN this_DT temple_NN ,_, but_CC that_IN they_PRP managed_VBD to_TO conceal_VB the_DT danger_NN from_IN us_PRP until_IN suspicions_NNS were_VBD aroused_VBN by_IN the_DT Head_NNP Fakir_NNP 's_POS death_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ now_RB evident_JJ that_IN these_DT rats_NNS were_VBD being_VBG poisoned_VBN from_IN the_DT neighbour-_JJ hood_NN of_IN the_DT temple_NN and_CC not_RB from_IN the_DT adjoining_VBG grain_NN godown_NN to_TO which_WDT our_PRP$ suspicions_NNS first_RB pointed_VBD ._.

Arrivals_NNS from_IN Indian_JJ infected_VBN ports_NNS were_VBD treated_VBN under_IN the_DT ``_`` General_JJ Regulations_NNPS as_IN to_TO Cholera_NNP ,_, Yellow_NNP Fever_NNP and_CC Plague_NNP ``_`` issued_VBN by_IN the_DT Local_NNP Gov-_NNP ernment_NNP Board_NNP on_IN the_DT 9th_CD November_NNP 1896_CD ._.
The_DT following_NN is_VBZ the_DT purport_NN of_IN these_DT Regulations_NNS :_: -_: The_DT customs-officer_JJ shall_MD visit_VB the_DT ship_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN he_PRP suspects_VBZ that_IN the_DT ship_NN is_VBZ infected_VBN or_CC has_VBZ come_VBN from_IN an_DT infected_JJ place_NN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD require_VB the_DT master_NN or_CC surgeon_NN to_TO state_NN whether_IN there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN any_DT case_NN or_CC suspected_VBN case_NN of_IN plague_NN ,_, etc._FW ,_, on_IN board_NN ._.
If_IN he_PRP finds_VBZ or_CC has_VBZ reason_NN to_TO suspect_VB that_IN the_DT ship_NN is_VBZ infected_VBN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD detain_VB the_DT ship_NN and_CC inform_VB the_DT sanitary_JJ authority_NN of_IN the_DT port_NN ._.
Sanitary_JJ authorities_NNS of_IN ports_NNS shall_MD fix_VB moorings_NNS for_IN infected_JJ ships_NNS and_CC make_VB provision_NN for_IN the_DT re-_JJ ception_NN of_IN persons_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ,_, etc_FW ._.
On_IN receiving_VBG notice_NN from_IN the_DT customs-officer_NN the_DT sani-_JJ tary_JJ authority_NN shall_MD cause_VB the_DT ship_NN to_TO be_VB inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN Health_NNP ._.
The_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN Health_NNP may_MD also_RB examine_VB any_DT ship_NN which_WDT he_PRP has_VBZ reason_NN to_TO suspect_VB to_TO be_VB infected_VBN or_CC to_TO come_VB from_IN an_DT infected_JJ port_NN ._.
The_DT detention_NN by_IN the_DT cus-_JJ toms-officer_JJ shall_MD cease_VB as_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT vessel_NN has_VBZ been_VBN examined_VBN by_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN ,_, or_CC if_IN the_DT ship_NN is_VBZ infected_VBN ,_, as_RB soon_RB as_IN she_PRP is_VBZ anchored_VBN at_IN the_DT mooring_NN appointed_VBN for_IN infected_JJ ships_NNS ._.
If_IN the_DT medical_JJ officer_NN finds_VBZ the_DT ship_NN to_TO be_VB infected_VBN ,_, he_PRP shall_MD give_VB a_DT certificate_NN to_TO that_DT effect_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT master_NN shall_MD then_RB moor_VB the_DT ship_NN at_IN the_DT appointed_JJ anchorage_NN ._.
No_DT one_CD shall_MD then_RB leave_VB the_DT ship_NN until_IN the_DT detailed_JJ examination_NN is_VBZ completed_VBN ._.
The_DT medical_JJ officer_NN shall_MD examine_VB every_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN ,_, and_CC if_IN he_PRP finds_VBZ or_CC suspects_VBZ any_DT one_CD to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN plague_NN ,_, etc._NN ,_, shall_MD give_VB a_DT certificate_NN to_TO that_DT effect_NN with_IN respect_NN to_TO such_JJ person_NN ._.

All_DT arrivals_NNS from_IN healthy_JJ Indian_JJ ports_NNS with_IN clean_JJ bill-of-health_NN admitted_VBD to_TO free_JJ pratique_NN ._.

No_DT re-_JJ laxations_NNS in_IN the_DT rules_NNS allowed_VBN in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN vessels_NNS previously_RB calling_VBG at_IN other_JJ ports_NNS ._.

2._CD of_IN the_DT United_NNP Kingdom_NNP as_IN to_TO Cholera_NNP ,_, Yellow_NNP Fever_NNP ,_, and_CC Plague_NNP ._.
To_TO all_DT port_NN Sanitary_NNP authorities_NNS ;_: To_TO all_DT other_JJ Sanitary_NNP authorities_NNS as_IN herein_NN defined_VBD ;_: To_TO the_DT Queen_NNP 's_POS Harbour_NNP masters_NNS of_IN dockyard_NN ports_NNS ;_: To_TO all_DT officers_NNS of_IN Customs_NNS ;_: To_TO all_DT medical_JJ officers_NNS of_IN health_NN of_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP authorities_NNS aforesaid_VBD ;_: To_TO all_DT masters_NNS of_IN ships_NNS ;_: To_TO all_DT pilots_NNS ;_: And_CC to_TO all_DT others_NNS whom_WP it_PRP may_MD concern_NN ._.
