459_CD Provided_VBD that_IN the_DT Regulations_NNPS shall_MD be_VB subject_JJ to_TO the_DT con-_JJ sent-_NN (_( a_DT )_) so_RB far_RB as_IN they_PRP apply_VBP to_TO the_DT officers_NNS of_IN Customs_NNP ,_, of_IN the_DT Commissioners_NNP of_IN Her_NNP Majesty_NNP 's_POS Customs_NNP ;_: and_CC (_( b_NN )_) so_RB far_RB as_IN they_PRP apply_VBP to_TO officers_NNS or_CC men_NNS employed_VBN in_IN the_DT coastguard_NN of_IN the_DT Admiralty_NNP ;_: and_CC (_( c_NN )_) so_RB far_RB as_IN they_PRP apply_VBP to_TO signals_NNS ,_, of_IN the_DT Board_NNP of_IN Trade_NNP ._.
And_CC whereas_NNS by_IN certain_JJ Orders_NNS ,_, dated_VBD respectively_RB the_DT 28th_JJ day_NN of_IN August_NNP ,_, 1890_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT 6th_CD day_NN of_IN September_NNP ,_, 1892_CD ,_, we_PRP made_VBD Regu-_NNP lations_NNS with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO the_DT treatment_NN of_IN persons_NNS affected_VBN with_IN cholera_NN ,_, and_CC for_IN preventing_VBG the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ expedient_JJ that_IN such_JJ Orders_NNS should_MD be_VB revoked_VBN ,_, and_CC that_IN Regulations_NNP should_MD be_VB made_VBN as_IN hereinafter_NN mentioned_VBD ,_, to_TO which_WDT the_DT Commissioners_NNPS of_IN Her_NNP Majesty_NNP 's_POS Customs_NNP and_CC the_DT Board_NNP of_IN Trade_NNP have_VBP respectively_RB signified_VBN their_PRP$ consent_NN so_RB far_RB as_IN such_JJ Regulations_NNS respectively_RB apply_VBP to_TO the_DT Officers_NNP of_IN Customs_NNP and_CC to_TO signals_NNS :_: Now_RB ,_, therefore_RB ,_, we_PRP ,_, the_DT Local_JJ Government_NNP Board_NNP ,_, do_VBP hereby_RB revoke_VB the_DT aforesaid_NN Orders_NNP ,_, except_IN in_IN so_RB far_RB as_IN they_PRP may_MD apply_VB to_TO any_DT proceedings_NNS now_RB pending_VBG ,_, and_CC we_PRP do_VBP ,_, by_IN this_DT our_PRP$ Order_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN exercise_NN of_IN the_DT powers_NNS conferred_VBD on_IN us_PRP by_IN ``_`` The_DT Public_NNP Health_NNP Act_NNP ,_, 1875_CD ,_, ''_'' ``_`` The_DT Public_NNP Health_NNP (_( London_NNP )_) Act_NNP ,_, 1891_CD ,_, ''_'' and_CC ``_`` The_DT Public_NNP Health_NNP Act_NNP ,_, 1895_CD ,_, ''_'' and_CC every_DT other_JJ power_NN enabling_VBG us_PRP in_IN that_DT behalf_NN ,_, make_VBP the_DT following_JJ Regulations_NNPS ,_, and_CC declare_VBP that_IN they_PRP shall_MD be_VB enforced_VBN and_CC executed_VBN by_IN the_DT authorities_NNS and_CC officers_NNS hereinafter_RBR mentioned_VBN :_: -_: PART_NN I_PRP ._.

1.-In_JJ this_DT Order-_JJ The_DT term_NN ``_`` ship_JJ ``_`` includes_VBZ vessel_NN or_CC boat_NN ._.

2.-_JJ (_( 1_CD )_) The_DT Officer_NNP of_IN Customs_NNP who_WP ,_, on_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN any_DT ship_NN from_IN foreign_JJ ,_, shall_MD visit_VB the_DT ship_NN shall_MD ascertain_VB ,_, so_RB far_RB as_IN possi-_JJ ble_NN ,_, whether_IN such_JJ ship_NN is_VBZ infected_VBN ,_, and_CC if_IN he_PRP have_VBP any_DT reason_NN to_TO suspect_VB that_IN the_DT ship_NN is_VBZ infected_VBN ,_, or_CC has_VBZ come_VBN from_IN any_DT infected_JJ place_NN ,_, shall_MD require_VB the_DT master_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN ,_, or_CC the_DT surgeon_NN ,_, if_IN the_DT ship_NN carries_VBZ a_DT surgeon_NN ,_, to_TO give_VB (_( in_IN writing_VBG under_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN and_CC in_IN the_DT form_NN hereunto_NN appended_VBD ,_, or_CC in_IN a_DT form_NN to_TO the_DT like_JJ effect_NN )_) a_DT true_JJ answer_NN to_TO the_DT following_JJ question_NN :_: -_: Question.-Has_JJ any_DT case_NN or_CC suspected_VBN case_NN of-_JJ Cholera_NNP ,_, Yellow_NNP fever_NN ,_, or_CC Plague_NNP occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT ship_NN ,_, of_IN which_WDT you_PRP are_VBP during_IN the_DT voyage_NN from_IN ,_, or_CC during_IN the_DT stay_NN of_IN the_DT ship_NN in_IN that_DT port_NN or_CC in_IN any_DT other_JJ port_NN in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT voyage_NN ?_.

The_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN Health_NNP shall_MD ,_, as_RB soon_RB as_IN possible_JJ after_IN any_DT such_JJ ship_NN has_VBZ been_VBN certified_VBN to_TO be_VB infected_VBN ,_, examine_VB every_DT person_NN on_IN board_NN the_DT same_JJ ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN any_DT person_NN suffering_VBG from_IN cholera_NN ,_, yellow_JJ fever_NN ,_, or_CC plague_NN ,_, or_CC from_IN any_DT illness_NN which_WDT the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP suspects_VBZ may_MD prove_VB to_TO be_VB cholera_NN ,_, yellow_JJ fever_NN ,_, or_CC plague_NN ,_, shall_MD certify_VB accordingly_RB ._.

13_CD ._.
Every_DT person_NN certified_VBN by_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN Health_NNP to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN cholera_NN ,_, yellow_JJ fever_NN ,_, or_CC plague_NN ,_, shall_MD be_VB removed_VBN if_IN his_PRP$ condition_NN admit_NN of_IN it_PRP ,_, to_TO some_DT hospital_NN or_CC other_JJ suitable_JJ place_NN appointed_VBN for_IN that_DT purpose_NN by_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP authority_NN ;_: and_CC no_DT person_NN so_RB removed_VBD shall_MD leave_VB such_JJ hospital_NN or_CC place_NN until_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN Health_NNP shall_MD have_VB certified_VBN that_IN such_JJ person_NN is_VBZ free_JJ from_IN the_DT said_VBD disease_NN ._.
If_IN any_DT person_NN so_RB certified_VBD to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN cholera_NN ,_, yellow_JJ fever_NN ,_, or_CC plague_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB removed_VBN ,_, the_DT ship_NN shall_MD remain_VB subject_JJ ,_, for_IN the_DT purposes_NNS of_IN this_DT Order_NNP ,_, to_TO the_DT control_NN of_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN Health_NNP ;_: and_CC such_JJ person_NN shall_MD not_RB be_VB removed_VBN from_IN or_CC leave_VB the_DT ship_NN ,_, except_IN with_IN the_DT consent_NN ,_, in_IN writing_NN ,_, of_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN Health_NNP ._.

14_CD ._.
Any_DT person_NN certified_VBN by_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN Health_NNP to_TO be_VB suffering_VBG from_IN any_DT illness_NN which_WDT such_JJ officer_NN suspects_NNS may_MD prove_VB to_TO be_VB cholera_NN ,_, yellow_JJ fever_NN ,_, or_CC plague_NN ,_, may_MD either_RB be_VB detained_VBN on_IN board_NN the_DT ship_NN for_IN any_DT period_NN not_RB exceeding_VBG two_CD days_NNS ,_, or_CC be_VB taken_VBN to_TO some_DT hospital_NN or_CC other_JJ suitable_JJ place_NN appointed_VBN for_IN that_DT purpose_NN by_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP authority_NN ,_, and_CC detained_VBD there_RB ,_, for_IN a_DT like_JJ period_NN ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN it_PRP may_MD be_VB ascertained_VBN whether_IN the_DT illness_NN is_VBZ or_CC is_VBZ not_RB cholera_JJ ,_, yellow_JJ fever_NN ,_, or_CC plague_NN ._.

Section_NN 1.-All_JJ vessels_NNS coming_VBG from_IN ports_NNS infected_VBN with_IN plague_NN or_CC belonging_NN to_TO local_JJ areas_NNS containing_VBG plague-stricken_JJ places_NNS ,_, before_IN being_VBG admitted_VBN to_TO free_VB pratique_NN in_IN the_DT Kingdom_NNP ,_, must_MD undergo_VB a_DT medical_JJ inspection_NN of_IN the_DT persons_NNS on_IN board_NN and_CC disinfection_NN of_IN their_PRP$ soiled_JJ wearing_NN apparel_NN or_CC other_JJ effects_NNS ._.
The_DT bilge-water_NN will_MD be_VB pumped_VBN out_RP after_IN disinfection_NN and_CC good_JJ drinking-water_NN substituted_VBN for_IN the_DT water_NN stored_VBD on_IN board_NN ._.
The_DT following_JJ rules_NNS must_MD also_RB be_VB observed_VBN :_: 1st.-Vessels_NNS provided_VBN with_IN a_DT Medical_JJ Officer_NNP and_CC with_IN a_DT disin-_JJ fecting_NN apparatus_NN will_MD be_VB admitted_VBN to_TO free_JJ pratique_NN ,_, provided_VBD such_JJ Medical_JJ Officer_NNP will_MD declare_VB upon_IN oath_NN :_: (_( a_DT )_) that_IN no_DT wearing_VBG apparel_NN or_CC other_JJ domestic_JJ effects_NNS or_CC luggage_NN were_VBD received_VBN on_IN board_NN without_IN having_VBG been_VBN previously_RB disinfected_VBN ,_, or_CC that_IN the_DT said_VBD articles_NNS were_VBD properly_RB disinfected_VBN on_IN board_NN ;_: (_( b_NN )_) that_IN neither_CC at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN sailing_NN ,_, nor_CC during_IN the_DT voyage_NN ,_, did_VBD any_DT actual_JJ or_CC suspected_JJ cases_NNS of_IN plague_NN occur_NN on_IN board_NN ._.
2nd.-Vessels_JJ having_VBG on_IN board_NN a_DT Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, but_CC not_RB pro-_JJ vided_VBN with_IN a_DT disinfecting_NN apparatus_NN ,_, will_MD be_VB admitted_VBN to_TO free_JJ partique_NN ,_, provided_VBD it_PRP is_VBZ substantiated_VBN by_IN a_DT sworn_JJ declaration_NN of_IN the_DT Medical_JJ Officer_NN :_: (_( a_DT )_) that_IN no_DT wearing_VBG appparel_NN or_CC other_JJ effects_NNS ,_, nor_CC luggage_NN were_VBD shipped_VBN without_IN previous_JJ disinfection_NN ;_: (_( b_NN )_) that_IN neither_CC at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN sailing_NN ,_, nor_CC during_IN the_DT voyage_NN ,_, did_VBD any_DT actual_JJ or_CC suspected_JJ cases_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN occur_NN on_IN board_NN ._.
3rd.-Vessels_NNS which_WDT are_VBP not_RB provided_VBN with_IN a_DT Medical_JJ Officer_NNP ,_, nor_CC with_IN a_DT disinfecting_NN apparatus_NN ,_, but_CC which_WDT were_VBD free_JJ from_IN disease_NN during_IN the_DT voyage_NN ,_, will_MD be_VB admitted_VBN to_TO free_VB pra-_NN tique_NN after_IN having_VBG gone_VBN through_IN the_DT treatment_NN set_VBN forth_NN in_IN the_DT first_JJ paragraph_NN of_IN this_DT section_NN ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN after_IN having_VBG undergone_RB all_DT such_JJ other_JJ precautionary_JJ measures_NNS as_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP authorities_NNS may_MD deem_VB expedient_NN to_TO order_NN ,_, in_IN special_JJ cases_NNS ,_, as_IN to_TO make_VB sure_JJ of_IN the_DT healthy_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT vessel_NN ._.

XI_NN ._.
have_VB elapsed_VBN since_IN the_DT death_NN or_CC complete_JJ recovery_NN of_IN any_DT stricken_JJ person_NN on_IN board_NN ;_: and_CC that_IN the_DT effects_NNS and_CC articles_NNS belonging_VBG to_TO the_DT person_NN so_RB stricken_JJ ,_, the_DT persons_NNS who_WP at-_VBP tended_VBN upon_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT cabins_NNS in_IN which_WDT the_DT sick_JJ per-_JJ sons_NNS were_VBD laid_VBN up_RB ,_, have_VBP been_VBN disinfected_VBN ._.

473_CD La_NNP prophylaxie_FW de_FW la_FW peste_NN ,_, telle_EX qu'il_JJ l'organise_NN ,_, comprend_VBP les_VBZ mesures_NNS sanitaires_VBZ prendre_JJ dans_NNS les_VBZ ports_NNS et_FW aux_JJ frontires_NNS de_IN terre_NN ,_, l'gard_RB des_VBZ voyageurs_NNS ,_, des_NNS marchandises_NNS ,_, et_FW des_NNS bagages_NNS ._.
Les_NNP unes_NNS ont_RB pour_VBP objet_NN la_NN visite_JJ mdicale_NN ,_, l'isolement_NN ,_, et_JJ la_FW ds-_JJ infection_NN des_NNS navires_NNS ,_, des_VBZ passagers_NNS et_FW de_FW l'quipage_NN ;_: les_VBZ autres_NNS ,_, les_NNS prcautions_NNS instituer_VBP quant_JJ aux_NN voyageurs_NNS arrivant_JJ dans_NNS le_VBP pays_NNS par_VBP voie_JJ ferre_NN ,_, aux_JJ voitures_NNS et_VBP wagons_NNS de_FW chemin_FW de_FW fer_NN ._.
La_NNP Convention_NNP n'impose_RB pas_VBZ la_JJ prohibition_NN absolue_NN des_VBZ marchan-_JJ dises_NNS qui_VBP sont_JJ considres_NNS comme_JJ suspects_NNS ._.

4_CD ._.
The_DT Principal_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN Customs_NNP at_IN any_DT place_NN at_IN which_WDT any_DT landing_NN or_CC transhipment_JJ shall_MD take_VB place_NN of_IN such_JJ prohibited_VBN goods_NNS shall_MD ,_, unless_IN the_DT Governor_NNP shall_MD other-_JJ wise_NN direct_NN ,_, cause_VB the_DT destruction_NN of_IN such_JJ goods_NNS ._.

Les_NNP mdecins_VBZ Sanitaires_NNP devront_JJ s'assurer_NN de_IN la_FW prsence_NN de_FW ses_VBZ auxiliaires_NNS ,_, et_FW s'ils_FW constatent_NN qu'il_NN y_VBZ a_DT des_JJ manquants_NNS parmi_JJ eux_NN ,_, chercher_NN avec_NN soin_NN les_VBZ causes_VBZ de_JJ l'absence_NN ._.

Un_NNP officier_MD Sanitaire_NNP et_VB deux_NN gardes_NNS Sanitaires_NNP montent_NN bord_NN ._.
Ils_NNP doivent_NN accompagner_NN le_JJ navire_NN jusqu_NN '_POS Port-Sad_NNP ;_: ils_NNS ont_IN pour_JJ mission_NN d'empcher_NN les_VBZ communications_NNS et_FW de_FW veiller_FW l'excution_NN des_NNS mesures_VBZ prescrites_NNS pendant_JJ la_JJ traverse_NN du_JJ Canal_NNP ._.
5_CD ._.
Les_NNP voyageurs_NNS pourront_JJ s'embarquer_JJ Port-Sad_NNP en_NN quarantaine_NN ._.
Mais_NNP tout_NN embarquement_NN ou_NN tout_IN transbordement_NN de_IN passager_NN ,_, et_FW de_FW marchandises_FW sont_FW interdits_NNS pendant_VBP le_JJ parcours_NNS du_VBP Canal_NNP de_FW Suez_NNP Port-Sad_NNP ._.
6_CD ._.
Les_NNP navires_VBZ transitant_JJ en_FW quarantaine_NN devront_NN effectuer_NN le_NN parcours_FW de_FW Suez_NNP Port-Sad_NNP sans_NNS garage_NN ._.
En_NNP cas_NN d'chouage_NN ou_FW de_FW garage_NN indispensable_JJ ,_, les_JJ oprations_NNS ncessaires_NNS seront_VBP effectues_NNS par_VBP le_JJ personnel_NNS du_NN bord_NN ,_, en_FW vitant_FW toute_NN communication_NN avec_FW le_JJ personnel_NNS de_IN la_FW Compagnie_NNP du_FW Canal_NNP de_FW Suez_NNP ._.
Les_NNP transports_VBZ de_FW troupes_NNS transitant_VBP en_JJ quarantaine_NN seront_JJ tenus_NN de_IN traverser_FW le_JJ Canal_NNP seulement_NN de_IN jour_NN ._.
S'ils_NNP doivent_NN sjourner_NN de_IN nuit_FW dans_NNS le_VBP Canal_NNP ,_, ils_VBZ prendront_JJ leur_JJ mouillage_NN dans_NNS les_VBZ grands_NNS lacs_RBR ._.
7_CD ._.
Le_NNP stationnement_NN des_NNS navires_NNS transitant_VBP en_JJ quarantaine_NN est_JJS interdit_NN dans_NNS le_VBP port_NN de_IN Port-Sad_NNP ,_, sauf_NN dans_NNS les_VBZ cas_NNS prvus_JJ aux_JJ paragraphes_NNS 5_CD et_RB 8_CD ._.
Les_JJ oprations_NNS de_FW ravitaillement_FW devront_NN tre_NN pratiques_NNS avec_VBP les_NNS moyens_NNS du_VBP bord_NN ._.
Ceux_NNP des_VBZ chargeurs_NNS ,_, ou_IN toute_JJ autre_NN personne_NN ,_, qui_JJ seront_NN monts_NNS bord_NN ,_, seront_NN isols_NNS sur_VBP le_JJ ponton_NN quarantenaire_NN ._.
Leurs_NNP vtements_NNS y_VBP subiront_JJ la_NN dsinfection_NN rglementaire_NN ._.
8_CD ._.
Lorsqu'il_NNP sera_NN indispensable_NN ,_, pour_VBP les_NNS navires_NNS transitant_VBP en_JJ quarantaine_NN ,_, de_FW prendre_FW du_JJ charbon_NN Port-Sad_NNP ,_, ces_VBZ navires_NNS devront_JJ excuter_RB cette_NN opration_NN dans_VBZ un_JJ endroit_JJ offrant_NN les_VBZ garanties_NNS nces-_JJ saires_NNS d'isolement_JJ et_FW de_FW surveillance_NN sanitaire_NN ,_, qui_JJ sera_NN indiqu_NN par_NN le_NN Conseil_NNP Sanitaire_NNP ._.
Pour_NNP les_VBZ navires_NNS bord_NN desquels_NNS une_JJ surveillance_NN efficace_NN de_IN cette_NN opration_NN est_JJS possible_JJ ,_, et_JJ o_NN tout_IN contact_NN avec_NN les_NNS ?_. 484_CD Regulations_NNPS against_IN arrivals_NNS from_IN India_NNP [_NNP APP_NNP ._.
XI_NN ._.

9_CD ._.

1_CD ._.

Dsinfection_NN ._.

Bagages_NNS ._.

Marchandises_NNS ._.
La_NNP dsinfection_NN ne_NN sera_NN applique_NN qu'aux_NN marchandises_NNS et_VBP objets_NNS que_JJ le_JJ Conseil_NNP considrera_NN comme_NN contamins_NNS ,_, ou_JJ ceux_NN dont_JJ l'im-_JJ portation_NN peut_NN tre_NN dfendue_NN ._.

2_CD Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP ,_, Home_NNP Department_NNP ,_, Notification_NNP No_NNP ._.

4_CD ._.
Government_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP ,_, Notification_NNP No_NNP ._.
3118-A._JJ ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 5th_CD June_NNP 1897_CD ._.
Whereas_IN the_DT City_NNP of_IN Bombay_NNP is_VBZ visited_VBN by_IN an_DT attack_NN of_IN a_DT danger-_JJ ous_JJ epidemic_JJ disease_NN ,_, namely_RB ,_, Bubonic_NNP Plague_NNP ,_, and_CC whereas_IN it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ to_TO prevent_VB the_DT spread_NN of_IN such_JJ disease_NN ,_, and_CC whereas_IN the_DT Governor_NNP in_IN Council_NNP thinks_VBZ that_IN the_DT ordinary_JJ provisions_NNS of_IN the_DT law_NN for_IN the_DT time_NN being_VBG in_IN force_NN are_VBP insufficient_JJ for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ pleased_JJ ,_, under_IN the_DT powers_NNS conferred_VBD upon_IN him_PRP by_IN the_DT Governor_NNP General_NNP in_IN Council_NNP under_IN Act_NNP III_NNP of_IN 1897_CD ,_, to_TO make_VB the_DT following_JJ temporary_JJ regulations_NNS to_TO be_VB observed_VBN by_IN the_DT public_NN and_CC by_IN all_DT persons_NNS whom_WP they_PRP may_MD concern_NN :_: -_: 1_CD ._.

2_CD ._.

3_CD ._.
